recipe.name: Pan-Seared Oyster Sauce Rice Bowl
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of (implied) oil in a pan over medium heat. Add diced onion and sauté until translucent. Step 2. Cook rice according to package instructions. Step 3. In a separate pan, add the cooked onion and 1 tablespoon of oyster sauce. Step 4. Stir-fry the mixture until the sauce is sticky and fragrant. Step 5. Serve the stir-fry over a bed of steaming hot rice.

recipe.name: Vegetarian Mexican Lentil Casserole
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C). Step 2. Cook the lentils according to package instructions. Step 3. In a large skillet, sauté the bok choy, broccoli, and cauliflower in a little water until tender. Step 4. In a separate skillet, cook the pasta according to package instructions. Step 5. In a large bowl, combine cooked lentils, pasta, sautéed vegetables, and corn. Step 6. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and top with a little water to prevent drying out.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Veggie Delight
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Rinse and chop the vegetables of your choice (e.g., bell peppers, zucchini, onions).
Step 2. Heat 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil in a pan over medium heat.
Step 3. Add chopped vegetables and sauté until they're tender.
Step 4. Squeeze 1 lime's juice over the vegetables and season with pepper.
Step 5. Reduce heat to low and let it simmer while you prepare a non-dairy alternative to serve with.

recipe.name: Spinach and Nutritional Yeast Fritters
recipe.steps:
Step 1. In a large bowl, combine spinach, nutritional yeast, flour, peanuts, chickpeas, potato, bell pepper, and onion. Mix well.
Step 2. Add a little water to the mixture to form a dough.
Step 3. Divide the dough into small portions and shape into patties.
Step 4. Heat a non-stick pan with a little oil over medium heat. Cook the fritters for 4-5 minutes on each side until golden brown.
Step 5. Serve hot with your favorite dipping sauce.
recipe.note: This recipe uses available ingredients. Lime is missing and needed for a traditional sauce.

recipe.name: American Grilled Salmon Salad
recipe.steps:
Step 1. In a small bowl, whisk together 2 tablespoons of olive oil, 1 tablespoon of lemon juice, and 1 teaspoon of Dijon mustard. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Step 2. Preheat a grill or grill pan to medium-high heat. Season the salmon fillet with salt, pepper, and a pinch of paprika. Grill the salmon for 4-5 minutes per side, or until cooked through.
Step 3. In a large bowl, combine the mixed greens, chickpeas, cucumber, and lettuce.
Step 4. Slice the grilled salmon into thin pieces and add to the bowl with the salad.
Step 5. Drizzle the dressing over the salad and toss to combine. Serve immediately, garnished with additional lemon wedges if desired.
recipe.note: Note: Traditionally, this salad would include mozzarella cheese. For a pescatarian version, omit or substitute with a non-dairy cheese alternative.

recipe.name: Chana Masala
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 2 tbsp of oil in a pan over medium heat. Add cumin and coriander and stir for 1 minute. Step 2. Add the chopped tomatoes and bell pepper, cook for 5 minutes or until they're soft and mushy. Step 3. Add the chickpeas, garam masala, salt, and a pinch of sugar to the pan. Step 4. Stir well and cook for 10 minutes or until the sauce thickens. Step 5. Serve the Chana Masala hot garnished with chopped fresh cilantro.

recipe.name: Spinach and Broccoli Fried Rice
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chopped onion and cook until translucent.Step 2. Add the minced garlic and cook for 1 minute, until fragrant.Step 3. Add the chopped broccoli and cook until it starts to soften.Step 4. Push the vegetables to one side of the wok. Crack in the beaten eggs and scramble them until cooked through.Step 5. Mix the eggs with the vegetables. Add the cooked rice, chopped spinach, and stir-fry everything together for about 2-3 minutes.

recipe.name: Japanese Lettuce and Garlic Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cut the lettuce and bok choy into bite-sized pieces and set aside. Step 2. Slice the chicken into thin strips and season with salt and pepper. Step 3. In a pan, heat some oil over medium heat and cook the chicken until browned. Step 4. Add the garlic and cook for 1 minute. Step 5. Add the bok choy and stir-fry until wilted. Step 6. Serve with steaming hot rice and garnish with lettuce.

recipe.name: Non-Dairy Roasted Carrot and Mushroom Stir-Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cut the carrot and mushroom into bite-sized pieces and set aside. Step 2. Heat 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil in a pan over medium heat. Step 3. Add the sliced carrots and cook for 10 minutes or until they start to soften. Step 4. Add the sliced mushroom and cook for another 5 minutes. Step 5. Serve the roasted carrot and mushroom mixture over a bed of cooked rice.

recipe.name: Roasted Brussels Sprouts and Potato
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C). Toss the diced potatoes and chopped onion with 2 tablespoons of olive oil, salt, and pepper on a baking sheet. Step 2. Roast in the oven for 20 minutes. Step 3. Toss the halved Brussels sprouts with the remaining 1 tablespoon of olive oil, salt, and pepper. Step 4. Add the Brussels sprouts to the baking sheet and continue roasting for an additional 15-20 minutes. Step 5. Serve hot, garnished with chopped fresh parsley if desired.
recipe.note: This recipe is a simple yet flavorful way to enjoy the flavors of roasted vegetables.

recipe.name: Spicy Chicken and Potato Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cut the potatoes and chicken breast into bite-sized pieces. Step 2. Heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a large pan and add the potatoes. Cook until they start to brown. Step 3. Add the chicken breast to the pan and cook until it's browned on both sides. Step 4. Add the coriander and salt to taste. Step 5. Cook for an additional 5 minutes and serve hot.

recipe.name: Scallops with Roasted Cauliflower
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C). Toss cauliflower with 2 tbsp olive oil, salt, and pepper on a baking sheet. Roast for 15-20 minutes, or until tender and lightly browned. Step 2. In a pan over medium-high heat, add 1 tbsp olive oil. Add sliced bell pepper and cook for 3-4 minutes, or until tender. Step 3. Add scallops to the pan, and cook for 2-3 minutes per side, or until cooked through. Step 4. Remove the pan from heat, and stir in lemon juice. Step 5. Serve roasted cauliflower with scallops and bell pepper, garnished with chopped kale. Note: Garlic is missing from the recipe.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Cod with Beef and Bok Choy Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a pan over medium-high heat. Add the ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks. Step 2. Remove the cooked beef from the pan and set aside. Step 3. Add another tablespoon of oil to the pan and add the bok choy. Cook until it starts to soften, about 2-3 minutes. Step 4. Add the green beans to the pan and cook until they start to soften as well, about 2-3 minutes. Step 5. Add the cooked beef back into the pan and stir to combine with the bok choy and green beans. Step 6. Add the cod to the pan and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, until it is cooked through.
recipe.note: Some ingredients are missing, including onion. You can add onion to the pan with the bok choy and green beans for added flavor.

recipe.name: Sopa de Elote y Epazote
recipe.steps: Step 1. Char the corn over an open flame or in a grill until slightly blackened. Peel off the char and set aside. Step 2. In a large pot, melt 1 tablespoon of butter over medium heat. Add the garlic and sauté until fragrant. Step 3. Add the diced tomato, chili powder, and epazote to the pot. Sauté for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Step 4. Add the charred corn, jalapeño, and spinach to the pot. Sauté for an additional 2-3 minutes, until the spinach has wilted. Step 5. Serve the sopa hot, topped with a dollop of butter and any remaining epazote.
recipe.note: None

recipe.name: Sardine and Mushroom Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat. Add minced garlic and cook for 1 minute.
Step 2. Add sliced mushrooms and cook until they release their moisture and start browning.
Step 3. Add sardines and cook for another 2-3 minutes, breaking them up with a spoon as they cook.
Step 4. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Step 5. Serve hot, garnished with chopped fresh herbs if desired.
recipe.note: This recipe uses ingredients from your inventory to create a delicious and quick stir fry. Since you're missing ground beef, milk, and carrot, I've substituted them with sardines and other available ingredients.

recipe.name: Roasted Chicken-Free Pasta
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cook the pasta in boiling water for 8-10 minutes until al dente. Drain and set aside. Step 2. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the pepper and sauté for 2-3 minutes until tender. Step 3. In a separate pan, mix together 1 tablespoon of olive oil and 1 tablespoon of water. Bring to a simmer and cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Step 4. Add the cooked pasta to the skillet with the pepper and toss to combine. Step 5. Serve the pasta hot, topped with the sauce.
recipe.note: Substituted chicken breast with a non-dairy alternative.

recipe.name: Crispy Pork and Broccoli Fritters
recipe.steps:
Step 1. In a large mixing bowl, combine minced pork, chopped broccoli, flour, and salt. Mix well until combined.
Step 2. Gradually add 1/2 cup of water to the mixture and stir until it forms a thick batter.
Step 3. Using a spoon, drop small balls of the batter into hot oil and flatten slightly.
Step 4. Fry the fritters for 5-6 minutes on each side, until they are golden brown and crispy.
Step 5. Remove the fritters from the oil and place them on a paper towel-lined plate to drain excess oil.
Step 6. Serve the fritters hot with your favorite dipping sauce.

recipe.name: Pasta with Lobster and Kale
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Cook pasta al dente according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
Step 2. In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium-high heat. Add lobster and cook until lightly browned, about 3-4 minutes.
Step 3. Add kale to the skillet and cook until wilted, about 2-3 minutes.
Step 4. Combine cooked pasta and lobster mixture. Toss to combine.
Step 5. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
recipe.note: Missing ingredients: carrot, eggs, garlic, tomato. These ingredients can be added to the shopping list to enhance the dish.

recipe.name: Veganizable Broccoli Fritters
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat a non-stick skillet over medium-high heat. In a bowl, whisk together flour and a pinch of salt. Gradually add water to form a thick batter. 
Step 2. In a separate pan, sauté broccoli in vegetable oil until it is tender and slightly caramelized.
Step 3. Combine the broccoli mixture with the batter and mix well. 
Step 4. Using a spoon, drop spoonfuls of the mixture into the skillet, flattening the edges.
Step 5. Cook the fritters for 5-6 minutes on each side, until golden brown and crispy.

recipe.name: Tempeh and Broccoli Stir Fry with Almond Sauce
main_ingredients: 2 cups mixed bok choy and mackerel (optional)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tbsp of oil in a pan and sauté the garlic until fragrant. 
Step 2. Add the broccoli and bok choy to the pan and cook until the broccoli is tender, about 5 minutes.
Step 3. Meanwhile, blend 1 cup of sliced almonds with 2 tbsp of water to make a smooth almond sauce.
Step 4. Add the tempeh to the pan and cook until browned on all sides.
Step 5. Stir in the almond sauce and cook for an additional 2 minutes until heated through. Garnish with peanuts.

recipe.name: Spinach Pasta Primavera
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Cook pasta according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
Step 2. In a pan, heat 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil over medium heat. Add the sliced mushrooms and cook until they release their moisture and start to brown.
Step 3. Add the chopped spinach to the pan with the mushrooms and cook until the spinach is wilted.
Step 4. Combine the cooked pasta, mushroom, and spinach mixture in a large serving dish.
Step 5. Drizzle with the remaining 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil and toss to combine.
Step 6. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

recipe.name: Roasted Mushroom Delight
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
        Step 2. In a bowl, mix together sliced mushrooms, minced garlic, 1 tbsp of vegetable oil, sugar, and pepper.
        Step 3. Spread the mixture evenly on a baking sheet and roast for 15 minutes.
        Step 4. After 15 minutes, drizzle with the remaining 1 tbsp of vegetable oil and continue roasting for another 10-12 minutes or until the mushrooms are tender.
        Step 5. Remove from the oven and let it cool down. You can serve it as a side dish or add it to your favorite non-dairy meals.

recipe.name: Korean-Style Stir-Fried Radish and Spinach
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of butter in a large pan over medium-high heat. Add the sliced Korean radish and cook until golden brown (5-7 minutes). Step 2. Add the sliced celery to the pan and cook for an additional 3-4 minutes, until slightly tender. Step 3. Push the vegetables to one side of the pan. Crack in the eggs and scramble them until cooked through. Step 4. Mix the cooked eggs with the vegetables. Step 5. Add the chopped spinach to the pan and stir-fry until wilted. Season with salt to taste. Step 6. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Ginger Onion Chutney
recipe.steps: Step 1. In a pan, heat the vegetable oil over medium heat. Add the grated ginger and sauté for 1 minute. Step 2. Add the chopped onions and sauté until they turn translucent. Step 3. Add the chickpeas and sauté for 2-3 minutes. Step 4. In a bowl, whisk the beaten eggs and add to the pan. Step 5. Mix everything together and cook until the mixture is well combined and the eggs are cooked through. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Thai Coconut Curry Noodle Soup
recipe.steps:
Step 1. In a blender or food processor, blend together galangal, 2 cloves of garlic (not available, will be excluded), and 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil until you get a smooth paste. Set aside.
Step 2. In a large saucepan, heat 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil over medium heat. Add the blended galangal paste and cook, stirring constantly, for 2 minutes.
Step 3. Add 1 can of coconut milk to the saucepan and stir well to combine with the galangal paste. Bring the mixture to a simmer.
Step 4. Add 1 cup of noodles (not available, will be excluded) to the saucepan and cook, stirring occasionally, until the noodles are tender.
Step 5. Stir in 1/4 cup of chopped thai basil leaves and season with salt to taste. Serve hot.
recipe.note: This recipe is a simplified version as some ingredients were not available in the inventory.

recipe.name: Mussel and Carrot Stir-Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat the diced bacon in a large skillet over medium-high heat until crispy. Remove the cooked bacon from the skillet and set aside. Step 2. Add the grated carrot to the skillet and cook for 5 minutes, or until slightly tender. Step 3. Add the broken cauliflower florets to the skillet and cook for an additional 3 minutes, or until they start to soften. Step 4. Add the diced tofu to the skillet and cook for 2 minutes, or until lightly browned. Step 5. Add the mussels to the skillet, cover with a lid, and cook for 3-5 minutes, or until the mussels open.

recipe.name: Miso Glazed Beef with Japanese Rice
recipe.steps: Step 1. In a large bowl, combine ground beef, miso paste, mirin, and rice vinegar. Mix well with your hands until just combined. Step 2. Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld. Step 3. Heat a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Step 4. Remove the beef mixture from the refrigerator and shape into small patties. Add a small amount of oil to the skillet and cook the beef patties for 3-4 minutes per side, or until cooked through. Step 5. Serve the beef patties on a bed of steamed Japanese rice, garnished with green onions and sesame seeds.
recipe.note: This recipe showcases the rich and savory flavors of miso paste in a traditional Japanese dish. The mirin and rice vinegar add a sweet and tangy note to the dish, while the ground beef provides a hearty and satisfying texture.

recipe.name: American Beef Burgers
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat a grill or grill pan to medium-high heat. Step 2. Divide the ground beef into 4 equal portions and shape each into a ball. Step 3. Flatten each ball slightly into a patty. Step 4. Dust the patties with a pinch of flour and season with salt. Step 5. Grill the patties for 4-5 minutes per side, or until they are cooked to your desired level of doneness. Step 6. Meanwhile, grill the sliced mushrooms for 2-3 minutes per side, or until they are tender. Step 7. Assemble the burgers by spreading a dollop of ketchup or mayonnaise on the bottom bun, followed by a cooked patty, a few slices of grilled mushroom, a handful of lettuce, and finally the top bun.

recipe.name: Carrot Ranch Sliders
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat a pan or griddle over medium heat. Step 2. Slice the hamburger buns in half and toast them for about 2-3 minutes or until lightly browned. Step 3. Shred the carrots and mix with ranch dressing. Step 4. Spread mayonnaise on the bottom half of the bun, followed by a spoonful of the carrot-ranch mixture. Step 5. Top with a lettuce leaf and the top half of the bun.

recipe.name: Gochujang Fried Rice
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tsp of sesame oil in a pan over medium heat. Add 1 tsp of gochugaru and stir for 1 minute. Step 2. Add 2 beaten eggs to the pan and scramble them. Step 3. Add the cooked rice to the pan and stir-fry for 2 minutes. Step 4. Add 1 tsp of sugar and stir-fry for another minute. Step 5. Serve the gochujang fried rice hot, garnished with a sprinkle of gochugaru if desired.

recipe.name: Korean-Style Stir-Fried Noodle
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Cook pasta according to package instructions and set aside.
Step 2. Heat vegetable oil in a large pan over medium heat and sauté the sliced celery until softened.
Step 3. Add the mushroom and stir-fry until it releases its moisture and starts browning.
Step 4. Add gochugaru and stir-fry for another minute to infuse the Korean chili pepper flavor.
Step 5. Combine cooked pasta and stir-fry ingredients, and mix well to coat the pasta with the spicy sauce.
Step 6. Serve hot and garnish with toasted sesame seeds.

recipe.name: Creamy Pasta with Veggies
recipe.steps: Step 1. Chop the celery and carrot into bite-sized pieces. Step 2. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the chopped vegetables and cook until tender, about 5 minutes. Step 3. Add the pasta to the skillet and cook for 1-2 minutes, until lightly toasted. Step 4. In a separate saucepan, heat the milk over medium heat until it starts to simmer. Step 5. Add the cooked pasta to the milk and toss to coat. Season with salt to taste. Step 6. Combine the cooked vegetables and pasta in a large bowl and serve hot.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Tofu with Roasted Vegetables
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C). In a bowl, toss together the chopped carrots and potatoes with 1 tablespoon of olive oil, salt, and pepper. Spread them out on a baking sheet and roast for 20-25 minutes, or until tender.

Step 2. While the vegetables are roasting, heat the remaining 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a non-stick skillet over medium-high heat. Add the tofu and cook for 3-4 minutes on each side, or until golden brown.

Step 3. Remove the tofu from the skillet and set aside with the roasted vegetables.

Step 4. Reduce the heat to medium and add the chopped thyme to the skillet. Cook for 1 minute, stirring constantly, until fragrant.

Step 5. Serve the pan-seared tofu with the roasted vegetables, garnished with additional thyme if desired.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Cod with Cauliflower and Bell Pepper
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat a skillet over medium-high heat and add 1 tbsp olive oil. Season the cod fillet with salt and pepper.

Step 2. Add the cod fillet to the skillet and sear for 3-4 minutes per side, until it's cooked through and flakes easily with a fork.

Step 3. In the same skillet, add the remaining 1 tbsp olive oil and sauté the bell pepper slices for 3-4 minutes, until tender and slightly charred.

Step 4. Add the cauliflower florets to the skillet and sauté for an additional 2-3 minutes, until they're tender and lightly browned.

Step 5. Serve the pan-seared cod with the sautéed cauliflower and bell pepper mixture, drizzled with lemon juice.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Scallops with Bacon
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Cut the lamb chop into small pieces and set aside. Heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a pan over medium-high heat. Add the lamb pieces and sear until browned, about 2-3 minutes. Remove from heat and set aside.
Step 2. Add the remaining 1 tablespoon of olive oil to the pan. Add the sliced bacon and cook until crispy, about 4-5 minutes. Remove the bacon from the pan and set aside on a paper towel-lined plate.
Step 3. Add the cod to the pan and sear until cooked through, about 3-4 minutes per side. Remove from heat and set aside.
Step 4. Add the scallops to the pan and sear until cooked through, about 2-3 minutes per side. Remove from heat and set aside.
Step 5. To serve, place a scallop on a plate, top with a piece of cooked bacon, and add a few pieces of the lamb chop on the side. Serve immediately.

recipe.name: Black Bean and Corn Quinoa Bowl
main_ingredients: 1 cup Black Beans, drained and rinsed
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Rinse the quinoa in a fine mesh strainer and drain well. In a medium saucepan, bring 2 cups of water to a boil. Add the quinoa and reduce heat to low. Cover and simmer for 15-20 minutes or until the quinoa is tender and the water has been absorbed.
Step 2. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the black beans and cook for 5 minutes or until heated through.
Step 3. Add the corn kernels to the skillet with the black beans. Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes or until the corn is tender.
Step 4. In a large bowl, combine the cooked quinoa, black bean and corn mixture. Toss to combine.
Step 5. Serve the quinoa bowl hot, garnished with chopped fresh cilantro if desired.

recipe.name: Grilled Shrimp and Asparagus Skewers with Lemon and Herbs
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Thread shrimp and asparagus onto skewers, leaving a small space between each piece. Step 2. In a small bowl, mix together parsley, garlic, lemon juice, and olive oil. Brush the mixture evenly onto both sides of the shrimp and asparagus. Step 3. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Step 4. Grill the skewers for 8-10 minutes, turning occasionally, until the shrimp are pink and the asparagus is tender. Step 5. Serve immediately, garnished with additional parsley if desired.

recipe.name: Grilled Pork and Vegetable Skewers
main_ingredients: chicken breast (1 pound, cut into bite-sized pieces)
bell pepper (1, cut into bite-sized pieces)
pork (1/2 pound, cut into bite-sized pieces)
recipe.steps: Step 1. In a bowl, whisk together 2 tbsp of vegetable oil, 1/4 tsp of star anise, and a pinch of salt. Add the chicken breast and pork pieces and marinate for at least 15 minutes. Step 2. Preheat a grill or grill pan to medium-high heat. Thread the marinated meat and bell pepper pieces onto skewers. Step 3. Grill the skewers for 10-12 minutes, flipping occasionally, until the meat is cooked through and the vegetables are tender. Step 4. Serve hot with additional star anise on the side, if desired.

recipe.name: Lentil Curry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat oil in a pan and sauté the cumin seeds until fragrant.
Step 2. Add the chopped onion and cook until the onion is translucent.
Step 3. Add the chopped tomato and cook until it's soft and mushy.
Step 4. Add the red lentils, cinnamon powder, and 4 cups of water. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat and let it simmer for 20 minutes.
Step 5. Season with salt to taste and serve with rice or roti.
recipe.note: Serve hot with basmati rice or Indian flatbread.

recipe.name: Ginger Spinach Fried Rice
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Step 2. Add the diced potato and cook until tender, about 5 minutes. Step 3. Add the grated ginger and cook for an additional 1 minute. Step 4. Add the cooked rice, sugar, and lime juice to the skillet, stirring to combine. Step 5. Add the fresh spinach to the skillet and cook until wilted. Step 6. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Italian Chicken Fettuccine
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook the pasta according to package instructions until al dente.
Step 2. While the pasta is cooking, heat the vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chicken breast and cook until browned and cooked through.
Step 3. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside. Add the oregano to the skillet and cook for 1 minute, until fragrant.
Step 4. Add the cooked pasta to the skillet with the oregano and toss to combine. Add the cooked chicken back into the skillet and stir to combine.
Step 5. Serve hot, garnished with additional oregano if desired.

recipe.name: Black Bean and Epazote Salsa Tacos
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat a pan over medium heat and toast the pine nuts until golden brown, about 5 minutes. Set aside. Step 2. In a separate pan, sauté the diced pepper and chopped epazote until fragrant, about 3 minutes. Step 3. In a large bowl, combine cooked black beans, toasted pine nuts, sautéed pepper and epazote mixture, and salsa. Step 4. Season with salt to taste. Step 5. Warm tortillas according to your preference and assemble the tacos. Serve immediately.

recipe.name: Spicy Thai-Style Stir-Fried Pork
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cut the pork into thin slices and season with salt. Set aside. Step 2. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the garlic and shallots and stir-fry until fragrant, about 1 minute. Step 3. Add the pork to the wok and stir-fry until browned, about 3-4 minutes. Step 4. Add your favorite Thai red curry paste and stir-fry for another minute. Step 5. Season with fish sauce and palm sugar (if using) to taste. Step 6. Garnish with chopped cilantro and serve immediately.

recipe.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook the pasta according to the package instructions until al dente. Reserve 1 cup of pasta water before draining the spaghetti.
Step 2. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the ground beef and cook, breaking it up with a spoon, until browned, about 5 minutes.
Step 3. Add the sliced bell pepper and diced carrot to the skillet with the ground beef. Cook, stirring occasionally, until the vegetables are tender, about 5 minutes.
Step 4. Add the reserved pasta water to the skillet and stir to combine. Bring the mixture to a simmer and cook for 2-3 minutes.
Step 5. Serve the ground beef and vegetable sauce over the cooked spaghetti.

recipe.name: Sardine and Shrimp Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat a pan with a little water and add the broccoli. Cook until tender. Step 2. In a separate pan, heat some water and add the sardines. Flake them apart. Step 3. Add the shrimp to the pan with the sardines and cook until pink. Step 4. Combine the cooked broccoli and sardine mixture. Step 5. Sprinkle almonds on top and serve.
recipe.note: This recipe utilizes the available ingredients. Unfortunately, pasta, lettuce, and olive oil were not found in the inventory.

recipe.name: Roasted Broccoli and Garlic
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C). Place the broccoli florets on a baking sheet, drizzle with vegetable oil, and sprinkle with minced garlic. Step 2. Roast the broccoli in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until tender. Step 3. While the broccoli is roasting, melt the butter in a saucepan over medium heat. Step 4. Once the broccoli is done, remove it from the oven and toss it with the melted butter. Step 5. Serve the roasted broccoli hot, garnished with chopped fresh parsley if desired.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Tilapia with Roasted Brussels Sprouts
main_ingredients: tilapia (2 fillets), brussels sprouts (1 bunch), peanuts (1/4 cup)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C). Cut the Brussels sprouts in half and toss with 2 tbsp oil, salt, and pepper. Spread on a baking sheet and roast for 20 minutes. Step 2. Meanwhile, season the tilapia fillets with salt and pepper. Heat 1 tbsp oil in a non-stick pan over medium-high heat. Add the tilapia and cook for 4-5 minutes per side, or until cooked through. Step 3. In the same pan, add the peanuts and cook for 1-2 minutes, or until fragrant. Step 4. Serve the tilapia on top of the roasted Brussels sprouts, with peanuts on the side. Step 5. Boil the potatoes in salted water until tender. Serve as a side dish.

recipe.name: American Tofu Quinoa Bowl
main_ingredients: 1/2 cup firm tofu (cut into small cubes)
2 slices whole wheat bread (cut into small cubes)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). Toss tofu with 1 tsp olive oil and roast for 15-20 minutes or until golden brown. Step 2. Cook quinoa according to package instructions. Step 3. In a pan, heat remaining 1 tsp olive oil over medium heat. Add chopped spinach and cook until wilted. Step 4. Toast bread cubes in the oven for 5-7 minutes or until lightly browned. Step 5. To assemble, divide cooked quinoa between bowls, top with roasted tofu, wilted spinach, and toasted bread cubes.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Pork and Spinach Gnocchi
recipe.steps:
Step 1. In a large mixing bowl, combine flour and a pinch of salt. Gradually add water to form a dough, kneading for 5 minutes until smooth. Rest for 10 minutes.
Step 2. Divide the dough into 4 equal parts and roll each part into a long rope. Cut into 1-inch pieces to form gnocchi.
Step 3. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil and cook the gnocchi for 3-5 minutes or until they float to the surface.
Step 4. In a large skillet, heat 2 tablespoons of oil over medium heat. Add garlic and cook for 1 minute until fragrant.
Step 5. Add the pan-seared pork and cooked spinach to the skillet. Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes until the spinach is wilted. Serve with the pan-seared gnocchi.

recipe.name: Japanese Shiso Leaves Salad with Pork
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Slice the pork into thin strips and marinate in a mixture of soy sauce and vegetable oil for 10 minutes.
                 Step 2. Slice the shiso leaves into thin strips and set aside.
                 Step 3. In a pan, heat a small amount of vegetable oil and sear the marinated pork until cooked through.
                 Step 4. In a separate pan, heat a small amount of vegetable oil and add the shiso leaves.
                 Step 5. Assemble the salad by combining the cooked pork, shiso leaves, lettuce, and shichimi togarashi.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Chicken with Honey Garlic Sauce
recipe.steps:
Step 1. In a small bowl, whisk together butter, garlic, and five-spice powder until well combined. Set aside. 
                Step 2. Season the chicken breast with salt and pepper. 
                Step 3. Heat a non-stick skillet over medium-high heat. 
                Step 4. Add the chicken to the skillet and cook for 5-6 minutes on each side, or until cooked through. 
                Step 5. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside. 
                Step 6. In the same skillet, add the garlic-butter mixture and cook for 1 minute, or until fragrant. 
                Step 7. Serve the chicken with the garlic-butter sauce spooned over the top.

recipe.name: Vegan Quinoa Bok Choy Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cut the tempeh into small cubes and set aside. Step 2. Heat a pan over medium heat and add the cubed tempeh. Cook for 3-4 minutes until golden brown. Step 3. In the same pan, add bok choy and cook until wilted. Step 4. In a small bowl, mix oats and nutritional yeast to create a crunchy topping. Step 5. Combine the cooked tempeh, bok choy, and crunchy topping in a bowl and serve.

recipe.name: Thai Basil Stir Fry
main_ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables (such as bell peppers, carrots, and onions)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a wok over medium heat. Add the mixed vegetables and cook until tender. Step 2. Add the lemongrass and stir-fry for 1 minute. Step 3. Push the vegetables aside and crack in the eggs. Scramble the eggs and mix with the vegetables. Step 4. Add the Thai basil leaves and stir-fry until wilted. Step 5. Season with palm sugar to taste.

recipe.name: Black Bean and Vegetable Stew
main_ingredients: 1 cup kidney beans, drained and rinsed
1 cup black beans, drained and rinsed
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat oil in a large pan over medium heat. Add chopped cabbage, diced eggplant, and diced bell pepper. Cook until the vegetables are tender, stirring occasionally.
Step 2. Add the broken cauliflower florets to the pan and cook for 2-3 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Step 3. In a separate pan, heat a little oil over medium heat. Add the kidney beans and black beans. Stir for 2-3 minutes.
Step 4. Add the bean mixture to the main pan with the vegetables. Stir to combine.
Step 5. Season with salt, pepper, and any other desired spices. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Salmon with Bacon Lentil Crust and Broccoli Slaw
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Step 2. In a food processor, pulse the bacon until it resembles breadcrumbs. Step 3. In a bowl, mix the lentils, flour, and processed bacon. Step 4. Season the salmon fillets with salt and pepper. Coat each fillet with the bacon-lentil mixture, pressing gently to adhere. Step 5. Place the coated salmon on the prepared baking sheet and bake for 12 minutes. Step 6. Meanwhile, pulse the broccoli in a food processor until it resembles slaw. In a bowl, mix the slaw with spinach. Step 7. Serve the pan-seared salmon with the broccoli slaw.

recipe.name: Veggie and Ground Beef Fajitas
recipe.steps: Optional: Serve with sour cream, shredded cheese, and salsa.
recipe.note: Cooking time does not include prep time.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Salmon with Roasted Vegetables
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Step 2. Season salmon fillets with salt and cook in olive oil in a skillet over medium heat for 3-4 minutes per side. Step 3. Toss kale with olive oil, salt, and peanuts. Spread on a baking sheet and roast in the oven for 12-15 minutes. Step 4. Serve roasted kale alongside pan-seared salmon.

recipe.name: Garlic Mushroom Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a pan over medium-high heat. Step 2. Add the ground beef and cook until browned. Step 3. Add the sliced bell pepper and cook until tender. Step 4. Add the chopped garlic and sliced mushrooms, cook for 5 minutes. Step 5. Serve the stir-fry hot, garnished with green onions if desired.
recipe.note: This recipe highlights the aromatic flavor of garlic and the earthy taste of mushrooms.

recipe.name: Lobster and Shrimp Stir-Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add the lobster and cook for 2-3 minutes, until pink and cooked through. Remove the lobster from the skillet and set aside.
Step 2. Add another tablespoon of oil to the skillet and add the shrimp. Cook for 2-3 minutes per side, until pink and cooked through. Remove the shrimp from the skillet and set aside with the lobster.
Step 3. Add the remaining ingredients to the skillet, including the black beans, lettuce, and cabbage. Cook for 3-5 minutes, until the vegetables are tender.
Step 4. Return the lobster and shrimp to the skillet and stir to combine with the vegetables.
Step 5. Serve the stir-fry hot, garnished with green onions and sesame seeds if desired.

recipe.name: Lemon and Herb Fritters
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
Step 2. In a large bowl, whisk together the flour and a pinch of salt.
Step 3. In a separate bowl, mix together the softened butter and olive oil.
Step 4. Add the chopped celery and lemon zest to the butter mixture and stir until well combined.
Step 5. Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and stir until a smooth dough forms.
Step 6. Drop the dough by tablespoonfuls onto the prepared baking sheet, leaving about 2 inches of space between each fritter.
Step 7. Drizzle the tops with lemon juice and bake for 15-20 minutes, or until golden brown.

recipe.name: Spinach and Black Bean Wrap
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat a pan over medium heat and sauté the asparagus and green beans until tender. Set aside.
Step 2. Add the oats to the pan and toast until lightly browned.
Step 3. In a separate bowl, mash the black beans using a fork.
Step 4. Add the mashed black beans to the oats and stir to combine.
Step 5. Add the cooked asparagus and green beans to the oat mixture and stir to combine.
Step 6. Add the chopped spinach to the pan and stir until wilted.
Step 7. Wrap the spinach mixture in a bread slice to serve.

recipe.name: Crispy Celery Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Rinse the celery and cut it into 1-inch pieces.
Step 2. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Step 3. Add the celery to the skillet and cook for 3-4 minutes or until tender.
Step 4. Add 1 cup of cooked rice to the skillet and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes.
Step 5. Serve hot and enjoy!

recipe.name: Thai Vegetable Curry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat oil in a large pan over medium-high heat. Add the chopped shallots and sauté until translucent (2-3 minutes). Step 2. Add the sliced bell pepper and carrots, and cook for an additional 4-5 minutes until tender. Step 3. In a separate pan, make the curry paste with a little water, and then add the palm sugar, and stir well. Step 4. Add the curry paste mixture to the vegetables and stir until well combined. Step 5. Serve the curry over steamed rice.

recipe.name: Korean-Style Stir-Fried Brussels Sprouts
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tsp of vegetable oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add the minced garlic and cook for 1 minute until fragrant.
Step 2. Add the sliced bell pepper and cook for 3-4 minutes until tender.
Step 3. Add the brussels sprouts and cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Step 4. In a small bowl, whisk together 1 tsp of soy sauce and 1 tsp of Gochujang. Pour the sauce over the vegetables and stir to combine.
Step 5. Sprinkle the cashews over the top and cook for an additional 1-2 minutes until the cashews are lightly toasted.

recipe.name: Baked Cod with Tempeh Broccoli Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat the oven to 200°C (400°F). Season the cod fillets with salt and pepper. Place the cod on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper and bake for 12-15 minutes or until cooked through.
Step 2. In a large pan, heat 1 tablespoon of oil over medium heat. Add the sliced mushrooms and carrots and cook until tender, about 5 minutes. Add the broccoli florets and cook for another 2-3 minutes.
Step 3. In a small bowl, whisk together 2 tablespoons of soy sauce and 1 tablespoon of rice vinegar. Pour the sauce over the vegetable mixture and stir to combine.
Step 4. About 5 minutes before the vegetables are done, add the tempeh to the pan and stir-fry until lightly browned.
Step 5. Serve the tempeh and broccoli mixture alongside the baked cod. Garnish with green onions and sesame seeds, if desired.

recipe.name: Thai Cilantro Lime Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a pan over medium-high heat. Add sliced onion and cook until translucent. Step 2. Add chopped cilantro and cook for 2 minutes. Step 3. Add 2 tablespoons of sugar and stir to combine. Step 4. Squeeze in lime juice and stir-fry for an additional 2 minutes. Step 5. Season with salt to taste. Step 6. Serve hot and garnish with additional cilantro if desired.

recipe.name: Tofu Lamb Fajitas
main_ingredients: 1 block of firm tofu (cut into thin strips)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the lamb chops and cook until browned, about 3-4 minutes per side. Remove from the skillet and set aside. Step 2. In the same skillet, add the remaining 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil. Add the sliced mushrooms and cook until they release their liquid and start to brown, about 3-4 minutes. Step 3. Add the sliced tofu to the skillet and cook until golden brown, about 3-4 minutes per side. Step 4. Add the cooked lamb chops back into the skillet and stir to combine with the tofu and mushrooms. Step 5. Serve the Tofu Lamb mixture over a bed of chopped lettuce and season with salt.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Lamb Chop with Garlic Spinach
recipe.steps: Step 1. Season the lamb chop with salt and pepper and heat a skillet over medium-high heat. Sear the lamb chop for 3-4 minutes on each side, or until it reaches your desired level of doneness. Step 2. Remove the lamb chop from the skillet and set it aside to rest. Step 3. Add 2 cloves of minced garlic to the skillet and sauté for 1 minute until fragrant. Step 4. Add the remaining 1 clove of minced garlic and a handful of chopped spinach to the skillet and wilt the spinach. Step 5. Slice the rested lamb chop and serve with the garlic spinach.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Squid with Bok Choy
recipe.steps: Step 1. Rinse the squid rings under cold water and pat dry with paper towels. Set aside. Step 2. Cut the bok choy into bite-sized pieces and rinse with cold water. Drain well. Step 3. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the squid rings and sear for 2-3 minutes per side, until cooked through. Step 4. Remove the squid from the skillet and set aside. Step 5. Add the bok choy to the skillet and cook for 3-4 minutes, until wilted. Step 6. Return the squid to the skillet and stir in soy sauce and lemon juice. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve immediately.

recipe.name: American-Style Broccoli Fritters
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C). Step 2. In a large bowl, mix together broccoli, flour, and eggs. Step 3. Add a pinch of salt and pepper for seasoning. Step 4. Form the mixture into patties and place on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Step 5. Bake in the oven for 15-20 minutes or until golden brown.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Tuna with Spinach and Green Beans
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Season tuna fillets with salt and pepper. Step 2. Grill tuna for 3-4 minutes per side or until cooked to your liking. Step 3. In a pan, heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil over medium heat. Add sliced onion and cook until translucent, about 5 minutes. Step 4. Add green beans to the pan and cook until tender, about 5 minutes. Step 5. Add chopped spinach to the pan and cook until wilted. Step 6. Serve tuna with the green bean and spinach mixture.
recipe.note: For a paleo diet, be sure to check the ingredients of any store-bought items, such as olive oil.

recipe.name: Spinach and Almond Stuffed Eggplant
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C). Cut the eggplants in half lengthwise.
                Step 2. Scoop out the eggplant flesh, leaving a shell of about 1/2 inch thickness.
                Step 3. In a bowl, mix together the spinach, almonds, and a squeeze of lemon juice.
                Step 4. Stuff the eggplant shells with the spinach mixture and place them on a baking sheet.
                Step 5. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until the eggplant is tender.

recipe.name: Roasted Vegetable Medley
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C). Step 2. In a large bowl, toss the sliced bell peppers and cubed potatoes with 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil, salt, and pepper until they are evenly coated. Step 3. Spread the vegetables on a baking sheet in a single layer and roast in the preheated oven for 20 minutes. Step 4. While the vegetables are roasting, heat the remaining 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil in a pan over medium heat. Add the chopped peanuts and cook, stirring frequently, until they are lightly toasted and fragrant. Step 5. Once the vegetables are done roasting, remove them from the oven and toss them with the toasted peanuts.

recipe.name: Pasta alla Siciliana
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook the pasta according to the package instructions until al dente. Reserve 1 cup of pasta water before draining the spaghetti.

Step 2. Heat 2 tbsp of olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the sliced mushrooms and cook until they release their moisture and start to brown, about 5 minutes.

Step 3. Add the diced tomatoes and chopped sun-dried tomatoes to the skillet. Cook for an additional 3-4 minutes, stirring occasionally.

Step 4. Stir in the shredded mozzarella and cook until melted and well combined. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

Step 5. Add the cooked pasta to the skillet, tossing to combine with the tomato and mushroom sauce. If the sauce seems too thick, add a bit of the reserved pasta water.

Step 6. Serve immediately, garnished with additional basil if desired.

recipe.name: Creamy Mushroom Pasta
recipe.steps: Step 1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil and cook pasta according to package instructions until al dente. Reserve 1 cup of pasta water before draining. Step 2. In a large skillet, heat 1 tablespoon of oil over medium heat and sauté the chicken breast until cooked through, about 5-6 minutes. Step 3. Add sliced mushrooms to the skillet and cook until they release their moisture and start to brown, about 3-4 minutes. Step 4. In a small bowl, whisk together milk and 1 tablespoon of butter until smooth. Add the milk mixture to the skillet and stir to combine. Step 5. Add cooked pasta to the skillet and toss everything together, ensuring the pasta is well coated with the creamy sauce. If needed, add some reserved pasta water to achieve the desired consistency.

recipe.name: Grilled Salmon with Roasted Corn and Almonds
main_ingredients: Corn on the Cob (4, husked and silked)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Season salmon fillets with salt and pepper. Grill for 4-5 minutes per side, or until cooked through.
Step 2. In a large bowl, whisk together 2 tbsp olive oil, 1 tsp garlic powder, and 1 tsp paprika. Add sliced corn and toss to coat.
Step 3. Spread corn on a baking sheet and roast in a 400°F oven for 15-20 minutes, or until lightly charred.
Step 4. In a small skillet, toast sliced almonds over medium heat, stirring frequently, until fragrant and lightly browned.
Step 5. In a large skillet, sauté sliced onion and minced garlic over medium heat until softened. Serve alongside grilled salmon and roasted corn.

recipe.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
recipe.steps: Step 1. Chop the onion and cook it in a large pan with a bit of oil until softened. Step 2. Add the ground beef and pork, cook until browned, breaking it up with a spoon as it cooks. Step 3. Add the diced tomato, salt, and pepper, stir well. Step 4. Cook the spaghetti in a large pot of boiling, salted water until al dente, then reserve 1 cup of pasta water and drain. Step 5. Add the cooked spaghetti to the bolognese sauce, tossing to combine, and serve with grated Parmesan cheese.

recipe.name: Grilled Crab and Sweet Potato Delight
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the grill to medium-high heat. Toss the sweet potato wedges with olive oil, thyme, salt, and pepper in a bowl. Step 2. Place the sweet potatoes on the grill and cook for 10 minutes, flipping occasionally, until tender and slightly charred. Step 3. Meanwhile, prepare the crab by mixing the lumps with lemon juice, salt, and pepper in a separate bowl. Step 4. Add the crab mixture to the grill and cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally, until lightly cooked. Step 5. Serve the grilled sweet potatoes and crab together, garnished with parsley.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Squid with Sardine-Celery Relish and Grilled Chicken Thigh
main_ingredients: Sardines (2 cans, drained and chopped, 120g each)
Squid (4 tentacles, 120g each), cleaned and cut into bite-sized pieces
Chicken Thigh (4 pieces, 120g each), patted dry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). Season the chicken thighs with salt and pepper. Step 2. Heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil in an oven-safe skillet over medium-high heat. Sear the chicken thighs for 2-3 minutes on each side, then transfer the skillet to the oven and cook for 12-15 minutes, or until cooked through. Step 3. In a separate pan, heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil over medium heat. Add the chopped celery and sauté for 5 minutes, or until tender. Step 4. Add the chopped sardines to the pan with the celery and stir to combine. Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, breaking up the sardines with a spoon as they cook. Step 5. In a large skillet, heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil over medium-high heat. Add the squid pieces and cook for 2-3 minutes on each side, or until tender and slightly charred. Serve the squid with the sardine-celery relish and grilled chicken thighs.

recipe.name: Tempeh Pasta Stir Fry
main_ingredients: tempeh (1 block, cut into bite-sized pieces)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cook pasta according to package directions and set aside. Step 2. Heat a non-stick pan over medium-high heat and add tempeh. Cook for 3-4 minutes per side, until golden brown. Step 3. Add sliced zucchini to the pan and cook for an additional 3-4 minutes, until tender. Step 4. In a small bowl, whisk together nutritional yeast and a pinch of salt. Add to the pan and stir to combine. Step 5. Combine cooked pasta and tempeh mixture in a large serving bowl and toss to combine.
recipe.note: This recipe uses tempeh and pasta, which are both available in your inventory. Eggs are missing, so they have not been included in the recipe.

recipe.name: Vegetarian Zucchini and Black Bean Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add onion and cook until softened, 3-4 minutes.
Step 2. Add bell pepper and cook until tender, 3-4 minutes.
Step 3. Add zucchini and cook until tender, 3-4 minutes.
Step 4. Stir in black beans and cook for 1-2 minutes.
Step 5. Serve hot, garnished with nutritional yeast (optional). Note: Omit ricotta if strict vegetarian, as it is not entirely plant-based. If kept, use sparingly.

recipe.name: Garlic Edamame Quinoa Bowl
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Rinse quinoa in a fine mesh strainer and drain well. Combine quinoa and 2 cups of water in a medium saucepan. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low and cover. Simmer for 15-20 minutes or until quinoa is tender and the water has been absorbed.

Step 2. While the quinoa cooks, peel and mince the garlic. In a large skillet, heat 1 tablespoon of oil over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and cook for 1-2 minutes or until fragrant.

Step 3. Add the edamame to the skillet with the garlic and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes or until warmed through.

Step 4. Fluff the cooked quinoa with a fork and stir in 1 tablespoon of soy sauce (optional). Divide the quinoa among four bowls.

Step 5. Top each bowl with the garlic edamame mixture, cooked rice, and your choice of herbs (such as green onions or sesame seeds). Serve immediately and enjoy!

recipe.name: Roasted Vegetables
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C). 
                 Step 2. Peel and chop the carrots, potatoes, and bell peppers into bite-sized pieces. 
                 Step 3. Place the chopped vegetables on a baking sheet and drizzle with vegetable oil. 
                 Step 4. Roast the vegetables in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes or until tender. 
                 Step 5. Add broccoli to the baking sheet and continue roasting for another 5-10 minutes or until tender.
recipe.note: Note: This recipe strictly adheres to the gluten-free dietary preference.

recipe.name: Broccoli, Green Beans, and Kidney Bean Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tbsp of oil in a pan over medium heat. Add the pepper and sauté for 2 minutes.
               Step 2. Add the broccoli and sauté for 3-4 minutes or until tender.
               Step 3. Add the green beans and sauté for 3-4 minutes or until tender.
               Step 4. Add the kidney beans and stir well to combine with the other vegetables.
               Step 5. Season with salt to taste and serve hot.

recipe.name: Sausage and Nutritional Yeast Fritters
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C). Step 2. In a food processor, combine peanuts and flour to make a crumb mixture. Step 3. Add nutritional yeast to the crumb mixture and process until well combined. Step 4. In a large bowl, combine sliced sausage, diced onion, and chopped peanuts. Step 5. Add the crumb mixture to the sausage mixture and mix until just combined. Step 6. Divide the mixture into 8 portions and shape each portion into a ball. Step 7. Flatten each ball slightly into a disk shape and place on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Step 8. Bake the fritters in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until golden brown and crispy.

recipe.name: Spinach and Bell Pepper Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tsp of oil in a pan over medium heat. Add the chopped bell pepper and cook for 3-4 minutes until tender.
Step 2. Add the chopped carrot to the pan and cook for another 3-4 minutes until tender.
Step 3. Add the fresh spinach leaves to the pan and cook until wilted.
Step 4. Serve the spinach and bell pepper mixture over a bed of cooked rice.
Step 5. Season with pepper to taste.

recipe.name: Mushroom and Chickpea Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat salt to taste in a pan over medium heat. Add ground beef and cook until browned. Step 2. Add mushroom and cook until softened. Step 3. Add chickpeas and stir to combine. Step 4. Add cucumber and stir to combine. Step 5. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Stir-Fried Bok Choy and Spinach with Ginger and Garlic
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat a tablespoon of oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat. Add minced garlic and grated ginger and stir-fry until fragrant (1 minute).
Step 2. Add chopped bok choy and cook until wilted (2-3 minutes).
Step 3. Add fresh spinach and cook until wilted (1 minute).
Step 4. Dust a small amount of flour on the vegetables and stir-fry for an additional minute.
Step 5. Season with soy sauce to taste and serve.

recipe.name: Japanese-Style Miso Soup
recipe.steps: Step 1. In a large pot, combine dashi and sliced pork. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to a simmer and cook for 5 minutes. Step 2. In a small bowl, whisk together miso paste and 2 cups of the hot dashi broth until smooth. Step 3. Add the miso paste mixture back into the pot and stir to combine. Step 4. Add sliced garlic and pickled ginger to the pot and cook for an additional 2 minutes. Step 5. Season with pepper to taste. Step 6. Serve hot, garnished with additional pickled ginger if desired.

recipe.name: Mushroom and Bok Choy Quinoa Bowl
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 2 tablespoons of water in a pan over medium heat. Add the cashews and cook for 2-3 minutes until lightly toasted. Remove from heat and set aside. Step 2. In the same pan, add another tablespoon of water. Add the sliced mushroom and cook until tender, about 5 minutes. Step 3. In a separate pot, bring 2 cups of water to a boil. Add the quinoa and reduce heat to a simmer. Cook until the quinoa is tender and the water is absorbed. Step 4. In a small bowl, whisk together 2 tablespoons of tahini and 2 tablespoons of water. Add the cooked tofu and mash with a fork until well combined. Step 5. In a large bowl, combine the cooked quinoa, mushroom, and bok choy. Top with the tofu mixture and toasted cashews.

recipe.name: Japanese-Style Teriyaki Veggie Skewers
recipe.steps:
Step 1: Rehydrate the dried seaweed by soaking it in water for about 10 minutes. Drain and chop it into smaller pieces.
Step 2: Preheat your grill or grill pan to medium-high heat.
Step 3: Thread the sliced bell pepper, rehydrated seaweed, and a pinch of pepper onto skewers.
Step 4: In a small bowl, whisk together the lemon juice and wasabi to make the teriyaki sauce.
Step 5: Brush the skewers with the teriyaki sauce and grill for about 5-7 minutes per side, or until the vegetables are tender.

recipe.name: Coconut Tamarind Pork Curry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat oil in a pan over medium heat. Add the sliced bell pepper, potato, and carrot. Cook until the vegetables are tender.
Step 2. Add the diced pork and cook until browned. Remove from the pan and set aside.
Step 3. In the same pan, add the tamarind paste and cook for 1 minute, stirring constantly.
Step 4. Add the coconut milk and stir to combine. Bring the mixture to a simmer.
Step 5. Return the cooked pork and vegetables to the pan and stir to combine. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Mushroom and Potato Stir-Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1: Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a pan over medium-high heat. Add the diced potato and cook for 5 minutes until slightly browned.
Step 2: Add the sliced mushrooms and bell pepper to the pan and cook for an additional 5 minutes.
Step 3: Add the minced garlic and cook for 1 minute until fragrant.
Step 4: Stir in the fish sauce and sugar, and cook for 1 minute until the mixture is well combined.
Step 5: Garnish with chopped basil and serve hot.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Mushrooms with Garlic and Spinach
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Crack the egg into a bowl and mix with 1 tablespoon of water. Set aside.
               Step 2. Heat 1 tablespoon of butter in a pan over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and cook for 1 minute until fragrant.
               Step 3. Add the sliced mushrooms and cook until they're tender and lightly browned, about 5 minutes.
               Step 4. Add the fresh spinach leaves to the pan and cook until wilted. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
               Step 5. Brush the egg wash on the edges of the pan to prevent the spinach mixture from sticking. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Crispy Chicken Thigh Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cut the chicken thigh into bite-sized pieces and season with salt and pepper. Step 2. Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat and add the chicken. Cook until browned and cooked through, about 5-6 minutes. Step 3. Add the green beans and cabbage to the pan and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes. Step 4. Squeeze the lime juice over the vegetables and stir to combine. Step 5. Serve the chicken and vegetables hot, garnished with additional lime wedges if desired.

recipe.name: Pork and Cheese Pasta Bake
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 180°C. Step 2. Cook the pasta according to the package instructions until al dente. Step 3. In a separate pan, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the diced pork and cook until browned. Step 4. In a large bowl, combine the cooked pasta, pork mixture, cheddar cheese, lemon juice, and pepper. Mix well to combine. Step 5. Transfer the pasta mixture to a baking dish and top with additional grated cheese. Bake for 20-25 minutes or until the top is golden brown.

recipe.name: Keto Crispy Salmon with Bacon
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
Step 2. Cut the salmon fillets into 4 equal portions. Season with salt, pepper, and your favorite herbs.
Step 3. In a pan, cook the diced pork belly over medium heat until crispy. Remove from heat and set aside.
Step 4. In a separate pan, cook the bacon slices over medium heat until crispy. Remove from heat and set aside.
Step 5. In a bowl, whisk the eggs and a pinch of salt. Pour the egg mixture onto the prepared baking sheet and spread evenly.
Step 6. Arrange the salmon portions on top of the egg mixture, followed by a sprinkle of crispy pork belly and bacon.
Step 7. Bake in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes or until the salmon is cooked through.

recipe.name: Tonkatsu with Salad
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cut the ground beef into thin slices and season with salt and pepper. Step 2. Dredge each slice of beef in panko, pressing gently to coat evenly. Step 3. Heat a large skillet with about 1/2 inch of oil over medium-high heat. Step 4. Fry the coated beef slices until golden brown and cooked through, about 3-4 minutes per side. Step 5. Meanwhile, mix the chopped celery, spinach, and onion in a bowl for the salad. Step 6. Serve the tonkatsu with the salad and your favorite dipping sauce.

recipe.name: Grilled Chicken and Veggies
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Season chicken thighs with salt, pepper, and your favorite herbs. Step 2. Grill chicken for 5-6 minutes per side, or until cooked through. Step 3. Toss green beans, brussels sprouts, and zucchini with olive oil, salt, and pepper. Step 4. Grill the vegetables for 3-4 minutes per side, or until tender. Step 5. Serve chicken with grilled vegetables.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Mushroom and Broccoli Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1: Slice the mushrooms and broccoli into thin pieces. Step 2: Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a pan over medium heat. Step 3: Add the mushrooms and broccoli to the pan and cook until they are tender, about 5 minutes. Step 4: Push the vegetables to one side of the pan, and crack in the eggs. Scramble the eggs until they are cooked through. Step 5: Mix the eggs with the vegetables, and sprinkle with salt to taste. Step 6: Serve the stir fry on a bed of lettuce.

recipe.name: Beef and Lettuce Salad
recipe.steps: Step 1. Chop the lettuce into bite-sized pieces. Step 2. Slice the pepper into thin strips. Step 3. Heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a pan over medium heat. Step 4. Sauté the pepper in the olive oil for 3-4 minutes or until tender. Step 5. Combine the cooked pepper with the chopped lettuce in a bowl and toss to coat.
recipe.note: Carrot and ground beef are missing in the inventory. Consider adding them to the shopping list.

recipe.name: Lobster and Black Bean Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cut asparagus into 1-inch pieces and set aside. Cut lobster into bite-sized chunks. Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add 2 tablespoons of oil and cook the lobster for 2-3 minutes per side, until pink and cooked through. Step 2. Remove the lobster from the skillet and set aside. In the same skillet, add 1 more tablespoon of oil and cook the black beans for 2-3 minutes, until tender. Step 3. Add the asparagus to the skillet and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, until tender. Step 4. Crack in the eggs and scramble them in the skillet, breaking them up with a spatula as they cook. Step 5. Return the cooked lobster to the skillet and stir to combine with the eggs, black beans, and asparagus. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
recipe.note: This recipe highlights the flavors of lobster, black beans, asparagus, and eggs, creating a delicious and satisfying stir fry.

recipe.name: Vegan Stuffed Zucchini
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C). Step 2. Scoop out the insides of the zucchini halves, leaving a shell of 1/4 inch thickness. Step 3. In a bowl, mix together the chopped almonds, mushroom, and green beans. Step 4. Stuff each zucchini shell with the almond mixture and drizzle with olive oil. Step 5. Place the stuffed zucchini on a baking sheet and bake for 25-30 minutes, or until the zucchini is tender.

recipe.name: Thai Coconut Curry
recipe.steps:
Step 1: Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat. Add bruised lemongrass and sauté for 2 minutes until fragrant.
Step 2: Add thai curry paste and sauté for another 2 minutes until the paste is fragrant.
Step 3: Add cubed potatoes, coconut milk, and fish sauce. Stir well to combine.
Step 4: Bring the mixture to a simmer and cook for 10-12 minutes or until the potatoes are cooked through.
Step 5: Season with lime juice and serve hot.

recipe.name: Vegan Black Bean and Broccoli Rice Bowl
recipe.steps: Step 1. Chop the broccoli into florets and set aside. Step 2. Cook the black beans according to package instructions. Step 3. Heat a tablespoon of oil in a pan over medium heat. Step 4. Add the chopped lettuce and cook until wilted. Step 5. Add the broccoli florets to the pan and cook until tender. Step 6. In a separate pan, heat a tablespoon of oil over medium heat. Step 7. Add the cooked black beans to the pan and stir to combine with the broccoli mixture. Step 8. Serve the black bean and broccoli mixture over cooked white rice, topped with fresh spinach leaves.

recipe.name: Vegan Quinoa Bowl with Roasted Vegetables
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). Step 2. In a large bowl, toss the sweet potato, zucchinis, potatoes, and chickpeas with 1 tablespoon of olive oil, dried basil, and dried oregano. Step 3. Spread the vegetables in a single layer on a baking sheet. Roast in the oven for 25-30 minutes, or until tender and lightly browned. Step 4. In a medium saucepan, bring 2 cups of water to a boil. Add quinoa and reduce heat to low. Cover and simmer for 15-20 minutes, or until the water is absorbed. Step 5. Fluff the cooked quinoa with a fork. Serve the quinoa in a bowl and top with the roasted vegetables.

recipe.name: Grilled Zucchini and Crab Wrap with Citrus Lime Butter
main_ingredients: lime (2 tbsp, freshly squeezed lime juice)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. In a small saucepan, melt butter over medium heat. Remove from heat and stir in sugar. Add freshly squeezed lime juice and set aside.
Step 2. Preheat a grill or grill pan to medium-high heat. Brush both sides of sliced zucchini with a little bit of oil and season with salt and pepper. Grill for 3-4 minutes per side or until tender and slightly charred.
Step 3. In a large bowl, combine flaked crab, chopped spinach, and chopped peanuts. Mix well to combine.
Step 4. Warm large flour tortillas by wrapping them in a damp paper towel and microwaving for 20-30 seconds.
Step 5. Assemble the wraps by spreading a tablespoon of lime butter on each tortilla, then topping with a few slices of grilled zucchini, a spoonful of crab mixture, and a sprinkle of chopped peanuts.

recipe.name: Spicy Korean-Style Bokkeumbap
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Cut the Korean radish into matchsticks and set aside. Chop the napa cabbage and broccoli into bite-sized pieces.
         Step 2. Heat a tablespoon of oil in a pan over medium-high heat. Add the chopped garlic and stir-fry until fragrant.
         Step 3. Add the chopped cabbage and broccoli to the pan, stir-frying for about 3 minutes. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
         Step 4. Add the gochugaru to the pan and stir-fry for another minute.
         Step 5. Add the cooked rice to the pan, breaking up any clumps with a spatula. Stir-fry everything together for about 2 minutes, until the rice is heated through.
         Step 6. Transfer the spicy rice mixture to a serving platter, topping it with the cut radish. Serve immediately.

recipe.name: Thai Coconut Curry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat. Add chopped celery and sauté until softened.
Step 2. Add 1-2 medium potatoes, diced, and cook until they start to soften.
Step 3. Pour in coconut milk and add your choice of protein (if any). Stir well.
Step 4. Add broccoli florets and stir-fry until the vegetables are tender.
Step 5. Season with sugar, salt, and pepper to taste. Serve hot.
recipe.note: This recipe is an adaptation of traditional Thai coconut curry to accommodate available ingredients. You can adjust the amount of coconut milk and add your choice of protein for a more authentic taste.

recipe.name: Vegan Asparagus Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. In a large skillet or wok, heat 1-2 tablespoons of oil over medium-high heat. Add the sliced bell pepper and cook for 3-4 minutes, until tender. Step 2. Add the minced garlic and cook for an additional 1 minute. Step 3. Add the trimmed asparagus and cook for 4-5 minutes, until tender. Step 4. Stir in some chopped lettuce and cook for an additional 1-2 minutes. Step 5. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Step 6. Garnish with additional chopped lettuce, if desired.

recipe.name: Korean Paleo-Style Grilled Squid with Stir-Fried Greens
recipe.steps: Step 1: Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Rinse squid and pat dry with paper towels. Season with salt and pepper. Grill for 2-3 minutes per side, or until slightly charred. Step 2: In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium-high heat. Add bok choy and spinach, and stir-fry until slightly wilted. Step 3: Slice the grilled squid into bite-sized pieces and add to the skillet with stir-fried greens. Step 4: Toss everything together, ensuring the squid is well coated with the flavorful greens. Step 5: Serve immediately and enjoy!

recipe.name: Spicy Gochujang Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tbsp of oil in a pan and sauté the minced garlic until fragrant. Step 2. Add the gochugaru and sauté for 1 minute, until fragrant. Step 3. Add the gochujang and 1 tbsp of soy sauce (assuming soy sauce is in the user's inventory), and stir well. Step 4. Add the stir-fry ingredients of your choice (e.g., vegetables, meat) and toss everything together. Step 5. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Step 6. Serve hot, garnished with toasted sesame seeds.

recipe.name: Savory Tomatillo Rice Bowl
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 2 tbsp of oil in a large pan over medium heat. Add minced garlic and sauté for 1 minute.
Step 2. Add the diced tomatillo and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
Step 3. Add cumin, pepper, and mexican oregano. Stir to combine.
Step 4. Add 2 cups of water and bring to a boil.
Step 5. Add rice, stir to combine, and cover the pan with a tight-fitting lid. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 18-20 minutes or until the water is absorbed.

recipe.name: Vegan Kale and Brussels Sprouts Stir-Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chopped onion and cook until translucent, about 3-4 minutes.
Step 2. Add the cubed tofu and cook until golden brown, about 5 minutes.
Step 3. Add the halved Brussels sprouts and cook until tender, about 5 minutes.
Step 4. Add the chopped kale and cook until wilted, about 2-3 minutes.
Step 5. Stir in the sliced cucumber and chopped almonds. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

recipe.name: Lime and Potato Cakes
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 180°C. In a large bowl, combine grated potato, flour, and lime juice. Mix well to combine.Step 2. Heat 1 tbsp of olive oil in a large non-stick pan over medium heat. Using a 1/4 cup measuring cup, scoop the potato mixture into the pan.Step 3. Flatten the mixture slightly and cook for 4-5 minutes or until the edges start to brown.Step 4. Flip the cakes over and cook for another 4-5 minutes or until golden brown.Step 5. Transfer the cakes to a baking sheet lined with parchment paper and bake for 10-12 minutes or until crispy and golden brown.

recipe.name: Roasted Cauliflower and Quinoa Bowl
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C). Toss the cauliflower with olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Roast in the oven for 20-25 minutes, or until tender.
Step 2. Cook the quinoa according to package instructions. Set aside.
Step 3. Sauté the onion in a pan with olive oil until softened.
Step 4. In a large bowl, combine the cooked quinoa, roasted cauliflower, and sautéed onion. Stir in the ricotta and cheddar cheese. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Step 5. Serve hot, garnished with chopped fresh parsley if desired.
recipe.note: null

recipe.name: Vegetarian Pasta Primavera
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain and set aside. Step 2. Chop cabbage into small pieces and sauté in a pan with a bit of oil until tender. Step 3. In the same pan, add chickpeas and cook for 2-3 minutes. Step 4. Stir in cooked pasta, chopped almonds, and season with salt and pepper to taste. Step 5. Serve hot and enjoy!

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Pork Chops with Roasted Vegetables
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Cut potatoes, onion, and bell peppers into 1-inch pieces and toss with 1 tsp olive oil, salt, and pepper. Spread on the prepared baking sheet and roast for 15 minutes. Step 2. Meanwhile, season the pork chops with salt, pepper, and your favorite spices. Heat 1 tsp olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Sear the pork chops for 2-3 minutes per side or until cooked through. Step 3. Remove the pork chops from the skillet and let them rest. Step 4. In the same skillet, add the roasted vegetables and toss to combine with any remaining pork juices. Step 5. Serve the pork chops with the roasted vegetables and enjoy!

recipe.name: Lentil and Broccoli Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat oil in a pan over medium heat. Step 2. Add lentils and cook until they start to soften (about 3 minutes). Step 3. Add broccoli and cauliflower. Stir-fry until they're tender (about 5 minutes). Step 4. Add peanuts and stir for another minute. Step 5. Season with salt and serve hot.

recipe.name: Crab and Pepper Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat a pan with some oil over medium heat. Add sliced carrot and pepper and sauté until they soften.
Step 2. Add flaked crab and cook for 2-3 minutes, until lightly browned.
Step 3. Add cooked lentils to the pan and stir well to combine.
Step 4. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Step 5. Serve hot and enjoy!
recipe.note: Missing onion and rice

recipe.name: Grilled Eggplant and Broccoli
main_ingredients: eggplant (2 medium), onion (1 medium), broccoli (1 head), mushroom (1 cup)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Slice the eggplant into 1/2-inch thick rounds and brush both sides with olive oil. Season with salt and pepper. Step 2. Grill the eggplant slices for 3-4 minutes per side, or until tender and lightly charred. Step 3. Meanwhile, trim the broccoli florets and steam them in a steamer basket until tender. Step 4. Grill the beef steak for 5-6 minutes per side, or until cooked to desired level of doneness. Step 5. Slice the grilled beef steak against the grain and serve with the eggplant and broccoli.
recipe.note: Lemon was requested but not available. This recipe uses a simple Italian-style approach to bring out the flavors of the eggplant and broccoli.

recipe.name: Stir-Fried Bok Choy and Edamame with Squid
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cut the squid into bite-sized pieces. Step 2. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the squid and cook until browned, about 2-3 minutes. Step 3. Add the bok choy and edamame to the wok. Cook, stirring occasionally, until the bok choy is tender but still crisp, about 3-4 minutes. Step 4. In a small bowl, whisk together 1 tablespoon of soy sauce and 1 tablespoon of rice vinegar. Pour the sauce over the bok choy and edamame mixture. Step 5. Sprinkle peanuts over the top and serve hot.
recipe.note: This recipe highlights the flavors of bok choy and edamame, while also incorporating the squid for added protein.

recipe.name: Pan-Fried Pork Belly with Roasted Asparagus and Celery
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
Step 2. Toss asparagus and celery with olive oil, salt, and pepper on the prepared baking sheet. Roast for 15-20 minutes or until tender.
Step 3. Cut pork belly into 1-inch thick slices. Season with salt and pepper.
Step 4. Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add a couple of tablespoons of oil. Sear pork belly slices until browned on both sides, about 3-4 minutes per side. Transfer pork belly to a plate and set aside.
Step 5. Reduce heat to medium. Add a tablespoon of oil to the same skillet. Add sliced onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes. Add flour and cook for 1-2 minutes, stirring constantly.
recipe.note: This recipe doesn't require milk. However, since it's missing from your inventory, we've adapted the recipe to exclude it.

recipe.name: Greek Stuffed Bell Peppers
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). Cut the tops off the bell peppers and remove seeds and membranes. Place them in a baking dish.

Step 2. In a large skillet, sauté the sliced mushrooms in melted butter until they're tender and lightly browned. Set aside.

Step 3. In a separate pan, boil the diced potatoes until they're tender. Drain and mash.

Step 4. Stuff each bell pepper with a mixture of mashed potatoes, sautéed mushrooms, and crumbled feta cheese.

Step 5. Cover the baking dish with aluminum foil and bake for 20 minutes. Remove the foil and continue baking for an additional 10-15 minutes, until the bell peppers are tender.

recipe.name: Lentil and Chickpea Stew
recipe.steps:
Step 1. In a large pot, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and sauté for 1-2 minutes until fragrant.
Step 2. Add the lentils and chickpeas to the pot, stirring to combine. Cook for 5 minutes.
Step 3. Add 4 cups of water to the pot and bring to a boil.
Step 4. Reduce heat and simmer for 20-25 minutes, or until the lentils are tender.
Step 5. Stir in the chopped corn and season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Smoked Salmon and Bacon Keto Bowl
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Step 2. Bake the bacon slices in the oven for 15-20 minutes or until crispy. Step 3. In a pan, cook the diced cucumber and peanuts (if using) over medium heat until the cucumber is slightly softened. Step 4. In a separate pan, heat the smoked salmon slices over low heat until warmed through. Step 5. To assemble the bowl, place a portion of black beans on the bottom, followed by a smoked salmon slice, a few pieces of crispy bacon, and finally the tuna. Garnish with diced cucumber and peanuts (if used)

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Sardines with Roasted Broccoli and Bell Pepper
recipe.steps:
Step 1: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Cut the broccoli and bell pepper into florets and toss with olive oil, salt, and pepper. Spread on a baking sheet and roast for 15-20 minutes or until tender.
Step 2: Meanwhile, season the sardines with salt and pepper. Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat and add the sardines. Cook for 2-3 minutes on each side or until cooked through.
Step 3: Slice the chicken breast into strips and cook in a separate pan with a little oil until browned and cooked through.
Step 4: Serve the sardines on top of the roasted broccoli and bell pepper, with the chicken breast on the side.
Step 5: Serve with a side of rice.
recipe.note: Missing ingredients: potato, eggs, lemon. You may consider adding them to your shopping list to complete the dish.

recipe.name: Roasted Veggie and Chickpea Delight
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
Step 2. In a large bowl, toss the broccoli and cauliflower florets with 1 tbsp of olive oil, salt, and pepper until they are evenly coated.
Step 3. Spread the vegetables out in a single layer on the prepared baking sheet and roast in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until tender and lightly browned.
Step 4. While the vegetables are roasting, heat the remaining 1 tbsp of olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chopped kale and cook, stirring frequently, until wilted.
Step 5. In the same skillet, add the chickpeas and cook for 2-3 minutes, stirring frequently, until lightly browned.
Step 6. To assemble the dish, place a portion of the roasted vegetables on a plate, top with a spoonful of the wilted kale, and finish with a spoonful of the chickpeas.

recipe.name: Twice-Baked Sweet Potato and Potatoes with Sausage
recipe.steps:
