Step 1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Scrub the sweet potatoes and potatoes clean, dry them with paper towels, and poke some holes in each with a fork.
                Step 2. Bake the sweet potatoes and potatoes for 45-60 minutes or until they can be easily pierced with a fork. Let them cool slightly.
                Step 3. Scoop out the flesh of the sweet potatoes and combine it with the flesh of the potatoes in a bowl.
                Step 4. Add diced lamb chop and sliced sausage to the bowl with the potato mixture.
                Step 5. Season the mixture with salt and mash it lightly to combine.
                Step 6. Stuff the sweet potatoes and potatoes with the mixture and place them on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
                Step 7. Bake for an additional 15-20 minutes or until golden brown.
                Step 8. Serve hot, garnished with chopped fresh herbs (optional)

recipe.name: Korean-Style Doenjang Jjigae
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat doenjang in a pan over medium heat until fragrant.Step 2. Add thinly sliced napa cabbage and stir-fry until wilted.Step 3. Mix in flour to thicken the mixture.Step 4. Add lemon juice and stir well.Step 5. Serve immediately with rice.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Mackerel with Broccoli
recipe.steps: Step 1. Rinse the mackerel fillet and pat dry with paper towels. Step 2. Heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a non-stick pan over medium heat. Step 3. Add the mackerel fillet and cook for 3-4 minutes per side, or until cooked through. Step 4. Meanwhile, toss the broccoli florets with the remaining 1 tablespoon of olive oil, lemon juice, garlic powder, salt, and pepper. Step 5. Add the broccoli to the pan with the mackerel and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, or until tender.

recipe.name: Sesame Chicken and Rice Bowl (Gan-jjajang-bokkeumbap)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cook the rice according to package instructions. Set aside. Step 2. In a pan, heat 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil over medium-high heat. Add the sliced chicken breast and cook until browned, about 5-6 minutes per side. Step 3. Remove the chicken from the pan and set aside. Step 4. In the same pan, add the remaining 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil, then add the sliced ginger and celery. Cook for 2-3 minutes until fragrant. Step 5. Add the cooked chicken back into the pan and stir to combine with the ginger and celery mixture.
recipe.note: This recipe is a simple and flavorful take on traditional Korean cuisine. The sesame seeds add a nice crunch and nutty flavor.

recipe.name: Tonjiru (Japanese Miso Soup)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. In a large pot, combine 2 cups of water and 2 tbsp of flour. Heat it over medium heat, whisking constantly to avoid lumps. Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat and simmer for 2 minutes.
Step 2. Add 2 cups of sliced mushrooms and 2 cups of sliced tomatoes to the pot. Stir well and cook for 3-4 minutes, until the vegetables are tender.
Step 3. Stir in 2 tsp of wasabi and 1 tsp of miso paste (optional). If using miso paste, add it now and stir well.
Step 4. Season the soup with salt and pepper to taste.
Step 5. Serve the Tonjiru hot, garnished with sliced green onions and toasted sesame seeds if desired.
recipe.note: For a more authentic Japanese flavor, use dashi broth and miso paste in place of flour and water.

recipe.name: Pappardelle con Prosciutto e Basilico
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil and cook the pappardelle according to the package instructions. Reserve 1 cup of pasta water before draining.

Step 2. In a large skillet, heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil over medium-high heat. Add the sliced prosciutto and cook until crispy, about 3-4 minutes. Remove from heat and set aside.

Step 3. In the same skillet, add another tablespoon of olive oil and sauté the minced garlic until fragrant, about 1 minute.

Step 4. Add the chopped arugula and basil to the skillet, tossing to combine with the garlic and cooked prosciutto. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

Step 5. Add the cooked pappardelle to the skillet, tossing to combine with the arugula and prosciutto mixture. If the mixture seems dry, add a bit of the reserved pasta water to loosen it up.

recipe.name: Thai-style Grilled Beef with Roasted Broccoli
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Season beef steak with salt, pepper, and a pinch of Thai red chili flakes. Grill for 5-7 minutes per side, or until cooked to desired doneness. Step 2. Toss broccoli with 2 tablespoons of coconut oil, salt, and a pinch of Thai red chili flakes. Spread on a baking sheet and roast in a preheated oven at 400°F (200°C) for 15-20 minutes, or until tender and caramelized. Step 3. In a small saucepan, toast peanuts over medium heat, stirring frequently, until fragrant and lightly browned. Step 4. In a small bowl, whisk together 2 tablespoons of coconut aminos (gluten-free soy sauce), 1 tablespoon of rice vinegar, and 1 tablespoon of honey. Step 5. To serve, slice grilled beef against the grain and serve with roasted broccoli and toasted peanuts. Drizzle with the sauce from Step 4.

recipe.name: Asparagus and Bok Choy Bruschetta
recipe.steps:
Step 1: Preheat the oven to 200°C. Cut the asparagus into 2-inch pieces and place on a baking sheet. Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Roast in the oven for 12-15 minutes, or until tender.
Step 2: Meanwhile, cook the black beans according to package instructions. Set aside.
Step 3: Grill or toast the salmon fillet until cooked through. Slice into thin strips.
Step 4: Chop the bok choy into 2-inch pieces and sauté in a pan with olive oil until wilted.
Step 5: Combine the roasted asparagus, cooked black beans, grilled salmon, and sautéed bok choy in a bowl. Squeeze lime juice over the top and mix well. Serve on toasted bread with a dollop of sour cream (optional).

recipe.name: Garlic Spinach Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat a pan over medium heat.
               Step 2. Chop the garlic and sauté until fragrant.
               Step 3. Add the sliced mushrooms and cook until tender.
               Step 4. Add the chopped spinach and stir until wilted.
               Step 5. Squeeze fresh lime juice and season with salt to taste.

recipe.name: Baked Cod with Kale and Sweet Potato Fries
main_ingredients: Sweet potato (2, peeled and cut into fries)
recipe.steps:
Step 1: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
Step 2: Rinse the cod fillets and pat dry with paper towels.
Step 3: Toss sweet potato fries with 1 tablespoon olive oil, salt, and pepper. Spread on a baking sheet and bake for 20-25 minutes, or until crispy.
Step 4: In a separate bowl, mix chopped kale with 1 tablespoon olive oil, salt, and pepper. Spread on the baking sheet with sweet potato fries and bake for an additional 5-7 minutes.
Step 5: Season cod fillets with salt, pepper, and lemon juice. Place on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper and bake for 12-15 minutes, or until cooked through.
Optional: Crumble tofu into small pieces and sprinkle on top of cod fillets for a crispy topping.

recipe.name: Italian Lentil and Vegetable Stew
recipe.steps:
Step 1. In a large pot, heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil over medium heat.
Step 2. Add the chopped carrots, zucchini, and asparagus. Cook for 10 minutes, until the vegetables are tender.
Step 3. Add the lentils, vegetable broth, and corn. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Step 4. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for 20 minutes, or until the lentils are tender.
Step 5. Serve the stew hot, garnished with fresh herbs if desired.

recipe.name: Roasted Vegetable Tart
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). Roll out the tart crust and place it on a baking sheet. Step 2. In a large bowl, toss the sweet potato and onion with 2 tablespoons olive oil, salt, and pepper until they are evenly coated. Step 3. Spread the sweet potato mixture over the tart crust, leaving a 1-inch border around the edges. Step 4. Sprinkle the shredded cheese over the sweet potato mixture. Step 5. Bake the tart in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown and the cheese is melted and bubbly.

recipe.name: Thai Inspired Almond Lime Chicken-Free Satay
main_ingredients: 2 stalks lemongrass, bruised (no lemongrass, omitted this ingredient, since Salmon was the only fish option - Replaced with alternative ingredient)
1/4 cup coconut oil (no coconut oil in the inventory - Replaced with vegetable oil)
2 tbsp soy sauce (soy sauce - No soy sauce in the inventory - Replaced with salt)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. In a blender or food processor, combine peanuts, almonds, lime juice, garlic, ginger, salt, and vegetable oil. Blend until you get a smooth paste. Step 2. Place the peanut-almond mixture on skewers, leaving a little space in between each piece. Step 3. Brush the skewers with a little bit of vegetable oil. Step 4. Grill the skewers for about 10-12 minutes, flipping them halfway through, until they are golden brown and crispy. Step 5. Serve the satay hot with your favorite dipping sauce.

recipe.name: Grilled Chicken and Vegetables
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat your grill to medium-high heat. Rinse the chicken breast and pat it dry with paper towels. Season with your favorite spices. Step 2. Grill the chicken for 6-8 minutes per side, or until it reaches an internal temperature of 165°F (74°C). Step 3. Grill the bell pepper, onion, and broccoli for 5-7 minutes per side, or until they are tender and slightly charred. Step 4. Let the chicken rest for a few minutes before slicing it. Step 5. Serve the grilled chicken with the vegetables and your favorite sides.

recipe.name: Pork Belly and Potato Almandine
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C). Step 2. Season the sliced pork belly with salt and pepper. Step 3. In a large oven-safe skillet, heat 2 tablespoons of oil over medium-high heat. Sear the pork belly until browned on both sides, about 5 minutes per side. Transfer the skillet to the preheated oven and cook for 20-25 minutes, or until the pork belly is crispy on the outside and tender on the inside. Step 4. While the pork belly is cooking, toss the sliced potatoes and zucchini with 1 tablespoon of oil, salt, and pepper on a baking sheet. Roast in the oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender and lightly browned. Step 5. In a small skillet, sauté the minced garlic and sliced almonds in 1 tablespoon of oil until fragrant. Step 6. To assemble the dish, slice the cooked pork belly into thick strips and serve with the roasted potatoes and zucchini, topped with the garlic-almond mixture.

recipe.name: Carrot and Bell Pepper Biryani
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 2 tbsp ghee in a pan over medium heat. Add garlic and sauté until fragrant. Step 2. Add the grated carrot and sauté until slightly tender. Step 3. Add the sliced bell pepper and sauté until tender. Step 4. In a separate pot, boil 2 cups of water and cook the rice until 70% done. Step 5. In a large bowl, combine the cooked rice, carrot-bell pepper mixture, and turmeric powder. Mix well and serve hot.

recipe.name: Tempeh Pasta Primavera
main_ingredients: ricotta (1/4 cup) is excluded from this recipe to respect non-dairy option in inventory - we will use yogurt instead.
recipe.steps: Step 1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil and cook the pasta according to package instructions. Reserve 1 cup of pasta water before draining. Step 2. In a large skillet, heat 1 tablespoon of oil over medium-high heat. Step 3. Add tempeh and cook for 3-4 minutes per side, until golden brown. Step 4. In the same skillet, add bok choy and cook until tender, about 3-4 minutes. Step 5. Add cauliflower and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, until tender. Step 6. In a medium bowl, whisk together 2 tablespoons of yogurt, 1 teaspoon of lemon juice, and a pinch of salt. Step 7. Add the cooked pasta to the bowl and toss with the yogurt sauce, adding some reserved pasta water if needed to achieve a creamy texture.

recipe.name: Tempeh and Sweet Potato Stir Fry
main_ingredients: sweet potato (1 medium, peeled and diced)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. In a small bowl, whisk together 2 tbsp of olive oil, 1 tsp of soy sauce, and 1 tsp of rice vinegar. Set aside.
Step 2. In a large pan or wok, heat 1 tbsp of olive oil over medium-high heat. Add the tempeh and cook until golden brown, about 3-4 minutes. Remove from the pan and set aside.
Step 3. Add the remaining 1 tbsp of olive oil to the pan. Add the sweet potato and cook for 5 minutes, or until slightly tender.
Step 4. Add the asparagus and green beans to the pan. Cook for an additional 3-4 minutes, or until tender.
Step 5. Return the tempeh to the pan and stir in the soy sauce mixture. Cook for 1-2 minutes, or until the tempeh is well coated. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Roasted Broccoli with Garlic and Lemon
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C). Rinse the broccoli and trim any tough ends. Cut into florets and place on a baking sheet.
Step 2. Mince the garlic and mix with salt. Drizzle over the broccoli and toss to coat.
Step 3. Squeeze the lemon juice over the broccoli and toss to coat.
Step 4. In a separate bowl, beat the eggs. Brush the beaten eggs over the broccoli.
Step 5. Roast in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the broccoli is tender and lightly browned.

recipe.name: Southern-Style Fried Mushrooms
recipe.steps: Step 1. Dredge the sliced mushrooms in a mixture of flour, a pinch of salt, and a few dashes of hot sauce, shaking off excess. Step 2. Heat about 1/2 inch of oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Step 3. Fry the mushrooms in batches until golden brown and crispy, about 3-4 minutes per batch. Step 4. Remove the fried mushrooms from the oil with a slotted spoon and place on a paper towel-lined plate to drain excess oil. Step 5. In a small bowl, mix together the chopped pickles and a squeeze of lime juice. Step 6. Serve the fried mushrooms hot with the pickle-lime sauce on top.

recipe.name: Lobster and Potato Stir Fry
main_ingredients: potato (2 large potatoes, peeled and diced)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat a pan with a little water over medium heat. Add the chopped potatoes and cook for 5 minutes until slightly tender.
Step 2. Add the chopped lobster to the pan and stir-fry for 3 minutes until cooked through.
Step 3. Season with pepper to taste.
Step 4. Serve the lobster and potato mixture hot.
Step 5. Garnish with chopped fresh herbs if desired.
recipe.note: This recipe uses only the available ingredients. To complete the recipe, you will need to add vegetable oil and eggs to your shopping list.

recipe.name: Savory Shiitake Mushroom Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat olive oil in a wok over medium-high heat. Add the sliced shiitake mushrooms and cook until they release their liquid and start to brown (about 3-4 minutes).
Step 2. Add sliced carrots to the wok and continue cooking for another 2-3 minutes until they start to tenderize.
Step 3. Add the diced tomato and stir-fry for another 2-3 minutes until the vegetables are tender-crisp.
Step 4. In a small bowl, whisk together rice vinegar, sugar, and a pinch of salt. Pour the dressing over the vegetables and stir-fry for 1 minute to combine.
Step 5. Serve the stir-fry hot, garnished with chopped green onions and a drizzle of additional rice vinegar if desired.

recipe.name: Spinach Fettuccine
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook fettuccine pasta according to the package instructions until al dente.
Step 2. In a pan, heat some water and blanch the chopped spinach until wilted.
Step 3. In a mixing bowl, whisk together eggs and a pinch of salt. Add the cooked spinach and mix well.
Step 4. Add the cooked fettuccine to the egg mixture and toss everything together until the pasta is well coated.
Step 5. Serve immediately, garnished with additional spinach if desired.

recipe.name: Seafood Pasta with Black Bean Salsa
recipe.steps: Step 1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook the pasta according to package instructions until al dente. Reserve 1 cup of pasta water before draining. Step 2. In a large skillet, heat 1 tbsp of olive oil over medium-high heat. Add the diced celery and cook until tender, about 3-4 minutes. Add the minced garlic and cook for an additional minute. Step 3. Add the mussels to the skillet, cover with a lid, and cook until they open, about 3-5 minutes. Remove the mussels from the skillet and set aside. Step 4. In the same skillet, add the remaining 1 tbsp of olive oil. Add the diced potatoes and cook until they start to brown, about 5 minutes. Step 5. Add the tilapia fillets to the skillet, skin side up (if they have skin). Cook until the skin is crispy and golden brown, about 3-4 minutes. Flip the fish over and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, until cooked through. Step 6. In a medium bowl, combine the cooked black beans, lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Stir to combine. Step 7. To serve, place the cooked pasta on a plate, top with the tilapia fillets, and spoon the black bean salsa and mussels over the top.

recipe.name: Creamy Lemongrass Mashed Potatoes
main_ingredients: potato (3 large), lemongrass (2 stalks), coconut milk (1 cup), salt (to taste)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Peel the potatoes and chop them into large chunks. Place them in a large pot and add enough cold water to cover them. Bring to a boil over high heat, then reduce the heat to medium-low and simmer for 15-20 minutes, or until the potatoes are tender when pierced with a fork.
                Step 2. While the potatoes are cooking, heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chopped lemongrass and sauté for 2-3 minutes, or until fragrant.
                Step 3. Add the sliced mushrooms to the skillet and cook for 5-7 minutes, or until they release their liquid and start to brown.
                Step 4. Drain the cooked potatoes and return them to the pot. Add the coconut milk, salt, and cooked mushroom and lemongrass mixture. Mash the potatoes with a potato masher or a fork until they're smooth and creamy.
                Step 5. Taste and adjust the seasoning as needed. Serve the mashed potatoes hot, garnished with chopped fresh herbs if desired.

recipe.name: Vegetarian Mediterranean Quinoa Bowl
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). 
                 Step 2. Toss eggplant slices with a pinch of salt and roast in the oven for 15-20 minutes, flipping halfway through.
                 Step 3. In a large skillet, heat 2 tbsp of olive oil over medium heat. Add the broccoli and cabbage, cooking for 5-7 minutes until tender.
                 Step 4. In a separate bowl, mix cooked quinoa with chickpeas and chopped fresh parsley.
                 Step 5. To assemble the bowls, place a scoop of quinoa mixture, top with roasted eggplant, sautéed vegetables, and drizzle with your favorite Mediterranean dressing.
recipe.note: Enjoy your delicious and healthy vegetarian Mediterranean quinoa bowl!

recipe.name: Roasted Sweet Potato and Cauliflower
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C). Cut the sweet potatoes into 1-inch cubes and place them on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Step 2. Rinse the cauliflower and cut it into florets. Place the cauliflower on a separate baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Step 3. Drizzle the sweet potatoes and cauliflower with 2 tablespoons of olive oil. Season with salt, pepper, and your favorite herbs. Step 4. Roast the sweet potatoes in the oven for 20 minutes, then add the cauliflower and continue roasting for another 15-20 minutes, or until both are tender and lightly browned. Step 5. Serve hot, garnished with chopped fresh herbs if desired.

recipe.name: Lime Broccoli Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 5. Season with pepper to taste and serve hot.

recipe.name: Kale and Lemon Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add sardines (drained and chopped) and cook until lightly browned (3-4 minutes). Step 2. Add chopped kale and cook until wilted (3-4 minutes). Step 3. Squeeze lemon juice over kale mixture and stir to combine. Step 4. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Step 5. Serve immediately, garnished with lemon wedges.

recipe.name: Spinach and Chickpea Sandwich
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat a toaster or grill to toast the bread slices for 2-3 minutes. Step 2. In a bowl, mash the cottage cheese using a fork until it's smooth. Step 3. Add chopped spinach to the bowl and mix well. Step 4. Heat a pan over medium heat and sauté the chickpeas for 2-3 minutes. Step 5. Assemble the sandwich by spreading the cottage cheese and spinach mixture on one bread slice, topping it with sautéed chickpeas, and finishing with the second bread slice.

recipe.name: Roasted Vegetable Medley
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
   Step 2. In a large bowl, toss together the potatoes, carrot, and broccoli with the vegetable oil until they are evenly coated.
   Step 3. Spread the vegetables out in a single layer on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
   Step 4. Roast in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes or until the vegetables are tender and lightly browned.
   Step 5. Serve hot, garnished with chopped fresh herbs if desired.

recipe.name: Creamy Mushroom Pasta
recipe.steps: Step 1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook the pasta according to package instructions until al dente. Reserve 1 cup of pasta water before draining. Step 2. In a large skillet, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the sliced onion and cook until translucent, about 3-4 minutes. Step 3. Add the sliced mushrooms to the skillet and cook until they release their liquid and start browning, about 5 minutes. Step 4. Stir in the reserved pasta water and cook for an additional 1-2 minutes. Step 5. Combine the cooked pasta and mushroom mixture in the skillet. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Broccoli and Mushroom Stir-Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat a pan with a tablespoon of oil over medium heat. Add the sliced onion and sauté until translucent.
Step 2. Add the sliced pepper and sauté for another minute.
Step 3. Add the sliced mushrooms and broccoli to the pan. Stir-fry for 2-3 minutes until the vegetables are tender.
Step 4. In a small bowl, mix together the milk and a pinch of salt. Pour the milk mixture over the vegetables in the pan.
Step 5. Stir-fry everything together for another minute until the sauce is bubbly. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Grilled Chicken Breast with Edamame and Spinach
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Cut the onion and tofu into small pieces. 
                  Step 2. Heat a pan with a small amount of oil over medium heat.
                  Step 3. Add the onion and tofu to the pan and cook until the onion is translucent.
                  Step 4. Add the edamame and spinach to the pan and cook until the spinach has wilted.
                  Step 5. Serve hot.
recipe.note: Could not include the requested chicken breast and flour in the recipe. Substituted with tofu.

recipe.name: Grilled Zucchini and Squid Skewers
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Step 2. In a bowl, mix minced garlic, olive oil, and a pinch of salt. Step 3. Add the sliced zucchini to the garlic mixture and toss to coat. Step 4. Thread the zucchini and squid rings onto skewers, leaving a small space between each piece. Step 5. Grill the skewers for 8-10 minutes, turning occasionally, until the squid is opaque and the zucchini is tender.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Cod with Lentil Salad
recipe.steps: Step 1. Rinse the lentils and cook according to package instructions. Set aside. Step 2. Cut the carrot into small pieces and sauté in a pan until tender. Step 3. In a large bowl, combine cooked lentils, sautéed carrot, and mixed greens. Step 4. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Step 5. Pan-sear the cod fillet until cooked through. Serve with the lentil salad.

recipe.name: Grilled Zucchini and Bok Choy Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat. Add garlic and cook until fragrant. Step 2. Add sliced pork chop and cook until browned. Step 3. Add chopped bok choy and cook until wilted. Step 4. Add sliced zucchini and cook until tender. Step 5. Serve hot and enjoy.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Cod with Cabbage and Rice
recipe.steps: Step 5. Serve the pan-seared cod on a bed of rice with sautéed cabbage on top.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Steak with Mushroom Shrimp Sauce
recipe.steps: Step 1. Season the steak with salt and pepper. Heat a skillet over medium-high heat and sear the steak for 3-4 minutes per side, or until it reaches your desired level of doneness. Step 2. Remove the steak from the skillet and set it aside to rest. Step 3. Add the shrimp and mushrooms to the skillet, cooking until the shrimp are pink and the mushrooms are tender. Step 4. Add a small amount of oil and lemon juice to the skillet, stirring to deglaze the pan. Step 5. Serve the steak with the mushroom shrimp sauce spooned over the top.

recipe.name: Chicken and Epazote Fajitas
main_ingredients: 1 pound chicken breast, cut into thin strips
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add chicken and cook until browned, about 5 minutes. Step 2. Remove chicken from skillet and set aside. Step 3. In the same skillet, add remaining 1 tablespoon vegetable oil. Add onion and cook until softened, about 3 minutes. Step 4. Add epazote and chili powder to skillet and cook for 1 minute. Step 5. Add chicken back to skillet and stir to combine with onion and epazote mixture. Step 6. Cook for an additional 2 minutes, until chicken is fully cooked. Serve hot with your favorite toppings.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Tilapia with Roasted Vegetables
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat your oven to 200°C (400°F).
        Step 2. In a large bowl, toss cauliflower and cabbage with olive oil, salt, and pepper until they are evenly coated.
        Step 3. Spread the vegetables on a baking sheet and roast in the oven for 15 minutes, or until tender and lightly browned.
        Step 4. While the vegetables are roasting, season the tilapia fillets with salt and pepper.
        Step 5. Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat and add a small amount of olive oil. Add the tilapia fillets and cook for 3-4 minutes per side, or until cooked through.

recipe.name: Zucchini Shrimp Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a large skillet over medium-high. Add shrimp and cook until pink, about 2-3 minutes per side. Set aside. Step 2. In the same skillet, add another tablespoon of oil. Add sliced bell pepper and cook until tender, about 3-4 minutes. Step 3. Add sliced zucchini to the skillet and cook until tender, about 4-5 minutes. Step 4. Add cooked shrimp, garlic, and sugar to the skillet. Stir-fry everything together for about 1 minute. Step 5. Season with salt to taste and serve immediately.

recipe.name: Spicy Thai Fish-Free Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Chop the mushroom and celery into bite-sized pieces. Heat 1 tbsp of oil in a pan over medium heat and sauté for 3-4 minutes until the vegetables are slightly tender.
Step 2. Add the minced garlic and sauté for another minute, until fragrant.
Step 3. Add the tamarind paste and stir for 1-2 minutes.
Step 4. Add the salt to taste.
Step 5. Continue to stir-fry the mixture for 2-3 minutes until all the flavors are well combined.
Step 6. Serve the stir-fry hot, garnished with bird's eye chilies on top.

recipe.name: Japanese-Style Grilled Pork Skewers with Wasabi
recipe.steps:
Step 1. In a large bowl, whisk together wasabi paste, milk, and a pinch of salt. Add the sliced pork and mix until coated. Cover and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes.
Step 2. Preheat a grill or grill pan to medium-high heat. Thread the marinated pork onto skewers, leaving a little space between each piece.
Step 3. Brush the grill or grill pan with a small amount of oil to prevent sticking. Grill the pork skewers for 8-10 minutes per side, or until cooked through.
Step 4. Meanwhile, toss the chopped bell peppers and spinach with a drizzle of oil and a pinch of salt. Grill the vegetables alongside the pork for an additional 5 minutes, or until tender.
Step 5. Serve the grilled pork skewers with the grilled vegetables and garnish with oregano.

recipe.name: Keto American Lamb Chop with Broccoli
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Season the lamb chops with salt and black pepper. Step 2. In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium-high heat. Sear the lamb chops for 2-3 minutes per side, or until browned. Step 3. Transfer the lamb chops to a baking sheet and roast in the oven for 10-12 minutes, or until cooked to desired level of doneness. Step 4. While the lamb is cooking, toss the broccoli florets with olive oil, salt, and black pepper on a separate baking sheet. Roast in the oven for 5-7 minutes, or until tender. Step 5. Serve the lamb chops with roasted broccoli and diced avocado on the side.

recipe.name: Sweet Potato Pork Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). 
                Step 2. Cut the sweet potatoes into 1/2-inch thick slices.
                Step 3. In a large bowl, mix the sugar and pork (cubes).
                Step 4. In a large skillet, heat 2 tablespoons of oil over medium-high heat. 
                Step 5. Add the pork mixture and cook until browned, about 5-7 minutes. 
                Step 6. Transfer the skillet to the preheated oven and cook for an additional 10-12 minutes, or until the sweet potatoes are tender.
recipe.note: This recipe uses the available ingredients from the inventory. However, some ingredients (ground beef, spinach, and pepper) are missing and can be added to the shopping list.

recipe.name: Vegan Bok Choy Stir Fry with Nutritional Yeast
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat the vegan oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add the minced garlic and cook for 1 minute, until fragrant.
Step 2. Add the chopped bok choy to the skillet and cook for 3-4 minutes, until tender.
Step 3. In a small bowl, whisk together the nutritional yeast and 1 tablespoon of water to create a smooth paste.
Step 4. Add the cooked quinoa to the skillet and stir to combine with the bok choy mixture.
Step 5. Pour the nutritional yeast paste into the skillet and stir-fry everything together for 1-2 minutes, until well combined.
Step 6. Serve the vegan bok choy stir fry hot, garnished with additional chopped bok choy if desired.

recipe.name: Shrimp and Cod Stir Fry
main_ingredients: 2 medium cod fillets (cut into bite-sized pieces)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the cod and cook for 3-4 minutes on each side, until cooked through. Remove from the skillet and set aside. Step 2. In the same skillet, add another tablespoon of oil if necessary. Add the shrimp and cook for 2-3 minutes per side, until pink and cooked through. Remove from the skillet and set aside with the cod. Step 3. In the same skillet, add the minced garlic and cook for 1 minute, until fragrant. Step 4. Add the sliced onion and cook for 3-4 minutes, until translucent. Step 5. Add the broken cauliflower florets and cook for 3-4 minutes, until tender but still crisp. Step 6. Add the diced tomato and cook for an additional 2 minutes. Step 7. Return the cooked cod and shrimp to the skillet and stir to combine with the vegetables. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve hot.

recipe.name: American Asparagus Fritters
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat a deep fryer to 350°F (180°C). In a large bowl, combine the chopped asparagus, bok choy, flour, onion, and a pinch of salt. Step 2. Add the flaked cod to the bowl and mix well. Step 3. Divide the mixture into 8 equal portions and shape each into a ball. Step 4. Flatten each ball slightly into a patty shape. Step 5. Fry the patties in batches for 3-4 minutes on each side, or until golden brown. Serve hot with a side of lettuce and tomato.

recipe.name: Pine Nut and Arugula Salad with Sage Croutons
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (180°C). Toss the sage leaves with a pinch of salt and a drizzle of olive oil (not provided in inventory) and bake for 5-7 minutes or until crispy. Step 2. In a large bowl, combine the arugula, diced eggs, and chopped sage croutons. Step 3. In a small pan, toast the pine nuts over medium heat for 2-3 minutes or until fragrant. Step 4. Sprinkle the toasted pine nuts and grated parmesan over the arugula mixture. Step 5. Gently toss the salad to combine and season with salt to taste.

recipe.name: Roasted Broccoli with Lemon and Carrot
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Step 2. In a large bowl, whisk together lemon juice and salt. Add sliced carrots and toss to coat. Step 3. Spread carrot slices on the prepared baking sheet in a single layer. Step 4. Roast carrots in the preheated oven for 15 minutes. Step 5. While carrots are roasting, toss broccoli florets with a pinch of salt on a separate baking sheet. Step 6. Add broccoli to the oven for the last 5 minutes of carrot roasting. Step 7. Remove both vegetables from the oven and serve hot, garnished with lemon wedges if desired.

recipe.name: Italian-Style Bruschetta
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Slice a baguette into 1-inch thick rounds and toast for 5-7 minutes or until lightly browned. Step 2. In a bowl, combine diced tomatoes, salt, and chopped rosemary. Step 3. Rub garlic on toasted baguette rounds and top with a spoonful of the tomato mixture. Step 4. Sprinkle arugula on top of the tomato mixture. Step 5. Serve immediately and enjoy!

recipe.name: Quinoa and Broccoli Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat. Add mushroom and cook until it's tender. Step 2. Add broccoli to the pan and cook until it's tender but still crisp. Step 3. Cook quinoa according to package instructions. Step 4. Mix cooked quinoa, mushroom, and broccoli in a bowl. Step 5. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Lime and Green Beans Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cut the chicken breast into small pieces and marinate in your favorite seasonings for at least 15 minutes. Step 2. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add the chicken and cook until browned, about 5-6 minutes. Step 3. Add the green beans to the skillet and cook until tender, about 3-4 minutes. Step 4. Squeeze the juice of 1 lime over the green beans and chicken. Step 5. Sprinkle peanuts over the top and serve immediately.

recipe.name: Crab and Mackerel Seafood Paella
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat olive oil in a large paella pan over medium-high heat. Add the diced chicken and cook until browned, then remove from the pan. Step 2. Add the mackerel and cook until browned, about 3-4 minutes. Step 3. Add the sliced mushroom and cook until softened, about 2-3 minutes. Step 4. Add the diced bell pepper and cook until tender, about 3-4 minutes. Step 5. Add the milk, crab, and scallops to the pan, stirring to combine. Step 6. Return the chicken and mackerel to the pan and stir to combine. Step 7. Cook for an additional 5-7 minutes, or until the liquid has been absorbed and the seafood is cooked through.

recipe.name: Indian-Style Chickpea Curry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat oil in a pan over medium heat. Add diced onion and sauté until translucent. Step 2. Add diced chicken breast and cook until browned. Step 3. Add 2 cups of water and fenugreek. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 10 minutes. Step 4. Add chickpeas and continue to simmer for another 5 minutes. Step 5. Season with salt and serve with steamed lettuce.

recipe.name: Lemon Pasta with Tomato and Spinach
recipe.steps: Step 1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil and cook the pasta according to package instructions until al dente. Reserve 1 cup of pasta water before draining the spaghetti. Step 2. In a large skillet, heat a splash of water over medium heat. Add sliced potatoes and cook until they are slightly tender, about 5 minutes. Step 3. Add diced tomatoes to the skillet with the potatoes. Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes. Step 4. Squeeze the juice of the lemon over the tomatoes and potatoes, then season with salt to taste. Step 5. To combine the pasta and vegetable mixture, add the reserved pasta water and toss everything together in the skillet.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Scallops with Roasted Sweet Potato and Broccoli
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C). Cut the sweet potato into 1-inch cubes and toss with 1 tablespoon olive oil. Spread on a baking sheet and roast for 20 minutes, or until tender.
Step 2. Meanwhile, bring a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the remaining 1 tablespoon olive oil. Add the broccoli and cook for 3-4 minutes, or until tender.
Step 3. In the same skillet, add the scallops and cook for 2-3 minutes per side, or until cooked through.
Step 4. Serve the scallops with roasted sweet potato and steamed broccoli.
Step 5. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

recipe.name: Bruschetta Italiano
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Slice the bread into 1-inch thick rounds and place on a baking sheet.
Step 2. Drizzle olive oil over the bread and sprinkle with minced garlic.
Step 3. Roast the bread in the oven for 5-7 minutes, or until lightly toasted.
Step 4. Meanwhile, chop the sun-dried tomatoes and bell pepper.
Step 5. Top the toasted bread with a mixture of chopped tomatoes, bell pepper, onion, anchovies, and a sprinkle of pepper.
Step 6. Serve immediately, garnished with a few leaves of lettuce.

recipe.name: Indian-Style Beef and Vegetable Curry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a large pan over medium-high heat. Add the ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks.

recipe.name: Stir-Fried Pasta with Garlic
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cook pasta according to package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside. Step 2. Heat vegetable oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat. Step 3. Add minced garlic and stir-fry until fragrant, about 1 minute. Step 4. Add cooked pasta to the wok and stir-fry everything together for 2-3 minutes. Step 5. Season with a splash of rice wine (if desired) and serve immediately.

recipe.name: Thai Basil Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a large pan over medium-high heat. Add the ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it apart into small pieces.
Step 2. Add the bird's eye chilies and cook for 1 minute.
Step 3. Add the palm sugar and cook for another minute, stirring constantly.
Step 4. Add the holy basil and stir-fry for 1 minute.
Step 5. Serve the beef mixture over a bed of lettuce and garnish with cilantro.

recipe.name: Vegan Tempeh and Vegetable Stir-Fry
main_ingredients: tofu (1 block, drained and cut into small pieces)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add the tofu and tempeh, and cook until golden brown on all sides (about 5-7 minutes).
Step 2. Remove the tofu and tempeh from the skillet, and set aside.
Step 3. Add another tablespoon of oil to the skillet, and sauté the sliced zucchini and broccoli until tender-crisp (about 3-5 minutes).
Step 4. Return the tofu and tempeh to the skillet, and stir to combine with the vegetables.
Step 5. Season with your favorite herbs and spices, and serve over bread (if desired)

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Tuna with Roasted Asparagus
main_ingredients: Fresh asparagus (12 spears, 1 pound), Tuna fillet (4 pieces, 1 pound)
Flour (1 tablespoon), Salt and pepper (to taste)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
                Step 2. Rinse the asparagus and pat it dry with a paper towel. Toss with olive oil, salt, and pepper.
                Step 3. Spread the asparagus on the prepared baking sheet and roast for 12-15 minutes or until tender.
                Step 4. Season the tuna with salt and pepper. Dredge the tuna in flour, shaking off excess.
                Step 5. Heat a skillet over medium-high heat and cook the tuna for 2-3 minutes per side or until cooked through.

recipe.name: Grilled Pork and Vegetable Skewers with Sage
main_ingredients: 1 pound pork shoulder (cut into bite-sized pieces)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. In a large bowl, whisk together 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1 tablespoon chopped sage, and 1 minced garlic clove. Add the pork and bell pepper pieces to the bowl and toss to coat.
Step 2. Thread the pork and bell pepper pieces onto skewers, leaving a small space between each piece.
Step 3. Grill the skewers for 12-15 minutes, turning occasionally, or until the pork is cooked through.
Step 4. Meanwhile, cook the pancetta in a small skillet over medium heat until crispy. Drain on paper towels.
Step 5. Serve the skewers hot, garnished with arugula and crispy pancetta.
recipe.note: This recipe is perfect for a summer evening. The smoky flavor of the grilled pork and vegetables pairs well with the crunchy pancetta and fresh arugula.

recipe.name: Ground Beef and Mushroom Stroganoff
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cook the ground beef in a pan until browned, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks. Drain excess fat. Step 2. Add the sliced mushrooms to the pan and cook until they release their moisture and start to brown. Step 3. Add the chopped onion and celery to the pan and cook until the vegetables are softened. Step 4. Stir in 2 cups of cooked spinach and cook until wilted. Step 5. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

recipe.name: Spicy Bell Pepper Curry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Cut the bell pepper into bite-sized pieces and set aside. Heat oil in a pan over medium heat. Add peanuts and roast until fragrant.
Step 2. Add chopped onion (not provided in inventory) and sauté until translucent.
Step 3. Add minced garlic (not provided in inventory) and sauté for another minute.
Step 4. Add the bell pepper, kale, tomato, and spices. Stir well.
Step 5. Add a splash of water and bring to a simmer. Let cook for 10-15 minutes or until the flavors have melded together.

recipe.name: Roasted Vegetable Wrap
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). Cut the bell pepper into large pieces and place on a baking sheet. Roast in the oven for 20 minutes, or until tender.
Step 2. Cut the cucumber into large slices and set aside.
Step 3. In a pan, toast the peanuts over medium heat for 2-3 minutes, or until fragrant.
Step 4. In a large bowl, combine the oats, roasted bell pepper, cucumber, paneer, and toasted peanuts. Mix well.
Step 5. Wrap the mixture in a tortilla or pita bread and serve.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Cod with Onion
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Step 2. Season the cod pieces with salt and pepper. Step 3. Add the cod to the skillet and sear for 3-4 minutes on each side. Step 4. Add the sliced onion to the skillet and cook for 2-3 minutes. Step 5. Serve the cod with the caramelized onion.
recipe.note: Note: Some requested ingredients (flour, mushroom) are missing, but this recipe uses the available ingredients to create a delicious dish with the cod and onion.

recipe.name: Creamy Broccoli and Rice Bowl
recipe.steps:
Step 1. In a medium saucepan, combine broccoli florets and 2 tablespoons of butter substitute. Cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until broccoli is tender, about 5 minutes.
Step 2. In a separate pot, cook the cooked rice according to package instructions.
Step 3. In a blender or food processor, combine non-dairy milk, lime juice, salt, and pepper. Blend until smooth.
Step 4. Add the blended mixture to the saucepan with the broccoli and stir to combine.
Step 5. Serve the broccoli mixture over the cooked rice.

recipe.name: Grilled Eggplant with Tilapia
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat grill to medium heat. Season tilapia with salt and pepper. Step 2. Grill tilapia for 5-6 minutes per side, or until cooked through. Step 3. Meanwhile, slice eggplant into 1/4-inch thick rounds. Step 4. Brush eggplant with olive oil (not included in this inventory, but assumed paleo-friendly) and grill for 3-4 minutes per side, or until tender. Step 5. Remove from heat and top with minced garlic. Serve immediately.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Scallops with Lentil Pilaf
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Rinse the scallops and pat them dry with paper towels. Season with salt and pepper. Set aside.
Step 2. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the mushroom and cook until tender, about 3-4 minutes.
Step 3. In a separate pot, bring 2 cups of water to a boil. Add the lentils and cook until tender, about 15-20 minutes.
Step 4. In the same skillet, add the remaining 1 tablespoon of oil. Add the scallops and cook until golden brown, about 2-3 minutes per side.
Step 5. Fluff the cooked lentils with a fork and stir in 2 tablespoons of sugar. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve with the pan-seared scallops and a side of lettuce.

recipe.name: Edamame and Bok Choy Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cut the bok choy and carrot into bite-sized pieces. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Step 2. Add the chicken breast and cook until browned, about 5 minutes. Step 3. Add the bok choy and carrot to the skillet and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes. Step 4. Add the edamame to the skillet and stir-fry for another 2 minutes. Step 5. Squeeze a slice of lemon over the mixture and serve hot.

recipe.name: Not Found
recipe.steps: Unknown
recipe.note: No pescatarian recipe found with available ingredients. Missing essential ingredients like fish or seafood.

recipe.name: Ginger-Lemon Lettuce Wrap
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Wash and dry the lettuce leaves. Set aside.
Step 2. In a pan, heat a small amount of oil over medium heat. Add cumin seeds and let them sizzle for a few seconds.
Step 3. Add diced ginger and sauté for 2-3 minutes or until it becomes fragrant and slightly softened.
Step 4. Add the lemon juice and stir well. Let it simmer for 2-3 minutes.
Step 5. Serve the ginger-lemon mixture in the lettuce wraps and enjoy!

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Tilapia with Broccoli and Squid Skewers
recipe.steps: Step 1. Rinse the tilapia fillet under cold water and pat it dry with a paper towel. Step 2. In a pan, heat a tablespoon of oil over medium heat. Add the tilapia fillet and cook for 4-5 minutes on each side, until it's cooked through. Step 3. Meanwhile, preheat a grill or grill pan to medium heat. Thread the squid tubes onto skewers. Brush the squid with a little oil and season with salt and black pepper. Grill the squid for 2-3 minutes on each side, until it's slightly charred. Step 4. In a separate pan, heat a tablespoon of oil over medium heat. Add the broccoli florets and cook until they're tender, about 5 minutes. Step 5. Serve the pan-seared tilapia with the grilled squid skewers and steamed broccoli, garnished with a squeeze of lime juice.

recipe.name: Thai-Style Coconut-Free Fried Rice
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tbsp olive oil in a pan over medium-high heat. Step 2. Add 2-3 kaffir lime leaves and crush them with a spoon to release their flavor. Step 3. Add the rice and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes. Step 4. Push the rice to one side of the pan. Step 5. Add another 1 tbsp olive oil, add the flour and stir-fry until the mixture is lightly browned. Step 6. Mix the rice and flour mixture together, add salt to taste and a squeeze of lemon juice.
recipe.note: Serve hot and garnish with additional kaffir lime leaves if desired.

recipe.name: Squid and Vegetable Stir-Fry
main_ingredients: 1 lb Squid, cleaned and cut into bite-sized pieces
1 block Tofu, cut into small cubes
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the squid and cook for 2-3 minutes until pink and slightly charred.
Step 2. Remove the squid from the wok and set aside. Add the sliced onion and cook for 3-4 minutes until translucent.
Step 3. Add the sliced celery to the wok and cook for an additional 2 minutes until slightly tender.
Step 4. Add the cooked squid back into the wok, along with the cubed tofu and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes until all the ingredients are well combined.
Step 5. Season with soy sauce and serve hot.

recipe.name: Lentil-free Vegan Quinoa Bowl
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Rinse and chop the Brussels sprouts and bok choy. Set aside.
Step 2. In a medium saucepan, bring 2 cups of water to a boil. Add quinoa and reduce heat to low. Simmer for 15-20 minutes or until quinoa is cooked and fluffy.
Step 3. In a separate pan, heat some water. Add edamame for 3-5 minutes, then add chopped bell pepper. Cook for additional 3-4 minutes.
Step 4. In a large bowl, combine cooked quinoa, edamame mixture, and chopped Brussels sprouts.
Step 5. Sprinkle chopped cashews on top and serve.

recipe.name: Vietnamese Chicken Noodle Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Slice the chicken breast into thin strips. Step 2. Heat a tablespoon of oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat. Step 3. Add the chicken to the wok and cook until browned and cooked through, about 5-6 minutes. Step 4. Add the rice noodles to the wok and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes, until they start to brown. Step 5. Add sliced lemons, sugar, and pepper to the wok and stir-fry for another minute. Step 6. Serve hot, garnished with additional lemon slices if desired.
recipe.note: A simple and flavorful Vietnamese-inspired stir fry using chicken breast and rice noodles.

recipe.name: Paleo Korean-Style Pork and Cabbage Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cut the cabbage into thin slices. Step 2. Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add 2 tablespoons of sesame oil and sauté 1 minced garlic for 1 minute. Step 3. Add 1 cup of ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks. Step 4. Add the cabbage and cook until it's slightly tender. Step 5. Season with salt and serve hot.
recipe.note: This recipe typically includes non-paleo ingredients, so adjustments were made to accommodate the dietary preference.

recipe.name: Grilled Chicken and Veggie Stir-Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tbsp of olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chicken breast and cook until browned on both sides, about 5-6 minutes. Set aside. Step 2. In the same skillet, add the remaining 1 tbsp of olive oil. Add the sliced bell peppers and carrots and cook until tender, about 5 minutes. Step 3. Add the diced tomato to the skillet and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes. Step 4. Return the cooked chicken to the skillet and stir to combine with the vegetables. Step 5. Serve hot and enjoy!

recipe.name: Sauteed Kale and Zucchini
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 2 tablespoons of vegetable oil in a large pan over medium heat. Step 2. Add sliced zucchini and cook for 3-4 minutes or until tender.  Step 3. Add chopped kale to the pan and cook for an additional 2 minutes. Step 4. In a small bowl, blend peanuts into a fine crumb using a food processor. Step 5. Sprinkle peanut crumbs on top of the sautéed kale and zucchini and serve.

recipe.name: Vietnamese Grilled Squid and Tempeh Salad
main_ingredients: Tempeh (1 cup, cut into small pieces)
Squid (1 cup, cut into small pieces)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. In a large bowl, combine chopped lettuce and sliced mushrooms. Set aside.
Step 2. In a separate pan, grill the squid and tempeh until cooked through, about 5-7 minutes. Set aside.
Step 3. In a small bowl, mix together salt and grilled squid and tempeh.
Step 4. Add the black beans to the bowl with the lettuce and mushrooms and toss to combine.
Step 5. Top the salad with the squid and tempeh mixture and serve immediately.

recipe.name: Lemon and Celery Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chopped celery and bell pepper. Cook, stirring occasionally, until the vegetables are tender-crisp, about 5 minutes.
Step 2. Add the lemon juice to the skillet and stir to combine. Season with salt to taste.
Step 3. Continue cooking for another 2-3 minutes, until the vegetables are slightly softened.
Step 4. Serve the stir fry hot, garnished with additional lemon wedges if desired.
Step 5. Enjoy your gluten-free meal!

recipe.name: Kimchi Pancake (Kimchijeon)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. In a large bowl, combine kimchi, potato, onion, celery, and sugar. Mix well.
Step 2. In a separate bowl, beat doenjang with a fork until smooth.
Step 3. Add doenjang mixture to the kimchi mixture and mix until well combined.
Step 4. Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat and brush with doenjang mixture (to prevent pancake from sticking).
Step 5. Pour kimchi mixture into the pan and spread evenly. Cook for 4-5 minutes or until the bottom is golden brown, then flip and cook the other side.

recipe.name: Spinach and Eggplant Fritters
main_ingredients: chicken breast (1/2 breast, finely chopped, 1 cup)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat a non-stick pan with 1 tablespoon oil over medium heat. Step 2. In a bowl, mix together the chopped chicken breast, spinach, eggplant, cucumber, and pepper. Step 3. Add salt and mix well. Step 4. Using your hands, shape the mixture into patties, about 1 1/2 inches in diameter. Step 5. Place the patties in the pan and cook for 3-4 minutes on each side, until golden brown. Step 6. Serve hot with your favorite sauce.

recipe.name: Mushroom and Bell Pepper Fajitas
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the sliced bell peppers and cook for 5 minutes, until tender. Step 2. Add the sliced mushrooms to the skillet and cook for an additional 3-4 minutes, until they're tender and lightly browned. Step 3. Warm the tortillas by wrapping them in a damp paper towel and microwaving for 20-30 seconds. Step 4. Add the cooked mushroom and bell pepper mixture to the tortillas and sprinkle with a small amount of butter. Step 5. Serve hot and enjoy!

recipe.name: Korean-Style Fried Rice Cakes
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat vegetable oil in a large pan over medium-high heat. Step 2. Add rice cakes and cook until golden brown, about 5 minutes per side. Step 3. Remove rice cakes from pan and set aside. Step 4. In the same pan, add more oil if necessary and cook minced garlic and pepper for 1 minute. Step 5. Add cooked rice cakes back into pan and stir-fry with garlic and pepper mixture. Step 6. Transfer rice cakes to a serving dish and sprinkle with sesame seeds.

recipe.name: Korean-Style Celery and Radish Jeon (Pan-Fried Pajeon)
recipe.steps: Step 1. In a large bowl, combine grated potato, chopped celery, and grated Korean radish. Add a pinch of salt and mix well. Step 2. In a separate bowl, whisk together rice flour and a pinch of salt. Add cold water and mix until a smooth batter forms. Step 3. Add the batter to the potato-vegetable mixture and mix until just combined. Step 4. Heat a non-stick pan with butter over medium heat. When the butter has melted, pour in the potato-vegetable batter. Step 5. Cook for 4-5 minutes on the first side, until the bottom is golden brown. Flip and cook for another 4-5 minutes, until the other side is also golden brown.
recipe.note: This recipe is inspired by traditional Korean pajeon, but adapted to use potato and Korean radish instead of onions. It's a delicious and authentic Korean-style snack or side dish.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Lentil Cakes with Garlic Mackerel
recipe.steps: Step 1. Rinse the lentils and soak them in water for at least 4 hours. Drain and mash in a bowl. Add minced garlic, salt, and pepper. Step 2. Divide the mashed lentil mixture into 4 equal parts and shape each part into a patty. Refrigerate for 30 minutes to firm. Step 3. Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat. Add a small amount of oil and sear the lentil cakes for 3-4 minutes on each side, until golden brown. Step 4. Meanwhile, season the mackerel fillets with salt and pepper. In a separate skillet, heat a small amount of oil over medium-high heat and sear the mackerel for 3-4 minutes on each side, until cooked through. Step 5. Slice the cooked mackerel into thin pieces and serve on top of the pan-seared lentil cakes.

recipe.name: Minty Noodle Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Cook rice noodles according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
Step 2. In a pan, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add sliced celery and sauté until tender, about 3-4 minutes.
Step 3. Add chopped mint to the pan and sauté for another minute.
Step 4. Add cooked noodles to the pan and toss with mint and celery mixture.
Step 5. Add a small amount of butter to the pan and stir-fry for an additional minute.

recipe.name: Vegetarian Quinoa and Tofu Bowl
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). Cut the potatoes and Brussels sprouts into bite-sized pieces and roast in the oven for 20 minutes.
Step 2. Cut the tofu into small cubes and cook in a pan with a little oil until golden brown. Set aside.
Step 3. Cook the quinoa according to the package instructions.
Step 4. In a pan, heat some oil and sauté the spinach until wilted.
Step 5. Assemble the bowls with the cooked quinoa, roasted vegetables, tofu, and sautéed spinach.

recipe.name: Italian Potato Gnocchi
recipe.steps: Step 1. Boil the potatoes until tender. Drain and let cool. Step 2. Peel the potatoes and mash them with a fork. Add flour and mix until a dough forms. Step 3. Knead the dough for about 10 minutes until it becomes smooth. Step 4. Divide the dough into 4 equal pieces. Roll each piece into a long rope. Cut the rope into 1-inch pieces to form the gnocchi. Step 5. Cook the gnocchi in boiling water for 2-3 minutes or until they float to the surface. Meanwhile, heat olive oil in a pan and sauté the chopped celery until softened. Step 6. Add the sun-dried tomatoes to the pan and cook for another minute. Step 7. Serve the gnocchi with the sun-dried tomato sauce.

recipe.name: Ground Beef Patties
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat your grill or grill pan to medium-high heat. Step 2. In a large bowl, combine the ground beef, peanuts, and a pinch of salt. Step 3. Use your hands to mix the ingredients until just combined. Step 4. Divide the mixture into 4 equal parts and shape each part into a ball. Step 5. Flatten each ball into a patty and place on the grill. Step 6. Cook for 4-5 minutes per side or until the internal temperature reaches 160°F.
recipe.note: You can use available ingredients to make a delicious ground beef patty, but flour and olive oil are required for a traditional breading. Add these to your shopping list for future recipes.

recipe.name: Tempeh and Bok Choy Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. 
                  Add the tempeh and cook until golden brown on both sides, about 5-6 minutes.
                  Remove the tempeh from the skillet and set aside.
               Step 2. In the same skillet, add another tablespoon of oil if needed. 
                  Add the chopped bok choy and cook until wilted, about 3-4 minutes.
               Step 3. In a small bowl, whisk the eggs together.
               Step 4. Pour the eggs over the bok choy and scramble them together.
               Step 5. Add the cooked tempeh back into the skillet and stir-fry everything together.
               Step 6. Season with soy sauce or your preferred seasoning and serve hot.

recipe.name: Vietnamese Chickenless Rice Paper Rolls
recipe.steps: Step 1. Soak the rice paper sheets in water for 10-15 minutes until soft and pliable. Step 2. Slice the bird's eye chili into thin rounds and chop the garlic. Step 3. In a pan, heat some oil and sauté the garlic until fragrant. Step 4. Add the sliced bird's eye chili to the pan and cook for another 2-3 minutes. Step 5. Prepare the filling by mixing the cooked bird's eye chili mixture with salt to taste. Step 6. To assemble the rice paper rolls, place a sheet of rice paper on a flat surface and add a small amount of the filling mixture in the center. Step 7. Fold the bottom half of the rice paper over the filling, then fold in the sides and roll up the paper to form a tight cylinder. Repeat with the remaining ingredients.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Cod with Crispy Pork Belly
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
         Step 2. In a pan, heat 1 tbsp olive oil over medium-high heat. Add pork belly and cook until crispy. Remove and set aside.
         Step 3. In the same pan, add the remaining 1 tbsp olive oil. Add shrimp and cook until pink, about 2-3 minutes per side. Remove and set aside.
         Step 4. Add mackerel to the pan and cook for 1 minute. Add garlic and cook for another minute, until fragrant.
         Step 5. Place cod pieces in the pan, skin side up. Cook for 3-4 minutes, then flip and cook for another 3-4 minutes, until cooked through.
         Step 6. Serve cod with crispy pork belly, shrimp, and a drizzle of lemon juice.

recipe.name: Chipotle Chicken Fajitas
main_ingredients: 1 lb Chicken breast (cut into thin strips)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chicken and cook until browned and cooked through, about 5-6 minutes. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.
Step 2. In the same skillet, add the minced garlic and cook for 1 minute, until fragrant. 
Step 3. Add the minced chipotle pepper to the skillet and cook for an additional 30 seconds. 
Step 4. Return the chicken to the skillet and stir in the lemon juice. Cook for an additional 2 minutes, until the chicken is coated in the sauce.
Step 5. Serve the chicken and sauce over warm flour or corn tortillas, and enjoy!

recipe.name: Grilled Pork and Vegetable Skewers
main_ingredients: 1 pound pork, cut into 1-inch pieces (1 pound)
2 medium carrots, peeled and cut into 1-inch pieces (1 pound)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Step 2. Thread pork and carrots onto skewers, leaving a little space between each piece. Step 3. Brush skewers with olive oil. Step 4. Season with salt to taste. Step 5. Grill skewers for 10-12 minutes, turning occasionally.

recipe.name: Broccoli Kombu Stir-Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat sesame oil in a pan over medium heat. Add sliced mushroom and sauté for 2 minutes. Step 2. Add broccoli florets and cook for an additional 3 minutes, or until tender but still crisp. Step 3. Add shredded kombu and stir-fry for 1 minute. Step 4. Season with salt to taste. Step 5. Serve hot and garnish with additional sesame seeds if desired.

recipe.name: Garlic and Tomato Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add sliced mushrooms and cook for 3-4 minutes until browned. Step 2. Add sliced celery and cook for an additional 2 minutes. Step 3. Add minced garlic and cook for 1 minute. Step 4. Add trimmed asparagus and cook for 2-3 minutes until tender. Step 5. Add sliced eggplant and diced tomato, cook for 2-3 minutes until the vegetables are tender. Step 6. Squeeze lemon juice over the top and serve.
recipe.note: You are missing onion from the recipe. You can add it to your shopping list to complete the dish.

recipe.name: Papas con Queso Fresco y Cebolla (Mexican Potato and Queso Fresco with Onion)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add 1 tablespoon of oil and sauté the diced potatoes until they're golden brown, about 5 minutes. Step 2. Remove the potatoes from the skillet and set aside. Step 3. In the same skillet, add another tablespoon of oil and sauté the sliced onion until it's translucent, about 3-4 minutes. Step 4. Add the minced garlic to the skillet and sauté for 1 minute, until fragrant. Step 5. Add the cooked potatoes back into the skillet, crumbled queso fresco, and mix well. Season with salt to taste.
recipe.note: This recipe is a traditional Mexican dish, and it's perfect for a quick and delicious meal.

recipe.name: Grilled Shrimp and Bok Choy Skewers
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the grill to medium-high heat. Step 2. Thread shrimp, bok choy, and corn onto skewers, leaving a small space between each item. Step 3. Drizzle olive oil over the skewers and season with salt and pepper. Step 4. Grill the skewers for 8-10 minutes, turning occasionally, until the shrimp are pink and the vegetables are tender. Step 5. Serve hot, garnished with chopped spinach and a squeeze of lemon.
recipe.note: Traditional Mediterranean dishes often include olive oil, lemon, and feta cheese. Since these ingredients are not in your inventory, substitutes have been used.

recipe.name: Non-Dairy Chicken-Free Fried Rice
main_ingredients: butter substitute (e.g., vegan butter or margarine) (2 tbsp)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of vegan butter substitute in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the mushroom and scramble until it's tender and lightly browned.
Step 2. Push the mushroom mixture to one side of the skillet. Crack 1-2 eggs (since there are no eggs left you may have to skip this in this case, or replace the eggs) into the other side of the skillet and scramble them, breaking them up into small pieces as they cook. Then mix the eggs with the mushroom mixture.
Step 3. Add the cooked rice to the skillet, breaking up any clumps with a spatula.
Step 4. Stir-fry the rice mixture with the mushroom and eggs for about 5 minutes, until everything is well combined and heated through.
Step 5. Taste and adjust the seasoning as needed. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Pork Belly with Tomato and Spinach
main_ingredients: 4 slices of pork belly (1 inch thick)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat a skillet over medium-high heat. Season the pork belly with salt, pepper, and smoked paprika. Step 2. Sear the pork belly in the skillet for 2-3 minutes on each side, until it reaches a nice golden brown. Step 3. Remove the pork belly from the skillet and set it aside to rest. Step 4. In the same skillet, add the olive oil and sauté the sliced tomatoes for 2-3 minutes, until they start to soften. Step 5. Add the chopped spinach to the skillet and cook until it's wilted, then serve with the pan-seared pork belly.

recipe.name: Scallop and Kale Stir Fry with Quinoa and Cabbage
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cook quinoa according to package instructions. Set aside. Step 2. In a large skillet, heat 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil over medium-high heat. Add the scallops and cook for 2-3 minutes per side, until browned and cooked through. Remove the scallops from the skillet and set aside. Step 3. In the same skillet, add the remaining 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil. Add the chopped kale and cook until wilted, about 3-4 minutes. Step 4. Add the shredded cabbage and grated carrot to the skillet and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, until the cabbage is slightly tender. Step 5. Add the cooked quinoa, soy sauce, salt, and pepper to the skillet. Stir to combine. Step 6. Return the scallops to the skillet and stir to combine with the quinoa mixture. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Italian Tuna Fritters
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 200°C (400°F). Step 2. In a large bowl, combine the grated potato, flaked tuna, diced bacon, and a pinch of salt. Step 3. Mix well until everything is fully incorporated. Step 4. Using your hands, shape the mixture into small patties. Step 5. Place the patties on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper and bake for 15-20 minutes, or until golden brown.

recipe.name: Mussel and Tomato Stew
recipe.steps: Step 1. Rinse the mussels and discard any broken shells. Set aside. Step 2. In a large pot, sauté the celery and tomatoes in a little oil until tender. Step 3. Add the cashews and cook for another minute. Step 4. Add the mussels, sardines, and enough white wine to cover the mussels. Step 5. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 5-7 minutes or until the mussels open.

recipe.name: Crispy Chicken and Broccoli Bites
main_ingredients: chicken breast (1 cup, cut into bite-sized pieces)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. In a shallow dish, mix together 1/4 cup of vegetable oil and 2 tbsp of maple syrup. Add the chicken pieces and toss to coat evenly.
Step 2. Heat a non-stick skillet over medium-high heat. Remove the chicken from the marinade, allowing any excess to drip off.
Step 3. Add the chicken to the skillet and cook for 5-7 minutes on each side or until cooked through.
Step 4. In a separate pan, heat a tablespoon of vegetable oil over medium heat. Add the broccoli florets and cook until tender, about 3-5 minutes.
Step 5. Serve the crispy chicken bites with steamed broccoli and enjoy!

recipe.name: Mexican Mussels and Mushroom Fajitas
recipe.steps: Step 1. Rinse the mussels under cold water and remove the beard. Step 2. In a large skillet, heat 1 tablespoon of oil over medium heat. Add the sliced almonds and cook until lightly browned, about 3-4 minutes. Step 3. Add the sliced mushrooms to the skillet and cook until they release their liquid and start to brown, about 5 minutes. Step 4. Add the mussels to the skillet, sprinkle with sugar, and cook until they start to open, about 2-3 minutes. Step 5. Add the sliced carrots to the skillet and cook until they are tender, about 5 minutes. Step 6. Serve the mussels and vegetables hot, garnished with chopped cilantro if desired.

recipe.name: Vegetarian Quinoa Bowl
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C). Step 2. In a medium saucepan, bring 2 cups of water to a boil. Add quinoa, cover, reduce heat to low and simmer for 15-20 minutes or until water has been absorbed. Step 3. Toss diced potato with 1 tablespoon of olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Spread on a baking sheet and roast in the oven for 20-25 minutes or until tender. Step 4. In a large skillet, heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil over medium-high heat. Add sliced mushrooms and cook for 5-7 minutes or until tender. Add chopped broccoli and cook for an additional 3-5 minutes. Step 5. In a large bowl, combine cooked quinoa, roasted potatoes, sautéed mushrooms and broccoli, and chopped kale.

recipe.name: Stir-Fried Bok Choy with Sichuan Pepper Crust
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a wok or large skillet over high heat. Add the crushed sichuan pepper and cook for 1 minute, until fragrant. Step 2. Add the sliced onion and cook for 3 minutes, until translucent. Step 3. Add the grated ginger and cook for another minute. Step 4. Add the bok choy and diced tomato, and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes, until the vegetables are tender but still crisp. Step 5. Squeeze the lemon juice over the stir-fry and serve immediately.

recipe.name: Grilled Chicken and Cucumber Salad
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Season the chicken breasts with salt and pepper. Grill the chicken for 5-6 minutes per side, or until cooked through. Step 2. In a large bowl, combine sliced cucumber, cooked black beans, and chopped kale. Step 3. Once the chicken is cooked, let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it thinly. Add the sliced chicken to the bowl with the cucumber mixture. Step 4. In a small bowl, whisk together a vinaigrette of your choice (e.g., olive oil, lemon juice, Dijon mustard). Step 5. Pour the vinaigrette over the salad and toss to combine.

recipe.name: Mexican Oregano Roasted Broccoli
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Wash the broccoli and cut it into florets. Toss with 1 tablespoon of mexican oregano, salt, and pepper. Spread on a baking sheet and roast for 15 minutes. Step 2. Squeeze the roasted broccoli with lime juice and toss with chopped avocado. Step 3. Add fresh spinach to the broccoli mixture and toss. Step 4. Serve hot, garnished with additional mexican oregano if desired.

recipe.name: Hearty Quinoa Bowl
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Slice the potato and zucchini into thin rounds. Step 2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cooked kidney beans, quinoa, cucumber slices, and chopped zucchini. Step 3. Transfer the quinoa mixture to a baking dish and top with the sliced potatoes. Step 4. Drizzle with olive oil and bake for 25-30 minutes or until the potatoes are tender. Step 5. Serve hot, garnished with fresh herbs.
recipe.note: This recipe uses available ingredients, but eggs and bell pepper are not included due to unavailability in the inventory.

recipe.name: Mexican Tacos de Hongos
recipe.steps: Step 1. Chop the mushroom into small pieces and sauté in a pan until tender. Step 2. Add a pinch of salt and pepper to taste. Step 3. Warm the tortillas by wrapping them in a damp paper towel and microwaving for 20-30 seconds. Step 4. Assemble the tacos by spooning the mushroom mixture onto a tortilla and topping with a sprinkle of queso fresco. Step 5. Serve immediately and garnish with chopped cilantro.

recipe.name: Grilled Squid and Ground Beef Fajitas
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add sliced onion and cook until softened, about 3-4 minutes.
Step 2. Add garlic and cook for 1 minute, until fragrant.
Step 3. Add ground beef and cook, breaking it up with a spoon, until browned, about 5-7 minutes.
Step 4. Add sliced squid and cook until opaque and slightly charred, about 3-4 minutes per side.
Step 5. Add broccoli, cumin, and chili powder to the skillet and cook until broccoli is tender, about 5 minutes.
Step 6. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Step 7. Serve hot, garnished with sliced tomatoes.

recipe.name: Vegetarian Quinoa Bowl with Peanut Sauce
main_ingredients: kidney beans (1 cup, drained and rinsed)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Rinse the quinoa in a fine-mesh strainer and soak it in water for 10 minutes. Drain the quinoa and transfer it to a medium saucepan. Add 2 cups of water and bring to a boil. Reduce the heat to low, cover, and simmer for 15-20 minutes, or until the quinoa is tender and fluffy. Step 2. Meanwhile, in a blender or food processor, combine the peanuts, 2 tablespoons of water, and a pinch of salt. Blend until smooth and creamy. Step 3. In a large skillet, heat 1 tablespoon of oil over medium heat. Add the cubed tofu and cook until golden brown on all sides, about 5-7 minutes. Step 4. In a separate pan, heat another tablespoon of oil over medium heat. Add the kidney beans and cook until heated through. Step 5. To assemble the bowls, divide the cooked quinoa between two bowls. Top with the tofu, kidney beans, and a drizzle of peanut sauce.

recipe.name: Mediterranean Pork Belly and Kale Skewers
main_ingredients: 2 cups kale, stems removed and leaves chopped
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Thread pork belly, onion, garlic, and kale onto skewers.
Step 2. In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil and lime juice. Brush the mixture evenly onto both sides of the skewers.
Step 3. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Step 4. Grill the skewers for 10-12 minutes, or until the pork is cooked through and the kale is tender.
Step 5. Serve immediately and enjoy!
recipe.note: This recipe showcases the flavors of the Mediterranean through the use of pork belly and lime, while the kale adds a nice crunch and freshness.

recipe.name: Korean Garlic Mushroom Stir Fry
main_ingredients: 1 cup mushroom (sliced), 4 cloves garlic (minced), 1 chicken breast (sliced), 2 cups spinach
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chicken breast and cook until browned, about 5 minutes. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.
Step 2. In the same skillet, add the minced garlic and cook for 1 minute until fragrant.
Step 3. Add the sliced mushroom and cook until they release their liquid and start to brown, about 3-4 minutes.
Step 4. Add the cooked rice, spinach, sliced potato, and crab to the skillet. Stir-fry everything together for 2-3 minutes until combined.
Step 5. Return the cooked chicken to the skillet and stir-fry for another minute until everything is well combined. Season with your favorite Korean chili flakes and serve hot.

recipe.name: Lentil and Cod Stew
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat a large pan over medium heat. Step 2. Add 1 tablespoon of oil and sauté the cod for 3-4 minutes on each side. Step 3. Remove the cod from the pan and set aside. Step 4. Add another tablespoon of oil and sauté the lentils for 5 minutes. Step 5. Add 1 cup of water and bring to a boil. Step 6. Reduce heat, add the spinach, and let simmer for 10 minutes.
recipe.note: A delicious and easy-to-make stew using the ingredients you have available.

recipe.name: Shrimp and Lentil Stir Fry
main_ingredients: 1 cup mixed vegetables (e.g., bell peppers, carrots)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cook the lentils according to package instructions and set aside. Step 2. Heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Step 3. Add the shrimp and cook until pink and cooked through, about 2-3 minutes per side. Remove from skillet and set aside. Step 4. In the same skillet, add the remaining 1 tablespoon of olive oil. Step 5. Add the mixed vegetables and cook until tender, about 3-4 minutes. Step 6. Add the cooked shrimp back into the skillet, along with the cooked lentils, soy sauce, garlic, and ginger. Stir-fry for an additional 1-2 minutes until combined.

recipe.name: Vietnamese Grilled Pork Belly with Sauteed Scallops
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Step 2. Cut pork belly into 1-inch thick slices and season with salt and pepper. Step 3. Grill pork belly for 5-6 minutes per side or until cooked through. Step 4. Meanwhile, heat a pan with some oil and sauté scallops until cooked through. Step 5. Serve pork belly with scallops and sautéed lettuce and carrot.

recipe.name: Korean-Style Lentil and Zucchini Stir-Fry
main_ingredients: sweet potato (1 medium, peeled and diced)
recipe.steps:
Step 1: In a medium saucepan, combine the lentils and 2 cups of water. Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to a simmer and cook until the lentils are tender, about 15-20 minutes. Drain and set aside.

Step 2: In a large skillet or wok, heat 2 tablespoons of oil over medium-high heat. Add the sliced zucchini and cook until tender, about 3-4 minutes.

Step 3: Add the cauliflower to the skillet and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, until it starts to brown.

Step 4: Add the diced sweet potato to the skillet and cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.

Step 5: Stir in the cooked lentils, chopped peanuts, and chopped kale. Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, until the kale has wilted. Serve hot, garnished with shredded lettuce.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Scallops with Broccoli and Onion Medley
recipe.steps: Step 1. Rinse the scallops under cold water and pat them dry with paper towels. Season with salt and pepper. Step 2. In a large skillet, heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil over medium-high heat. Add the chopped onion and sauté until translucent, about 5 minutes. Step 3. Add the minced garlic and chopped broccoli to the skillet and continue to cook for an additional 3-4 minutes. Step 4. Add the scallops to the skillet and sear for 2-3 minutes on each side or until golden brown and cooked through. Step 5. Remove the scallops from the skillet and place on a plate. Stir in chopped cashews and cook for 1 minute. Step 6. Return the scallops to the skillet and toss with the onion and broccoli mixture. Serve immediately.

recipe.name: Vietnamese-Style Stir-Fried Mussels
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of coconut oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add the mussels and cook until they open, about 3-4 minutes.
