Remove the mussels from the skillet and set aside. Step 2. In the same skillet, add the remaining 1 tablespoon of coconut oil. Add the minced garlic and cook for 1 minute, until fragrant. Step 3. Add the cauliflower florets to the skillet and cook for 4-5 minutes, until they start to soften. Step 4. Add the chopped spinach to the skillet and cook until wilted, about 1-2 minutes. Step 5. Return the mussels to the skillet and stir in the fish sauce, lime juice, chili flakes, and ground black pepper. Cook for an additional 1-2 minutes, until the flavors are well combined.

recipe.name: Garlic and Carrot Stir Fry with Salmon
main_ingredients: salmon (4 oz), garlic (3 cloves), carrot (2 medium), pepper (1 tsp)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tsp of oil in a pan over medium heat. Add 3 cloves of minced garlic and sauté until fragrant. 
Step 2. Add 2 medium sliced carrots and cook for 3-4 minutes until tender. 
Step 3. In a separate pan, cook 4 oz of salmon fillet over medium heat for 3-4 minutes per side or until cooked through. 
Step 4. In a small bowl, mix 1 tsp of flour with 1 tsp of water to create a slurry. Add the slurry to the pan with the carrots and stir for 1 minute. 
Step 5. Serve the cooked salmon on top of the carrot stir fry and garnish with sliced pepper.

recipe.name: Garlic and Carrot Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Chop the carrot, lettuce, and celery into bite-sized pieces. Heat 1 tablespoon of butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Step 2. Add the chopped garlic and sauté for 1 minute until fragrant. Step 3. Add the chopped carrots, lettuce, and celery to the skillet. Step 4. Cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the vegetables start to soften. Step 5. Add the cooked rice to the skillet and stir to combine with the vegetables. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

recipe.name: Japanese-Style Pan-Seared Celery with Yuzu Sauce
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat with a small amount of water. Add sliced celery and cook until slightly tender, about 3-4 minutes. Step 2. In a small bowl, whisk together yuzu juice, soy sauce, sesame seeds, and salt. Step 3. Add the yuzu sauce mixture to the pan with the celery and stir to combine. Step 4. Sprinkle grated wasabi on top of the celery and stir-fry for another minute. Step 5. Serve immediately and garnish with additional sesame seeds if desired.

recipe.name: Bruschetta con Prosciutto e Mozzarella
recipe.steps:
Step 1: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Slice the baguette into 1-inch thick slices and toast until lightly browned.
Step 2: Meanwhile, combine minced garlic and chopped oregano in a bowl.
Step 3: Slice prosciutto into thin strips and set aside.
Step 4: Slice the mozzarella cheese into thin slices and set aside.
Step 5: Assemble the bruschetta by spreading garlic-oregano mixture on toasted baguette slices, topping with prosciutto and mozzarella cheese, and garnishing with pine nuts.

recipe.name: Thai-Style Beef and Vegetable Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1: Heat butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add garlic and Thai chili, stir-fry until fragrant. Add ground beef, cook until browned, breaking it up into small pieces. Step 2: Add the cooked rice to the skillet, stir-fry for 2 minutes. Step 3: Add the spinach and tomato, stir-fry until the spinach is wilted. Step 4: Season with your desired amount of salt and pepper. Step 5: Serve hot.

recipe.name: Scallop and Vegetable Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the scallops and cook until golden brown, about 2-3 minutes per side. Step 2. Remove the scallops from the wok and set aside. Step 3. Add another tablespoon of oil to the wok and stir-fry the zucchini, carrot, and bell pepper until tender-crisp, about 3-4 minutes. Step 4. Add the chopped cashews and stir-fry for another minute. Step 5. Return the scallops to the wok and stir-fry everything together for 1 minute. Step 6. Serve the scallop and vegetable mixture over toasted bread.

recipe.name: Sun-Dried Tomato Focaccia Bread
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 220°C (425°F). Step 2. In a large mixing bowl, combine 500g of flour, 5g of sugar, and 1 teaspoon of salt. Step 3. Gradually add 20g of olive oil and mix until the dough comes together. Step 4. Knead the dough for 10 minutes until smooth and elastic. Step 5. Roll out the dough to a thickness of 2cm and transfer to a baking sheet. Step 6. Top with sun-dried tomatoes, minced garlic, and a sprinkle of parmesan cheese. Step 7. Bake for 20-25 minutes or until the bread is golden brown.

recipe.name: Vegan Sweet Potato and Black Bean Tacos
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). Pierce the sweet potatoes with a fork a few times and bake for 45-50 minutes, or until tender when pierced with a fork. Step 2. While the sweet potatoes are baking, heat a tablespoon of oil in a pan over medium heat. Add the onion and garlic and cook until softened, about 5 minutes. Step 3. Add the cooked black beans to the pan and stir to combine with the onion and garlic. Step 4. Warm the corn tortillas by wrapping them in a damp paper towel and microwaving for 20-30 seconds. Step 5. Assemble the tacos by slicing the roasted sweet potatoes and adding them to the tortillas along with the black bean mixture and any desired toppings.

recipe.name: Spicy Seaweed Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Rehydrate dried seaweed in water for 5 minutes. Drain excess water and chop into smaller pieces.
Step 2. Heat a pan with a little oil over medium heat. Add crushed anchovy and stir for 1 minute.
Step 3. Add sliced bell pepper and cook until it's tender. 
Step 4. Add chopped seaweed, soy sauce, and korean chili pepper. Stir well and cook for 2 more minutes.
Step 5. Season with pepper to taste and serve.

recipe.name: Lobster and Sardine Free Mediterranean Stew
main_ingredients: loin-free Mediterranean herb marinade mix (2 tbsp)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add marinade mix and cook for 1 minute.
Step 2. Add the sliced onion and cook, stirring occasionally until softened, about 5 minutes.
Step 3. Add the zucchini, cauliflower, and asparagus to the skillet. Cook, stirring occasionally until the vegetables are tender, about 10 minutes.
Step 4. Season the stew with salt and pepper to taste.
Step 5. Serve the stew hot, garnished with lemon wedges and fresh Mediterranean herbs.

recipe.name: Grilled Squid with Brussels Sprouts
recipe.steps: Step 1. Rinse the squid under cold water, pat dry with paper towels, and set aside. Rinse the Brussels sprouts, trim the ends, and cut in half. Step 2. Heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the Brussels sprouts and cook until browned, about 5 minutes. Step 3. Add the shrimp and cook until pink, about 2-3 minutes per side. Step 4. Meanwhile, brush the squid rings with the remaining 1 tablespoon of olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Step 5. Grill the squid over medium heat for 2-3 minutes per side until cooked through. Serve with the Brussels sprouts and shrimp.

recipe.name: Greek-Style Pasta Bake
recipe.steps:
Step 1: Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C). Cook the pasta in boiling water until al dente. Drain and set aside.
Step 2: In a pan, heat 1 tablespoon of oil over medium heat. Add the sliced eggplant and cook until tender. Set aside.
Step 3: In the same pan, add the ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it up with a spoon as it cooks.
Step 4: In a large bowl, combine the cooked pasta, eggplant, and ground beef mixture. Mix in the crumbled feta cheese, dried oregano, and chopped parsley.
Step 5: Transfer the pasta mixture to a baking dish and bake in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.

recipe.name: Creamless Quinoa Stuffed Pasta Bake
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). Cook pasta according to package instructions, then set aside. Step 2. In a skillet, heat some water and cook the "bacon" slices until crispy, then set aside. Step 3. In the same skillet, cook the chickpeas with some water until they start to brown. Step 4. In a large mixing bowl, combine cooked quinoa, shredded cabbage, chickpeas, and cooked pasta. Step 5. In a greased baking dish, combine the pasta mixture and top with crispy "bacon" slices. Step 6. Bake in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes.

recipe.name: Spinach and Egg Scramble
recipe.steps: Step 1. Crack the eggs into a bowl, whisk them together, and set aside. Step 2. Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat and add the chopped lettuce. Step 3. Add the fresh spinach to the pan and cook until wilted. Step 4. Pour the whisked eggs over the spinach mixture and scramble everything together. Step 5. Add the chopped tomato to the pan and stir it in. Step 6. Cook for an additional 2 minutes and serve hot.

recipe.name: Italian Pancetta and Mushroom Risotto
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add pancetta and cook until crispy, then set aside. Step 2. In the same skillet, cook the sliced mushrooms until they release their liquid and start to brown. Step 3. In a large pot, combine diced carrot, minced garlic, vegetable broth, and white wine. Step 4. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for 3-4 minutes or until the carrot is slightly tender. Step 5. Stir in Arborio rice and cook for 2-3 minutes or until it starts to toast. Step 6. Start adding the hot broth mixture, one ladle at a time, stirring constantly until the rice is cooked and creamy.

recipe.name: Paleo Sweet Potato and Vegetable Hash
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Toss the sweet potato with 1 tablespoon of olive oil and season with salt. Spread on a baking sheet and roast for 20-25 minutes, or until tender.
Step 2. While the sweet potato is cooking, heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the diced tomatoes and cook for 5-7 minutes, or until they start to release their juices.
Step 3. Add the corn, diced cucumber, and minced garlic to the skillet with the tomatoes. Cook for an additional 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Step 4. Add the chopped kale to the skillet and cook until wilted, about 2-3 minutes.
Step 5. To assemble the hash, place the roasted sweet potato on a serving plate and top with the vegetable mixture.

recipe.name: Nutritional Yeast and Asparagus Stir-Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 2 tbsp of oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks.
Step 2. Add the asparagus to the skillet and cook for 3-4 minutes, or until tender but still crisp.
Step 3. In a small bowl, mix together the nutritional yeast and a squeeze of lime juice (if available, or omit). Add this mixture to the skillet and stir-fry for 1-2 minutes.
Step 4. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Step 5. Serve hot and garnish with fresh herbs if desired.
recipe.note: This recipe uses the available ingredients in your inventory, but note that the recipe was not able to include the lime juice due to its unavailability.

recipe.name: Thai Basil Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Chop the bell pepper and mushroom into bite-sized pieces. Step 2. Heat the olive oil in a pan over medium-high heat. Step 3. Add the ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it up with a spoon as it cooks. Step 4. Add the bell pepper and mushroom to the pan and cook until they start to soften. Step 5. Add the Thai basil to the pan and stir-fry for 1-2 minutes until the vegetables are tender. Step 6. Squeeze the lime juice over the top of the stir fry and serve immediately.

recipe.name: Tofu and Vegetable Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cook pasta according to package instructions and set aside. Step 2. In a large skillet, heat a couple of tablespoons of oil over medium heat. Add the sliced eggplant and cook for about 5 minutes, until tender. Step 3. Add the minced garlic and cook for another minute. Step 4. Add the chopped cabbage and grated carrots to the skillet and cook for about 3-4 minutes, until they begin to soften. Step 5. Finally, add the cubed tofu to the skillet and stir to combine with the vegetables. Add the cooked pasta and toss everything together to combine.

recipe.name: Mexican Black Bean and Chicken Fajitas
main_ingredients: 1 lb chicken breast, cut into thin strips
1 cup black beans, drained and rinsed
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat butter in a large skillet over medium-high. Add chicken and cook until browned, about 5 minutes. Remove from skillet and set aside. Step 2. Add more butter if necessary, then add black beans and cook until slightly browned, about 3-4 minutes. Step 3. Add Mexican oregano, epazote, and cook for 1 minute, stirring constantly. Step 4. Return chicken to skillet, stir to combine with bean mixture. Step 5. Cook for an additional 2 minutes, until heated through. Serve with your favorite toppings.

recipe.name: Indian-Style Lentil Curry
main_ingredients: 1 cup red or brown lentils, rinsed and drained
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a large pan over medium heat. Add chopped onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
Step 2. Add the sliced bell peppers and cook for another 5 minutes, until they start to soften.
Step 3. Add 2 cups of water and bring the mixture to a boil. Reduce the heat to low and simmer for 20 minutes.
Step 4. In a separate pan, cook 1 tablespoon of oil over medium heat. Add 1 cup of lentils and cook for 5 minutes, until they're lightly browned.
Step 5. Add the cooked lentils to the large pan with the bell peppers and onions. Season with salt and sugar to taste. Serve hot, garnished with chopped cilantro if desired.

recipe.name: Vegetarian Chinese Quinoa Bowl
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Cook quinoa according to package instructions and set aside.
Step 2. In a pan, heat 1 tablespoon of oil over medium heat. Add minced garlic and sauté until fragrant.
Step 3. Add diced onion and sauté until translucent.
Step 4. Stir in cooked black beans, cottage cheese, and a pinch of soy sauce (optional). Cook for 2-3 minutes.
Step 5. In a large bowl, combine cooked quinoa, the black bean and cottage cheese mixture, and chopped almonds. Toss to combine.
Step 6. Serve hot and garnish with chopped green onions (if available).

recipe.name: Tandoori Lamb Chops with Tomato Broccoli Raita
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat your oven to 200°C (400°F). In a blender, combine yogurt, lemon juice, cumin powder, coriander powder, garam masala, and red chili powder. Blend until smooth. Set aside. Step 2. In a large bowl, whisk together ginger, garlic, and cilantro. Add lamb chops and marinate for at least 30 minutes, refrigerated. Step 3. Remove lamb chops from the marinade, letting any excess liquid drip off. Step 4. In a large skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat. Add lamb chops and cook until browned, about 2-3 minutes per side. Transfer the skillet to the preheated oven and cook for 12-15 minutes or until the lamb chops are cooked to your desired level of doneness. Step 5. Meanwhile, steam broccoli florets until tender. Step 6. In a bowl, combine steamed broccoli, diced tomatoes, and a pinch of salt. Serve with tandoori lamb chops and a dollop of raita (yogurt mixture).

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Scallops with Asparagus and Rice
recipe.steps: Step 1. Rinse the scallops under cold water and pat them dry with paper towels. Step 2. Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat and add the scallops. Cook for 2-3 minutes per side, or until opaque and cooked through. Step 3. In a separate pan, heat a tablespoon of oil over medium heat and add the asparagus. Cook for 3-4 minutes per side, or until tender. Step 4. Cook the rice according to package instructions. Step 5. Serve the scallops and asparagus on top of the cooked rice.

recipe.name: American-Style Bacon Cheddar Burger
recipe.steps: Step 5. Serve the burgers with a side of ketchup or your favorite condiment.

recipe.name: Baked Cod with Bacon and Mussels
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil.

Step 2. Wrap each cod fillet with 2 slices of bacon and place on the baking sheet.

Step 3. In a separate pan, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add garlic and sauté for 1 minute until fragrant.

Step 4. Add mussels to the pan and cook until they start to open. Remove from heat and set aside.

Step 5. Bake the cod in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes or until cooked through. Serve with mussels on top.

recipe.name: Tofu and Kale Teriyaki Bowl
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cook quinoa according to package instructions. Step 2. Cut the onion and bell pepper into thin slices and sauté in a pan with a little oil until softened. Step 3. Add the cubed tofu and cook until golden brown. Step 4. In a separate pan, whisk together 2 tablespoons of soy sauce, 2 tablespoons of maple syrup, and 1 tablespoon of rice vinegar. Bring the mixture to a boil and then reduce the heat to a simmer. Step 5. Add the kale and black beans to the pan and cook until the kale is wilted. Step 6. To assemble the bowls, place a scoop of cooked quinoa, then top with the tofu and vegetable mixture, and drizzle with the teriyaki sauce.
recipe.note: This recipe uses a mixture of soy sauce and maple syrup to create a sweet and savory teriyaki sauce that is free from animal products.

recipe.name: Cinnamon Lemon Pasta
main_ingredients: cinnamon (2 tsp), sugar (2 tsp), lemon (1/2), coriander (1 tsp)
recipe.steps: Step 1: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil and cook the pasta according to package instructions until al dente. Reserve 1 cup of pasta water before draining. Step 2: In a large skillet, heat 1 tablespoon of oil over medium heat. Add 1/4 cup of sugar and cook, stirring occasionally, until caramelized. This should take about 5 minutes. Step 3: Zest the lemon and mix it with cinnamon, sugar, and coriander in a small bowl. Step 4: Add the cooked pasta to the skillet with the caramelized sugar and toss to combine, adding some reserved pasta water if the pasta seems dry. Step 5: Stir in the cinnamon-lemon mixture and cook for an additional 1-2 minutes, until fragrant. Serve immediately.

recipe.name: Italian Roasted Vegetables with Balsamic Glaze
main_ingredients: 2 tbsp olive oil (not in inventory, but can be added or substituted with balsamic vinegar)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Toss the tomatoes and rosemary in a bowl with 1 tbsp olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Spread them on a baking sheet and roast for 20 minutes. Step 2. In a saucepan, reduce the balsamic vinegar over medium heat until thickened to a glaze. Step 3. Remove the tomatoes from the oven and toss them with the balsamic glaze. Step 4. Arrange the tomatoes on a serving plate and garnish with capers. Step 5. Serve warm, topped with chopped pecorino (optional).

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Duck Breast with Chicken and Tomato Salad
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat a non-stick pan over medium heat and add the duck breast. Cook for 5 minutes on each side, until it reaches your desired level of doneness. Let it rest for 5 minutes before slicing.
Step 2. Slice the chicken breast into thin strips and season with salt and pepper. In the same pan, add the chicken and cook until browned and cooked through.
Step 3. In a separate pan, heat the olive oil over medium heat and add the sliced bell peppers. Cook until they are tender and lightly browned.
Step 4. Cut the cooked chicken and duck into thin strips and combine them with the cooked bell peppers.
Step 5. Slice the tomatoes in half and add them to the pan, tossing gently to combine with the chicken and duck. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Step 6. Serve the salad warm, garnished with fresh herbs if desired.

recipe.name: Garlic and Mushroom Stir-Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a wok over medium-high heat. Add garlic and mushrooms; cook, stirring occasionally, until mushrooms release their moisture and start to brown, about 5 minutes.
Step 2. Add the sliced celery; cook, stirring occasionally, until it starts to soften, about 3 minutes.
Step 3. Add the chopped lettuce; cook, stirring occasionally, until it starts to wilt, about 2 minutes.
Step 4. Add the lime and lemon juice; stir to combine.
Step 5. Serve the stir-fry immediately, garnished with additional lime wedges if desired.

recipe.name: Grilled Tofu with Roasted Broccoli
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Step 2. Cut tofu into cubes and season with mackerel for added flavor. Step 3. Grill tofu for 10 minutes on each side. Step 4. Toss broccoli with a pinch of salt and a drizzle of water. Step 5. Roast broccoli in the oven at 400°F (200°C) for 15 minutes.

recipe.name: Spinach and Mushroom Stir-Fry
main_ingredients: 2 cups mixed mushrooms (1 cup, sliced and 1 cup whole)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. In a large skillet or wok, melt 1 tablespoon of butter over medium-high heat. Add sliced onion and cook until translucent, about 3-4 minutes.
Step 2. Add sliced bell pepper and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, until tender.
Step 3. Add sliced mushrooms and cook until they release their liquid and start to brown, about 5 minutes.
Step 4. Add chopped spinach and cook until wilted, about 1-2 minutes.
Step 5. Season with salt and pepper to taste, then serve hot, garnished with additional spinach if desired.

recipe.name: Thai Basil Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tbsp of oil in a pan over medium heat. Add Thai Curry Paste and stir-fry for 1 minute.
Step 2. Add eggs and scramble them. Set aside.
Step 3. Add the remaining 1 tbsp of oil to the pan. Add Thai Basil and stir-fry until fragrant.
Step 4. Add the scrambled eggs back into the pan with Thai Basil. Stir-fry for 1 minute.
Step 5. Add Tamarind Paste and pepper to taste. Stir-fry for another minute.
Step 6. Serve with steamed Rice.

recipe.name: Pork Belly and Pork Chop Glazed Ribs with Sweet Potato Mash
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Step 2. In a small bowl, whisk together soy sauce, brown sugar, and rice vinegar. Brush the mixture evenly onto both sides of the pork belly and pork chop pieces. Cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or overnight. Step 3. Remove the pork belly and pork chop from the refrigerator and let them sit at room temperature for 30 minutes. Step 4. Place the pork belly and pork chop on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Roast in the preheated oven for 25 minutes, then brush with the pan juices and continue roasting for an additional 10-15 minutes, or until the pork is golden brown and crispy. Step 5. Meanwhile, boil the sliced sweet potatoes in salted water until tender. Drain and mash with butter and milk. Step 6. Heat a tablespoon of oil in a pan over medium heat. Add the sliced tomatoes and cook until they start to soften. Add a pinch of salt and pepper to taste. Step 7. To serve, place a portion of the sweet potato mash on a plate, then top with a pork belly and pork chop piece, and garnish with the pan-fried tomatoes.

recipe.name: Broccoli and Sugar Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a pan over medium heat. Add sliced onion and cook until softened for 3 minutes. Step 2. Add sliced mushroom and cook for another 3 minutes, until they release their moisture and start browning. Step 3. Add broccoli florets and cook for 5 minutes, until they begin to soften. Step 4. Sprinkle sugar over the broccoli and continue cooking for another 2 minutes, until it caramelizes. Step 5. Serve hot, garnished with chopped peanuts.
recipe.note: This recipe showcases the sweetness of broccoli when cooked with sugar.

recipe.name: Tom Yum Soup
recipe.steps:
Step 1: Peel and slice the carrots into thin strips. Heat oil in a pan over medium heat and sauté them until they start to soften. 
                Step 2: Add in sliced tomatoes and cook until they start to break down. 
                Step 3: Add coconut milk and bring the mixture to a simmer. 
                Step 4: Add Thai chilies, sliced or pounded into a paste depending on desired heat level. 
                Step 5: Cook the soup for a further 5 minutes, allowing the flavors to meld together. 
                Step 6: Add rice noodles to the soup and cook for 2-3 minutes, or until they're slightly softened.

recipe.name: Bengali Crab and Edamame Curry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat oil in a pan and sauté the mackerel until it's cooked halfway through. Remove the mackerel and set aside. Step 2. In the same pan, add the edamame, kidney beans, and broccoli. Cook until the vegetables are slightly tender. Step 3. Add the flaked crab to the pan and stir well. Step 4. Add the nutritional yeast, milk, and cooked mackerel back to the pan. Step 5. Season the curry with salt and pepper to taste. Simmer for 10 more minutes.

recipe.name: Beef and Broccoli Stir-Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks. Step 2. Remove the beef from the wok and set aside. Step 3. Add the broccoli and onion to the wok and cook until the vegetables are tender. Step 4. Return the beef to the wok and stir in the cooked rice, sugar, and pepper. Step 5. Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, until the ingredients are well combined. Step 6. Serve hot and enjoy!

recipe.name: Creamy Zucchini and Cauliflower Fritters with Kale
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). In a large bowl, combine grated zucchini, cauliflower, sweet potato, and black beans. In a separate bowl, whisk together milk, egg, and a pinch of salt and pepper. Step 2. Add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients and stir until well combined. Step 3. Stir in breadcrumbs and Parmesan cheese. Step 4. Using a 1/4 cup measuring cup, scoop the mixture into balls and flatten slightly into patties. Step 5. Place the patties on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper and bake for 15-20 minutes or until golden brown.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Spinach Tempura with Sesame Seeds
recipe.steps: Step 1. In a shallow dish, mix together sesame seeds and a pinch of salt. Step 2. Dip each spinach leaf into the sesame seed mixture, coating both sides evenly. Step 3. Heat about 2-3 inches of vegetable oil in a large frying pan over medium-high heat. Step 4. Carefully place the coated spinach leaves into the hot oil and fry until golden brown (about 2-3 minutes per side). Step 5. Using a slotted spoon, remove the tempura from the oil and place on a paper towel-lined plate to drain excess oil. Step 6. Squeeze a slice of lemon over the top of the spinach and sprinkle with additional sesame seeds if desired.

recipe.name: Keto Chinese Stir-Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Cut the lamb chop and chicken thigh into bite-sized pieces and set aside. 
             Step 2. In a large skillet or wok, heat the coconut oil over medium-high heat. 
             Step 3. Add the garlic and ginger and stir-fry for 1-2 minutes until fragrant. 
             Step 4. Add the lamb and chicken and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes until browned. 
             Step 5. Add the crab and mussels and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes until cooked through. 
             Step 6. In a small bowl, whisk together the soy sauce, chili flakes, and sesame seeds. 
             Step 7. Pour the sauce over the stir-fry and stir to combine. 
             Step 8. Garnish with scallions and serve immediately.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Cod with Black Bean and Chickpea Salsa
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C) and season the cod with salt and pepper. Step 2. Heat a non-stick skillet over medium-high heat and sear the cod for 3-4 minutes on each side. Step 3. Meanwhile, in a separate bowl, mix together chickpeas, black beans, bell pepper, and lettuce. Step 4. In a small bowl, whisk together your favorite dressing (e.g., olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper). Step 5. Once the fish is cooked, serve with the black bean and chickpea salsa.

recipe.name: Vegetarian Mexican Quinoa Bowl
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat a skillet over medium heat and add a drizzle of oil. Add the diced paneer and cook until golden brown, about 5 minutes. Set aside. Step 2. In the same skillet, add the trimmed asparagus and green beans. Cook until tender, about 5-7 minutes. Step 3. In a separate bowl, mix together the cooked lentils, diced paneer, and cooked asparagus and green beans. Step 4. In a separate pan, heat a small amount of oil over medium heat and add a sprinkle of cumin seeds. Cook for 1 minute, until fragrant. Step 5. In a large bowl, combine the quinoa, lentil-vegetable mixture, and cook the cumin seeds mixture together. Step 6. Season with lime juice, salt, and pepper to taste.

recipe.name: Grilled Potato with Herb Crust
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat a grill to medium heat. Step 2. In a bowl, combine chopped vietnamese coriander, basil, garlic, and a pinch of salt. Step 3. Wash the potatoes and pat them dry. Step 4. Rub the herb mixture onto the potatoes and drizzle with hoisin sauce. Step 5. Grill the potatoes for about 15-20 minutes on each side, until they're tender and slightly charred. Step 6. Serve the potatoes hot, topped with lemon juice and additional herbs if desired.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Potato and Corn Delight
main_ingredients: potato (1 medium), corn (1 cup), lemon (1/2 cup)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Slice the potato into 1/4 inch thick rounds and set aside.
Step 2. In a large skillet, heat a tablespoon of oil over medium heat. Add the ground pork and cook until browned, breaking it into small pieces.
Step 3. Add the corn to the skillet and cook until lightly browned, about 3-4 minutes.
Step 4. Add the sliced potatoes to the skillet, cooking for about 5 minutes or until they start to brown.
Step 5. Squeeze the lemon juice over the potatoes and corn, and stir to combine.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Tofu with Potato Hash
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat a non-stick pan with 1 tbsp of vegetable oil over medium heat. Add the diced potatoes and cook until they're golden brown, about 10 minutes. Step 2. Remove the potatoes from the pan and set them aside. Add the remaining 1 tbsp of vegetable oil and cook the tofu until golden brown, about 5 minutes. Step 3. Add the chopped almonds, minced garlic, and soy sauce to the pan and stir-fry for 1 minute. Step 4. Return the cooked potatoes to the pan and stir-fry everything together. Step 5. Serve the pan-seared tofu and potato hash hot.

recipe.name: Vegan Vegetable Fritters
recipe.steps: Step 1. In a large bowl, mix together flour, sugar, and a pinch of salt. Step 2. Add the chopped onion, bell pepper, and celery to the bowl and stir until well combined. Step 3. In a separate bowl, mix together vegetable oil and lime juice. Step 4. Add the oil mixture to the dry ingredients and stir until a thick batter forms. Step 5. Heat a non-stick pan with a small amount of oil over medium heat. Step 6. Using a 1/4 cup measuring cup, scoop the batter into the pan and flatten slightly. Step 7. Cook the fritters for 3-4 minutes on each side, until golden brown and crispy.

recipe.name: Italian-Style Mushroom and Basil Pasta
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook the pasta according to package instructions until al dente. Reserve 1 cup of pasta water before draining.

Step 2. In a large skillet, heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and sauté for 1 minute until fragrant.

Step 3. Add the sliced mushrooms to the skillet and cook until they release their moisture and start browning, about 5 minutes.

Step 4. Add the chopped basil and arugula to the skillet and cook until wilted, about 1 minute. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

Step 5. Add the cooked pasta to the skillet, tossing everything together to combine. If the pasta seems dry, add a bit of the reserved pasta water.

Step 6. Drizzle the balsamic vinegar over the pasta and toss everything together to combine. Serve immediately.

recipe.name: Japanese-Inspired Spinach and Hummus Wrap
recipe.steps: Step 1. In a pan, heat olive oil over medium heat. Step 2. Add chopped spinach and cook until wilted, about 2-3 minutes. Step 3. In a bowl, whisk together hummus, beaten eggs, and lime juice. Step 4. Add the cooked spinach to the bowl and mix well. Step 5. Season with shichimi togarashi to taste. Step 6. Cook the mixture in a non-stick pan like a pancake. Flip and cook the other side.

recipe.name: Roasted Vegetable Medley
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C). Step 2. Wash and peel the potatoes. Cut them into 1-inch (2.5 cm) cubes. Step 3. Cut the bell peppers and tomatoes into 1-inch (2.5 cm) pieces. Step 4. In a large bowl, mix together the potato, bell pepper, and tomato pieces. Step 5. Drizzle 2 tablespoons of olive oil over the vegetables and toss to coat. Step 6. Spread the vegetables in a single layer on a baking sheet. Step 7. Roast in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender and lightly browned.

recipe.name: Lamb Chops with Eggplant
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the grill or grill pan to medium-high heat. Season the lamb chops with salt and pepper. Step 2. Grill the lamb chops for 4-5 minutes per side, or until they reach your desired level of doneness. Step 3. Meanwhile, slice the eggplant into 1/2-inch thick rounds. Brush both sides of the eggplant with butter and season with salt and pepper. Step 4. Grill the eggplant rounds for 3-4 minutes per side, or until they are tender and lightly charred. Step 5. Serve the lamb chops with the grilled eggplant and a side of pasta.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Scallops with Lettuce and Cucumber Salad
recipe.steps: Step 1. Rinse the scallops and pat them dry with paper towels. Season with salt and pepper. Step 2. Heat a non-stick skillet over medium-high heat and add a small amount of oil. Sear the scallops for 2-3 minutes per side, until golden brown. Step 3. Meanwhile, chop the onion and cucumber into thin slices. Step 4. In a separate bowl, combine the chopped onion and cucumber with a squeeze of lemon juice and a dash of salt. Step 5. To assemble the salad, place a bed of chopped lettuce on a plate, top with the seared scallops, and spoon the onion-cucumber mixture alongside.

recipe.name: Grilled Pork with Roasted Brussels Sprouts and Corn Fritters
main_ingredients: 1 pound pork (500g), boneless and thinly sliced
1 1/2 pounds Brussels sprouts (750g), trimmed and halved
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat the grill to medium-high heat. In a small bowl, whisk together 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1 teaspoon dried oregano, and salt and pepper to taste. Brush the mixture on both sides of the pork slices and grill for 5-6 minutes per side, or until cooked through. Let rest for 5 minutes before slicing.
Step 2. Toss the Brussels sprouts with 2 tablespoons olive oil, salt, and pepper on a baking sheet. Roast in the oven at 425°F (220°C) for 20-25 minutes, or until caramelized and tender.
Step 3. In a large bowl, whisk together 1 cup all-purpose flour, 1/2 cup cornmeal, and 1/2 teaspoon paprika. Add the corn kernels, minced garlic, and 1/4 cup chopped fresh parsley. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Step 4. In a separate bowl, whisk together 1/2 cup buttermilk and 1 large egg. Add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients and stir until just combined. Do not overmix.
Step 5. Heat about 1/2 inch (1 cm) of olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Using a 1/4 cup measuring cup, scoop the corn batter into the oil and flatten slightly with a spatula. Cook for 3-4 minutes on each side, or until golden brown and crispy. Drain on paper towels.

recipe.name: Thai-Style Lentil and Vegetable Curry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. In a medium saucepan, combine the lentils and water. Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for 15-20 minutes or until the lentils are tender. Drain and set aside.
Step 2. In a large skillet, heat a couple of tablespoons of oil over medium heat. Add the garlic and cook for 1-2 minutes or until fragrant.
Step 3. Add the sliced cabbage and cucumber to the skillet and cook for 3-4 minutes or until the vegetables are tender.
Step 4. Stir in the cooked lentils, along with some Thai red curry paste (use your own or omit for a milder flavor) and a splash of coconut oil. Cook for 1-2 minutes, until the flavors have melded together.
Step 5. Season with salt and pepper to taste, then serve over steamed quinoa or rice.
recipe.note: You can customize the amount of curry paste to your taste buds.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Tempeh with Roasted Vegetables
main_ingredients: 1 block tempeh (drained and cut into 1-inch pieces)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C). Toss the chopped cabbage with 1 tablespoon olive oil, salt, and pepper on a baking sheet. Roast in the oven for 20-25 minutes, or until tender and lightly browned. Step 2. In a separate pan, heat the remaining 1 tablespoon olive oil over medium-high heat. Add the sliced zucchini and bell pepper. Cook for 5-7 minutes, or until they start to soften. Step 3. Add the tempeh to the pan and cook for 5-7 minutes, or until golden brown and crispy on both sides. Step 4. To serve, place the roasted cabbage on a plate and top with the pan-seared tempeh and vegetables. Step 5. Serve immediately and enjoy!

recipe.name: Citrus Herb Roasted Carrots
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C). In a large bowl, toss the chopped carrots with butter, lime juice, and chopped rosemary until well coated. Step 2. Spread the carrots in a single layer on a baking sheet. Step 3. Cook in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes or until tender, flipping halfway through. Step 4. Meanwhile, cook the bacon slices in a pan over medium heat until crispy. Step 5. Serve the roasted carrots hot, topped with crispy bacon and an additional sprinkle of rosemary if desired.

recipe.name: Gluten-Free Beef Pasta
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cook the gluten-free pasta according to package instructions and set aside. Step 2. Slice the ground beef into small pieces and heat 1 tbsp of vegetable oil in a pan over medium-high heat. Step 3. Add the ground beef to the pan and cook until browned, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks. Step 4. Add the cooked pasta to the pan with the beef and stir to combine. Step 5. Squeeze the lime juice over the top and sprinkle with salt to taste.
recipe.note: You can replace the ground beef with alternative protein sources if you prefer.

recipe.name: Edamame and Broccoli Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a wok over medium-high heat. Add the scallops and cook until browned, about 2-3 minutes. Set aside.

Step 2. Add the bell pepper and broccoli to the wok and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes, until the vegetables start to soften.

Step 3. Add the edamame and stir-fry for another 2 minutes, until the vegetables are tender-crisp.

Step 4. Add the cooked scallops back into the wok and stir-fry for 1 minute, until everything is well combined.

Step 5. Serve the stir-fry over pasta and enjoy!

recipe.name: Sausage and Ground Beef Skewers with Summer Veggies
main_ingredients: 4 sausages (you can use any variety, e.g., Italian or Chorizo)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat your grill to medium-high heat. Thread the sliced sausage, ground beef, zucchini, and cucumber onto skewers. Step 2. Brush the skewers with a little bit of oil and season with salt, pepper, and any other desired herbs or spices. Step 3. Grill the skewers for about 10-12 minutes, turning occasionally, or until the sausage is cooked through and the ground beef is cooked to your desired level of doneness. Step 4. Remove the skewers from the grill and let them rest for a few minutes. Step 5. Serve the skewers hot, garnished with any additional fresh herbs or lemon wedges.

recipe.name: Creamy Mushroom and Vegetable Stir-Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1: Heat butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add cashews and cook for 2 minutes until lightly toasted.
Step 2: In a separate bowl, whisk together milk and flour to make a slurry.
Step 3: Add the broccoli and mushroom to the skillet and cook for 3-4 minutes until tender.
Step 4: Pour in the milk-flour slurry and stir to combine.
Step 5: Reduce heat to low and simmer for 5 minutes until the sauce thickens.

recipe.name: Grilled Chicken and Rice
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cut the chicken breast into 1-inch pieces and season with salt, pepper, and lime juice. Step 2. Heat 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil in a pan over medium-high heat and grill the chicken for 5-6 minutes per side. Step 3. While the chicken is cooking, heat the remaining 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil in a separate pan over medium heat. Step 4. Add the rice to the pan and cook for 2-3 minutes, stirring frequently, until the rice is lightly toasted. Step 5. Add 2 cups of water to the pan with the rice and bring to a boil. Step 6. Reduce the heat to low, cover, and cook for 15-20 minutes or until the water has been absorbed.

recipe.name: Grilled Pork and Shiso Pasta
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil and cook pasta according to package instructions until al dente. Reserve 1 cup of pasta water before draining.
Step 2. In a small saucepan, combine 30ml of mirin and 1 tablespoon of reserved pasta water. Whisk in 1 teaspoon of sesame oil and 1 teaspoon of soy sauce. Bring to a simmer over medium heat and cook until the sauce has thickened slightly, about 2-3 minutes.
Step 3. Meanwhile, preheat a grill or grill pan to medium-high heat. Grill the pork for 3-4 minutes per side, or until it reaches an internal temperature of 145°F (63°C). Let the pork rest for 5 minutes before slicing into thin strips.
Step 4. In a large skillet, combine the cooked pasta, sliced pork, and chopped shiso leaves. Toss to combine and add the mirin sauce. Cook for 1-2 minutes, stirring constantly, until the sauce has coated the pasta and the shiso has wilted.
Step 5. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Garnish with sliced pickled ginger and serve immediately.

recipe.name: Ground Beef and Potato Stir-Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat a large pan with a small amount of oil over medium-high heat. Add the ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks.
Step 2. While the ground beef is cooking, peel and dice the potatoes and add them to the pan.
Step 3. Continue cooking the potato and beef mixture for about 10-12 minutes, or until the potatoes are tender.
Step 4. Once the potatoes are cooked, add the mackerel to the pan and break it up with a spoon.
Step 5. Season the mixture with salt and pepper to taste. Serve hot.
recipe.note: This recipe does not include lettuce or flour as they were not available in the inventory.

recipe.name: Chickpea and Broccoli Biryani
recipe.steps: Step 1: Heat oil in a pan, add cumin seeds. Once cumin seeds crackle, add ginger and sauté for 1 minute. Add onion, bell pepper and sauté until the vegetables are tender. Step 2: Add broccoli, cumin powder, and chili powder, mix well and sauté for 2 minutes. Step 3: In a separate pan, heat oil, add 2 cups of water and bring to a boil. Step 4: Add the uncooked Basmati Rice to the boiling water, cover the pan with a lid, and cook on low heat for 15 minutes or until the rice is cooked. Step 5: In a large serving dish, layer the cooked rice and the vegetable mixture alternately, finishing with a layer of rice on top. Garnish with coriander leaves.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Lobster with Broccoli and Potato
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 2 tablespoons of vegetable oil in a pan over medium heat. Step 2. Add sliced potatoes and cook for 5 minutes or until slightly browned. Step 3. Add broccoli florets and cook for an additional 3 minutes. Step 4. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Step 5. Pan-sear the lobster for 2-3 minutes per side, or until cooked through.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Salmon with Rice and Spinach
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Cut the salmon into slices and season with salt (add salt if available). Set aside.
Step 2. Cut the potato into 1-inch pieces and boil in water until tender. Drain and set aside.
Step 3. In a pan, cook the bacon slices until crispy. Remove from pan.
Step 4. In the same pan, add the salmon slices and cook for 3-4 minutes per side or until cooked through.
Step 5. In a separate pan, heat some oil and sauté the spinach until wilted. Serve with cooked rice and pan-seared salmon.
recipe.note: This recipe uses available ingredients. Bell pepper and salt are not included due to unavailability in the inventory.

recipe.name: Enchiladas Rojas
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C). Step 2. Cook the pasta according to the package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside. Step 3. In a large skillet, heat 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil over medium heat. Add the ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks. Step 4. Add the mushrooms, broccoli, and 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil to the skillet and cook until the vegetables are tender. Step 5. In a large saucepan, melt 1 tablespoon of butter over medium heat. Add 1 cup of enchilada sauce and stir to combine. Step 6. In a large baking dish, arrange 4 cooked pasta noodles. Spoon some of the beef and vegetable mixture onto each noodle, followed by a spoonful of the enchilada sauce. Repeat this process until all the ingredients have been used, finishing with a layer of enchilada sauce on top. Step 7. Cover the baking dish with aluminum foil and bake for 20 minutes. Remove the foil and continue baking for an additional 10-15 minutes, until the top is lightly browned.

recipe.name: Roasted Vegetable Medley
main_ingredients: 1 large bell pepper, seeded and sliced (120g)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C). In a large bowl, toss the chopped carrots and sliced bell pepper with a tablespoon of butter until they are well coated. Spread the vegetables in a single layer on a baking sheet and roast in the preheated oven for 20 minutes. Step 2. Meanwhile, in a separate bowl, toss the sliced mushrooms with a teaspoon of butter until they are well coated. After the carrots and bell pepper have roasted for 20 minutes, add the mushrooms to the baking sheet and continue to roast for an additional 10-15 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender and lightly browned. Step 3. Remove the baking sheet from the oven and sprinkle with lemon juice. Step 4. Serve the roasted vegetables hot, garnished with additional lemon wedges if desired.

recipe.name: Italian-Style Fettuccine with Tomato and Mushroom Sauce
main_ingredients: 250g Fettuccine (use arugula as a substitute for basil if desired)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook the Fettuccine according to package instructions until al dente. Reserve 1 cup of pasta water before draining. Step 2. In a large skillet, heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and sauté for 1-2 minutes until fragrant. Step 3. Add the sliced mushrooms to the skillet and cook until they release their moisture and start browning, about 3-4 minutes. Step 4. Add the diced tomatoes to the skillet, stirring to combine with the mushrooms and garlic. Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes until the tomatoes start to break down. Step 5. Stir in the reserved pasta water and cook for 1 minute. Step 6. Add the cooked Fettuccine to the skillet, tossing everything together to combine. Season with salt and black pepper to taste. Step 7. Serve immediately, garnished with fresh basil leaves if desired.

recipe.name: Steamed Mussels with Asian Pepper
recipe.steps: Step 1. Rinse the mussels under cold water, discarding any broken shells. Step 2. In a large saucepan or steamer, combine the mussels, corn, and beef steak. Step 3. In a small bowl, mix together the sliced pepper, sugar, and 2 tablespoons of water. Step 4. Pour the pepper mixture over the mussels and corn. Step 5. Steam the mixture over boiling water for 8-10 minutes, or until the mussels are cooked through.

recipe.name: Vegetarian Cauliflower Fritters
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). Step 2. Rinse the cauliflower and pulse in a food processor until it resembles rice. Step 3. In a large bowl, combine the cauliflower, ricotta, chopped peanuts, and cubed bread. Step 4. Season with salt and pepper to taste, and mix well. Step 5. Using your hands, shape the mixture into 8-10 patties. Step 6. Place the patties on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper and bake for 20-25 minutes, flipping halfway through.

recipe.name: Mexican-Style Stuffed Potatoes
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Poke each potato with a fork a few times and bake for 45-60 minutes or until tender. Step 2. Scoop out the flesh, leaving about 1/4 inch at the bottom. Mash the flesh with lime juice, diced tomato, and chopped cilantro. Step 3. Stuff each potato shell with the mashed mixture. Step 4. Serve hot, garnished with extra cilantro if desired.

recipe.name: Garlic Stir-Fried Bok Choy
recipe.steps: Step 1. Chop the bok choy into bite-sized pieces and set aside. Step 2. In a small bowl, whisk together 1 egg and a pinch of salt. Set aside. Step 3. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat. Step 4. Add the minced garlic and stir-fry until fragrant, about 1 minute. Step 5. Add the chopped bok choy and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes, until wilted. Step 6. Push the bok choy to one side of the wok. Step 7. Add a little more oil to the empty side of the wok, then pour in the whisked egg. Scramble the egg until it's cooked through, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks. Step 8. Mix the egg into the bok choy and stir-fry for another minute. Step 9. Season with sugar to taste, if desired. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Chicken and Bacon Fajitas
main_ingredients: 1 lb chicken breast, cut into thin strips
6 slices of bacon, cut into pieces
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Cook the bacon pieces until crispy, then remove from the skillet and set aside.
Step 2. Add the chicken breast to the skillet and cook until browned and cooked through.
Step 3. Add the sliced mushroom and edamame to the skillet and cook until the mushroom releases its moisture and the edamame are tender.
Step 4. Return the cooked bacon to the skillet and stir to combine with the chicken, mushroom, and edamame.
Step 5. Season with salt and pepper to taste, then serve hot.

recipe.name: Tomato Garlic Chutney
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Chop the tomatoes and celery into small pieces. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a pan over medium heat.
Step 2. Add the chopped garlic and sauté until it turns golden brown.
Step 3. Add the chopped celery and sauté for another minute.
Step 4. Add the chopped tomatoes and stir well. Add garam masala and sugar.
Step 5. Stir well and let the mixture cook for 10-15 minutes or until the chutney thickens.

recipe.name: Classic BLT Sandwich
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Cook the bacon in a pan over medium heat until crispy. Set aside.
                Step 2. Toast the bread slices.
                Step 3. Assemble the sandwiches by spreading mayonnaise on each slice, followed by a layer of lettuce, tomato, and 2 slices of bacon.
                Step 4. Place the other slice of bread on top to complete the sandwich.
                Step 5. Serve immediately and enjoy!

recipe.name: Grilled Chicken and Roasted Vegetables
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Season chicken breast with salt and pepper. Grill chicken for 5-6 minutes per side or until cooked through. Let rest for 5 minutes before slicing.
Step 2. In a large bowl, toss lettuce, mushroom, brussels sprouts, and onion with butter until evenly coated.
Step 3. Spread the vegetables out in a single layer on a baking sheet. Roast in the oven at 425°F (220°C) for 20-25 minutes or until tender and lightly browned.
Step 4. Serve sliced grilled chicken with roasted vegetables.
Step 5. Optional: Drizzle with a vinaigrette made from olive oil (missing ingredient) and sugar (missing ingredient).
recipe.note: Missing ingredients: sugar, olive oil, and chicken breast. Please add these to your shopping list.

recipe.name: Yuzu Miso Edamame Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cook the rice according to the package instructions. Set aside. Step 2. In a pan, heat 1 tablespoon of mirin over medium heat. Add the edamame and cook for 3-4 minutes until tender. Step 3. In the same pan, add the miso paste and stir until dissolved. Step 4. Add the cooked rice, spinach, and yuzu juice to the pan. Stir-fry for 2-3 minutes until the spinach is wilted. Step 5. Sprinkle sesame seeds on top. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Vegan Pesto Pasta
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Cook pasta according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
                Step 2. In a blender or food processor, combine almonds, garlic, and 2 cups of water to make a pesto sauce. Blend until smooth.
                Step 3. Heat a large skillet over medium heat. Add zucchini and cook until tender, about 3-4 minutes.
                Step 4. Add chopped kale to the skillet and cook until wilted. Stir in pesto sauce.
                Step 5. Combine cooked pasta, zucchini-kale mixture, and bok choy in a bowl. Toss to combine.

recipe.name: Roasted Vegetable Delight
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C). Cut the broccoli, carrot, and celery into bite-sized pieces.
Step 2. In a large bowl, toss the vegetables with olive oil, making sure they're evenly coated.
Step 3. Spread the vegetables on a baking sheet and roast in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes or until tender and lightly browned.
Step 4. Remove from the oven and season with salt to taste. Serve hot as a side dish or add to your favorite non-dairy pasta sauce.

recipe.name: Thai-style Tamarind Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the sliced onion and stir-fry until translucent.
Step 2. Add the sliced thai chili and stir-fry for another minute.
Step 3. Add 2 tablespoons of tamarind paste and stir-fry for 1 minute, until fragrant.
Step 4. Add a squeeze of lemon juice and stir-fry for another minute.
Step 5. Taste and adjust seasoning as needed. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Thai-Style Stir-Fried Noodles
recipe.steps:
Step 1: Cook rice noodles according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
Step 2: Heat 1 tbsp of butter in a pan over medium heat. Add the sliced bell pepper and cook until tender.
Step 3: Add chopped cilantro and stir-fry for 1 minute.
Step 4: Add cooked rice noodles to the pan and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes.
Step 5: Serve hot and garnish with additional cilantro if desired.

recipe.name: Fenugreek Ghee Pasta
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 20g of ghee in a pan over medium heat. Add 5g of ground fenugreek seeds and let them sizzle for a minute.
Step 2. Add 2 cups of water and bring to a boil. Then, reduce the heat to low and cook until the liquid is reduced to 1 cup.
Step 3. In a separate pan, cook the pasta according to the package instructions. Drain and set aside.
Step 4. Add 10g of chopped fenugreek leaves to the reduced fenugreek liquid and stir well.
Step 5. Combine the cooked pasta, fenugreek liquid, and 10g of melted ghee. Mix well and serve.

recipe.name: Tempeh and Lentil Tacos
recipe.steps: Step 1. Chop the cabbage and Brussels sprouts into small pieces and set aside. Step 2. In a large pan, heat 2 tablespoons of oil over medium heat. Add the chopped garlic and sauté for 2 minutes until fragrant. Step 3. Add the tempeh to the pan and cook until browned on all sides. Step 4. In a separate pot, cook the lentils according to package instructions. Step 5. Warm tacos shells according to package instructions and assemble the tacos with tempeh, lentils, cabbage, and Brussels sprouts.

recipe.name: Roasted Spring Vegetables with Garlic and Sausage
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C). Toss chopped celery and Brussels sprouts with olive oil, salt, and pepper on a baking sheet. Step 2. Roast in the oven for 20-25 minutes until tender. Step 3. In a large skillet, cook sliced sausage over medium-high heat until browned, about 5-7 minutes. Step 4. Remove sausage from skillet and set aside. Step 5. Add minced garlic and chopped onion to the skillet. Cook for 2-3 minutes until softened. Step 6. Add trimmed asparagus, chopped tomato, and roasted celery and Brussels sprouts to the skillet. Step 7. Season with dried thyme and serve hot.

recipe.name: Grilled Shrimp and Cauliflower Skewers
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. In a large bowl, whisk together olive oil, smoked paprika, garlic powder, salt, and pepper. Add the shrimp and cauliflower to the bowl and toss to coat. Step 2. Thread the shrimp and cauliflower onto skewers, leaving a small space between each piece. Step 3. Grill the skewers for 8-10 minutes, turning occasionally, until the shrimp are pink and the cauliflower is tender. Step 4. Serve immediately, garnished with fresh parsley or cilantro if desired. Step 5. Enjoy your delicious grilled shrimp and cauliflower skewers!

recipe.name: Chicken and Lentil Biryani
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a pan and sauté the ginger and pepper until fragrant.
Step 2. Add the chicken breast and cook until browned.
Step 3. Add the lentils and cook for 5 minutes.
Step 4. Add the basmati rice, 2 cups of water, and salt to taste.
Step 5. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low and cover until the rice is cooked.

recipe.name: Vegan Zucchini Stuffed Bell Peppers
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). Cut the tops off the bell peppers and remove seeds and membranes. Place them in a baking dish.
Step 2. Sauté the chopped zucchini, mushroom, and cabbage in a pan with a small amount of oil until tender.
Step 3. Add the diced tomato and chickpeas to the pan and stir to combine.
Step 4. Stuff each bell pepper with the zucchini mixture and place in the baking dish.
Step 5. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until the bell peppers are tender.

recipe.name: Creamy Onion Pasta
recipe.steps: Step 1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil and cook pasta according to package instructions until al dente. Reserve 1 cup of pasta water and then drain the pasta. Step 2. In a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Add sliced onion and cook until softened and lightly browned, about 8-10 minutes. Step 3. Add the reserved pasta water to the skillet and stir to combine. Step 4. Add cooked pasta to the skillet, tossing to coat with the onion butter sauce. Step 5. Season with salt to taste and serve hot. Step 6. Garnish with chopped fresh parsley if desired.

recipe.name: Stir-Fried Galangal with Beef
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil in a wok over medium-high heat. Add the ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it up with a spoon as it cooks. Remove from wok and set aside.
 Step 2. In the same wok, add the remaining 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil. Add the sliced galangal and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
 Step 3. Add the bean sprouts to the wok and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes, until they start to soften.
 Step 4. Return the cooked ground beef to the wok and stir to combine with the galangal and bean sprouts.
 Step 5. Add the cinnamon and salt to taste. Stir-fry for a final minute to combine flavors.

recipe.name: Veggie Scramble
main_ingredients: 2 medium sweet potato, peeled and diced (250g)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C). Step 2. Toss the sweet potatoes and potatoes with 1 tablespoon olive oil and season with salt. Spread on a baking sheet and roast for 20 minutes. Step 3. In a separate pan, sauté the eggplant and bok choy in 1 tablespoon olive oil until tender. Step 4. In a large skillet, combine the roasted sweet potatoes and potatoes, sautéed eggplant and bok choy, and diced tomato. Step 5. Stir occasionally until all ingredients are well combined. Step 6. Serve hot.
recipe.note: This recipe does not include eggs due to their unavailability. You can try substituting with tofu or tempeh for a vegan version.

recipe.name: Stir-Fried Bell Pepper and Spinach
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Cut the bell pepper into thin slices and chop the spinach. Set aside.
Step 2. Crack the eggs into a bowl, whisking lightly. Set aside.
Step 3. Heat a non-stick pan over medium-high heat. Add a small amount of oil if needed.
Step 4. Pour in the eggs, let them set slightly, then scramble them.
Step 5. Add the stir-fried eggs, bell pepper, and spinach to the pan, stirring to combine. Season with Sichuan pepper.
Step 6. In a small bowl, mix cornstarch with a splash of water to create a slurry. Add the slurry to the pan and stir until the sauce has thickened.

recipe.name: Grilled Vegetable Medley
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. In a large bowl, toss the green beans and corn with 1 tsp olive oil, 1 tsp salt, and 1 tsp pepper. Step 2. Grill the vegetables for 10-12 minutes or until slightly charred. Step 3. Meanwhile, grill the tomato slices for 2-3 minutes per side or until tender. Step 4. To assemble the dish, place a portion of grilled vegetables on a plate, top with grilled tomato slices, and sprinkle with chopped cashews. Step 5. Garnish with sliced cucumber and serve immediately.

recipe.name: Crispy Pork Chop with Ground Pork and Asparagus
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Season the pork chop with salt. Step 2. Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and cook for 1 minute. Step 3. Add the ground pork to the skillet and cook until browned, breaking it up with a spoon as it cooks. Step 4. Add the asparagus to the skillet and cook until tender. Step 5. Transfer the skillet to the oven and bake the pork chop for 12-15 minutes or until cooked to your liking. Step 6. Garnish with lemon juice and serve.

recipe.name: Spinach and Basil Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat the vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Step 2. Add the sugar and cook for 1-2 minutes until it dissolves and starts to caramelize. Step 3. Add the fresh basil and cook for 1 minute until fragrant. Step 4. Add the fresh spinach and cook until wilted, about 2-3 minutes. Step 5. Serve hot and enjoy!

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Lamb Chop with Grilled Asparagus and Steamed Green Beans and Tuna Salad
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat the grill to medium-high heat. Season the lamb chops with salt and pepper. Grill the lamb chops for 4-5 minutes per side, or until they reach your desired level of doneness. Let the lamb chops rest for 5 minutes before slicing.

Step 2. Meanwhile, toss the asparagus spears with olive oil, salt, and pepper. Grill the asparagus for 3-4 minutes per side, or until tender.

Step 3. To prepare the tuna salad, combine the flaked tuna with 1 tbsp olive oil, 1 tbsp lemon juice, and a pinch of salt and pepper.

Step 4. To prepare the green beans, fill a large pot with 2 inches of water and bring to a boil. Reduce the heat to a simmer and steam the green beans for 4-5 minutes, or until tender.

Step 5. To assemble the dish, slice the grilled lamb chops and serve with the steamed green beans, grilled asparagus, and tuna salad.

recipe.name: Poblano and Black Bean Pasta
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook the pasta according to package instructions until al dente. Reserve 1 cup of pasta water before draining.

Step 2. In a large skillet, heat the butter over medium-high heat. Add the sliced poblano peppers and cook until charred on both sides, about 5 minutes.

Step 3. Add the diced tomato and celery to the skillet with the poblanos. Cook until the vegetables are tender, about 5 minutes.

Step 4. Stir in the black beans, cooked pasta, and reserved pasta water. Cook for 2-3 minutes, until the sauce has thickened slightly.

Step 5. Season with salt and pepper to taste, and serve hot.

recipe.name: Korean-Style Beef and Cabbage Stir-Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tbsp of sesame oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add the sliced ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks. Step 2. Remove the cooked beef from the skillet and set aside. Step 3. In the same skillet, add the remaining 1 tbsp of sesame oil. Add the chopped chinese cabbage and cook until it starts to soften, about 3-4 minutes. Step 4. Add the cooked ground beef back into the skillet with the cabbage. Step 5. In a small bowl, whisk together 2 tbsp of rice vinegar and 1 tsp of sugar. Pour the vinegar mixture over the beef and cabbage mixture, and stir to combine. Step 6. Season with salt and pepper to taste, and serve hot.

recipe.name: Grilled Tilapia with Asparagus and Lime
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Step 2. Season tilapia fillets with salt, pepper, and lime juice. Step 3. Grill tilapia for 4-5 minutes per side or until cooked through. Step 4. Meanwhile, brush asparagus with vegetable oil and season with salt and pepper. Step 5. Grill asparagus for 3-4 minutes per side or until tender.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Beef and Lobster Stir-Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the sliced pork belly and cook until crispy, about 3-4 minutes. Remove from the wok and set aside.
Step 2. Add another tablespoon of oil to the wok and add the minced garlic. Cook for 1 minute until fragrant.
Step 3. Add the ground beef to the wok, breaking it up with a spoon as it cooks. Cook until the beef is browned, about 5 minutes.
Step 4. Add the lobster tail to the wok and cook for 2-3 minutes, until it turns pink.
Step 5. Return the pork belly to the wok and stir in 1 teaspoon of soy sauce and 1 teaspoon of salt. Cook for an additional 2 minutes, until the flavors have combined.

recipe.name: Roasted Vegetable and Rice Bowl
main_ingredients: 1 medium bell pepper, seeded and cubed (150g)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat the oven to 200°C (400°F). In a large bowl, toss the potato, bell pepper, and onion with 1 tablespoon of olive oil, oregano, smoked paprika, salt, and pepper until evenly coated. Spread the vegetables on a baking sheet and roast for 20 minutes.
Step 2. After 20 minutes, add the tomatoes to the baking sheet and toss to coat with the remaining olive oil and spices. Return to the oven and roast for an additional 10 minutes.
Step 3. While the vegetables are roasting, prepare the cooked rice according to package instructions. Set aside.
Step 4. To assemble the bowls, divide the cooked rice between four plates, then top with the roasted vegetables and drizzle with additional olive oil if desired.
Step 5. Serve immediately, garnished with chopped fresh herbs if desired.

recipe.name: Garlic and Mackerel Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Chop the garlic and carrot into small pieces. Step 2. Heat a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chicken breast and cook until browned, about 5 minutes. Step 3. Add the mackerel and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes. Step 4. Add the chopped garlic and carrot to the wok and stir-fry until the vegetables are tender. Step 5. Sprinkle peanuts over the top and serve hot.
recipe.note: No substitutions possible for missing ingredients.

recipe.name: Grilled Eggplant with Broccoli and Chickpeas
main_ingredients: chickpeas (1 can, 15 oz, drained and rinsed)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Brush eggplant slices with a little milk and season with salt and pepper. Step 2. Grill eggplant slices for 3-4 minutes per side, or until tender. Step 3. In a separate pan, heat some oil over medium heat. Add chopped broccoli and cook until tender, about 5 minutes. Step 4. In a large bowl, combine cooked broccoli, chickpeas, and grilled eggplant slices. Step 5. Season with salt, pepper, and any other desired herbs or spices.
recipe.note: This recipe uses the available eggplant, chickpeas, and broccoli, but does not include ground beef.

recipe.name: Lemon Quinoa Bowl
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Cook the quinoa according to package instructions. 
                Step 2. In a pan, heat the olive oil over medium heat. 
                Step 3. Add the lentils and saute until they're lightly browned. 
                Step 4. Add the lemon juice and stir to combine. 
                Step 5. Fluff the cooked quinoa with a fork and serve with the lentil mixture, 
                Step 6. topped with tuna and sardines.

recipe.name: Beef and Cabbage Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Chop the onion and cabbage into small pieces. Step 2. Heat a pan with a small amount of oil over medium-high heat. Step 3. Cook the ground beef until browned, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks. Step 4. Add the chopped onion and cabbage to the pan and stir-fry until they are tender. Step 5. Season with your favorite stir-fry sauce and serve.

recipe.name: Beef and Vegetable Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add the ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks. Step 2. Add the sliced ginger and cook for 1 minute, until fragrant. Step 3. Add the sliced bell pepper and chopped green onion, and cook for 3-4 minutes, until the vegetables are tender-crisp. Step 4. Stir in 2 tablespoons of lemon juice and season with salt and pepper to taste. Step 5. Serve the beef and vegetable mixture hot over steamed rice.

recipe.name: Thai-Style Beef and Vegetable Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat butter in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat. Add ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks.
Step 2. Add sliced onion and diced potato to the wok. Cook until the vegetables are tender-crisp, about 5 minutes.
Step 3. Add chopped kale and broccoli to the wok. Cook until the vegetables are tender, about 3-4 minutes.
Step 4. Season the stir-fry with Thai seasonings, such as fish sauce and chili flakes. Stir to combine.
Step 5. Serve the stir-fry hot, garnished with fresh herbs, such as cilantro or basil.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Lobster with Spinach and Peanuts
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Rinse the lobster tail and pat it dry with a paper towel. Season with salt and pepper.
         Step 2. Heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat.
         Step 3. Add the lobster tail to the skillet and sear for 2 minutes on each side, until pink and cooked through.
         Step 4. Remove the lobster from the skillet and set aside. Add the remaining 1 tablespoon of olive oil, minced garlic, and peanuts to the skillet.
         Step 5. Stir-fry the peanut mixture for 1-2 minutes, until fragrant and lightly toasted.
         Step 6. Add the fresh spinach to the skillet and stir-fry until wilted.
         Step 7. Serve the seared lobster tail with the spinach-peanut mixture spooned over the top.

recipe.name: Low-Carb Thai Crab Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cut the crab into bite-sized pieces. Step 2. In a wok or large skillet, heat 1-2 tbsp of oil over medium-high heat. Step 3. Add the crab and cook for 3-4 minutes, until lightly browned. Step 4. Add the broccoli and spinach to the wok, stir-frying for an additional 2-3 minutes until the vegetables are tender-crisp. Step 5. Season with Thai red curry paste (use a small amount to keep it keto-friendly) and serve immediately.

recipe.name: Vegetarian Mushroom Bok Choy Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat a tablespoon of oil in a large skillet or wok over medium heat. Add the sliced mushrooms and cook until they're tender and lightly browned, about 5 minutes. Step 2. Add the chopped bok choy to the skillet and cook until it's wilted, about 3-4 minutes. Step 3. In a small bowl, whisk together 2 tablespoons of soy sauce (or tamari for gluten-free) and 1 tablespoon of rice vinegar. Step 4. Pour the soy sauce mixture over the mushrooms and bok choy in the skillet, and stir to combine. Step 5. Sprinkle the chopped peanuts over the top of the stir-fry and serve hot.

recipe.name: Paleo Shrimp and Green Beans Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Cut the green beans and zucchini into bite-sized pieces. Heat coconut oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Step 2. Add the garlic and ginger to the skillet and sauté for 1 minute, until fragrant.
Step 3. Add the shrimp to the skillet and cook for 2-3 minutes per side, until pink and cooked through.
Step 4. Add the green beans and zucchini to the skillet and stir to combine with the shrimp and sauce.
Step 5. Serve the stir fry hot, garnished with soy sauce to taste.

recipe.name: Sauteed Onion and Pepper
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat the vegetable oil in a pan over medium heat. 
      Step 2. Add the sliced onion and sauté until slightly caramelized, about 8 minutes.
      Step 3. Add the sliced pepper and continue sautéing for another 5 minutes.
      Step 4. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
      Step 5. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Thai Stir-Fried Green Beans with Sardines
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1tbsp oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat. Add cashews and cook for 2-3 minutes or until golden brown, then set aside.
Step 2. Add more oil if needed and cook sardines for 2-3 minutes or until lightly browned, break into smaller pieces as they cook.
Step 3. Add green beans to the wok and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes or until slightly tender. Season with salt to taste.
Step 4. Return the cooked cashews to the wok and stir-fry for a minute to combine with green beans.
Step 5. Serve hot, garnished with additional cashews if desired.

recipe.name: Italian Grilled Sausage with Kale and Zucchini
main_ingredients: 2 cups kale, stems removed and discarded, leaves coarsely chopped
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat a grill or grill pan over medium-high heat. Step 2. Slice the sausage into 1/2-inch thick rounds. Step 3. Grill the sausage for 2-3 minutes per side, or until cooked through. Step 4. Meanwhile, toss the kale and zucchini with olive oil, salt, and pepper. Step 5. Grill the vegetables for 2-3 minutes per side, or until tender.
recipe.note: Make sure the sausage is paleo-friendly, as some may contain non-paleo ingredients like sugar or fillers.

recipe.name: Spicy Korean Radish Stir Fry
main_ingredients: 1 large Korean radish ( peeled and grated)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat oil in a large skillet or wok over medium heat. Add grated ginger and cook for 1-2 minutes until fragrant.
Step 2. Add the grated Korean radish and cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Step 3. Add the bean sprouts and stir to combine.
Step 4. In a small bowl, whisk together soy sauce and rice vinegar. Pour the sauce over the radish and bean sprouts mixture.
Step 5. Stir-fry for an additional 2-3 minutes until the sauce has thickened and the vegetables are tender.

recipe.name: Vegetarian Korean-Style Broccoli Stir-Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1: In a large pan or wok, heat 2 tablespoons of oil over medium-high heat. Add broccoli, corn, and Brussels sprouts. Stir-fry for 3-4 minutes or until the vegetables are slightly tender.
Step 2: Add 1 tablespoon of soy sauce and 1 tablespoon of Gochujang to the pan and stir-fry for another minute. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Step 3: In a small bowl, whisk together 2 tablespoons of water and 1 tablespoon of cornstarch until smooth. Add the cornstarch mixture to the pan and stir-fry for 1-2 minutes or until the sauce thickens.
Step 4: Reduce heat to low and stir in shredded mozzarella until melted and well combined.
Step 5: Taste and adjust the seasoning as needed. Serve hot garnished with toasted sesame seeds and chopped green onions.
recipe.note: For an authentic Korean experience, consider adding kimchi or gochugaru (Korean chili flakes) to the stir-fry if available.

recipe.name: Keto Banh Xeo (Sizzling Vietnamese Pancake)
recipe.steps: Step 1. In a large bowl, mix together ground beef, coconut oil, fish sauce, and a pinch of salt. Set aside for 10 minutes to allow the flavors to meld. Step 2. Heat a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add the ground beef mixture and cook until browned, breaking it up with a spoon as it cooks. Step 3. Add the mussels and lobster to the skillet and cook until the mussels start to open, about 2-3 minutes. Step 4. Add the broccoli to the skillet and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, until tender but still crisp. Step 5. Serve the keto banh xeo hot, garnished with fresh herbs and a squeeze of lime juice.

recipe.name: Classic American BBQ Ribs
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat oven to 300°F (150°C). Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil and set aside.
Step 2. In a small bowl, mix together sugar, BBQ sauce, mayonnaise, and ketchup.
Step 3. Remove the membrane from the back of the ribs and rub the sugar-BBQ mixture all over the ribs.
Step 4. Place the ribs on the prepared baking sheet and bake for 1 hour and 15 minutes.
Step 5. While the ribs are baking, cook the bacon in a pan over medium heat until crispy. Remove the bacon from the pan and crumble.
Step 6. Remove the ribs from the oven and brush with the remaining sugar-BBQ mixture. Sprinkle with crumbled bacon.

recipe.name: Vegan Stuffed Zucchini Boats
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C). Step 2. In a food processor, blend almonds, kale, spinach, and a pinch of salt until well combined. Step 3. Stuff each zucchini boat with the almond-kale mixture and place them in a baking dish. Step 4. Drizzle with olive oil and bake for 20-25 minutes or until the zucchini is tender. Step 5. Serve warm, garnished with sliced cucumber.

recipe.name: Thai Galangal Curry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Peel and chop the galangal into small pieces. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a pan over medium heat and sauté the galangal until fragrant. Step 2. Add the Thai curry paste and continue to sauté for 1 minute, until the aroma is released. Step 3. Add the mushrooms and broccoli to the pan, and cook until they start to soften. Step 4. Pour in the coconut milk and stir well to combine. Bring the mixture to a simmer. Step 5. Reduce the heat to low and let the curry simmer for 10-15 minutes, until the vegetables are tender.

recipe.name: Sun-Dried Tomato Pasta
recipe.steps: Step 1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook pasta according to package instructions until al dente. Reserve 1 cup of pasta water before draining. Step 2. In a large skillet, heat 2 tbsp of olive oil over medium heat. Add chopped sun-dried tomatoes and cook for 2-3 minutes until fragrant. Step 3. Add fresh spinach to the skillet and cook until wilted, about 1-2 minutes. Step 4. In a large serving bowl, combine cooked pasta, spinach mixture, and grated pecorino cheese. Toss well, adding reserved pasta water if needed to achieve a creamy sauce. Step 5. Season with salt, pepper, and oregano to taste. Serve immediately.

recipe.name: Grilled Sardines with Edamame Salsa and Pan-Seared Pork Chop
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Season pork chop with salt and pepper. Grill for 4-5 minutes per side, or until cooked to your liking. Set aside.
Step 2. In a blender, combine edamame, 1 lime juice, and a pinch of salt. Blend until smooth.
Step 3. Heat 2 tablespoons of vegetable oil in a pan over medium heat. Add sardines and cook for 2-3 minutes per side, or until cooked through.
Step 4. Serve grilled pork chop with edamame salsa spooned over the top and a sardine fillet on the side.
Step 5. Garnish with fresh cilantro and a squeeze of lime juice.

recipe.name: Crispy Potato Gnocchi
main_ingredients: potato (2 large, peeled, boiled, and mashed)
recipe.steps: Step 1. In a mixing bowl, combine mashed potato, flour, and a pinch of salt. Mix until a dough forms. Knead for 5 minutes until smooth. Wrap in plastic and rest for 10 minutes. Step 2.
