Divide dough into 4 equal parts and roll each into a long rope. Cut each rope into 1-inch pieces to form gnocchi. Step 3. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook gnocchi for 3-5 minutes, or until they float to the surface. Step 4. In a skillet, heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil over medium heat. Add diced chicken breast and cook until browned, about 5-6 minutes. Step 5. In a separate pan, melt 1 tablespoon of butter over medium heat. Add cooked gnocchi and toss to coat with butter. Serve with chicken breast and garnish with parsley.

recipe.name: Grilled Salmon with Quinoa and Edamame
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the grill to medium-high heat. Season the salmon with salt and pepper. Step 2. In a medium saucepan, bring 2 cups water to a boil. Add the quinoa and reduce heat to low. Cover and simmer for 15-20 minutes. Step 3. In a large skillet, heat 1 tbsp of peanut oil over medium heat. Add the sliced zucchinis and cook for 3-4 minutes per side. Step 4. Grill the salmon for 4-5 minutes per side, or until cooked through. Step 5. In the same skillet, add the remaining 1 tbsp of peanut oil and cooked edamame. Cook for 1-2 minutes, stirring frequently.

recipe.name: Bruschetta Italiano
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). Slice the baguette into 1-inch thick rounds and toast until crispy. Step 2. Meanwhile, mix the chopped bell pepper, lettuce, arugula, oregano, and sugar in a bowl. Step 3. Drizzle the toasted baguette rounds with olive oil (not in inventory, but a common Italian ingredient, you may consider adding to shopping list). Step 4. Top each toasted round with the mixed green salad. Step 5. Serve immediately and enjoy!

recipe.name: Beef and Broccoli Stir Fry with Kidney Beans
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Cut the beef steak into thin slices and season with salt. Set aside. 
                Step 2. In a large skillet or wok, heat 1 tablespoon of oil over medium-high heat. 
                Step 3. Add the beef steak and cook until browned, about 3-4 minutes. Remove from the skillet. 
                Step 4. In the same skillet, add the broccoli and cook until tender, about 4-5 minutes. 
                Step 5. Add the kidney beans and cook for an additional 2 minutes. 
                Step 6. Return the beef steak to the skillet and stir to combine with the broccoli and kidney beans.

recipe.name: Black Bean and Mushroom Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Cook oats according to package instructions.
Step 2. In a large pan, heat 1 tablespoon of oil over medium heat.
Step 3. Add sliced mushroom and cook until tender.
Step 4. Add chopped broccoli and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes.
Step 5. Stir in cooked black beans and cooked oats.
Step 6. Season with soy sauce and serve.

recipe.name: Spinach and Tomato Curry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat oil in a pan over medium heat. Add the crushed cardamom and sauté for 1 minute. Step 2. Add the ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it up with a spoon as it cooks. Step 3. Add the diced tomatoes and cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Step 4. Add the spinach and cook until wilted. Step 5. Season with salt to taste.

recipe.name: Bonito Flakes Yuzu Nigiri
recipe.steps: Step 1. Rinse the rice thoroughly and cook according to Japanese rice cooking instructions. Step 2. Prepare a mixture of soy sauce and yuzu juice as a marinade for the bonito flakes. Step 3. Shape the cooked rice into small nigiri shapes. Step 4. Place a small amount of the bonito flakes on top of each nigiri. Step 5. Drizzle the soy sauce-yuzu marinade over the bonito flakes. Step 6. Serve immediately and enjoy!

recipe.name: Japanese-style Daikon Radish and Broccoli Stir-fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat a tablespoon of oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the sliced daikon radish and bell pepper, and stir-fry until they start to soften (3-4 minutes).
Step 2. Add the broccoli to the wok and continue stir-frying until all the vegetables are tender-crisp (another 3-4 minutes).
Step 3. In a small bowl, whisk together the miso paste and a splash of water to create a smooth paste. Add this paste to the wok and stir-fry for 1 minute, until the vegetables are well coated.
Step 4. Season with bonito flakes and pepper to taste.
Step 5. Serve hot, garnished with pickled ginger if desired.

recipe.name: Garlic Pasta with Cinnamon Crunch
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil and cook the pasta according to the package instructions until al dente. Reserve 1 cup of pasta water before draining.
Step 2. In a large skillet, heat 1 tablespoon of ghee over medium heat. Add 2 cloves of minced garlic and cook, stirring occasionally, until fragrant and lightly browned, about 2-3 minutes.
Step 3. Add the reserved pasta water to the skillet and stir to combine with the garlic and ghee.
Step 4. Add the cooked pasta to the skillet, tossing to combine with the garlic and ghee mixture. Season with salt and sugar to taste.
Step 5. In a small bowl, mix together the remaining 1 tablespoon of ghee and 1/4 teaspoon of cinnamon. Brush the mixture evenly over the pasta to create a crunchy topping.
Step 6. Serve hot, garnished with chopped lettuce and mustard seeds if desired.

recipe.name: Shiso Leaf and Daikon Radish Tempura
main_ingredients: Daikon radish (1 large, peeled and sliced)
recipe.steps: Step 1. In a large bowl, combine 1/2 cup ice water and 1 tablespoon wasabi. Stir until wasabi is fully dissolved. Add sliced daikon radish and let it sit for at least 20 minutes to draw out excess water. Step 2. Heat 2 inches of vegetable oil in a deep frying pan over medium-high heat until it reaches 350°F. Step 3. Remove daikon radish from the ice water bath and pat dry with paper towels. Step 4. Dip radish slices into the melted butter, then coat in a mixture of flour, cornstarch, and a pinch of salt. Step 5. Fry the coated daikon radish in batches until crispy and golden brown. Step 6. Serve hot with a side of wasabi mayonnaise (made by mixing wasabi with mayonnaise) and fresh shiso leaves. Step 7. Garnish with fresh spinach leaves.

recipe.name: Crispy Pork and Vegetable Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the sliced pork and cook until browned, about 3-4 minutes. Remove from the skillet and set aside. Step 2. In the same skillet, add another tablespoon of oil if necessary. Add the diced potatoes and sliced carrots and cook until they start to soften, about 5 minutes. Step 3. Add the cooked pork back into the skillet and stir in the lime juice. Step 4. Continue to cook for another 5 minutes, stirring frequently, until the vegetables are tender and the pork is coated with the lime sauce. Step 5. Serve hot, garnished with fresh cilantro if desired.

recipe.name: Herbed Chicken Breast with Caramelized Onions
recipe.steps:
Step 1: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
         Step 2: Slice the onions thinly and separate them into rings.
         Step 3: In a large skillet, heat 2 tbsp of oil over medium heat.
         Step 4: Add the sliced onions to the skillet and cook for 20-25 minutes,
            stirring occasionally, until they're caramelized and golden brown.
         Step 5: Season the chicken breast with salt, black pepper, and dried herbs.
            You can use any combination you like, such as thyme, rosemary, or oregano.
         Step 6: Grill or pan-fry the chicken breast until it's cooked through,
            about 5-6 minutes per side.
         Step 7: Serve the chicken breast with the caramelized onions and a squeeze of lemon juice.
recipe.note: This recipe highlights the flavors of onion and chicken breast, perfect for a keto diet.

recipe.name: Hearty Lentil Pasta Bolognese
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Cook pasta in boiling water for 10 minutes until al dente. Drain and set aside.
Step 2. Saute garlic and celery in a pan until fragrant. Add lentils and cook for 5 minutes.
Step 3. Add chickpeas, garam masala, and cinnamon to the pan. Stir well.
Step 4. Combine cooked pasta with the lentil mixture. Toss well.
Step 5. Season with salt and serve hot.

recipe.name: Japanese Sausage Stir-Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Slice sausage into thin rounds. Heat a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat and cook sausage until browned, about 5 minutes. Remove sausage from skillet and set aside. Step 2. In the same skillet, add 1 tbsp of sugar and cook for 1 minute. Add sliced celery and cook until tender, about 3 minutes. Step 3. Add shrimp and squid to the skillet and cook until the seafood is pink and cooked through, about 3-4 minutes. Step 4. Add cooked sausage back into the skillet and stir in black beans. Cook for an additional 2 minutes. Step 5. Serve hot and enjoy!

recipe.name: Vegan Quinoa and Cabbage Bowl
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Chop the cabbage and onion into small pieces. Heat 2 tbsp of oil in a pan and sauté the cabbage until it's soft and slightly caramelized.
Step 2. Cook the quinoa according to package instructions.
Step 3. In a separate pan, heat some oil and sauté the kidney beans with some salt and pepper until they're crispy.
Step 4. In a bowl, combine the cooked quinoa, sautéed cabbage, and kidney beans. Top with chopped cashews for added crunch.
Step 5. Serve hot and enjoy!

recipe.name: American-Style BBQ Pork Ribs
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 300°F (150°C). In a small bowl, mix together ranch dressing, mustard, and sugar. Step 2. Apply the dry rub to the pork ribs, making sure to coat them evenly. Step 3. Place the ribs on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper, and brush with vegetable oil. Step 4. Bake the ribs in the oven for 2 hours, or until they reach an internal temperature of 160°F (71°C). Step 5. After 2 hours, increase the oven temperature to broil, and cook for an additional 10-15 minutes, or until the ribs are nicely caramelized. Step 6. Remove the ribs from the oven, and let them rest for 10 minutes before serving.

recipe.name: Vegan Mexican Lentil Tacos
recipe.steps: Step 1. Rinse the lentils and quinoa separately. Drain and set aside. Step 2. In a large pan, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the cumin and chili powder. Cook for 1 minute, stirring constantly. Step 3. Add the chopped bok choy and shredded cabbage. Cook until wilted, about 5 minutes. Step 4. Add the lentils, quinoa, and chopped peanuts to the pan. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Step 5. Warm tacos shells according to the package instructions. Fill the shells with the lentil-quinoa mixture.

recipe.name: Grilled Japanese-Style Vegetable Skewers with Sweet Butter Sauce
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Meanwhile, soak 12 bamboo skewers in water for at least 30 minutes. Step 2. Thread carrot and celery pieces onto the skewers, leaving a small space between each piece. Step 3. In a saucepan, melt the unsalted butter over low heat. Add the granulated sugar and whisk until dissolved. Step 4. Brush the skewers with the sweet butter sauce during the last 2 minutes of grilling. Step 5. Grill the skewers for 8-10 minutes, turning occasionally, until the vegetables are tender and lightly charred.
recipe.note: This recipe highlights the requested ingredients.

recipe.name: Spinach and Potato Fritters
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C). In a large mixing bowl, combine grated potato, chopped spinach, and flour. Mix well until combined.
Step 2. Add olive oil to the mixture and mix until the dough is smooth and pliable.
Step 3. Using your hands, shape the dough into small patties.
Step 4. Place the patties on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
Step 5. Bake for 20-25 minutes or until the fritters are golden brown and crispy.

recipe.name: Tempeh and Black Bean Stir-Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Step 2. Add the sliced sausage and cook until browned, about 3-4 minutes. Remove from skillet and set aside.
Step 3. Add the sliced zucchini to the skillet and cook until tender, about 4-5 minutes.
Step 4. Add the cooked black beans, tempeh, and cooked sausage back into the skillet. Stir-fry for 2-3 minutes.
Step 5. Serve hot, garnished with sliced cucumber.

recipe.name: Vietnamese Beef and Broccoli Stir Fry
main_ingredients: lentil would not be found so using potato (200g)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Wash and slice the broccoli, carrot, and potato into thin strips. Step 2. In a pan, heat 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil over medium heat. Step 3. Add the ground beef and cook, breaking it up with a spoon, until it's browned, about 5 minutes. Step 4. Add the sliced vegetables to the pan and cook, stirring occasionally, until they're tender-crisp, about 5 minutes. Step 5. Serve the beef and vegetable mixture hot, garnished with some vietnamese coriander leaves.

recipe.name: Cod and Beef Fritters with Sardine Salsa
recipe.steps: Step 1: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). Cut the cod into small pieces and set aside. Step 2: In a large bowl, combine the ground beef, chopped onion, and a pinch of salt. Mix well with your hands until just combined. Step 3: Add the cod pieces to the bowl and mix gently until the cod is evenly distributed throughout the mixture. Step 4: Using your hands, shape the mixture into small patties, about 1 1/2 inches (3.8 cm) in diameter. Place the patties on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Step 5: Dot the top of each patty with a small amount of butter. Bake in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the internal temperature of the cod reaches 145°F (63°C). Step 6: While the fritters are baking, prepare the sardine salsa. In a small bowl, combine the chopped sardines, a squeeze of lemon juice, and a pinch of salt. Mix well to combine.

recipe.name: Korean Radish Kimchi
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Cut the Korean radish into 2-inch pieces and soak in cold water for 30 minutes to remove bitterness.
               Step 2. Drain the radish pieces and set aside.
               Step 3. In a blender or food processor, combine anchovy, butter, lemon juice, sugar, and garlic. Blend until smooth.
               Step 4. In a large bowl, combine the blended mixture, radish pieces, and salt. Mix well to combine.
               Step 5. Transfer the kimchi to a jar or airtight container and store in the refrigerator for at least 24 hours to allow fermentation.

recipe.name: Classic Beef and Mushroom Meatloaf
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C). In a large bowl, combine the ground beef, chopped mushroom, onion, bell pepper, and crushed tomato. Mix well with your hands until just combined. Add a pinch of salt and pepper to taste.

Step 2. Transfer the mixture to a loaf pan and shape it into a loaf. Place the loaf pan on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.

Step 3. Drizzle a bit of oil over the top of the meatloaf to prevent it from drying out.

Step 4. Bake the meatloaf in the preheated oven for 35-40 minutes, or until it reaches an internal temperature of 160°F (71°C).

Step 5. Remove the meatloaf from the oven and let it rest for 10-15 minutes before slicing and serving.

Step 6. Serve the meatloaf hot with your favorite sides, such as mashed potatoes or a salad.

recipe.name: Thai-Style Lobster and Scallop Stir-Fry
main_ingredients: scallops (6 pieces, rinsed and patted dry)
bok choy (2 bunches, washed and drained)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat coconut oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Step 2. Add the curry paste and cook for 1-2 minutes, or until fragrant. Step 3. Add the lobster and scallops and cook until pink, about 3-4 minutes per side. Step 4. Add the bok choy and cook until wilted, about 2-3 minutes. Step 5. Stir in the diced tomatoes and broccoli florets, and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes. Step 6. Serve immediately and garnish with fresh cilantro.

recipe.name: Thai-Style Vietnamese Vegetable Soup
recipe.steps: Step 1. In a large pot, heat 2 tablespoons of oil over medium heat. Add chopped celery, lemongrass, and star anise. Saute until the vegetables are softened, about 5 minutes. Step 2. Add 4 cups of water to the pot and bring to a boil. Step 3. Reduce the heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes. Step 4. Serve the soup hot, garnished with fresh herbs if desired. Step 5. Serve with a side of steamed rice for a filling and flavorful meal.

recipe.name: Non-Dairy Mexican Tofu and Bok Choy Stir-Fry
main_ingredients: Tofu (1 block, drained and cut into small cubes)
Bok Choy (1 bunch, cleaned and chopped)
Kidney Beans (1 cup, drained and rinsed)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat and add chopped cashews. Cook until lightly toasted, about 2-3 minutes.
Step 2. Add tofu cubes to the skillet and cook until golden brown, about 3-4 minutes.
Step 3. Add chopped bok choy to the skillet and cook until wilted, about 2-3 minutes.
Step 4. Stir in kidney beans and diced tomatoes. Cook for an additional 2 minutes.
Step 5. Season with your favorite Mexican spices and serve hot.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Mackerel with Roasted Brussels Sprouts
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Cut the Brussels sprouts in half and toss with olive oil, salt, and pepper. Spread on a baking sheet and roast for 20 minutes. Step 2. Cook quinoa and lentils according to package instructions. Step 3. Season mackerel fillets with salt and pepper. Heat a skillet over medium-high heat and add a small amount of oil. Sear the mackerel for 2-3 minutes on each side. Step 4. Serve mackerel with roasted Brussels sprouts and a side of quinoa and lentil salad. Step 5. Garnish with nutritional yeast for added flavor and nutrition.

recipe.name: Grilled Bok Choy and Crab Delight
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Step 2. Rinse the bok choy and pat it dry. Step 3. Place bok choy on the grill and cook for 3-4 minutes per side, or until slightly charred. Step 4. Meanwhile, heat a skillet over medium heat and add the crab. Cook for 3-4 minutes per side, or until heated through. Step 5. Serve the grilled bok choy with the crab on top.

recipe.name: Grilled Jalapeño and Tomato Salsa
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Cut jalapeño and bell pepper into 1-inch pieces and grill for 5 minutes on each side, until slightly charred. Step 2. Chop grilled jalapeño and bell pepper into smaller pieces and combine in a bowl with diced tomato, minced garlic, and lime juice. Step 3. Stir well to combine and adjust seasoning as needed. Step 4. Cover and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes to allow flavors to meld. Step 5. Serve chilled or at room temperature with tortilla chips or use as a topping for tacos.

recipe.name: Stir-fried Eggplant with Garlic
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tsp of oil in a pan over medium heat. Add the sliced onion and sauté until softened.
Step 2. Add the sliced eggplant and cook until tender.
Step 3. Add the chopped kale and stir-fry until wilted.
Step 4. Add the cooked pasta, stir to combine, and season with nutritional yeast.
Step 5. Serve hot and enjoy!

recipe.name: Roasted Bell Pepper and Broccoli Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C). Place the bell pepper on a baking sheet, drizzle with 1 tablespoon of oil, and roast for 20 minutes or until the skin is blistered. Step 2. Remove the bell pepper from the oven and let it cool down. Peel off the skin, chop it into bite-sized pieces, and set aside. Step 3. In a large skillet, heat the remaining 1 tablespoon of oil over medium-high heat. Add the broccoli florets and cook for 3-4 minutes or until they start to brown. Step 4. Add the diced tomato to the skillet and cook for an additional 2 minutes. Step 5. Stir in the roasted bell pepper, salt, and lemon juice. Cook for 1 minute to combine the flavors. Step 6. Serve the bell pepper and broccoli stir-fry hot, garnished with lemon wedges if desired.

recipe.name: Vegetarian Italian Stuffed Sweet Potatoes
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). Wash and poke the sweet potatoes with a fork. Bake for 45 minutes, or until tender. Step 2. While sweet potatoes are baking, heat a pan over medium heat. Add 1/4 cup water and sauté 1/2 cup cooked black beans with 1/4 cup sliced almonds until the liquid evaporates. Step 3. Remove the sweet potatoes from the oven and let them cool for 10 minutes. Slice them in half lengthwise and scoop out some of the flesh to make room for the filling. Step 4. In a bowl, combine the cooked black bean and almond mixture, 1/4 cup oats, and 1 cup fresh lettuce. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Step 5. Fill the sweet potatoes with the black bean and lettuce mixture, and serve.

recipe.name: Garlic and Mint Pita Focaccia
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). Step 2. Chop the garlic and mint. Step 3. Brush the pita bread with olive oil. Step 4. Top the pita bread with the chopped garlic and mint. Step 5. Bake in the oven for 10-12 minutes or until crispy.

recipe.name: Paleo Grilled Salmon with Roasted Vegetables
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Season salmon fillets with salt and pepper. Step 2. Grill salmon for 4-5 minutes per side or until cooked through. Step 3. Toss cauliflower and green beans with olive oil, salt, and pepper on a baking sheet. Step 4. Roast in the oven at 425°F (220°C) for 15-20 minutes or until tender. Step 5. Wilt spinach in a pan with olive oil over medium heat. Serve salmon with roasted vegetables and wilted spinach.

recipe.name: Mexican-Style Scallops with Salsa and Peppers
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the sliced mushrooms and cook until they release their liquid and start to brown, about 5 minutes. Remove from the skillet and set aside. Step 2. Add another tablespoon of oil to the skillet and cook the sliced peppers until they start to soften, about 3 minutes. Add the chopped peanuts and cook for another minute, stirring constantly. Step 3. Add the scallops to the skillet and cook until they are opaque and cooked through, about 3-4 minutes per side. Step 4. In a small bowl, mix together 1/2 cup of diced cabbage, 1 tablespoon of lime juice, and 1 minced garlic clove. Step 5. Serve the scallops with the salsa and peppers on the side, garnished with additional peanuts and cabbage if desired.

recipe.name: Grilled Duck Fajitas
main_ingredients: 1 lb duck breast (1 piece, sliced into thin strips)
2 tbsp avocado oil (or other paleo-friendly oil)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Season duck breast with cumin and chili powder. Step 2. Grill duck breast for 5-6 minutes per side, or until cooked through. Step 3. Meanwhile, heat avocado oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add sliced zucchini and cook for 3-4 minutes per side, or until tender. Step 4. Add broccoli to the skillet and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, or until tender. Step 5. Slice the grilled duck into thin strips and serve with sautéed zucchini and broccoli. Step 6. Serve with your favorite paleo-friendly toppings, such as sliced avocado or salsa.

recipe.name: Keto Mexican-Style Grilled Tilapia
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Step 2. In a bowl, mix lime juice, cumin, chili powder, garlic, salt, and cilantro. Step 3. Add chopped lamb, cod, and shrimp to the bowl and mix well. Step 4. Place the tilapia fillets on the grill and cook for 4-5 minutes per side or until cooked through. Step 5. Grill the lamb, cod, and shrimp mixture for 5-7 minutes per side or until cooked through, breaking it up into smaller pieces as it cooks.

recipe.name: Roasted Non-Dairy Vegetable Medley
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
      Step 2. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
      Step 3. In a large bowl, toss together the sliced potatoes, broccoli florets, bell pepper slices, and chopped carrots until they are evenly coated with olive oil, garlic powder, and thyme.
      Step 4. Spread the vegetable mixture onto the prepared baking sheet and roast in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender and lightly browned.
      Step 5. Serve the roasted vegetable medley hot, garnished with fresh herbs if desired.

recipe.name: Kombu Dashi Jiru (Japanese Clear Broth)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cut the kombu into large pieces and soak them in 2 cups of water for at least 30 minutes to remove impurities. Step 2. Heat a pot over medium heat and add the kombu and water. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes. Step 3. Strain the broth through a fine-mesh sieve into a clean pot, discarding the kombu. Step 4. Add the rice vinegar and lemon juice to the broth and stir to combine. Step 5. Serve the dashi hot, garnished with a sprinkle of sesame seeds if desired.

recipe.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
recipe.steps: Step 1: Cook the pasta according to package instructions. Drain and set aside. Step 2: In a large pan, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks. Step 3: Once the beef is browned, add the flour and cook for 1-2 minutes, stirring constantly. Step 4: Gradually add a little water to the pan, stirring constantly to avoid lumps. Bring the mixture to a simmer and cook for 5-7 minutes, until it thickens. Step 5: Season the bolognese sauce with salt and pepper to taste. Serve the sauce over the cooked pasta.

recipe.name: Cucumber and Green Bean Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a wok over medium-high heat. Add the diced pork belly and cook for 3-4 minutes until browned.
Step 2. Add the green beans and cook for 4-5 minutes until tender.
Step 3. Add the sliced cucumber and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes.
Step 4. Season with soy sauce and stir-fry for another minute.
Step 5. Serve over steamed rice, garnished with peanuts.

recipe.name: Tomato Fritters
recipe.steps:
Step 1. In a large bowl, combine the flour, eggs, and chopped lettuce. Mix well to form a thick batter.
Step 2. Add the chopped tomato and mix until just combined.
Step 3. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Step 4. Heat a large non-stick skillet over medium heat.
Step 5. Drop the batter by tablespoonfuls onto the skillet, flatten slightly, and cook for 2-3 minutes or until golden brown. Flip and cook the other side.

recipe.name: Spicy Mushroom Tacos
recipe.steps: Step 1. In a large skillet, heat 1 tsp of oil over medium heat and sauté the sliced mushrooms until tender. Step 2. Add the diced jalapeño and cook for an additional 1-2 minutes. Step 3. Stir in chili powder and mexican oregano and cook for 1 minute. Step 4. Warm the tortillas by wrapping them in a damp paper towel and microwaving for 20-30 seconds. Step 5. Assemble the tacos by spooning the mushroom mixture onto a tortilla and serving.
recipe.note: Authentic Mexican tacos often include a variety of toppings such as diced onions, cilantro, and sour cream. Feel free to get creative!

recipe.name: Garlic Steak with Green Beans and Corn
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat your grill to medium-high heat. Season the beef steak with salt, pepper, and garlic powder. Step 2. Grill the steak for 5-6 minutes per side, or until it reaches your desired level of doneness. Step 3. While the steak is cooking, toss the green beans and corn with olive oil, salt, and pepper. Step 4. Grill the vegetables for 5-7 minutes, or until they are tender and lightly charred. Step 5. Slice the steak and serve with the grilled vegetables.

recipe.name: Roasted Vegetable Frittata
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). Step 2. In a large bowl, whisk together flour, 1/2 cup water, and a pinch of salt. Step 3. Add chopped vegetables to the bowl and mix well. Step 4. Pour the mixture into a greased 9-inch pie dish. Step 5. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until the vegetables are tender and the crust is golden brown. Step 6. Remove from oven and let it cool for 5 minutes before serving.

recipe.name: Grilled Tuna and Scallops Pasta
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook the pasta according to the package instructions until al dente. Reserve 1 cup of pasta water before draining.
Step 2. In a large skillet, heat 1 tablespoon of oil over medium-high heat. Add the tuna and cook for 2-3 minutes per side, or until cooked through. Transfer to a plate and set aside.
Step 3. In the same skillet, add another tablespoon of oil if necessary. Add the scallops and cook for 2-3 minutes per side, or until cooked through. Transfer to a plate with the tuna.
Step 4. In a large skillet or wok, heat 1 tablespoon of oil over medium heat. Add the sliced carrot and cook for 3-4 minutes, or until tender. Add the reserved pasta water and stir to combine.
Step 5. Add the cooked pasta to the skillet with the carrot and toss to combine. Slice the cooked tuna and scallops and add to the pasta. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
recipe.note: This recipe is missing the mushroom, which was requested by the user.

recipe.name: Chinese Tuna Stir Fry with Sardines and Onion
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cook the pasta according to the package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside. Step 2. In a wok or large skillet, heat 2 tablespoons of oil over medium-high heat. Add the sliced onion and cook for 2-3 minutes until softened. Step 3. Add the diced tuna to the wok and cook for 2-3 minutes until browned. Step 4. Add the flaked sardines, cooked pasta, and 1 tablespoon of soy sauce to the wok. Stir-fry for 2-3 minutes until the ingredients are well combined. Step 5. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Garlic and Tuna Salad
recipe.steps: Step 1. Peel and chop the garlic cloves. Step 2. Chop the tuna into small pieces. Step 3. In a large bowl, combine the chopped tuna, lettuce, and garlic. Step 4. Squeeze a slice of lemon over the top and mix well. Step 5. Serve and enjoy!

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Cod with Black Bean and Bell Pepper Sauté
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat a non-stick pan with a small amount of oil. Add sliced bell peppers and sauté until tender. Step 2. Add sliced mushrooms and cook for another 3-4 minutes or until they release their liquid. Step 3. Add cooked black beans to the pan and stir well to combine with bell peppers and mushrooms. Step 4. Season with sugar and garlic. Step 5. Season cod pieces with salt and pepper and pan-fry until golden brown.

recipe.name: Italian Chicken and Broccoli Roulade
recipe.steps: Step 1: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). Step 2: Butterfly the chicken breasts and season with salt, pepper, and oregano. Step 3: In a pan, sauté the broccoli in a little bit of oil until tender. Step 4: Place a chicken breast on a flat surface and add a slice of mozzarella, a spoonful of broccoli, and a sprinkle of sage. Roll the chicken tightly and secure with toothpicks. Repeat with the remaining chicken breasts. Step 5: Place the chicken roulades seam-side down in a baking dish and drizzle with balsamic vinegar. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through.

recipe.name: Classic American Beef Mac and Cheese
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Step 2. Cook pasta according to package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside.
Step 3. In a large skillet, cook ground beef over medium-high heat until browned, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks.
Step 4. Stir in shredded cheese until melted. Add cooked pasta and stir until well combined.
Step 5. Transfer the pasta mixture to a baking dish and top with additional shredded cheese and butter.
Step 6. Bake in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the top is golden brown and the cheese is bubbly.

recipe.name: Crispy Keto American Lamb Chop
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Step 2. In a food processor, grind the almond flour and Parmesan cheese into a fine crumb. Step 3. In a shallow dish, mix together the beaten eggs. In another shallow dish, mix together the almond flour crumb mixture, oregano, salt, and pepper. Step 4. Season the lamb chop with salt and pepper. Coat the lamb chop evenly with the beaten eggs, then coat with the almond flour crumb mixture, pressing gently to adhere. Step 5. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Sear the lamb chop for 2-3 minutes on each side, then transfer to a baking sheet and bake for an additional 10-12 minutes, or until the internal temperature reaches 145°F (63°C) for medium-rare. Let the lamb rest for 5 minutes before slicing. Meanwhile, toss the cauliflower florets with olive oil, garlic, salt, and pepper on a separate baking sheet. Roast in the oven for 15-20 minutes, or until tender and caramelized.

recipe.name: Japanese Corn and Eggplant Stir-Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 2 tbsp of sesame oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add 3 cloves of minced garlic and cook for 1 minute. Step 2. Add sliced eggplant and cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Step 3. Add corn and cook for an additional 3 minutes. Step 4. Stir in chopped bok choy and cook until wilted. Step 5. Serve over 8 oz of cooked pasta. Step 6. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

recipe.name: Roasted Potato and Mushroom Glutten-Free Delight
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 200C (400F). Wash and peel the potatoes, then chop them into large wedges. Step 2. In a large bowl, mix together chopped potatoes, olive oil, salt, and pepper until the potatoes are evenly coated. Step 3. Spread the potato wedges in a single layer on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Step 4. Roast the potatoes in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes or until they are golden brown. Step 5. While the potatoes are roasting, heat some olive oil in a pan over medium heat. Add the sliced mushroom and cook until they are tender and lightly browned. Step 6. Once the potatoes are done, remove them from the oven and serve hot with the roasted mushroom on top.

recipe.name: Scrambled Eggs and Roasted Green Beans
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat the oven to 200°C (400°F). Rinse 200g green beans and place them on a baking sheet. Drizzle with a pinch of salt. Roast in the oven for 10-12 minutes, or until slightly tender.

Step 2. In a pan, heat a tablespoon of oil over medium heat. Add 100g sliced mushrooms and cook until slightly browned, about 3-4 minutes.

Step 3. Add 50g diced tomato to the pan and cook for another 2-3 minutes, stirring occasionally.

Step 4. In a separate bowl, whisk together 4 eggs and a pinch of salt. Add a teaspoon of nutritional yeast for extra flavor.

Step 5. Pour the eggs over the mushroom and tomato mixture in the pan. Scramble the eggs until they are cooked to your desired doneness.
Serve the scrambled eggs with roasted green beans and a sprinkle of nutritional yeast.

recipe.name: Roasted Tomato and Garlic Soup
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). Place the chopped onion and garlic on a baking sheet and roast for 15 minutes or until lightly caramelized. Step 2. Peel the skin off the roasted garlic and add it to a blender or food processor. Step 3. Add the chopped tomatoes, roasted onion, olive oil, salt, and pepper to the blender or food processor. Step 4. Blend the mixture until smooth. Step 5. Taste and adjust the seasoning as needed. Step 6. Serve the soup hot, garnished with a sprinkle of fresh herbs if desired.

recipe.name: Lime BBQ Burger
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat a grill or grill pan to medium-high heat. Step 2. In a small bowl, mix together a tablespoon of butter with a tablespoon of BBQ sauce. Step 3. Brush the BBQ butter mixture onto the hamburger buns. Step 4. Grill the hamburger buns for 2-3 minutes on each side, until lightly toasted. Step 5. Assemble the burgers by spreading a tablespoon of BBQ sauce on the bottom bun, followed by a lettuce leaf, a tomato slice, and finally the top bun. Step 6. Cut the burgers in half and serve immediately.

recipe.name: Vegan Black Bean and Edamame Stir Fry
main_ingredients: 1 cup black beans, drained and rinsed
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the green beans and cook for 3-4 minutes, until tender. Remove from skillet and set aside.
Step 2. In the same skillet, add the black beans, edamame, and chopped cashews. Cook for 2-3 minutes, until the ingredients start to brown.
Step 3. Add 1 tablespoon of soy sauce (make sure it's vegan) and 1 tablespoon of nutritional yeast to the skillet. Stir well to combine.
Step 4. Return the green beans to the skillet and stir to combine with the black bean mixture.
Step 5. Cook for an additional 2 minutes, until the ingredients are well combined and heated through.
Step 6. Serve hot, garnished with additional green beans and cashews if desired.

recipe.name: Vietnamese Grilled Mushroom Skewers
main_ingredients: carrot (4-5, peeled and cut into bite-sized pieces)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat your grill to medium-high heat. Thread mushroom, carrot, and mint onto skewers, leaving a little space between each piece. Step 2. In a small bowl, whisk together 2 tablespoons of hoisin sauce and 1 tablespoon of fish sauce. Brush the mixture evenly onto both sides of the skewers. Step 3. Grill the skewers for 10-12 minutes, turning occasionally, until the vegetables are tender and slightly charred. Step 4. Remove the skewers from the grill and garnish with fresh Vietnamese coriander leaves. Step 5. Serve immediately and enjoy!
recipe.note: These skewers are inspired by the flavorful street food of Vietnam. The combination of hoisin and fish sauce creates a sweet and savory glaze that's perfect for grilled vegetables.

recipe.name: Vegetarian Indian-Style Quinoa Bowl
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Rinse the quinoa in a fine mesh strainer and drain well. In a medium saucepan, bring the quinoa and water to a boil. Reduce the heat to low, cover, and simmer for 15-20 minutes or until the quinoa is tender and the water has been absorbed.

Step 2. While the quinoa cooks, heat a tablespoon of vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the sliced mushrooms and cook, stirring occasionally, until they release their liquid and start to brown, about 5-7 minutes.

Step 3. Add the shredded cabbage and minced garlic to the skillet with the mushrooms. Cook, stirring occasionally, until the cabbage is tender and lightly browned, about 5-7 minutes.

Step 4. Fluff the cooked quinoa with a fork and add it to the skillet with the mushroom and cabbage mixture. Stir to combine.

Step 5. Season the quinoa mixture with salt and lime juice to taste. Serve hot, garnished with sliced cucumber.
recipe.note: Enjoy your delicious and nutritious Indian-Style Quinoa Bowl!

recipe.name: Crispy Chicken and Tomato Stir-Fry
main_ingredients: chicken breast (3 lbs, cut into bite-sized pieces)
recipe.steps: Step 1. In a medium bowl, whisk together 2 tablespoons sugar, 1 egg, and 1 tablespoon cornstarch. Add the chicken pieces and toss to coat. Step 2. Heat 2 tablespoons vegetable oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add the chicken and cook until browned, about 5-6 minutes. Step 3. Add the sliced tomatoes to the skillet and cook for 3-4 minutes, until they start to soften. Step 4. Push the chicken and tomatoes to one side of the skillet. Step 5. In a small bowl, mix 1 tablespoon sugar and 1 tablespoon cornstarch. Add 2 tablespoons milk and whisk until smooth. Pour the mixture into the empty side of the skillet and cook for 1-2 minutes, until the sauce thickens. Step 6. Stir the sauce into the chicken and tomatoes, and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, until the sauce has thickened and the chicken is cooked through.
recipe.note: None

recipe.name: Creamy Lentil Pasta
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cook pasta according to package instructions until al dente. Step 2. Sauté sliced celery and minced garlic in a pan until softened. Step 3. Add lentils and a splash of water to the pan, and cook until lentils are tender. Step 4. Combine cooked pasta and lentil mixture, tossing to combine. Step 5. Season with salt to taste.
recipe.note: Please add salt to your shopping list.

recipe.name: Thai Basil Fritters
recipe.steps: Step 1. In a large bowl, whisk together flour, a pinch of salt, and 1 tablespoon sugar. Step 2. Add chopped Thai basil, holy basil, and kaffir lime leaves to the flour mixture. Step 3. Mix in 2 tablespoons of lime juice and 1/2 cup of water to form a dough. Step 4. Knead the dough for 5-7 minutes until smooth. Step 5. Divide the dough into 8 equal pieces and shape each piece into a ball. Flatten each ball slightly into a disk shape. Step 6. Heat a non-stick pan with 2 tablespoons of oil over medium heat. Cook the fritters for 2-3 minutes on each side, until golden brown.

recipe.name: Italian Keto Tuna Salad
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Drizzle the tuna with olive oil (1 tbsp) and lemon juice (1 tbsp). Set aside.
Step 2. In a pan, sauté the spinach with garlic (1 clove) until wilted.
Step 3. Cut the avocado in half and remove the pit.
Step 4. In a bowl, combine the sautéed spinach, tuna, and avocado.
Step 5. Mix well and serve chilled.

recipe.name: Stuffed Eggplant Rolls
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). Cut the eggplant in half lengthwise and scoop out the insides, leaving a shell of about 1 cm thick. Step 2. In a pan, heat 1 tablespoon of oil over medium heat. Add the chopped peanuts and cook for 3-4 minutes until fragrant. Step 3. Mix the peanuts with 200g ground beef (you can also use other meats) and add 2 tablespoons of nutritional yeast. Step 4. Stuff each eggplant half with the peanut-beef mixture and roll them up tightly. Place the rolls seam-side down in a baking dish. Step 5. Drizzle with olive oil and bake for 20-25 minutes until the eggplant is tender and the filling is cooked through.

recipe.name: Twice-Baked Sweet Potato Cakes with Chickpea Topping
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Pierce the sweet potatoes with a fork a few times and bake for about 45 minutes, or until tender. Let cool. Step 2. Scoop out the flesh of the sweet potatoes and mash in a bowl. Add the flour, a pinch of salt, and mix well. Step 3. Divide the sweet potato mixture into 4 equal parts and shape each into a patty. Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat and cook the patties for about 4-5 minutes on each side, or until crispy and golden. Step 4. In the same skillet, add the chopped onion and cook until translucent. Step 5. Stir in the chickpeas and cook for 1 minute. Step 6. To assemble the dish, place a twice-baked sweet potato cake on each plate, top with a spoonful of the chickpea mixture, and garnish with parsley.

recipe.name: Italian Pork Belly Ragu
recipe.steps: Step 1. Chop onion, shallots, and garlic. Step 2. Sear the pork belly in hot skillet until browned. Step 3. Add the ground pork and cook until browned, breaking it apart as it cooks. Step 4. Add the lobster, chopped onion, shallots, garlic, and tomato paste. Step 5. Add in asparagus and simmer the sauce for 15 minutes.

recipe.name: Indian-Style Lentil Curry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat oil in a pan over medium heat. Add cumin seeds and cinnamon, and sauté until fragrant.
Step 2. Add diced bell pepper and cook until tender.
Step 3. Add lentils and 2 cups of water. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 20-25 minutes.
Step 4. Season with salt and sugar to taste.
Step 5. Serve hot, garnished with chopped cilantro (if available).
Step 6. Serve with rice or naan bread, if desired.

recipe.name: Thai Curry Rice Bowl
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of butter in a large pan over medium heat. Add the chopped carrot and cook until tender, about 5 minutes. Step 2. In a separate pan, heat the remaining 1 tablespoon of butter over low heat. Add the thai curry paste and cook, stirring constantly, for 1 minute. Step 3. Add 2 cups of water to the pan with the curry paste and bring to a boil. Step 4. Add the cooked carrot to the curry sauce and stir to combine. Step 5. Cook the rice according to package instructions. Step 6. To assemble the dish, place a scoop of rice in a bowl, top with the curry sauce and carrot mixture, and garnish with a squeeze of lime juice.

recipe.name: Pork and Mushroom Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks.
Step 2. Add diced celery to the skillet and cook until tender.
Step 3. Add mushrooms and cook until they release their liquid and start to brown.
Step 4. Stir in edamame and cook until heated through.
Step 5. Serve hot.
recipe.note: Lettuce is missing from the inventory. Consider adding it to your shopping list.

recipe.name: Grilled Chicken Feta Skewers
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Thread the chicken, tomato, bell pepper, and garlic onto skewers. Step 2. Brush the skewers with olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Step 3. Grill the skewers for 10-12 minutes, turning occasionally, until the chicken is cooked through. Step 4. Remove the skewers from the grill and top each with a sprinkle of crumbled feta cheese. Step 5. Serve immediately, garnished with additional fresh herbs if desired.

recipe.name: Vietnamese Lemongrass and Spinach Soup
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Chop lemongrass, celery, onion, and shallots into small pieces.
Step 2. In a large pot, heat 2 tablespoons of oil over medium heat. Add the chopped lemongrass, celery, onion, and shallots. Cook until the vegetables are softened.
Step 3. Add 4 cups of vegetable broth to the pot and bring to a boil.
Step 4. Reduce the heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes.
Step 5. Add the spinach to the pot and cook until wilted.

recipe.name: Sweet Potato and Garlic Delight
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). 
                Step 2. Toss the sweet potato cubes with olive oil, garlic, and salt in a bowl.
                Step 3. Spread the sweet potato mixture on a baking sheet and roast in the oven for 20-25 minutes or until tender.
                Step 4. Remove from the oven and serve hot.
                Step 5. Garnish with additional garlic if desired.

recipe.name: Indian Lobster and Spinach Curry
main_ingredients: lobster (1 whole, cut into small pieces)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat oil in a large pan over medium heat. Add onion, garlic, and ginger and sauté until onion is translucent.
Step 2. Add curry powder and sauté for 1 minute.
Step 3. Add lobster pieces and cook until they start to brown.
Step 4. Add chopped spinach, sliced green beans, and sliced carrot, and cook until the vegetables are tender.
Step 5. Add chickpeas, tomato puree, lemon juice, salt, and black pepper. Stir well and cook for an additional 5 minutes.
Step 6. Serve hot with basmati rice or naan bread.

recipe.name: Rosemary Sun-Dried Tomato Pasta
recipe.steps: Step 1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook pasta according to package instructions until al dente. Reserve 1 cup of pasta water before draining. Step 2. In a large skillet, heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil over medium heat. Add 6 slices of prosciutto and cook until crispy, about 4-5 minutes. Remove prosciutto from skillet and set aside. Step 3. In the same skillet, add 2 sprigs of fresh rosemary and cook for 1 minute, until fragrant. Step 4. Add the sun-dried tomatoes to the skillet and cook for 2-3 minutes, until they start to soften. Step 5. Add the reserved pasta water to the skillet and stir to combine. Step 6. Add the cooked pasta to the skillet, tossing to combine with the tomato and rosemary mixture. Step 7. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Step 8. Slice the cooked prosciutto into strips and sprinkle over the pasta. Serve immediately.

recipe.name: Grilled Steak and Cabbage
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Step 2. Slice the cabbage into thin strips and separate into leaves. Step 3. Season the beef steak with salt and pepper. Step 4. Grill the beef steak for 5-6 minutes per side, or until it reaches desired doneness. Step 5. Grill the cabbage leaves for 2-3 minutes per side, or until slightly charred.
recipe.note: You are missing lettuce for a salad, but you can still enjoy the grilled steak and cabbage.

recipe.name: Mushroom Fried Rice
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the sliced mushrooms and cook until they're tender and lightly browned, about 3-4 minutes.
Step 2. Push the mushrooms to one side of the skillet. Crack in the eggs and scramble them until they're cooked through, breaking them up into small pieces as they cook.
Step 3. Mix the eggs with the mushrooms. Add the cooked rice to the skillet, breaking up any clumps with a spatula. Stir-fry the rice with the mushrooms and eggs for about 2-3 minutes, until everything is well combined.
Step 4. Stir in the remaining 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil, the lime juice, and a pinch of salt to taste.
Step 5. Transfer the mushroom fried rice to a serving platter and serve hot.

recipe.name: Keto Tuna Avocado Salad
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cut the avocado into small pieces and place in a large bowl. Step 2. Add the shredded cheese to the bowl and mix well. Step 3. Flake the tuna into small pieces and add to the bowl. Step 4. Cut the eggs into small pieces and add to the bowl. Step 5. Mix all the ingredients together and serve.

recipe.name: Vegan Sweet Potato and Kale Stew
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat the olive oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add the chopped onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes. Step 2. Add the diced sweet potato and cook for an additional 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Step 3. Add the cooked kidney beans, chopped kale, and a pinch of salt. Step 4. Pour in 2 cups of water and bring the mixture to a boil. Step 5. Reduce the heat to low and simmer, covered, for 20-25 minutes, or until the sweet potatoes are tender.

recipe.name: Tofu and Duck Breast Piccata
main_ingredients: tofu (8 oz, cut into thin slices)
duck breast (6 oz, sliced into thin cutlets)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Season the duck breast cutlets with salt and pepper. Dredge the tofu slices in flour, shaking off excess. 
Step 2. In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium-high heat. Sear the duck breast cutlets until browned, about 2-3 minutes per side. Transfer the duck to a plate. 
Step 3. In the same skillet, add more olive oil if necessary. Add the tofu slices and cook until golden brown, about 3-4 minutes per side. Transfer the tofu to the plate with the duck. 
Step 4. In the same skillet, add the minced garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute. Add the shrimp and cook until pink, about 2-3 minutes per side. 
Step 5. Add the chicken broth, tomato paste, and nutritional yeast to the skillet. Stir to combine and bring to a simmer. Return the duck and tofu to the skillet and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, until the sauce has thickened. Serve the piccata hot, garnished with chopped cashews and lemon wedges.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Tilapia with Mashed Potatoes and Garlic
recipe.steps: Step 1. Peel and chop the potatoes into large chunks. Boil them in salted water until tender, then drain the water and mash the potatoes with butter and a pinch of salt. Step 2. Heat a pan over medium heat and add 2 tablespoons of oil. Add the garlic and sauté until fragrant. Step 3. Season the tilapia fillets with salt and pepper. Step 4. Place the tilapia in the pan and sear for 3-4 minutes per side, until cooked through. Step 5. Serve the tilapia with mashed potatoes and garlic sauce.
recipe.note: This recipe uses available ingredients, but note that milk and celery are missing which were requested.

recipe.name: Grilled Chicken Fajitas
main_ingredients: 1 lb chicken breast, cut into thin strips (500g)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chicken and cook until browned, about 5-6 minutes. Remove from heat and set aside. Step 2. Add the sliced bell peppers to the skillet and cook for 3-4 minutes, until they start to soften. Step 3. Add the cooked chicken back into the skillet and stir in the lime juice. Step 4. Cook for an additional 2 minutes, until the chicken and peppers are well coated with the lime juice. Step 5. Serve immediately, garnished with additional lime wedges if desired.

recipe.name: Gluten-Free Italian Baked Sweet Potatoes
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). Scrub the sweet potatoes clean. Poke some holes in each with a fork to allow steam to escape. Rub the sweet potatoes with olive oil and sprinkle with salt, pepper, and dried oregano. Step 2. Place the sweet potatoes directly on the middle rack of the oven. Bake for 30 minutes or until the skin is crispy. Step 3. While the sweet potatoes are baking, mince the garlic and sauté in a pan over low heat for 5-7 minutes, stirring frequently, until fragrant. Step 4. Once the sweet potatoes are done, let them cool for a few minutes. Slice them in half lengthwise. Step 5. Divide the sautéed garlic among the sweet potatoes and serve.

recipe.name: Vegan Cucumber Fritters with Sweet Glaze
recipe.steps:
Step 1. In a large bowl, combine sliced cucumber, flour, sugar, and a pinch of salt. Mix well to combine.
Step 2. Heat a non-stick skillet or griddle over medium heat. Add a small amount of oil to prevent sticking.
Step 3. Using a 1/4 cup measuring cup, scoop the cucumber mixture onto the skillet or griddle.
Step 4. Flatten the mixture slightly with a spatula and cook for 2-3 minutes on each side, until golden brown.
Step 5. Serve the cucumber fritters warm with a sweet glaze made by dissolving the remaining sugar in a little water.

recipe.name: Vietnamese Beef and Scallop Stir-Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cut the brussels sprouts in half and set aside. Heat 1 tbsp of oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the ground beef and cook, breaking it up with a spoon, until browned, about 5 minutes. Step 2. Add the edamame and cook for 2 minutes. Step 3. Add the scallops and cook for 2-3 minutes per side, or until lightly browned and cooked through. Step 4. Add the brussels sprouts and cook, stirring frequently, until tender and slightly browned, about 5 minutes. Step 5. Sprinkle with sugar to taste and serve hot.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Salmon with Vegetables
main_ingredients: salmon (2 fillets), zucchini (2 medium), carrot (2 medium), potato (2 medium)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat a non-stick skillet or pan over medium heat. Step 2. Peel and slice the potatoes into wedges. Step 3. Slice the zucchini and carrot into bite-sized pieces. Step 4. Season the salmon fillets with salt (available in the pantry). Step 5. Add a small amount of oil to the preheated pan and sear the salmon fillets for 3-4 minutes per side. Step 6. Add the sliced potatoes, zucchini, and carrot to the pan and cook for an additional 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.

recipe.name: Mattar Mushroom Curry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat ghee in a pan over medium heat. Add mustard seeds and let them sizzle for a few seconds. Add sliced bell pepper and sauté until it's tender. Step 2. Add diced mushrooms and cook until they release their moisture and start browning. Step 3. Add garam masala, chili powder, and salt. Cook for 1 minute, stirring constantly. Step 4. Add diced tomatoes and stir well. Step 5. Reduce heat to low and simmer the curry for 10-15 minutes or until the sauce thickens. Season with salt to taste.

recipe.name: Classic American Chicken Breast with Mushroom Gravy
recipe.steps: Step 1: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C). Step 2: Season the chicken breast with salt and pepper. Step 3: Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat and sear the chicken breast until browned on both sides. Step 4: Transfer the chicken breast to a baking dish, add the diced tomato, and bake for 20 minutes. Step 5: While the chicken is cooking, heat vegetable oil in a separate skillet over medium heat and sauté the mushrooms until tender. Step 6: Serve the chicken breast with the mushroom gravy made from sautéed mushrooms and pan juices.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Cod
recipe.steps: Step 1. Rinse the cod fillets and pat them dry with a paper towel. Step 2. Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat and add a small amount of oil. Step 3. Place the cod fillets in the pan, skin side up (if they have skin). Step 4. Cook for 3-4 minutes, then flip the cod over and cook for an additional 3-4 minutes, until cooked through. Step 5. Serve the cod with a side of pan-fried potatoes and a sprinkle of peanuts.

recipe.name: Broccoli Lime Soup
main_ingredients: lime (2), broccoli (2 heads), salt (to taste), tomato (1)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 2 cups of milk in a saucepan over medium heat.
                Step 2. Add 2 heads of broccoli to the saucepan and cook until tender.
                Step 3. Squeeze 2 limes and add the juice to the saucepan.
                Step 4. Add 1 tomato, diced, to the saucepan and cook for 5 minutes.
                Step 5. Season with salt to taste and blend until smooth.

recipe.name: Grilled Lemon Garlic Pork Chops
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
Step 2. In a small bowl, whisk together lemon juice, minced garlic, and olive oil.
Step 3. Season pork chops with salt and brush the lemon-garlic mixture on both sides of the chops.
Step 4. Grill pork chops for 5-6 minutes per side, or until cooked through.
Step 5. Let the chops rest for 5 minutes before serving.

recipe.name: Korean-Style Fried Rice
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the minced garlic and stir-fry until fragrant, about 1 minute.
Step 2. Add the grated carrot and stir-fry for an additional 2-3 minutes, until slightly tender.
Step 3. Add the cooked rice to the skillet, breaking up any clumps with a spatula. Stir-fry the rice with the garlic and carrot for about 5 minutes, until heated through.
Step 4. Add the soy sauce and sesame oil to the rice mixture, and stir-fry for an additional 1-2 minutes, until the rice is well coated.
Step 5. Taste and adjust the seasoning as needed. Serve hot and enjoy!
Step 6. Garnish with sesame seeds and chopped green onions, if desired.

recipe.name: Simple Tomato Fritters
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oil in a deep frying pan to 350°F. In a bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, and a pinch of salt. Step 2. Add the softened butter to the flour mixture and mix until it resembles breadcrumbs. Step 3. Cut the tomato into small pieces and add them to the flour mixture. Mix well. Step 4. Using a spoon, drop small portions of the mixture into the hot oil. Step 5. Fry the fritters until they are golden brown and crispy, then remove them from the oil with a slotted spoon.

recipe.name: Italian Cucumber and Lime Salad
main_ingredients: 1/4 cup chopped fresh pepper (such as bell or sweet pepper)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cook quinoa according to package instructions and set aside. Step 2. Cut the cucumbers into thin slices and place them in a bowl. Step 3. Squeeze the juice of one lime over the cucumbers, and sprinkle with salt to taste. Step 4. Flake the sardines and scatter them over the cucumbers. Step 5. Sprinkle chopped pepper over the sardines. Step 6. Serve the salad over cooked quinoa.

recipe.name: Thai-Style Grilled Chicken and Celery Skewers
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cut the chicken breast into bite-sized pieces and set aside. Cut the celery into 1-inch pieces and place in a bowl. Step 2. In a small bowl, whisk together 2 tbsp of fish sauce, 1 tsp of sugar, and 1 minced bird's eye chili. Step 3. Add the fish sauce mixture to the celery and toss to coat. Step 4. Thread the chicken and celery onto skewers, leaving a small space between each piece. Step 5. Grill the skewers over medium-high heat for 10-12 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through.

recipe.name: Spicy Beef and Celery Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tbsp of olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Cook the ground beef until browned, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks, about 5-7 minutes. Step 2. Add the sliced celery to the skillet and cook for an additional 3-4 minutes, until tender. Step 3. Add the bird's eye chilies, minced, to the skillet and cook for 1 minute. Step 4. Squeeze the juice of 1 lime over the beef and celery mixture and stir to combine. Step 5. Sprinkle 2 tbsp of flour over the mixture and stir to combine. Cook for an additional 2 minutes, until the flour is lightly toasted. Step 6. Stir in the diced tomato and cook for an additional 2 minutes, until heated through. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Vietnamese-Style Steamed Broccoli and Seafood Rice Bowl
recipe.steps: Step 1. Rinse the rice and mussels in cold water, then soak the mussels in water for 10 minutes. Drain and set aside. Step 2. Heat a tablespoon of sesame oil in a pan over medium heat. Add the mussels and cook for 2-3 minutes or until they open. Remove from heat and set aside. Step 3. In the same pan, add another tablespoon of sesame oil and sauté the flaked tuna until lightly browned. Step 4. In a separate pot, steam the broccoli for 3-4 minutes or until it's tender but crisp. Step 5. Cook the rice according to package instructions. Step 6. To assemble the dish, place a scoop of cooked rice in a bowl, followed by a portion of steamed broccoli, some cooked mussels, and a sprinkle of tuna.

recipe.name: Cheesy Potato Shepherd's Pie
main_ingredients: 1 large potato (1.5 lbs), peeled and diced
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). In a large skillet, sauté diced potato in a little oil until they start to brown. Set aside.
Step 2. Using the same skillet, add a bit more oil and sauté chopped eggplant and bell pepper until tender.
Step 3. In a separate pan, melt a non-dairy butter substitute and add corn kernels. Cook for 2-3 minutes until lightly toasted.
Step 4. In a large bowl, combine cooked potato mixture, eggplant and bell pepper mixture, and corn mixture. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Step 5. Transfer the mixture to a 9x13 inch baking dish and top with a layer of nutritional yeast-based cheesy sauce (see note).
Step 6. Brush the edges of the baking dish with a little egg wash to create a golden crust.
Step 7. Bake in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes until the top is golden brown and the filling is hot and bubbly.
recipe.note: To make a non-dairy cheesy sauce, combine 1/2 cup nutritional yeast with 1/4 cup non-dairy milk in a blender. Blend until smooth and creamy, then season with salt and pepper to taste.

recipe.name: Vegan Sweet Potato and Kale Stew
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C). Toss the sweet potato cubes with 1 tablespoon of oil and roast in the oven for 20 minutes until tender. Step 2. In a large pot, sauté the chopped tempeh in a little oil until golden brown. Step 3. Add the chopped kale, sliced carrots, and roasted sweet potato to the pot. Step 4. Stir in the chopped cashews and a pinch of salt and pepper. Step 5. Simmer the stew over low heat for 10-15 minutes until the flavors have melded together.

recipe.name: Stir-Fried Squid with Pork and Pepper
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat olive oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat.
                 Step 2. Add the sliced pork and cook until browned, about 3-4 minutes.
                 Step 3. Remove the pork from the wok and set aside.
                 Step 4. Add the sliced peppers to the wok and cook until tender, about 3-4 minutes.
                 Step 5. Add the squid to the wok and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, until it starts to flake apart.
                 Step 6. Return the cooked pork to the wok and stir to combine with the squid and peppers.
                 Step 7. Serve immediately.

recipe.name: Asian-Style Stir-Fried Pasta and Carrot
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Cook pasta according to package instructions. 
               Step 2. Heat 1 tbsp of oil in a pan over medium-high heat. 
               Step 3. Add grated carrot and cook for 3-4 minutes until slightly tender. 
               Step 4. Add cooked pasta to the pan and stir in fish sauce. 
               Step 5. Season with pepper to taste.

recipe.name: Vegan Black Bean and Cauliflower Stir Fry
main_ingredients: 1 cup black beans, drained and rinsed
1 head of cauliflower, broken into florets
recipe.steps:
Step 1. In a large pan, heat 2 tablespoons of oil over medium-high heat. Add the black beans and cook until lightly browned, about 5 minutes.
Step 2. Add the cauliflower to the pan and cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally, until slightly tender.
Step 3. Add the cabbage and corn kernels to the pan, stirring to combine with the black beans and cauliflower.
Step 4. Reduce heat to medium-low and cook, covered, for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Step 5. Serve the stir fry hot, garnished with chopped fresh herbs if desired.

recipe.name: BBQ Pork Rice Bowl
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat grill or grill pan to medium-high heat. Season pork with sugar and a pinch of salt.
Step 2. Grill the pork for 5-6 minutes per side, or until it reaches an internal temperature of 63°C.
Step 3. Meanwhile, heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat. Add sliced bell peppers and celery, and cook until tender (about 5 minutes).
Step 4. Cook the rice according to package instructions.
Step 5. Slice the grilled pork and assemble the BBQ pork rice bowls with the cooked rice, grilled vegetables, and BBQ sauce.
recipe.note: None

recipe.name: Chicken and Veggie Stir-Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Cut the chicken breast into bite-sized pieces and season with salt and pepper. Cook the chicken for 5-7 minutes per side, or until it reaches an internal temperature of 165°F. Step 2. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside. Add more oil if needed, then add the chopped cauliflower and cook for 5 minutes, or until it starts to tenderize. Step 3. Add the sliced tomato and cook for an additional 5 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender-crisp. Step 4. Return the cooked chicken to the skillet and stir in the chopped lettuce. Cook for 1-2 minutes, or until the lettuce is wilted. Step 5. Serve hot and enjoy!
recipe.note: This recipe requires flour and butter, which are not available in your inventory.

recipe.name: Pasta Primavera with Nutritional Yeast and Peanuts
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cook the pasta according to package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside. Step 2. In a pan, heat some oil and sauté the broccoli and spinach until tender. Step 3. Add the cooked pasta to the pan with the vegetables and toss to combine. Step 4. Sprinkle nutritional yeast and peanuts over the pasta and toss again to distribute evenly. Step 5. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

recipe.name: Vietnamese Lobster and Cauliflower Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. In a medium bowl, whisk together lime juice, 1 tsp fish sauce, and 1 tsp sugar. Add the lobster meat and marinate for at least 15 minutes.
recipe.Step 2. In a wok or large skillet, melt: Step 3. Add the remaining 1 tbsp butter to the wok or skillet. Add the sliced carrots and cook until they start to soften, about 2-3 minutes.
recipe.Step 4. Add the cauliflower florets to t: Step 5. Return the cooked lobster to the wok or skillet and stir in with the vegetables. Cook for an additional 1-2 minutes to combine. Serve hot and garnish with fresh cilantro if desired.

recipe.name: Grilled Lobster with Vietnamese-Style Tempeh Salad
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Season the lobster with a pinch of salt and grill for 3-4 minutes per side, or until opaque and slightly charred. Set aside to rest. Step 2. In a small bowl, whisk together 1 tbsp of olive oil, 1 tbsp of flour, and a pinch of salt. Toss the mushroom slices with the mixture to coat. Step 3. Grill the coated mushroom slices for 2-3 minutes per side, or until tender and slightly charred. Step 4. In a large bowl, combine the crumbled tempeh, sliced mushrooms, and a sprinkle of salt. Step 5. Slice the grilled lobster and place on top of the tempeh mixture. Drizzle with the remaining 1 tbsp of olive oil and serve immediately.

recipe.name: Pan-Roasted Cauliflower
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Step 2. Cut the cauliflower into florets and potatoes into wedges. Step 3. In a mixing bowl, toss the cauliflower and potatoes with vegetable oil, salt, and flour until evenly coated. Step 4. Place the cauliflower and potatoes on a baking sheet and bake for 20-25 minutes or until golden brown. Step 5. Meanwhile, cook the lamb chops in a pan with a little oil until browned on both sides and cooked to your liking. Step 6. Serve the roasted cauliflower and potatoes with the lamb chops.
recipe.note: This recipe does not use broccoli or sugar, which are the missing ingredients from your request.

recipe.name: Pasta alla Amatriciana
recipe.steps: Step 1. Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook pasta according to package instructions. Reserve 1 cup of pasta water before draining. Step 2. Finely chop the pancetta and cook in a large skillet over medium heat until crispy. Remove the pancetta from the skillet, leaving the rendered fat behind. Step 3. Add the minced garlic to the skillet and cook for 1 minute until fragrant. Step 4. Add the sliced bell pepper to the skillet and cook until tender, about 3-4 minutes. Step 5. Add the sun-dried tomatoes to the skillet, stir to combine with the garlic and bell pepper mixture. Step 6. Add the reserved pasta water to the skillet and stir to combine. Step 7. Add the cooked pasta to the skillet, tossing to coat with the tomato sauce. Step 8. Return the cooked pancetta to the skillet, tossing to combine with the pasta and sauce.

recipe.name: Roasted Asparagus and Potato with Garlic Salt
recipe.steps: Step 1: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Step 2: In a large bowl, toss the chopped potatoes with 2 tablespoons of olive oil, salt, and minced garlic until they are well coated. Spread them out in a single layer on the prepared baking sheet. Step 3: Roast the potatoes in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until they are golden brown and crispy. Step 4: While the potatoes are roasting, toss the asparagus spears with 1 tablespoon of olive oil, salt, and minced garlic. Step 5: After the potatoes have roasted for 20 minutes, add the asparagus to the baking sheet and continue roasting for an additional 5-7 minutes, or until the asparagus is tender and slightly charred. Step 6: Remove the roasted vegetables from the oven and sprinkle with additional salt to taste. Serve hot, garnished with chopped fresh herbs if desired.

recipe.name: Roasted Vegetarian Italian Quinoa Bowl
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). Cut the eggplant and brussels sprouts into bite-sized pieces and place on a baking sheet. Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Roast in the oven for 25 minutes, or until tender and lightly browned.
Step 2. In a separate pan, heat some olive oil over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and sauté for 1-2 minutes until fragrant.
Step 3. In a medium saucepan, bring 2 cups of water to a boil. Add the quinoa and reduce the heat to low. Cover the saucepan and simmer for 20 minutes, or until the water is absorbed and the quinoa is tender.
Step 4. Once the quinoa is cooked, fluff it with a fork and stir in some chopped cashews.
Step 5. To assemble the quinoa bowls, place a scoop of quinoa on a plate, followed by some roasted vegetables and a sprinkle of parmesan cheese (not included in this recipe since it contains dairy, but you can add it according to your preference). Season with salt and pepper to taste.

recipe.name: Gochujang Bokkeumbap (Korean-Style Stir-Fried Rice)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 2 tbsp of vegetable oil in a pan over medium-high heat. Add the chopped onion and cook until translucent (3-4 min).
Step 2. Add the sliced mushroom and cook until they release their moisture and start browning (4-5 min).
Step 3. Add the chopped perilla leaves, gochugaru, and korean chili pepper to the pan and stir-fry for 1-2 min.
Step 4. Add the broccoli florets to the pan and stir-fry until they are tender-crisp (2-3 min).
Step 5. Season with salt to taste and serve the gochujang bokkeumbap hot.

recipe.name: Korean-Style Kimchi Stir-Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add the grated carrot and cook for 2-3 minutes until slightly tender.
Step 2. Add the kimchi to the skillet and stir-fry for 1-2 minutes until it starts to caramelize.
Step 3. Add the dried seaweed and soy sauce to the skillet and stir-fry for another minute, until the seaweed is crispy.
Step 4. Add the lettuce to the skillet and stir-fry for 1-2 minutes until wilted.
Step 5. Serve the kimchi stir-fry immediately, garnished with additional seaweed if desired.

recipe.name: Vegetarian Indian Lentil Curry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a pan and sauté the green beans until tender. Set aside. Step 2. In the same pan, add another 2 tablespoons of oil and sauté the broccoli until tender. Step 3. Add 1 onion (200g) diced and sauté until softened. Step 4. Add 2 cloves of garlic (15g) minced, 1 teaspoon of cumin powder, 1 teaspoon of coriander powder, and 1 teaspoon of turmeric. Step 5. Add 1 cup (250ml) of water, 1 cup (250ml) of vegetable broth, and 200g of lentils. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer until the lentils are tender.

recipe.name: Spinach and Edamame Stir-Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat. Step 2. Add sliced bell pepper and cook for 3-4 minutes until tender. Step 3. Add edamame and cook for 2-3 minutes until heated through. Step 4. Stir in spinach and cook until wilted. Step 5. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Step 6. Serve immediately.

recipe.name: Vegan Peanut and Garlic Rice Bowl
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Cook rice according to package instructions. 
                Step 2. Chop peanuts and garlic, set aside. 
                Step 3. Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat. 
                Step 4. Add chopped peanuts and garlic, cook for 2-3 minutes until fragrant. 
                Step 5. Serve cooked rice with peanut-garlic mixture on top.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Tilapia with Sautéed Spinach and Mushroom
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat a non-stick skillet over medium-high heat. Step 2. Season the tilapia fillets with salt and pepper. Step 3. Add 1 tbsp of olive oil to the skillet and sear the tilapia for 3-4 minutes per side, until cooked through. Step 4. In a separate pan, heat the remaining 1 tbsp of olive oil over medium heat. Add the sliced carrots and cook for 2-3 minutes until tender. Step 5. Add the sliced mushrooms to the pan and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes until they release their liquid and start to brown. Step 6. Add the chopped spinach to the pan and cook until wilted. Step 7. Serve the pan-seared tilapia with the sautéed spinach and mushrooms.

recipe.name: Korean-Style Beef and Radish Stir-Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 2 tablespoons of vegetable oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add the sliced celery and cook until it starts to soften, about 2-3 minutes.
Step 2. Add the minced garlic and cook for another minute, until fragrant.
Step 3. Add the diced ground beef and cook until it is browned, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks.
Step 4. Add the diced korean radish and cook for another 2-3 minutes, until it starts to soften.
Step 5. Stir in 2 cups of cooked rice and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, until everything is well combined and heated through.
Step 6. Serve hot, garnished with chopped lettuce if desired.

recipe.name: Thai Bird's Eye Chili Stir Fry with Celery
recipe.steps: Step 1. Slice the celery into thin strips. Step 2. In a wok or large skillet, heat 1-2 tablespoons of oil over medium-high heat. Step 3. Add the sliced bird's eye chilies and stir-fry until fragrant, about 2 minutes. Step 4. Add the celery strips and stir-fry for another 3-4 minutes, until they start to soften. Step 5. Add the fish sauce and stir-fry for another minute. If desired, add the milk to create a creamy version and stir-fry for another 2 minutes. Step 6. Serve hot, garnished with a sprinkle of fish sauce and a squeeze of lime juice.

recipe.name: Garam Masala Veggie Dosa
recipe.steps:
Step 1. In a large bowl, combine grated carrot, chopped celery, grated ginger, and minced garlic. Mix well.
Step 2. Add garam masala, salt, and a pinch of black pepper to the mixture. Mix well.
Step 3. Heat a non-stick pan or griddle over medium heat. Grease the pan with a small amount of oil.
Step 4. Using a ladle, scoop the vegetable mixture onto the pan and spread it evenly to form a dosa.
Step 5. Cook the dosa for 2-3 minutes or until it's golden brown and crispy. Flip the dosa and cook for another 2 minutes.
Step 6. Serve the dosa hot with your favorite chutney or sauce.
recipe.note: This recipe is a vegetarian twist on the classic Indian dosa. The garam masala adds a warm, aromatic flavor to the dish.

recipe.name: Vegetarian Sweet Potato and Paneer Curry
main_ingredients: sweet potato (2 large, peeled and diced)
paneer (1 cup, cut into bite-sized pieces)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat oil in a pan over medium heat. Add chopped peanuts and sauté for 2 minutes until fragrant.
Step 2. Add diced sweet potato and sauté for 5 minutes until slightly tender.
Step 3. Add chopped kale and corn to the pan. Stir well and continue to cook for 5 minutes.
Step 4. Add paneer to the pan and stir gently to combine. Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes until paneer is lightly browned.
Step 5. Season the curry with salt and pepper to taste. Serve hot over rice or with naan bread.

recipe.name: Classic Italian Pasta
recipe.steps: Step 1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook pasta according to package instructions until al dente. Step 2. In a large skillet, heat 1 tsp of oil over medium-high heat. Add pork and cook until browned, about 3-4 minutes. Step 3. Add sliced peppers to the skillet and cook until tender, about 5 minutes. Step 4. Squeeze 1 tsp of fresh lemon juice over the cooked peppers and pork. Step 5. Combine cooked pasta, pepper mixture, and a pinch of sugar in a large serving bowl. Toss to combine.

recipe.name: Roasted Vegetable Medley
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Step 2. Cut the broccoli into florets and the mushrooms into slices. Add the celery stalks to the sheet. Step 3. Drizzle with water and sprinkle salt. Step 4. Roast in the oven for 20-25 minutes or until the vegetables are tender. Step 5. Serve hot, garnished with additional herbs if desired.

recipe.name: Simple Chicken and Vegetable Stir-Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Step 2. Add the sliced onion and cook until softened, about 3-4 minutes. Step 3. Add the sliced carrot and cook for another 3-4 minutes, until tender-crisp. Step 4. Add the chicken breast and cook until browned and cooked through, about 5-6 minutes. Step 5. Season with salt to taste. Step 6. Serve hot and enjoy!

recipe.name: Grilled Mushroom and Lime Rice Bowl
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Rinse 1 cup of rice and soak it in water for 20 minutes. Drain and set aside.
Step 2. Heat 1 tablespoon of lime juice in a pan over medium heat. Add 1 cup of sliced mushrooms and cook until they release their moisture and start browning.
Step 3. Add 1 teaspoon of sugar to the pan and stir to combine. Continue cooking for another 2 minutes.
Step 4. In a separate pan, heat 2 tablespoons of lime juice over medium heat. Add 1 cup of soaked and drained rice and stir to combine.
