Step 5. Divide the cooked rice between two bowls, top with the grilled mushroom mixture, and serve immediately.

recipe.name: Sardine and Edamame Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a pan over medium-high heat. Add the sliced bell pepper and cook until tender, about 3-4 minutes.
Step 2. Add the flaked sardines and cooked edamame to the pan, stir-frying for 2-3 minutes.
Step 3. Season with a pinch of salt and pepper to taste.
Step 4. Serve the sardine and edamame mixture over cooked rice.
Step 5. Garnish with additional sliced bell peppers, if desired.
Step 6. Serve immediately and enjoy!

recipe.name: Italian Squid and Potato Fritters
main_ingredients: 1 large squid (250g), cleaned and cut into small pieces
recipe.steps: Step 1. In a large bowl, combine squid, potatoes, celery, and garlic. Step 2. Add flour, salt, and pepper to the bowl and mix well. Step 3. Using your hands, shape the mixture into small patties. Step 4. Heat a non-stick pan with a small amount of oil over medium heat. Step 5. Fry the fritters for 3-4 minutes on each side, until golden brown and crispy.

recipe.name: Creamy Pork Pasta
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cook pasta according to package instructions. Drain and set aside. Step 2. In a pan, melt butter over medium heat. Add pork and cook until browned, about 5 minutes. Step 3. Add flour and cook for 1 minute, stirring constantly. Step 4. Gradually add 200ml of water to the pan, whisking continuously to avoid lumps. Step 5. Bring the mixture to a simmer and cook until it thickens. Step 6. Stir in cooked pasta and wilted spinach.

recipe.name: Chicken and Mushroom Fettuccine
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil and cook the fettuccine according to package instructions until al dente. Reserve 1 cup of pasta water before draining.
Step 2. In a large skillet, heat the vegetable oil over medium-high heat. Add the sliced chicken breast and cook until browned and cooked through, about 5-6 minutes. Remove from heat and set aside.
Step 3. In the same skillet, add the sliced mushrooms and cook until they release their moisture and start to brown, about 3-4 minutes.
Step 4. Add the cooked fettuccine to the skillet with the mushrooms and toss to combine, adding some reserved pasta water if the mixture seems dry.
Step 5. Slice the cooked chicken breast and add it to the skillet with the fettuccine and mushrooms. Toss to combine and season with salt and pepper to taste.
Step 6. Serve hot, topped with chopped lettuce and additional parmesan cheese if desired.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Chicken Breast and Thigh with Mackerel Crust
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat a non-stick skillet over medium-high heat. Season the chicken breast with salt and pepper.
Step 2. In a separate bowl, mix flour and lemon juice. Coat the chicken breast with the flour mixture, shaking off excess.
Step 3. Add 1 tablespoon of oil to the preheated skillet and sear the chicken breast for 3-4 minutes per side, until golden brown.
Step 4. Meanwhile, prepare the mackerel crust by mashing the mackerel fillets with a fork and mixing with 1 tablespoon of lemon juice. Set aside.
Step 5. Reduce heat to medium and place the mackerel fillets on top of the chicken breast. Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, until the mackerel is lightly browned.

recipe.name: Stir-Fried Ginger Chicken (modified to vegetable version) - Vegetable Stir-Fry
main_ingredients: rice (no quantities needed since it's in the recipe but will be omitted for now)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Chop the celery and garlic into small pieces. Slice the ginger thinly.
Step 2. Heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chopped celery and sauté for 3-4 minutes.
Step 3. Add the sliced ginger and minced garlic to the wok and stir-fry for another minute.
Step 4. Add the pasta and 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil to the wok. Stir-fry for 2-3 minutes.
Step 5. Add 1 teaspoon of sugar and stir-fry for another minute. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Spaghetti Aglio e Olio
recipe.steps: Step 1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil and cook the spaghetti according to package instructions. Reserve 1 cup of pasta water before draining the spaghetti. Step 2. In a large skillet, heat 3 cloves of minced garlic in 1/4 cup of olive oil over medium heat until fragrant. Step 3. Add the reserved pasta water to the skillet and stir to combine. Step 4. Add the cooked spaghetti to the skillet, tossing to combine with the garlic and oil mixture. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Step 5. Garnish with fresh basil leaves before serving.

recipe.name: Stuffed Eggplant with Ground Beef
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). Step 2. In a large skillet, heat 1 tablespoon olive oil over medium heat. Add onion and garlic and sauté until softened, about 5 minutes. Step 3. Add broccoli florets and cook for an additional 3-4 minutes. Step 4. In a separate pan, cook the available onions. Step 5. Stuff each eggplant slice with the cooked onion and broccoli mixture. Place eggplant slices on a baking sheet and drizzle with remaining olive oil. Step 6. Bake for 15-20 minutes, or until eggplant is tender.
recipe.note: Cannot complete recipe as 'ground beef' and 'sugar' are not in your inventory.

recipe.name: Carrot and Bell Pepper Tempura
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Cut the carrots and bell peppers into bite-sized pieces and set aside. In a large bowl, whisk together 100g rice flour, a pinch of salt, and a few grinds of black pepper. Gradually add in 200ml dashi, whisking until smooth.
Step 2. Heat about 5-7cm of vegetable oil in a deep frying pan over medium-high heat until it reaches 180°C.
Step 3. Dip each piece of carrot and bell pepper into the batter, coating them evenly, and then carefully place them into the hot oil.
Step 4. Fry the tempura for about 3-4 minutes or until they turn golden brown.
Step 5. Remove the tempura from the oil with a slotted spoon and drain on paper towels. Serve hot with a dipping sauce of your choice.

recipe.name: Southern-Style BBQ Nachos
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Step 2. Chop the celery and carrot into small pieces. 
Step 3. Arrange tortilla chips on a baking sheet. 
Step 4. Drizzle BBQ sauce over the tortilla chips. 
Step 5. Sprinkle chopped celery, grated carrot, and sliced pickles on top. 
Step 6. Bake in the oven for 10-12 minutes or until crispy.

recipe.name: Indian-Style Vegetable Biryani
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tbsp vegetable oil in a pan over medium heat. Add 1 tsp of butter and sauté until melted.
Step 2. Add 1 cup of rice to the pan and sauté for 2-3 minutes.
Step 3. Add 1 cup of water and 1 tsp of fenugreek to the pan. Bring to a boil.
Step 4. Reduce heat to low and cover the pan with a lid. Simmer for 15-20 minutes or until the rice is cooked.
Step 5. In a separate pan, heat the remaining 1 tbsp of vegetable oil over medium heat. Add 1 cup of spinach and sauté until wilted.
Step 6. Combine the cooked rice and spinach mixture in the biryani pan.
Step 7. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Grilled Corn and Spinach Salad with Cucumber
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Grill corn for 10-12 minutes, turning occasionally, until lightly charred.
Step 2. In a large bowl, combine spinach, cucumber, and grilled corn.
Step 3. Drizzle 2 tablespoons of vegetable oil over the salad and toss to combine.
Step 4. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Step 5. Serve immediately, garnished with additional spinach if desired.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Cod with Roasted Vegetables
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). Rinse and pat dry the cod fillet. Season with salt and pepper. Step 2. In a bowl, toss zucchinis and cauliflower with 1 tbsp of olive oil, salt, and pepper. Spread on a baking sheet and roast in the oven for 15 minutes. Step 3. In a pan, heat 1 tbsp of olive oil over medium heat. Add the cod fillet and cook for 3-4 minutes on each side, or until cooked through. Step 4. Remove the cod from the pan and set aside. Step 5. Add the roasted zucchinis and cauliflower to the pan and toss to combine with the leftover pan juices. Serve the pan-seared cod with the roasted vegetables.
recipe.note: This paleo recipe highlights the importance of using whole, unprocessed ingredients to create a delicious and balanced meal.

recipe.name: Spicy Broccoli Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat the vegetable oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add the sliced shallots and cook until they are translucent, about 2-3 minutes.
Step 2. Add the sliced bird's eye chilies and cook for another minute.
Step 3. Add the grated carrot and cook for 2-3 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Step 4. Add the broccoli florets and cook until they are tender but still crisp, about 3-4 minutes.
Step 5. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Mushroom and Peanut Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tsp of oil in a pan over medium heat.
Step 2. Add 1 cup sliced mushroom and cook until browned, about 3-4 minutes.
Step 3. Add 2 tbsp chopped peanuts and stir-fry for another minute.
Step 4. Add 1 tsp pepper and stir-fry for 1 minute.
Step 5. Serve hot with steamed rice.

recipe.name: Crispy Vegetable Fritters
recipe.steps:
Step 1. In a large bowl, combine grated zucchini and bell pepper. Add flour and mix well.
Step 2. Heat 1/4 cup of vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Step 3. Using a spoon, drop the zucchini mixture into the hot oil and flatten slightly.
Step 4. Cook for 3-4 minutes on each side or until golden brown.
Step 5. Remove from oil and drain on paper towels. Serve hot and enjoy!

recipe.name: Broccoli with Miso Glaze
recipe.steps:
Step 1. In a large skillet, heat a tablespoon of oil over medium-high heat. Add the chopped onion and cook until translucent, about 5 minutes.
Step 2. Add the chopped celery and cook for an additional 2 minutes.
Step 3. Add the broccoli to the skillet and cook until it starts to soften, about 5 minutes.
Step 4. In a small bowl, whisk together the mirin, chopped ginger, and sugar to make the glaze. Pour the glaze over the broccoli mixture and stir to coat.
Step 5. Continue cooking for an additional 5-7 minutes, until the broccoli is tender and the glaze is caramelized.

recipe.name: Vegetarian Lentil Chili con Carne
main_ingredients: 1 lamb chop (for flavor only, use lamb broth instead of animal part)
recipe.steps: Step 1: In a large pot, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes. Step 2: Add the garlic and cook for 1 minute. Step 3: Add the lentils, cashews, lamb broth, cumin, and chili powder. Stir to combine. Step 4: Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer, covered, for 20-25 minutes, or until the lentils are tender. Step 5: Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve hot, garnished with chopped fresh cilantro if desired.

recipe.name: Roasted Vegan Vegetable Medley
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.Step 2. In a large bowl, toss asparagus, kale, bell pepper, and zucchini with 2 tbsp olive oil, salt, and pepper until evenly coated.Step 3. Spread the vegetables in a single layer on the prepared baking sheet.Step 4. Roast in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender and lightly caramelized.Step 5. In a separate pan, heat 1 tbsp olive oil over medium heat. Add kidney beans and edamame. Cook for 5-7 minutes, stirring occasionally, until heated through.Step 6. Serve the roasted vegetables alongside the bean and edamame mixture.

recipe.name: Simple Stir-Fried Rice Bowl
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat a tablespoon of oil in a pan over medium heat. Step 2. Add the diced carrot and pepper, and cook until tender. Step 3. Add the cooked rice to the pan, breaking up any clumps. Step 4. Stir-fry the rice with the vegetables for about 5 minutes. Step 5. Add the chopped lettuce to the pan and stir-fry until wilted. Season with salt to taste.

recipe.name: Sesame Potato Cakes
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat a non-stick pan over medium heat. Step 2. In a large mixing bowl, combine grated potatoes, flour, and minced garlic. Step 3. Gradually add sesame oil to the potato mixture, mixing well until a thick batter forms. Step 4. Using a 1/4 cup measuring cup, shape the batter into patties. Step 5. Pan-fry the potato cakes until golden brown on both sides, about 5-6 minutes total.

recipe.name: Grilled Mackerel with Spinach
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Step 2. Season mackerel fillets with salt and pepper. Step 3. Brush olive oil on both sides of the mackerel fillets. Step 4. Grill the mackerel for 8-10 minutes per side, or until cooked through. Step 5. While the mackerel is cooking, heat a pan over medium heat. Step 6. Add a splash of olive oil to the pan and sauté chopped spinach until wilted. Step 7. Squeeze lemon juice over the spinach and season with salt and pepper. Step 8. Serve the grilled mackerel with sautéed spinach.

recipe.name: Grilled Chicken and Spinach Salad
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Season chicken breast with salt and pepper. Grill chicken for 5-6 minutes per side, or until cooked through. Step 2. In a large bowl, whisk together olive oil and lime juice. Add chopped spinach and toss to combine. Step 3. In a separate bowl, slice grilled chicken into thin strips. Step 4. Add chicken strips to the spinach mixture and toss to combine. Step 5. Serve immediately and enjoy!

recipe.name: Thai-Style Holy Basil Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Mince the lemongrass and sauté in butter until fragrant. Step 2. Add diced celery and cook until it starts to soften. Step 3. Add holy basil leaves and stir constantly to prevent burning. Step 4. Cook rice according to package instructions. Step 5. Serve the stir-fry over cooked rice.

recipe.name: Kombu Shiso Stir Fry
main_ingredients: kombu (2 sheets cut into thin strips)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil in a pan over medium heat.
Step 2. Add the sliced bell pepper and cook until tender, about 5 minutes.
Step 3. Add the chopped shiso leaves and cook for an additional minute.
Step 4. Add the kombu strips and cook for 2-3 minutes, until slightly softened.
Step 5. Season with salt to taste.
Step 6. Serve immediately.

recipe.name: Keto Chinese-Style Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Slice the salmon fillet, shrimp, cod, and lamb chop into bite-sized pieces. Set aside. Step 2. In a wok or large skillet, heat the vegetable oil over medium-high heat. Cook the bacon slices until crispy, then set aside. Step 3. In the same wok or skillet, add the sliced salmon, shrimp, cod, and lamb chop. Cook for 2-3 minutes on each side, or until cooked through. Step 4. Remove the cooked seafood from the wok or skillet and set aside. Step 5. In the same wok or skillet, add the soy sauce, ginger, and garlic. Stir-fry for 1 minute, then add the cooked seafood back into the wok or skillet. Step 6. Stir-fry everything together for 1-2 minutes, until the sauce has thickened. Step 7. Garnish with green onions and serve with sliced avocado.

recipe.name: Lobster and Pork Italian Stir Fry
main_ingredients: lobster tail (1 lb, cut into bite-sized pieces)
pork tenderloin (1 lb, cut into bite-sized pieces)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 2 tbsp olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the pork and cook until browned, 3-4 minutes. Set aside.
Step 2. Add the lobster to the skillet and cook until lightly browned, 2-3 minutes. Set aside with the pork.
Step 3. In the same skillet, add 1 tbsp olive oil over medium heat. Add the chopped celery and cook until tender, 3-4 minutes.
Step 4. Add the cooked edamame, spinach, and cooked lobster and pork back into the skillet. Stir in 1 tsp dried basil and 1 tsp dried oregano. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Step 5. Serve the Italian stir fry hot, garnished with additional basil if desired.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Bok Choy with Asian Glaze
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a pan over medium-high heat.
Step 2. Add bok choy and cook until wilted, about 3-4 minutes.
Step 3. Meanwhile, mix 1 tablespoon of soy sauce and 1 tablespoon of honey in a small bowl.
Step 4. Add the soy sauce mixture to the pan and stir to combine.
Step 5. Sprinkle almonds over the top and serve.

recipe.name: Baked Shrimp with Mediterranean Cabbage
main_ingredients: 1 pound large shrimp, peeled and deveined
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. In a bowl, toss 1 medium head of cabbage (shredded) with 1 tablespoon olive oil, salt, and pepper until well coated. Spread on the prepared baking sheet. Step 2. In a separate bowl, mix 1/4 cup nutritional yeast with 1 teaspoon paprika and 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder. Step 3. Place 2 medium carrots (peeled and sliced) on a separate baking sheet. Drizzle with 1 tablespoon olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Step 4. On a separate baking sheet, place 1 pound large shrimp, peeled and deveined. Drizzle with 1 tablespoon olive oil and sprinkle with 1/4 cup nutritional yeast mixture. Step 5. Bake in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes for the cabbage and carrots, and 8-10 minutes for the shrimp.

recipe.name: Grilled Bok Choy with Black Bean Salsa
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Step 2. Brush bok choy with olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Step 3. Grill bok choy for 5-7 minutes or until tender. Step 4. Meanwhile, heat a pan over medium heat and sauté garlic until fragrant. Step 5. Add black beans, diced tomato, and pork belly to the pan. Cook for 5-7 minutes or until the pork is crispy.
recipe.note: Missing onion, which could be used to add more flavor to the dish.

recipe.name: Spicy Lemongrass and Carrot Soup
recipe.steps:
Step 1. In a large pot, combine chopped carrot and bruised lemongrass. Cook over medium heat until the carrot is tender, about 20 minutes.
Step 2. Add chopped cilantro and lemon juice to the pot. Stir well.
Step 3. Use an immersion blender to puree the soup until smooth.
Step 4. Taste and adjust seasoning as needed.
Step 5. Serve the soup hot, garnished with additional cilantro if desired.

recipe.name: Japanese Teriyaki Rice Bowl with Pork and Broccoli
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Cook Japanese rice according to package instructions. Set aside.
Step 2. In a small bowl, whisk together soy sauce and rice vinegar. Set aside.
Step 3. Heat a non-stick pan over medium-high heat. Add pork and cook until browned, about 3-4 minutes. Remove from pan and set aside.
Step 4. In the same pan, add the broccoli and cook until tender-crisp, about 3-4 minutes.
Step 5. Add the cooked pork back into the pan and pour in the soy sauce and rice vinegar mixture. Stir to combine and cook for an additional 1-2 minutes.
Step 6. To assemble the bowl, place a scoop of cooked rice at the bottom, followed by a portion of the pork and broccoli mixture.
recipe.note: Serve immediately and enjoy!

recipe.name: Japanese-Style Beef Teriyaki
recipe.steps: Step 1. In a small bowl, whisk together soy sauce, mirin, and miso paste. Set aside. Step 2. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks. Step 3. Once browned, add the whisked soy sauce mixture to the skillet and stir to combine. Step 4. Bring the mixture to a simmer and cook for 5-7 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened. Step 5. Meanwhile, slice the onion into thin rings. Step 6. Serve the beef teriyaki over a bed of rice, topped with sliced onion and a sprinkle of shichimi togarashi, if desired.

recipe.name: Mexican Tortilla Quesadilla
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat. Step 2. Butter one side of a tortilla and place it in the pan. Step 3. Sprinkle queso fresco and cotija cheese on half of the tortilla. Step 4. Fold the tortilla in half to enclose the filling. Step 5. Cook for 2-3 minutes or until the tortilla is crispy and the cheese is melted. Step 6. Flip the quesadilla and cook for another 2-3 minutes or until the other side is also crispy. Step 7. Garnish with cilantro and serve hot.

recipe.name: Vegetarian Edamame Quinoa Bowl
recipe.steps: Step 1. Rinse quinoa in a fine mesh strainer and drain well. In a medium saucepan, bring 2 cups of water to a boil. Add quinoa and reduce heat to low. Simmer, covered, until quinoa is tender and water has been absorbed, about 15-20 minutes. Step 2. In a separate pan, heat 1 tablespoon of oil over medium heat. Add chickpeas and cook until lightly browned, about 5 minutes. Step 3. Add edamame to the pan with chickpeas and cook until thawed, about 5 minutes. Step 4. In a large serving bowl, combine cooked quinoa, chickpea and edamame mixture, and chopped almonds. Step 5. Serve and enjoy!

recipe.name: Spinach and Broccoli Lemon Rice
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 2 cups of water in a large saucepan over high heat. Add 1 cup of rice and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for 15 minutes. 
Step 2. In a separate pan, heat 2 tablespoons of your preferred non-dairy oil over medium heat. Add 2 cups of broccoli florets and cook until tender, about 3-4 minutes. 
Step 3. Add 1 cup of fresh spinach to the pan with the broccoli and cook until wilted, about 1-2 minutes. 
Step 4. Stir in 2 lemons juiced and season with salt to taste. 
Step 5. Serve the lemony broccoli and spinach mixture over the cooked rice.

recipe.name: Vegan Stuffed Bell Peppers
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). Cut off the tops of the bell peppers and remove seeds.
Step 2. In a pan, heat some water and sauté the cabbage and spinach until wilted.
Step 3. In a bowl, mash the black beans and mix with the wilted cabbage mixture.
Step 4. Stuff each bell pepper with the bean and cabbage mixture and place in a baking dish.
Step 5. Bake for 20-25 minutes or until the bell peppers are tender.

recipe.name: Mexican-Style Broccoli Epazote
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add a pinch of epazote and sautxe9 for 1 minute until fragrant. Step 2. Add the broccoli florets to the skillet and cook for 3-4 minutes, until slightly tender. Step 3. Stir in the remaining 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil. Step 4. Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, until the broccoli is tender but still crisp. Step 5. Serve hot, garnished with cilantro if desired.

recipe.name: Vegetarian Quesadilla Casserole
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 180°C. Step 2. Cook pasta according to package instructions and set aside. Step 3. Sauté the mushroom in a pan with some oil until tender. Step 4. In a large bowl, combine cooked pasta, sautéed mushroom, and cottage cheese. Step 5. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish, top with more cheese, and bake for 15 minutes until golden brown.

recipe.name: Turmeric Chicken Naan Wrap
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat a non-stick pan over medium heat. Season the chicken breast with turmeric and cook until browned and cooked through. Set aside. Step 2. In the same pan, sauté the diced onion until translucent. Step 3. Add the diced potato to the pan and cook until tender. Step 4. Warm the naan bread by wrapping it in a damp cloth and microwaving for 20-30 seconds. Step 5. Assemble the wrap by placing the cooked chicken, sauté onion and potato mixture, and a sprinkle of turmeric on the naan bread. Step 6. Drizzle with ghee and serve.

recipe.name: Edamame and Mushroom Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add sliced mushrooms and cook until tender, about 5 minutes.
Step 2. In a separate pan, heat some oil and steam edamame until tender. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Step 3. Add cooked edamame to the skillet with mushrooms and stir-fry for 2 minutes.
Step 4. Squeeze lemon juice over the edamame and mushroom mixture and stir-fry for another minute.
Step 5. Serve hot, garnished with additional lemon wedges if desired.

recipe.name: Roasted Mushroom and Carrot Medley
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Step 2. Cut the mushrooms and carrots into bite-sized pieces and place them on the prepared baking sheet. Step 3. Drizzle 1 tablespoon of butter over the vegetables and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Step 4. Roast the vegetables in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes or until tender, flipping halfway through. Step 5. Remove the vegetables from the oven and sprinkle with fresh spinach. Squeeze a bit of lemon juice over the top and serve.

recipe.name: Gluten-Free Lime Cookies
recipe.steps: The recipe could not be generated due to the missing ingredient 'flour alternatives' required for gluten-free cuisine.

recipe.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
recipe.steps: Step 1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil and cook the pasta according to package instructions. Step 2. In a large pan, cook the ground beef over medium heat until browned, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks. Step 3. Add 1 tablespoon of sugar to the pan and stir to combine. Step 4. Add the ground anise to the pan and stir to combine. Step 5. Add the spinach to the pan and stir to combine. Step 6. Combine the cooked pasta and meat sauce and serve hot.
recipe.note: This recipe is a hearty and flavorful take on the classic spaghetti bolognese, perfect for a weeknight dinner.

recipe.name: Creamy Baked Potatoes with Roasted Bok Choy
recipe.steps:
Step 1: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). 
               Step 2: Scrub the potatoes clean and poke some holes in each using a fork. 
               Step 3: Rub the potatoes with a tablespoon of olive oil, then sprinkle with salt and pepper. 
               Step 4: Place the potatoes directly on the middle rack of the oven and bake for 30 minutes. 
               Step 5: While the potatoes are baking, chop the bok choy into bite-sized pieces. Toss with a tablespoon of olive oil, salt, and pepper. Spread out on a baking sheet and roast for 15-20 minutes, or until tender and slightly caramelized.

recipe.name: Garlic and Herb Potato
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Step 2. Peel the potatoes and cut them into 1-inch wedges. Step 3. In a large bowl, drizzle olive oil over the potato wedges, then sprinkle minced garlic. Step 4. Toss to coat and season with salt. Step 5. Spread the potatoes on a baking sheet and roast for 20 minutes, flip and roast for another 10 minutes. Step 6. Garnish with chopped parsley before serving.

recipe.name: Roasted Garlic and Potato Hash
main_ingredients: 1 head of lettuce (100g), shredded for garnish
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C). In a large bowl, toss diced potatoes with 1 tablespoon of olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Spread the potatoes on a baking sheet and roast for 20-25 minutes, or until tender and lightly browned.

Step 2. While the potatoes are roasting, heat the remaining 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and sauté for 2-3 minutes, until fragrant and golden brown.

Step 3. Once the potatoes are done, remove them from the oven and toss them with the roasted garlic mixture. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

Step 4. Transfer the potato and garlic mixture to a serving dish. Garnish with shredded lettuce and serve hot.

Step 5. Serve the roasted garlic and potato hash as a side dish or add it to a bed of greens for a filling salad.

recipe.name: Japanese-Style Kombu Fried Rice
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Cut the kombu into smaller pieces and soak them in water for 30 minutes. Drain and set aside.
Step 2. Heat the vegetable oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat.
Step 3. Add the panko and cook until golden brown, stirring frequently.
Step 4. Add the rice to the skillet and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes.
Step 5. Add the kombu and stir-fry for another 2 minutes.
Step 6. Season with pepper to taste.

recipe.name: Non-Dairy Beef Potato Curry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat oil in a pan over medium heat and sauté the chopped onion until softened.
Step 2. Add the ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it up with a spoon as it cooks.
Step 3. Add the diced potatoes and cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Step 4. Add 1 cup of non-dairy milk and stir to combine.
Step 5. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
recipe.note: You may want to consider adding non-dairy milk, butter, and cheese to your shopping list to make this recipe complete.

recipe.name: Gluten-Free Beef Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cook the pasta according to package instructions, but ensure it's gluten-free. Drain and set aside. Step 2. Heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it up into small pieces. Step 3. Add the sliced mushrooms and bell peppers to the skillet and cook until they're tender. Step 4. Add the cooked pasta to the skillet and stir to combine with the beef and vegetables. Step 5. Serve hot, garnished with fresh herbs if desired.
recipe.note: To ensure the recipe remains gluten-free, be mindful of cross-contamination with gluten-containing ingredients.

recipe.name: Chickpea and Broccoli Korma
recipe.steps: Step 5. Reduce heat to low, cover, and let it simmer for 10-12 minutes or until the vegetables are tender. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

recipe.name: Tomato and Mushroom Stir-Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the sliced onion and cook until translucent, about 3-4 minutes. Step 2. Add the sliced mushroom and cook until they release their liquid and start to brown, about 4-5 minutes. Step 3. Add the green beans and cook for another 2-3 minutes, until they start to soften. Step 4. Add the halved tomato and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, until they start to release their juices. Step 5. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve hot, garnished with sliced almonds.

recipe.name: Indian-Style Basmati Rice with Bell Pepper and Tomato
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a pan over medium heat. Add sliced bell pepper and sauté until tender (about 5 minutes).
Step 2. Add diced tomato to the pan and continue to cook for another 3-4 minutes, until they start to soften.
Step 3. Add basmati rice to the pan and stir well to combine with the bell pepper and tomato mixture.
Step 4. Add 1 cup of water to the pan and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for 15-20 minutes or until the rice is cooked.
Step 5. Remove from heat and serve hot.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Lamb Chop with Bok Choy and Carrot
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Season the lamb chops with salt and pepper. Sear the lamb chops for 2-3 minutes on each side, or until browned. Transfer the lamb chops to a plate and set aside.
Step 2. In the same skillet, add 1 tablespoon of oil. Add the sliced carrots and cook for 5 minutes, or until they begin to soften.
Step 3. Add the sliced bok choy to the skillet and cook for an additional 2 minutes, or until wilted. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Step 4. In a small bowl, mix together 1 cup of flour and 1/2 cup of water to create a slurry. Add the slurry to the skillet and cook for 1-2 minutes, or until the sauce thickens.
Step 5. Return the lamb chops to the skillet and simmer in the sauce for 5-7 minutes, or until cooked to your desired level of doneness.

recipe.name: Roasted Broccoli and Rice
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add broccoli and cook for 5 minutes. Step 2. Add rice to the skillet and stir to combine with broccoli. Step 3. Reduce heat to medium-low and cover the skillet with a lid. Step 4. Simmer for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally. Step 5. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Grilled Chicken and Avocado Salad
main_ingredients: chicken breast (1 breast, cut into strips)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Season the chicken breast with pepper and grill for 5-6 minutes per side, or until cooked through. Step 2. In a large bowl, combine the chopped lettuce, lime juice, and lime zest. Step 3. Once the chicken is cooked, let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it into thin strips. Step 4. Add the sliced chicken to the bowl with the lettuce mixture. Step 5. Drizzle vegetable oil over the salad and serve immediately.

recipe.name: Crispy Fried Squid and Carrot Stir-Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cut the squid into bite-sized pieces and season with salt and pepper. Step 2. Heat 2 tablespoons of vegetable oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat. Step 3. Add the squid and cook until browned and crispy, about 3-4 minutes. Step 4. Remove the squid from the wok and set aside. Step 5. In the same wok, add 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil and stir-fry the celery and carrot until they are tender-crisp, about 4-5 minutes.

recipe.name: Thai-Style Stir-Fried Vegetable Curry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a wok over medium-high heat. Add the galangal and cook for 2 minutes.
Step 2. Add the sliced onion and bell pepper and cook for 3 minutes.
Step 3. Add the diced tomato and thai chili, and cook for 2 minutes.
Step 4. Stir in 2 tablespoons of sugar and a pinch of pepper. Cook for 1 minute.
Step 5. Serve hot and garnish with lime wedges.

recipe.name: Brussels Sprouts with Bacon Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cut the Brussels sprouts in half and slice the mushroom into thin pieces. Step 2. Cook the bacon in a pan until crispy. Step 3. Remove the bacon from the pan and add the sliced mushroom, cooking until tender. Step 4. Add the Brussels sprouts to the pan and cook until tender. Step 5. Serve the Brussels sprouts and mushroom mixture with crispy bacon on top.

recipe.name: American-Style Bread and Pasta Casserole
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C). Step 2. Cook pasta according to package instructions. Drain and set aside. Step 3. In a large skillet, sauté the torn bread pieces over medium heat until lightly toasted and crispy. Step 4. In a large casserole dish, combine cooked pasta, toasted bread, and your favorite seasonings (such as salt and pickles). Step 5. Bake for 20-25 minutes or until the top is golden brown.

recipe.name: Broccoli and Lettuce Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Chop the broccoli, lettuce, celery, and peanuts. Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat. Step 2. Add the chopped vegetables and peanuts to the pan and stir-fry for 5 minutes. Step 3. Add the kidney beans to the pan and stir-fry for another 2 minutes. Step 4. Squeeze the lime over the mixture and stir-fry for another minute. Step 5. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Cauliflower and Chickpea Quinoa Bowl
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). Toss cauliflower florets with a little water, season with salt, and roast in the oven for 15 minutes.
Step 2. In a large pan, sauté the diced onion and sliced cucumber in a little water until tender. Add the chickpeas and cook for an additional 5 minutes.
Step 3. In a separate pot, bring 2 cups of water to a boil. Add the quinoa, cover, and reduce heat to low. Simmer for 15 minutes or until the water is absorbed.
Step 4. In a blender or food processor, grind the chopped cashews into a fine texture.
Step 5. To assemble the bowls, divide the cooked quinoa among plates, top with roasted cauliflower, sautéed chickpea mixture, and sprinkle with ground cashews.

recipe.name: Cabbage and Mozzarella Fritters
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oil in a deep frying pan over medium-high heat. Step 2. In a large bowl, mix together the cabbage, mozzarella, and nutritional yeast. Step 3. Using your hands, shape the mixture into small patties. Step 4. Carefully place the patties into the hot oil and fry for 3-4 minutes on each side, until golden brown. Step 5. Remove the fritters from the oil and place them on a paper towel-lined plate to drain excess oil.

recipe.name: Asian-Style Stir-Fried Lettuce
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of sesame oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat.
Step 2. Add the chopped lettuce and stir-fry until it's slightly wilted, about 3-4 minutes.
Step 3. In a small bowl, whisk together the soy sauce and remaining 1 tablespoon of sesame oil.
Step 4. Dust the flour over the lettuce to create a crispy coating, then stir-fry for another 2 minutes.
Step 5. Remove the skillet from heat and pour the soy sauce mixture over the lettuce, tossing to coat.
Step 6. Serve hot and enjoy!

recipe.name: Cantonese-Style Braised Pork with Potato
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a wok over medium heat. Add the pork and cook until browned, about 5 minutes. Remove the pork from the wok and set aside. Step 2. In the same wok, add another tablespoon of oil if necessary. Add the cubed potato and cook until they start to brown, about 5 minutes. Step 3. Add the chopped bok choy to the wok and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes until wilted. Step 4. Return the cooked pork to the wok and add salt and pepper to taste. Step 5. Serve the braised pork and potato hot, garnished with chopped green onions if desired.

recipe.name: Vegetarian Sweet Potato Tikka Masala with Squid
main_ingredients: sweet potato (2 medium, peeled and diced)
chicken breast (optional omit for vegetarian version)
recipe.steps: Step 1. In a bowl, marinate the squid pieces in a mixture of 2 tbsp lemon juice, 1 tsp garam masala, and 1 tsp salt for at least 15 minutes. Step 2. Heat 2 tbsp oil in a pan over medium heat. Add the marinated squid pieces and cook until they are golden brown on both sides. Step 3. Remove the squid from the pan and set aside. Step 4. In the same pan, add another 2 tbsp oil and sauté the diced sweet potatoes until they are tender. Step 5. Add the tomato puree, garam masala, cumin powder, and salt to the pan and mix well. Step 6. Add the cooked squid pieces to the pan and stir well. Step 7. Serve the squid and sweet potato mixture with steaming basmati rice.

recipe.name: Spicy Thai Basil Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Chop the lemongrass into 2-inch pieces and bruise with a spoon to release the oils. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a wok over medium-high heat. Add the lemongrass and cook for 1-2 minutes until fragrant. Step 2. Add the bell pepper and cook for 3-4 minutes until tender. Step 3. Add the chopped cilantro and cook for an additional minute. Step 4. In a small bowl, mix together the fish sauce, and 1 tablespoon of oil. Pour the sauce over the vegetables and stir-fry for 1-2 minutes. Step 5. Serve immediately and enjoy!

recipe.name: Tom Kha Kai (Coconut Soup with Galangal)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. In a large pan, heat 2 tbsp of vegetable oil over medium-high heat. Add the sliced galangal and sauté for 1 minute.
Step 2. Add the diced potato, sliced shallots, and chopped holy basil. Stir-fry for 3-4 minutes or until the potatoes start to soften.
Step 3. Pour in 2 cups of coconut milk and 1 cup of water. Stir well and bring the mixture to a simmer.
Step 4. In a small bowl, mix together 2 tbsp of tamarind paste and 1 tsp of fish sauce. Stir to dissolve the tamarind paste.
Step 5. Add the tamarind-fish sauce mixture to the soup and stir well. Simmer for 10-15 minutes or until the potatoes are cooked through.

recipe.name: Coconut Lemongrass Soup
recipe.steps:
Step 1. In a large pot, heat 2 tablespoons of butter over medium heat. Add the lemongrass and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
Step 2. Add the diced potatoes and cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Step 3. Pour in the coconut milk and bring the mixture to a simmer.
Step 4. Reduce the heat to low and let the soup simmer for 15-20 minutes, or until the potatoes are tender.
Step 5. Season the soup with salt and pepper to taste, then serve hot.

recipe.name: Smokey Poblano Corn Fritters
main_ingredients: poblano pepper (1, roasted and chopped), sour cream (1 tbsp), jalapeño (1, finely chopped)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat a non-stick skillet or griddle to medium heat. 
                 Step 2. In a large bowl, combine the chopped corn, roasted poblano pepper, sour cream, jalapeño, and a pinch of salt. 
                 Step 3. In a separate bowl, mix together some flour, a pinch of baking powder, and a pinch of cumin.
                 Step 4. Add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients and mix until just combined.
                 Step 5. Using a spoon, drop small portions of the mixture into the skillet or griddle and flatten slightly.
                 Step 6. Cook for 3-4 minutes on each side, until golden brown and crispy.

recipe.name: Grilled Salmon with Brussels Sprouts and Bell Pepper
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Rinse the salmon fillet and season with salt and pepper. Step 2. Grill the salmon for 4-5 minutes per side, or until it reaches an internal temperature of 145°F. Step 3. Toss the brussels sprouts with olive oil, salt, and pepper. Step 4. Grill the bell pepper for 5 minutes per side, or until it's tender and slightly charred. Step 5. Chop the lettuce and serve alongside the grilled salmon, brussels sprouts, and bell pepper.

recipe.name: Grilled Salmon with Broccoli and Bell Pepper
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the grill to medium-high heat. Step 2. Season the salmon fillets with salt and pepper. Step 3. Grill the salmon for 4-5 minutes per side, or until cooked through. Step 4. Toss the broccoli and bell pepper with olive oil, salt, and pepper. Step 5. Grill the vegetables for 2-3 minutes per side, or until tender.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Beef and Bok Choy Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add the ground beef and cook, breaking it up with a spoon, until it is no longer pink, about 5 minutes.
Step 2. Add the remaining 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil to the skillet. Add the bok choy and cook, stirring occasionally, until it is tender but still crisp, about 3-4 minutes.
Step 3. In a small bowl, mix together the cornstarch and flour. Add the lime juice and stir to combine.
Step 4. Add the cornstarch mixture to the skillet and stir to combine with the bok choy and beef.
Step 5. Cook for an additional 1-2 minutes, until the mixture is bubbly and slightly thickened.

recipe.name: Roasted Eggplant and Bok Choy
recipe.steps: Step 1: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C). Cut eggplant, onion, and bell peppers into 1-inch cubes. Step 2: In a large bowl, toss eggplant mixture with 1 tablespoon of olive oil, salt, and pepper. Step 3: Spread the eggplant mixture on a baking sheet and roast for 25-30 minutes. Step 4: In a separate pan, heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil over medium heat. Add minced garlic and sauté for 1 minute. Step 5: Add bok choy to the pan and stir-fry until wilted. Step 6: Serve roasted eggplant mixture over steamed bok choy.

recipe.name: Stir-Fried Tuna and Vegetables
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a wok or a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the sliced mushroom and cook until it's browned. Remove the mushroom and set it aside.
Step 2. Add the diced sweet potato to the wok and cook until it's slightly tender. Remove the sweet potato and set it aside with the mushroom.
Step 3. Add the cauliflower florets to the wok and cook until they're slightly tender.
Step 4. Add the canned tuna to the wok and stir-fry it with the cauliflower for about 2 minutes.
Step 5. Add the cooked mushroom and sweet potato back to the wok. Stir in the gluten-free soy sauce and serve hot.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Scallop and Mushroom Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the sliced carrot and cook for 3-4 minutes or until slightly tender. Remove from the skillet and set aside.
Step 2. Add the remaining tablespoon of vegetable oil to the skillet. Add the sliced mushroom and cook for 3-4 minutes or until they release their liquid and start browning.
Step 3. Add the scallops to the skillet and cook for 2-3 minutes per side or until they are cooked through.
Step 4. Return the cooked carrot to the skillet and stir to combine with the mushroom and scallops.
Step 5. Season with salt to taste and serve immediately.

recipe.name: Mediterranean Lentil Stew
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Rinse the lentils and soak them in water for 30 minutes. Drain and set aside.
Step 2. Heat a large pot over medium heat and add the diced zucchini and minced garlic. Cook until the zucchini is tender, about 5 minutes.
Step 3. Add the cooked lentils, water, nutritional yeast, oregano, thyme, salt, and pepper to the pot. Stir well to combine.
Step 4. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for 20 minutes, or until the stew has thickened slightly.
Step 5. Taste and adjust the seasoning as needed. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Lime and Pepper Pasta
recipe.steps: Step 1. Bring a large pot of water to a boil. Add the pasta and cook until al dente. Reserve 1 cup of pasta water before draining. Step 2. In a large skillet, heat the vegetable oil over medium heat. Add sliced lemons and cook for 2-3 minutes or until slightly caramelized. Step 3. Add lime juice, pepper to taste, and reserved pasta water to the skillet. Step 4. Return the cooked pasta to the skillet, tossing everything together to combine. Step 5. Season with salt to taste and serve.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Tilapia with Sauteed Mushrooms and Vegetables
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tbsp of vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Season the tilapia fillets with salt and pepper to taste. Add the tilapia and cook for 3-4 minutes on each side, until golden brown and cooked through. Set aside.
Step 2. In the same skillet, heat the remaining 1 tbsp of vegetable oil over medium heat. Add the sliced mushrooms and cook for 3-4 minutes, until they release their liquid and start to brown.
Step 3. Add the sliced bell peppers, celery, carrots, and onion to the skillet. Cook for 5-6 minutes, until the vegetables are tender and lightly browned.
Step 4. Serve the pan-seared tilapia on top of the sauteed mushrooms and vegetables.
Step 5. Garnish with fresh herbs, if desired.

recipe.name: Garlic and Spinach Flautas
main_ingredients: 1 bunch of spinach leaves, chopped (1 cup)
1 cup of chickpeas, drained and rinsed
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). Slice the zucchinis and onion into thin strips.
Step 2. In a large skillet, heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and cook for 1 minute until fragrant.
Step 3. Add the chopped onion, diced cucumber, and cumin to the skillet. Cook for 2 minutes until the vegetables are slightly softened.
Step 4. Add the sliced zucchinis and cook for an additional 2 minutes.
Step 5. Stir in the chopped spinach leaves and cook until wilted.
Step 6. In a separate pan, warm the corn tortillas over medium heat for 30 seconds on each side. To assemble the flautas, lay a tortilla flat and spoon a portion of the vegetable mixture onto the center of the tortilla. Roll the tortilla and place seam-side down on a baking sheet. Repeat with the remaining tortillas and filling.
Step 7. Drizzle the remaining 1 tablespoon of olive oil over the rolled tortillas and sprinkle with paprika, cayenne pepper, salt, and black pepper.
recipe.note: This recipe showcases the requested ingredients, garlic, spinach, and cucumber, while also highlighting other ingredients in your inventory.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Cod with Kale and Mozzarella
recipe.steps: Step 1. Rinse the cod pieces and pat them dry with a paper towel. Season with salt and pepper. Step 2. Heat olive oil in a non-stick skillet over medium-high heat. Add the garlic and sauté for 1 minute. Step 3. Add the cod pieces to the skillet, skin side up. Cook for 3-4 minutes, then flip and cook for another 3-4 minutes, or until cooked through. Step 4. Meanwhile, heat a separate skillet over medium heat. Add a drizzle of olive oil and sauté the chopped kale until wilted. Step 5. To assemble the dish, place a cooked cod piece on each plate, top with a slice of mozzarella, a spoonful of wilted kale, and a squeeze of lemon juice.

recipe.name: Mexican Cilantro Lime Chutney
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Combine chopped celery and cilantro in a blender or food processor. Blend until well combined.
Step 2. Add lime juice and blend until smooth.
Step 3. Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat.
Step 4. Add blended mixture and cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Step 5. Remove from heat and stir in crumbled queso fresco. Serve warm or at room temperature.

recipe.name: Spinach and Tomato Frittata
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C). Step 2. In a large skillet, heat a tablespoon of oil over medium heat. Add the chopped bell pepper and cook until tender. Step 3. Add the chopped tomato and cook for another 2-3 minutes. Step 4. Stir in the chopped parsley and cook for 1 minute. Step 5. In a bowl, whisk together the eggs and a pinch of salt. Step 6. Pour the egg mixture over the vegetable mixture and cook until the eggs start to set. Step 7. Transfer the skillet to the preheated oven and bake for 15-20 minutes, or until the eggs are set and the frittata is golden brown.

recipe.name: Baked Mackerel with Lemon and Asparagus
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Season the mackerel fillets with salt and pepper. Step 2. Cut the asparagus into 2-inch pieces and place on a baking sheet. Step 3. Drizzle olive oil and squeeze lemon juice over the asparagus. Step 4. Place the mackerel fillets on a separate baking sheet and bake for 8-10 minutes or until cooked through. Step 5. Remove the asparagus from the oven and sprinkle chopped onion over the top. Step 6. Serve the baked mackerel with lemon wedges and roasted asparagus.

recipe.name: Steamed Mussels with Cauliflower and Zucchini Stir-Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat sesame oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add cauliflower and zucchini, and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes until slightly tender. Set aside.
Step 2. In a separate pot, steam mussels over boiling water until opened, about 3-5 minutes.
Step 3. In the same skillet used for the stir-fry, add the steamed mussels (along with their cooking liquid), and brussels sprouts. Stir-fry for 2-3 minutes until the brussels sprouts are slightly tender.
Step 4. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Step 5. Serve the stir-fry with the steamed mussels on top.

recipe.name: Cardamom Chicken Naan Wraps
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat a grill or grill pan to medium-high heat. Step 2. In a bowl, mix together cumin and cardamom. Add the chicken breast and coat evenly with the spice mixture. Step 3. Grill the chicken for 5-6 minutes per side, or until cooked through. Step 4. Meanwhile, cook the naan according to package instructions. Step 5. Slice the cooked chicken into thin strips. Assemble the wraps by placing a few slices of chicken on each naan, topping with lettuce and diced potato, and serving immediately.

recipe.name: Mexican Mushroom and Avocado Rice Bowl
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Cook the rice according to package instructions. Set aside.
Step 2. Melt 1 tablespoon of butter in a pan and sauté the mushrooms until tender.
Step 3. Add diced tomatoes to the pan and cook for 2-3 minutes until they start to break down.
Step 4. Stir in cumin and mexican oregano, and cook for another minute.
Step 5. Slice the avocados and place on top of the cooked rice.
Step 6. Serve the mushroom and tomato mixture over the rice and garnish with remaining butter.

recipe.name: Korean-Style Beef and Vegetable Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Cook the rice according to the package instructions and set aside. 
Step 2. In a large pan, heat 1 tablespoon of oil over medium-high heat. Add the ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it up with a spoon as it cooks. 
Step 3. Add the chopped bell pepper and diced tomato to the pan and cook until the vegetables are tender. 
Step 4. Season the mixture with salt to taste. 
Step 5. Serve the beef and vegetable mixture over the cooked rice.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Potato and Mushroom
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.

      Step 2. Add the sliced potato and cook for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.

      Step 3. Add the sliced mushroom and cook for an additional 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.

      Step 4. Season with black pepper to taste.

      Step 5. Serve the potato and mushroom hot.

recipe.name: Gimjeon Guksu (Spicy Rice Cake Noodle Soup)
main_ingredients: 2 cups rice cake, cut into bite-sized pieces
recipe.steps: Step 1. Rinse the dried seaweed in cold water, then soak it in hot water for at least 30 minutes to rehydrate. Cut it into bite-sized pieces and set aside. Step 2. In a large pot, heat 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and sauté for 1 minute until fragrant. Step 3. Add the chopped onion and sauté for another 2-3 minutes until softened. Step 4. Add the sliced carrots and cook for 3-4 minutes until they start to soften. Step 5. Add the rice cake pieces and cook for 2-3 minutes until they start to brown. Step 6. Add the rehydrated seaweed, water, and a pinch of salt to the pot. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for 10-15 minutes. Step 7. Serve the spicy rice cake noodle soup hot, garnished with additional ginger slices if desired.

recipe.name: Baked Zucchini and Bell Pepper with Mackerel
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat oven to 200°C (400°F). Rinse the zucchini and bell pepper, then slice them into 1/2-inch thick rounds.

Step 2. In a bowl, whisk together 1 tbsp olive oil, salt, and pepper. Add the zucchini and bell pepper slices, and toss to coat.

Step 3. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Arrange the zucchini and bell pepper slices in a single layer, leaving about 1 inch of space between each slice.

Step 4. Place the mackerel fillets on top of the vegetables, drizzle with the remaining 1 tbsp olive oil, and season with salt and pepper.

Step 5. Bake for 15-20 minutes or until the fish is cooked through and the vegetables are tender. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Savory Mushroom and Tomato Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat a pan with a small amount of water over medium heat. Add 2 medium carrots and cook for 5 minutes until tender. Step 2. Add 1 cup mushrooms (sliced) to the pan and cook for another 3-4 minutes until soft. Step 3. Add 2 medium tomatoes to the pan and cook for 5 minutes until they start to break down. Step 4. Add 6 oz ground pork to the pan and cook for 3-4 minutes until browned, breaking it up with a spoon as it cooks. Step 5. Season the mixture with salt and pepper, to taste. Serve hot.
recipe.note: This recipe uses ground pork, but you can omit it to make it vegetarian if you have tempeh or other vegetarian alternatives.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Beef Steak with Roasted Veggies
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C). Cut sweet potato and carrot into 1-inch cubes. Step 2. Toss the veggies with a bit of oil, salt, and pepper on a baking sheet. Step 3. Roast the veggies in the oven for 20 minutes, or until tender. Step 4. Season the beef steak with salt and pepper. Step 5. Sear the beef steak in a hot skillet with oil for 4-5 minutes per side, or until cooked to desired doneness.
recipe.note: This recipe uses available ingredients, but garlic and eggs are not included due to their absence in the inventory.

recipe.name: Vegetarian Palak Paneer
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a pan over medium heat. Add sliced green beans and cook until tender. Step 2. In a blender, puree 1 cup of cabbage and 1 cup of water until smooth. Step 3. In a pan, heat 2 tablespoons of oil and add 1 teaspoon of cumin seeds. When cumin seeds start to sizzle, add the cabbage puree and cooked black beans. Step 4. Add 1 cup of rice to the pan and mix well. Step 5. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
recipe.note: This recipe is inspired by the flavors of Indian cuisine and is suitable for a vegetarian diet.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Tilapia with Broccoli
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Rinse the tilapia fillets and pat them dry with paper towels. Season with salt and pepper.
Step 2. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the garlic and sauté for 1 minute.
Step 3. Add the tilapia fillets to the skillet and sear for 3-4 minutes on each side, or until cooked through.
Step 4. Remove the tilapia from the skillet and set it aside. Add the broccoli to the skillet and sauté for 3-4 minutes, or until tender.
Step 5. Serve the tilapia with the broccoli and enjoy!

recipe.name: Vietnamese Mushroom Spring Rolls
recipe.steps: Step 1. Prepare the ingredients: Clean and slice the mushrooms into thin strips. Chop the vietnamese coriander and set aside. Step 2. Prepare the rice paper sheets: Cut the rice paper sheets into 4 equal pieces and soak in water for 30 seconds on each side to make them pliable. Step 3. Assemble the spring rolls: Place a piece of rice paper on a surface, add a few slices of mushroom and a sprinkle of vietnamese coriander in the center. Fold the bottom half of the rice paper over the filling, then fold in the sides and roll up the spring roll. Repeat with the remaining ingredients. Step 4. Serve: Serve the spring rolls with a dipping sauce of your choice. Step 5. Garnish: Garnish with additional vietnamese coriander and serve immediately.

recipe.name: Beef and Vegetable Stir-Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add the diced onion, bell peppers and celery and cook until the vegetables are tender, about 5 minutes. Step 2. Add the ground beef to the skillet and cook until browned, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks. Step 3. Season the beef and vegetable mixture with salt and pepper to taste. Step 4. Add 2 tablespoons of sugar to the skillet and stir to combine. Step 5. Continue cooking for an additional 2-3 minutes, until the sugar has caramelized and the flavors have melded together.

recipe.name: Tamarind Pasta
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook the pasta according to package instructions until al dente. Reserve 1 cup of pasta water before draining the spaghetti.

Step 2. In a large skillet, heat 1 tbsp of oil over medium heat. Add the tamarind paste and cook, stirring constantly, for 2-3 minutes until fragrant.

Step 3. Add the reserved pasta water to the skillet, and stir to combine with the tamarind paste mixture. Bring the mixture to a simmer and cook for 2-3 minutes until slightly thickened.

Step 4. Add the cooked pasta to the skillet, and toss to combine with the tamarind sauce. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

Step 5. Garnish with chopped cilantro and a squeeze of lemon juice. Serve immediately.

recipe.name: Grilled Chicken and Edamame Stir-Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add the chicken thigh and cook until browned, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat and set aside.
Step 2. In the same skillet, add the remaining 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil. Add the bacon and cook until crispy, about 3-4 minutes. Remove the bacon from the skillet and set aside.
Step 3. Add the sliced bell pepper to the skillet and cook until tender, about 5 minutes.
Step 4. Add the edamame to the skillet and cook for 2-3 minutes, until they start to soften.
Step 5. Add the cooked chicken back into the skillet, along with the cooked bacon and stir to combine. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

recipe.name: Pine Nut and Tomato Pasta
recipe.steps: Step 1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook pasta according to package instructions until al dente. Reserve 1 cup of pasta water before draining. Step 2. Chop the tomatoes in half and place them on a baking sheet. Drizzle with a little olive oil and roast in the oven at 200°C for 15-20 minutes, or until the tomatoes have released their juices and are slightly caramelized. Step 3. In a pan, toast the pine nuts over medium heat until fragrant and lightly browned. Step 4. In the same pan, combine the roasted tomatoes, pine nuts, and reserved pasta water. Simmer for a few minutes to create a sauce. Step 5. Toss the cooked pasta in the tomato and pine nut sauce. Season with salt and top with grated Parmesan.

recipe.name: Spicy Thai Basil Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Chop the lemongrass and sauté it with oil in a pan for 2 minutes.
Step 2. Add the sliced celery and stir-fry for 3 minutes.
Step 3. Add the broccoli and stir-fry for 4 minutes.
Step 4. Beat the eggs and pour them over the vegetables. Stir-fry until the eggs are cooked.
Step 5. Stir in the coconut milk, chopped thai basil, and sliced thai chilies. Cook for 2 minutes.

recipe.name: Creamy Pasta with Mushroom and Spinach
recipe.steps: Step 1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook the gluten-free pasta according to the package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside. Step 2. In a large skillet, heat 2 tablespoons of oil over medium heat. Add the sliced mushrooms and cook until tender, about 5 minutes. Step 3. Add the chopped celery and cook for another 2 minutes. Step 4. Add the sliced potato and cook for 3-4 minutes, or until the potato is slightly tender. Step 5. Stir in the fresh spinach leaves and cook until wilted. Step 6. Combine the cooked pasta, mushroom mixture, and a splash of your favorite non-dairy milk (such as almond or soy milk). Step 7. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

recipe.name: Asian-Style Stir-Fried Lettuce
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat a tablespoon of oil in a pan over medium heat. Add minced garlic and sauté for 1 minute. Step 2. Add letuce to the pan and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes until slightly softened. Step 3. Add cumin and stir-fry for another minute. Step 4. Season with rice vinegar and hoisin sauce to taste. Step 5. Serve immediately.

recipe.name: Spicy Stir-Fried Pasta with Vegetables
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cook pasta according to package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside. Step 2. In a large skillet, heat garlic and galangal over medium-high heat until fragrant. Step 3. Add sliced bell pepper and cook for 3-4 minutes until tender. Step 4. Add broccoli florets and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes until tender. Step 5. Stir in hoisin sauce and cook for 1-2 minutes until combined. Step 6. Combine cooked pasta and stir-fry mixture. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

recipe.name: Mexican Onion and Epazote Fried Rice
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add diced onion and cook until translucent, about 5 minutes. Step 2. Stir in chopped epazote and cook for an additional 1-2 minutes. Step 3. Add cooked rice to the skillet and stir to combine with onion and epazote mixture. Cook for about 5 minutes, breaking up any clumps with a spatula. Step 4. Push the rice mixture to one side of the skillet and add the remaining 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil to the other side. Step 5. Crack in 2 eggs (not available in original recipe, but I'm assuming to meet non-vegetarian requirement) and scramble them, then mix with the rice and onion mixture. Step 6. Finally, stir in crumbled queso fresco and season with salt to taste.

recipe.name: American-Style Cheese Frittata
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C). Step 2. In a large bowl, whisk together eggs, shredded cheese, diced onion, and minced garlic. Step 3. Season with salt to taste. Step 4. Pour the egg mixture into a greased 9-inch pie plate or skillet. Step 5. Bake for 20-25 minutes or until the eggs are set, and the cheese is melted and golden brown. Step 6. Remove from the oven and let it rest for 5 minutes before slicing and serving.

recipe.name: Mushroom and Leek Fritters
recipe.steps: Step 1. In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, salt, and pepper. Step 2. In a separate bowl, whisk together the milk, eggs, and tahini. Step 3. Add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients and stir until just combined. Step 4. Heat a non-stick skillet with a small amount of oil over medium heat. Step 5. Using a spoon, drop the batter into the skillet and flatten slightly with a spatula. Fry for 2-3 minutes on the first side, or until golden brown, then flip and cook for another 2-3 minutes.

recipe.name: Spicy Bok Choy Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tsp sesame oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the minced garlic and sauté for 1 minute.
Step 2. Add the sliced mushroom and cook until tender, about 5 minutes.
Step 3. Add the bok choy and cook until wilted, about 3 minutes.
Step 4. Stir in the chopped peanuts, Gochujang, soy sauce, and spinach. Cook for 1 minute.
Step 5. Serve hot, garnished with additional peanuts and sesame oil if desired.

recipe.name: Chinese-Style Stir-Fried Noodles
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cook 200g of noodles according to package instructions. Step 2. In a wok or large skillet, heat 1 tablespoon of butter over medium-high heat. Add the chopped celery and shallots, and stir-fry until fragrant, about 2-3 minutes. Step 3. Add the sliced onion and minced garlic, and continue to stir-fry for another 2-3 minutes. Step 4. Add cooked noodles to the wok or skillet, and toss everything together to combine. Step 5. Serve hot, garnished with chopped cilantro if desired.

recipe.name: Chiles Rellenos con Queso
main_ingredients: poblano pepper (4), mexican oregano (1 tsp), epazote (1 tsp), cotija cheese (1/2 cup, crumbled), ground beef (1/2 cup)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Roast the poblano peppers over an open flame, turning occasionally until charred. Peel off the skin, and set aside. Step 2. In a skillet, cook the ground beef until browned, breaking it into small pieces. Season with mexican oregano and epazote. Step 3. Stuff each roasted poblano pepper with the cooked ground beef mixture. Step 4. Dip the stuffed poblano peppers in a lightly beaten egg and coat with a layer of cotija cheese. Step 5. Pan-fry the stuffed poblano peppers until the cheese is golden brown. Serve with sliced avocado

recipe.name: Keto Scallop and Squid Skewers
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Thread scallops, squid, bacon, duck breast, and beef steak onto skewers. Season with salt and pepper.
Step 2. Grill skewers for 8-10 minutes per side, or until cooked through.
Step 3. Meanwhile, slice avocado into wedges.
Step 4. Serve skewers hot with avocado slices on the side.
Step 5. Garnish with chopped fresh herbs, such as parsley or cilantro, if desired.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Cod with Mushroom
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Rinse the cod fillet and pat it dry with paper towels. Season with salt and pepper.
                Step 2. Heat a non-stick skillet over medium-high heat. Add a small amount of oil and sauté the mushrooms until golden brown.
                Step 3. Remove the mushrooms from the skillet and set aside. Add the lamb chop and sear until browned, then remove and set aside.
                Step 4. Add the lobster to the skillet and sear for 2 minutes on each side, then set aside with the lamb and mushrooms.
                Step 5. Place the cod fillet in the skillet and cook for 3-4 minutes per side, or until cooked through. Serve with mushrooms and lobster.
recipe.note: This recipe uses available ingredients from the user's inventory. Lettuce and olive oil are missing and will be added to the shopping list.

recipe.name: Garlic and Spinach Fried Rice
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add minced garlic and sauté until fragrant. Step 2. Add diced bell pepper and cook until tender. Step 3. Push the vegetables to one side of the skillet. Step 4. Add cooked rice to the other side of the skillet and stir-fry until combined with the vegetables. Step 5. Add chopped spinach and stir-fry until wilted. Step 6. Season with salt to taste.

recipe.name: Paleo American Grilled Veggie Skewers
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Thread bok choy, tomato, asparagus, cabbage, and brussels sprouts onto skewers. Step 2. Brush the vegetables with coconut oil and season with salt and pepper. Step 3. Grill the skewers for 10-12 minutes, turning occasionally. Step 4. Remove the skewers from the grill and let them cool for a few minutes. Step 5. Serve the skewers hot, garnished with fresh herbs if desired.

recipe.name: Cauliflower and Ground Pork Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add the ground pork and cook until browned, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks. Step 2. Remove the cooked pork from the skillet and set it aside. Step 3. Add the chopped onion to the skillet and cook until it is translucent. Step 4. Add the cauliflower and broccoli to the skillet and cook until they are tender-crisp. Step 5. Return the cooked pork to the skillet and stir to combine with the vegetables. Step 6. Season with soy sauce and serve hot.
recipe.note: Lettuce is missing from the inventory. A fresh lettuce salad can be added as a side dish if desired.

recipe.name: Indian-Style Chickpea Curry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat oil in a pan over medium heat. Add onion and bell pepper and sauté until they're softened.

recipe.name: Cod with Stir-Fried Vegetables
main_ingredients: 1 cup brussels sprouts, trimmed and halved
4 oz cod, cut into small pieces
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the minced garlic and stir-fry until fragrant.
Step 2. Add the brussels sprouts to the wok and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes, until they start to soften.
Step 3. Add the cabbage to the wok and stir-fry for another 2-3 minutes, until the vegetables are tender.
Step 4. Add the cod pieces to the wok and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes, until the fish is cooked through.
Step 5. Season with salt and pepper to taste, and serve immediately.

recipe.name: Simple Italian Beef Stew
recipe.steps: Step 1: Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add the chopped onion and sauté until softened, about 5 minutes. Step 2: Add the minced garlic and cook for another minute. Step 3: Add the ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it up with a spoon as it cooks. Step 4: Add the diced tomato and salt to taste. Step 5: Simmer the stew over low heat for 20-25 minutes, stirring occasionally.
recipe.note: A hearty and flavorful Italian beef stew that combines ground beef, onions, garlic, and tomatoes for a satisfying dinner.

recipe.name: Savory Pork and Mushroom Stir-Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cut pork into small pieces and marinate in salt for 5 minutes. Step 2. Heat butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Step 3. Add the pork and cook until browned, about 3-4 minutes. Step 4. Add the mixed mushrooms and bell peppers to the skillet. Step 5. Stir-fry for 2-3 minutes until the vegetables are tender. Step 6. Add the lettuce to the skillet and stir-fry for another minute. Step 7. Serve hot and enjoy!

recipe.name: Roasted Chicken Breast with Honey-Free Glaze
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat the oven to 200°C (400°F). Rinse the chicken breast and pat it dry with paper towels.
Step 2. In a small bowl, mix together olive oil, lemon juice, and sugar. Brush the mixture evenly over the chicken breast.
Step 3. Place the chicken breast on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Arrange the sliced onion around the chicken.
Step 4. Roast the chicken in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes or until it reaches an internal temperature of 74°C (165°F).
Step 5. Remove the chicken from the oven and let it rest for 5 minutes before slicing.

recipe.name: Vietnamese Chicken and Bacon Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Cut the chicken thighs into bite-sized pieces and season with salt, pepper, and a pinch of sugar. Set aside.
Step 2. Cut the bacon into small pieces and cook in a pan over medium heat until crispy. Remove the bacon from the pan and set aside.
Step 3. Add more oil to the pan if necessary and cook the chicken until browned and cooked through. Remove the chicken from the pan and set aside with the bacon.
Step 4. Cut the tofu into small cubes and add to the pan. Cook until the tofu is golden brown.
Step 5. Add the kale to the pan and cook until wilted. Return the bacon and chicken to the pan and stir to combine. Serve hot.
Step 6. Serve the chicken and bacon stir fry over a bed of steamed rice.

recipe.name: Crispy Baked Salmon
main_ingredients: 1 pound salmon fillet (6 ounces per serving)
1/2 cup grated cheddar cheese (optional, for keto version, omit or substitute with vegan alternative)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
Step 2. Rinse salmon fillet and pat dry with paper towels.
Step 3. In a small bowl, mix melted coconut oil, garlic, and salt.
Step 4. Brush the mixture evenly over the salmon fillet.
Step 5. Sprinkle grated cheddar cheese (if using) over the salmon.
Step 6. Bake for 12-15 minutes or until cooked through.
recipe.note: For a vegan version, omit cheddar cheese and substitute with a dairy-free alternative.

recipe.name: Classic Beef and Pepper Tacos
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add 1 tablespoon of butter and melt. Add the ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks.
Step 2. While the beef is cooking, chop the bell pepper into small strips and add it to the skillet. Cook until the pepper is tender.
Step 3. Slice the lime into wedges and set aside.
Step 4. Warm taco shells according to the package instructions.
Step 5. Assemble the tacos by spooning the beef and pepper mixture into the shells and serving with a lime wedge on the side.

recipe.name: Mediterranean Lentil Stew
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat the olive oil in a large pot over medium heat.
                Step 2. Add the sliced mushrooms and cook until they release their moisture and start browning (5-7 minutes).
                Step 3. Add the chopped celery and cook until it starts to soften (3-4 minutes).
                Step 4. Add the chopped lettuce and cook until it starts to wilt (2-3 minutes).
                Step 5. Add the lentils, 2 cups of water, and a pinch of salt. Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for 20-25 minutes or until the lentils are tender.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Bok Choy with Mushroom and Eggplant
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cook the rice according to the package instructions and set aside. Step 2. In a large skillet, heat 2 tablespoons of oil over medium-high heat. Add the sliced eggplant and cook for 3-4 minutes on each side, until tender. Step 3. Remove the eggplant from the skillet and set aside. Step 4. In the same skillet, add the sliced mushrooms and cook for 3-4 minutes, until they release their liquid and start to brown. Step 5. Add the grated carrots and corn to the skillet and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, until the vegetables are tender. Step 6. Stir in the chopped bok choy and cook until wilted. Step 7. Season with nutritional yeast and serve over cooked rice.

recipe.name: Twice-Cooked Pork with Potato Gnocchi
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Peel and dice potatoes. Boil them until tender. Mash and mix with flour. Knead into dough. Rest for 30 minutes. Roll out to 1cm thickness. Cut into gnocchi shapes.
Step 2. Season pork with salt and pepper. Sear in a pan until browned on both sides.
Step 3. In a separate pan, heat 2 tbsp of oil. Add diced pork and cook until browned.
Step 4. In the same pan, add gnocchi and cook for 5 minutes or until slightly browned.
Step 5. Squeeze juice of 1 lime over the gnocchi. Serve with seared pork.

recipe.name: Vegan Cauliflower Tempeh Bowl
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Cut the cauliflower into florets and roast for 15 minutes until tender.
Step 2. Cut the tempeh into small pieces and pan-fry until golden brown.
Step 3. Cook the rice according to package instructions.
Step 4. In a separate pan, sauté the cucumber and lettuce until the lettuce is wilted.
Step 5. Combine the roasted cauliflower, pan-fried tempeh, cooked rice, and sautéed cucumber and lettuce in a bowl. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Tilapia with Spinach
recipe.steps: Step 1: Preheat a skillet over medium-high heat. Step 2: Season the tilapia fillets with salt, pepper, garlic powder, and paprika. Step 3: Add the olive oil to the preheated skillet and sear the tilapia for 3-4 minutes on each side. Step 4: Add the fresh spinach to the skillet and cook until wilted. Step 5: Serve the pan-seared tilapia with the spinach on top.

recipe.name: Yuzu Miso Glazed Broccoli Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Step 2. Add a small amount of oil and sauté the broccoli for 3-4 minutes or until tender. Step 3. In a small bowl, whisk together miso paste, rice vinegar, and yuzu juice. Step 4. Pour the miso glaze over the broccoli and stir-fry for an additional 2 minutes. Step 5. Serve hot, garnished with additional yuzu juice if desired.

recipe.name: Korean-Style Stir-Fried Broccoli and Mushrooms
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add the pork and cook until browned, about 3-4 minutes. Remove from the skillet and set aside.
Step 2. In the same skillet, add the remaining 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil. Add the minced garlic and sauté for 1 minute until fragrant.
Step 3. Add the broccoli and mushrooms to the skillet and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes until they start to soften.
Step 4. Add the cooked pork back into the skillet, along with the soy sauce, Gochujang sauce, sesame oil, and sugar. Stir-fry for another 2-3 minutes until the vegetables are tender.
Step 5. Serve the stir-fry hot, garnished with chopped green onions and kimchi.

recipe.name: Vegan Chickpea and Asparagus Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Chop asparagus into 1-inch pieces and sauté in a pan over medium heat until tender, about 3-4 minutes.
Step 2. Add chopped cabbage to the pan and continue cooking for another 2-3 minutes.
Step 3. In a separate pan, sauté the chickpeas with a bit of oil until lightly browned.
Step 4. Add chopped tomato to the chickpea pan and cook for 2-3 minutes.
Step 5. Combine the cooked asparagus and cabbage mixture with the chickpea and tomato mixture, then sprinkle with nutritional yeast and serve with a side of lettuce.

recipe.name: Grilled Vietnamese-Style Cauliflower with Lobster
main_ingredients: 2 tbsp coconut aminos (sub for fish sauce)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Cut cauliflower into florets. Toss with 1 tbsp coconut oil, salt, and pepper.
Step 2. Grill cauliflower for 5-7 minutes or until tender. Set aside.
Step 3. In a small bowl, mix coconut aminos, grated ginger, garlic powder, and black pepper. Add lobster meat and toss to coat.
Step 4. Grill lobster for 3-5 minutes per side or until cooked through.
Step 5. To serve, place grilled cauliflower on a plate, top with grilled lobster, and drizzle with remaining coconut aminos mixture.

recipe.name: Spicy Thai Broccoli Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tbsp of vegetable oil in a pan over medium heat. Add 1 onion, finely chopped, and sauté until translucent.
Step 2. Add 250g broccoli florets and sauté for 3-4 minutes until slightly tender.
Step 3. Slice 2 thai chilies and add to the pan, stir-frying for another 1 minute.
Step 4. In a small bowl, mix 2 tbsp of tamarind paste and 1 tbsp of palm sugar to form a paste. Add this paste to the pan and stir-fry for another minute.
Step 5. Add 50g of cooked rice noodles to the pan and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes. Serve with a squeeze of juice from 1 lime.
