recipe.name: Avocado Fritters
recipe.steps: Step 1: In a bowl, mash the avocado and mix with black beans, eggs, and diced pepper. Step 2: Add a pinch of salt and mix well. Step 3: Heat about 1/2 inch of oil in a frying pan over medium heat. Step 4: Using a spoon, drop small amounts of the mixture into the oil and fry until golden brown. Step 5: Drain on paper towels and serve hot with a sprinkle of sugar.

recipe.name: Edamame and Bonito Flakes Stir Fry with Lemon
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of butter in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Step 2. Add pork and cook until browned, about 3-4 minutes. Remove from skillet and set aside. Step 3. Add sliced carrots to the skillet and cook until tender, about 5 minutes. Step 4. Add edamame and bonito flakes to the skillet and stir-fry for 2 minutes. Step 5. Add lemon juice to the skillet and stir-fry for another minute. Step 6. Return pork to the skillet and stir-fry until heated through.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Squid with Roasted Cauliflower
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C). Cut the cauliflower into florets and season with salt and pepper. Roast in the oven for 20 minutes.
Step 2. Rinse the squid under cold water and pat dry with paper towels. Season with salt and pepper.
Step 3. Heat a skillet over medium-high heat and add a small amount of oil. Sear the squid for 2-3 minutes on each side.
Step 4. Remove the squid from the skillet and set aside. Add more oil if necessary and sauté some garlic for 1 minute.
Step 5. Serve the seared squid with roasted cauliflower and garnish with lemon wedges.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Chicken Breast with Onion
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat a skillet over medium-high heat. Add salt and pepper to taste.
                Step 2. Slice the onion into thin rings and sauté until translucent.
                Step 3. Add the chicken breast to the skillet and sear for 5 minutes on each side.
                Step 4. Reduce heat to medium-low and continue cooking for 10-12 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through.
                Step 5. Serve the chicken breast with sautéed onions and enjoy!

recipe.name: Gochujang Kimchi with Ginger
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cut the napa cabbage into 2-inch pieces and separate the leaves. In a blender, blend 2 inches of ginger with 2 tsp of gochugaru until you get a smooth paste. Step 2. In a large bowl, combine the cabbage, ginger-gochugaru paste, and 1 tsp of salt. Mix well and let it sit for 10 minutes. Step 3. Rinse the cabbage mixture with water to remove excess salt. Drain well and squeeze out excess water. Step 4. In a pan, heat 2 tbsp of oil over medium heat. Add the cabbage mixture and cook for 10 minutes, stirring frequently. Step 5. Serve the kimchi hot, garnished with toasted sesame seeds and chopped green onions.

recipe.name: Gluten-Free Pasta with Mushroom and Bell Pepper
recipe.steps: Step 1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil and cook pasta according to package instructions. Drain and set aside. Step 2. Heat 2 tbsp of vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add sliced bell pepper and cook until tender, about 3-4 minutes. Step 3. Add sliced mushrooms to the skillet and cook until they release their moisture and start browning, about 5 minutes. Step 4. Combine cooked pasta and mushroom-bell pepper mixture in the skillet. Toss to combine and season with salt to taste. Step 5. Serve hot, garnished with chopped lettuce if desired.

recipe.name: Eggplant and Peanut Stir-Fry with Carrot
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the sliced pork chop and cook until browned, about 3-4 minutes. Step 2. Remove the pork from the wok and set aside. Step 3. In the same wok, add the remaining 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil. Add the minced garlic and cook for 1 minute until fragrant. Step 4. Add the sliced eggplant and cook until tender, about 5 minutes. Step 5. Add the grated carrot and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes until slightly tender. Step 6. Stir in the peanuts and cooked pork. Cook for 1 minute until everything is well combined. Step 7. Serve hot and enjoy!

recipe.name: Roasted Broccoli and Garlic with Tahini Sauce
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C). Toss broccoli florets with olive oil, salt, and pepper on a baking sheet. Roast for 15-20 minutes until tender.
Step 2. In a small saucepan, heat 2 tablespoons olive oil over medium heat. Add minced garlic and cook for 1-2 minutes until fragrant.
Step 3. In a blender or food processor, combine roasted garlic, tahini, parsley, sugar, and 2 tablespoons water. Blend until smooth.
Step 4. To assemble, place roasted broccoli on a serving plate and drizzle with tahini sauce.
Step 5. Garnish with additional parsley if desired.

recipe.name: Stir-Fried Asparagus with Tempeh
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat a tablespoon of oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat.
Step 2. Chop the tempeh into bite-sized pieces and cook until lightly browned.
Step 3. Remove the tempeh from the wok and set aside.
Step 4. Add the chopped garlic and cook for 1 minute.
Step 5. Add the asparagus and cook for 2 minutes.
Step 6. Add the kale and cook until wilted.
Step 7. Return the tempeh to the wok and stir to combine.
Step 8. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Vegetarian Sweet Potato Pasta
main_ingredients: sweet potato (2 large, peeled and chopped)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil and cook the pasta according to package instructions. Reserve 1 cup of pasta water before draining. Step 2. In a large skillet, heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil over medium heat. Add the chopped sweet potato and carrot. Cook for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally, until tender. Step 3. Add the minced garlic to the skillet and cook for 1-2 minutes until fragrant. Step 4. Stir in the chopped spinach and cook until wilted. Step 5. Add the cooked pasta to the skillet, tossing to combine with the sweet potato and spinach mixture. If the mixture seems dry, add a bit of the reserved pasta water.

recipe.name: Bacon and Spinach Fritters
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C). In a large mixing bowl, whisk together flour, a pinch of salt, and a few grinds of black pepper.
Step 2. Add shredded spinach, crumbled bacon, and a pat of butter to the dry mixture. Mix well.
Step 3. Divide the mixture into 8 equal parts and shape into patties.
Step 4. Place the patties on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper and bake for 15-20 minutes or until golden brown.
Step 5. Serve warm and enjoy!

recipe.name: Chicken and Potato Shepherd's Pie
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). In a large skillet, heat 2 tablespoons of oil over medium-high heat. Add the chicken breast and cook until browned, about 5-6 minutes. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside. Step 2. In the same skillet, add the diced potatoes and cook until they start to brown, about 5 minutes. Step 3. In a separate saucepan, bring 2 cups of water to a boil. Add 1 cup of quinoa and reduce heat to low. Cover the saucepan with a lid and simmer for 15-20 minutes, or until the quinoa is tender. Step 4. In a large bowl, combine the cooked quinoa, chopped lettuce, and minced garlic. Step 5. In a 9x13-inch baking dish, create a layer of the potato mixture, followed by a layer of the quinoa mixture, and then a layer of the cooked chicken. Repeat this process until all the ingredients are used, finishing with a layer of potatoes on top. Step 6. Bake the shepherd's pie in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the potatoes are golden brown.

recipe.name: Vietnamese Grilled Pork Chop and Tilapia
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Season pork chop with salt and pepper. Grill for 4-5 minutes per side or until cooked to desired doneness.
Step 2. Meanwhile, mix cooked lentils with pasta, milk, and olive oil to create a creamy sauce.
Step 3. Grill tilapia for 3-4 minutes per side or until cooked through.
Step 4. Slice grilled pork chop and serve with tilapia and creamy lentil pasta sauce.
Step 5. Garnish with chopped almonds and serve immediately.

recipe.name: Korean-Style Grilled Chicken
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Step 2. In a small bowl, whisk together gochujang, butter, and salt to make the marinade. Step 3. Add the chicken breast to the marinade and coat evenly. Step 4. Grill the chicken for 5-6 minutes per side, or until it reaches an internal temperature of 165°F. Step 5. While the chicken is cooking, brush the tomato slices with olive oil and grill for 2-3 minutes per side, or until they're slightly charred. Step 6. Serve the grilled chicken with the tomato slices and enjoy!

recipe.name: Vietnamese-Style Bánh Mì
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C). Step 2. In a bowl, whisk together 2 eggs and a pinch of salt. Step 3. Dip each slice of bread into the egg mixture, coating both sides evenly. Step 4. Place the coated bread slices on a baking sheet and bake for 15-20 minutes, or until golden brown. Step 5. Meanwhile, chop the spinach leaves and set aside. Step 6. Once the bread is done, assemble the bánh mì by spreading a layer of egg on each slice, topping with chopped spinach, and serving.

recipe.name: Grilled Lamb Chop with Bell Pepper and Lettuce Salad
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the grill to medium-high heat. Season the lamb chop with salt and black pepper. Step 2. Grill the lamb chop for 5-6 minutes per side, or until it reaches your desired level of doneness. Step 3. Meanwhile, toss the sliced bell pepper and pepper in olive oil, salt, and black pepper. Step 4. Grill the bell pepper mixture for 5-6 minutes, or until it starts to char. Step 5. In a bowl, combine the chopped lettuce and grilled bell pepper mixture. Step 6. Slice the lamb chop and serve with the salad.

recipe.name: Vegetarian American Kale Quiche
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). Step 2. Roll out a pie crust (store-bought or homemade). Step 3. In a pan, sauté diced tofu and chopped kale until the kale is wilted. Step 4. In a bowl, whisk together eggs, milk, and yogurt. Add cooked tofu and kale mixture to the bowl and mix well. Step 5. Pour the mixture into the pie crust and bake for 35-40 minutes or until the quiche is set. Step 6. Serve warm, garnished with additional kale if desired.

recipe.name: Classic Italian Risotto
recipe.steps: Step 1. Finely chop the bell pepper and garlic. Step 2. In a large pan, heat a small amount of oil over medium heat. Add the bell pepper and garlic and cook until tender, about 5 minutes. Step 3. Add the rice and cook for 2-3 minutes, stirring constantly, until the rice is lightly toasted. Step 4. Add 1 cup of water and stir until the rice absorbs the liquid. Repeat this process, adding 1 cup of water at a time, and waiting for the rice to absorb it, until the rice is cooked and creamy, about 20 minutes. Step 5. Remove the pan from heat and stir in the ricotta and parmesan. Season with salt to taste. Serve hot and enjoy!

recipe.name: Korean Radish Pancake
recipe.steps:
Step 1: In a large bowl, combine grated korean radish, crushed rice cake, chopped celery, and ground beef.
               Step 2: Mix well and add lemon juice.
               Step 3: Heat a non-stick pan with some oil and pour the radish mixture.
               Step 4: Cook for 5-6 minutes or until the edges start to brown.
               Step 5: Flip and cook the other side for another 5-6 minutes.
               Step 6: Serve hot with a side of soy sauce and kimchi.

recipe.name: Vegan Sweet Potato and Chili Fritters
main_ingredients: bird's eye chili (2-3, seeded and finely chopped)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. In a large bowl, combine grated potato, chopped chili, and 2 tablespoons of sugar. Mix well.
Step 2. Divide the mixture into 6-8 portions, shape each portion into a small patty.
Step 3. Heat a non-stick pan with a little oil over medium heat. Add the patties and cook for 4-5 minutes on each side or until golden brown and crispy.
Step 4. Serve hot with your favorite chutney or a dollop of vegan yogurt (optional).
Step 5. Enjoy your delicious vegan sweet potato and chili fritters!

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Shrimp with Garlic Soy Sauce
recipe.steps: Step 1. Rinse the shrimp under cold water and pat them dry with paper towels. Season with salt and pepper. Step 2. Heat sesame oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the garlic and sauté for 1-2 minutes until fragrant. Step 3. Add the shrimp to the skillet and cook for 2-3 minutes per side, until pink and cooked through. Step 4. In a small bowl, whisk together soy sauce and 1 tablespoon of water. Step 5. Pour the soy sauce mixture over the shrimp and simmer for an additional 1-2 minutes, until the sauce has thickened slightly.

recipe.name: Fajitas de Peppers y Lettuce
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the sliced bell peppers and cook for 3-4 minutes, until they start to soften. Add a pinch of salt to bring out their flavor. Step 2. Add the chopped lettuce to the skillet and cook for another 2-3 minutes, until it starts to wilt. Step 3. Warm the tortillas by wrapping them in a damp paper towel and microwaving for 20-30 seconds. Step 4. Assemble the fajitas by placing a portion of the pepper and lettuce mixture onto each tortilla. Step 5. Drizzle the remaining 1 tablespoon of butter over the top of each fajita and serve immediately.

recipe.name: Beef and Sardine Pasta Bake
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F). Cook pasta according to package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside.
Step 2. In a pan, heat a tablespoon of oil over medium heat. Add ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks.
Step 3. Add flour to the pan and stir to combine. Cook for 1-2 minutes, until lightly browned.
Step 4. Add chopped sardines to the pan and stir to combine. Cook for 2-3 minutes, until heated through.
Step 5. In a large mixing bowl, combine cooked pasta, beef and sardine mixture, and a sprinkle of nutritional yeast (optional). Mix well to combine.
Step 6. Transfer the pasta mixture to a baking dish and top with additional nutritional yeast (if using). Bake in the preheated oven for 10-15 minutes, until lightly browned and crispy.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Zucchini and Sardines with Caramelized Onion
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a pan over medium heat. Add sliced onions and cook until caramelized (5-7 minutes). Step 2. Add sliced zucchinis to the pan and cook for 3-4 minutes, or until slightly tender. Step 3. Add chopped sardines to the pan and cook for 1-2 minutes, stirring occasionally. Step 4. Add broccoli florets to the pan and cook until tender, about 3-5 minutes. Step 5. Serve hot, garnished with lemon wedges.
recipe.note: Butter is required for a richer flavor, but you can make do without it. You can add it to the recipe by substituting it for the olive oil or melting it on top before serving. Please add butter to your shopping list to get the authentic taste.

recipe.name: Korean-Style Fried Chicken Breast
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cut the chicken breast into bite-sized pieces and season with salt. Step 2. In a large pan, heat 1 cup of vegetable oil over medium heat. Step 3. Once the oil is hot, add the chicken pieces and cook until golden brown, about 5-7 minutes. Remove the chicken from the oil and set aside. Step 4. In the same pan, add 2 tbsp of sesame oil and 2 tbsp of gochugaru. Cook for 1 minute until fragrant. Step 5. Add the carrot and potato slices to the pan and cook until they are crispy and golden brown, about 5-7 minutes. Step 6. Serve the fried chicken with the carrot and potato mixture.

recipe.name: Carrot Lime Slaw Burgers
recipe.steps: Step 1. Grate the carrot and chop the lettuce. In a bowl, mix together the grated carrot, chopped lettuce, and lime juice. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Step 2. Grill or cook the hamburger buns according to your preference. Step 3. Spread a layer of ranch dressing on each hamburger bun. Step 4. Add a cooked patty of your choice to each bun. Step 5. Top the patty with the carrot-lime slaw. Step 6. Serve immediately and enjoy!
recipe.note: This recipe is a classic American-style burger with a twist of a carrot-lime slaw. You can customize it to your taste by using different types of buns or adding your favorite toppings.

recipe.name: Tuna and Asparagus Pasta
recipe.steps: Step 1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil and cook 8 oz of pasta according to package instructions. Step 2. In a large skillet, heat 2 tbsp of olive oil over medium-high heat. Add the sliced onion and cook until softened, about 3-4 minutes. Step 3. Add the diced carrot to the skillet and cook for an additional 4-5 minutes, or until tender. Step 4. Add the tuna to the skillet and cook for 2-3 minutes on each side, or until cooked through. Step 5. Stir in the asparagus and lemon juice, and season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve over cooked pasta.

recipe.name: Thai-Style Chicken and Basil Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Slice the chicken breast into thin strips. Season with salt and pepper. Step 2. Heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add the chicken and cook until browned and cooked through, about 5-6 minutes. Step 3. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside. Step 4. In the same skillet, add the remaining 1 tablespoon of olive oil. Add the sliced galangal and cook for 1-2 minutes, until fragrant. Step 5. Add the sliced bell peppers (none available, so omitting this ingredient) and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, until tender. Step 6. Add the cooked chicken back into the skillet, along with the chopped basil and the juice of 2 limes. Stir-fry everything together for about 1 minute, until the basil is wilted. Step 7. Serve hot over rice or noodles.

recipe.name: Vegetable Biryani
main_ingredients: Vegetables (1 cup, chopped, mixed, e.g., carrots, peas, cauliflower, onions)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 2 tbsp of ghee in a pan. Add 1 tsp cumin and 1 tsp garam masala. Saute for a minute.
Step 2. Add the chopped vegetables and saute until they start to soften.
Step 3. Add 1 cup of Basmati rice to the pan and mix well.
Step 4. Add 2 cups of water to the pan and bring to a boil.
Step 5. Reduce heat to low, cover and cook for 15-20 minutes or until the rice is cooked and fluffy.
recipe.note: You can use yogurt or add spices to taste.

recipe.name: Miso Shiso Noodles
recipe.steps: Step 1. Bring a pot of salted water to a boil and cook the noodles according to the package instructions. Drain and set aside. Step 2. In a small saucepan, whisk together miso paste and soy sauce. Step 3. Add 2 tbsp of water to the miso mixture and whisk until smooth. Step 4. Add chopped shiso leaves to the miso mixture and stir. Step 5. In a large skillet, heat the miso-shiso mixture over medium heat. Add cooked noodles to the skillet and toss to coat with the sauce. Step 6. Top with scallions and serve.

recipe.name: Vegetable Fajitas with Bacon
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 2 tablespoons of vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the diced bacon and cook until crispy. Remove the cooked bacon from the skillet and set aside. Step 2. In the same skillet, add the remaining 2 tablespoons of vegetable oil. Add the minced garlic and sauté for 1 minute until fragrant. Step 3. Add the diced bell pepper to the skillet and cook for 3-4 minutes until tender. Step 4. Add the chopped bok choy to the skillet and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes until wilted. Step 5. Return the cooked bacon to the skillet and stir to combine with the vegetable mixture. Step 6. Serve the vegetable fajita mixture hot with your favorite Mexican dishes.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Tilapia with Roasted Zucchini
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper and arrange the zucchini slices in a single layer. Roast in the oven for 15 minutes or until tender.
Step 2. Heat a non-stick skillet over medium-high heat. Season the tilapia fillets with salt and pepper. Add 1 tablespoon of oil to the skillet and sear the tilapia for 3-4 minutes on each side or until cooked through.
Step 3. In a separate skillet, heat 1 tablespoon of oil over medium heat. Add the sliced onion and cook for 5 minutes or until translucent.
Step 4. Add the sliced cucumber to the skillet with the onion and cook for an additional 2 minutes or until slightly tender.
Step 5. Serve the pan-seared tilapia with the roasted zucchini and sautéed onion and cucumber.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Cod with Kale and Edamame
recipe.steps: Step 1. Rinse the cod fillet under cold water and pat dry with paper towels. Season with salt and pepper. Step 2. Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat and add almond oil. Sear the cod fillet for 3-4 minutes on each side, until cooked through. Step 3. In a separate pan, heat a tablespoon of almond oil over medium heat. Add the chopped kale and cook until wilted, about 3-4 minutes. Step 4. Add the cooked edamame to the kale pan and stir to combine. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Step 5. Serve the pan-seared cod with the kale and edamame mixture, drizzled with a squeeze of lemon juice.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Tilapia with Bacon
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat a skillet over medium-high heat and cook the bacon until crispy. Step 2. Remove the bacon from the skillet and set aside. Step 3. Add the olive oil to the skillet and sear the tilapia for 3-4 minutes on each side. Step 4. Serve the tilapia with the crispy bacon on top. Step 5. Garnish with fresh parsley and lemon wedges.

recipe.name: Pecorino and Pesto Stuffed Bell Peppers
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). Step 2. Cut off the tops of the bell peppers and remove seeds and membranes. Step 3. In a bowl, mix together pine nuts, pecorino, and olive oil to make the pesto. Step 4. Fill the bell peppers with the pesto mixture and top with diced potato. Step 5. Bake for 20-25 minutes or until the bell peppers are tender.

recipe.name: Savory Mushroom Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. In a small bowl, whisk together flour, salt, and 1 tablespoon of water to make a slurry. Set aside. Step 2. In a large pan or wok, heat 1 tablespoon of oil over medium-high heat. Add the sliced carrots and celery and stir-fry until they are tender, about 3 minutes. Step 3. Add the sliced mushrooms to the pan and stir-fry for another 2-3 minutes, until they release their liquid and start to brown. Step 4. Pour in the rice vinegar and soy sauce, and stir to coat the vegetables evenly. Step 5. Stir in the flour slurry and cook for 1 minute, until the sauce has thickened. Step 6. Serve the stir fry hot, garnished with chopped green onions or sesame seeds if desired.

recipe.name: Bacon and Scallop Stir Fry
main_ingredients: bacon (6 slices), scallops (12), onion (1 large), asparagus (8 spears)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cut bacon into strips and cook in a pan over medium heat until crispy. Set aside. Step 2. Cut onion and asparagus into bite-sized pieces. Step 3. Add onion to the pan and sauté until translucent. Step 4. Add asparagus and cook for 2-3 minutes. Step 5. Add scallops and cook for 2-3 minutes per side. Step 6. Combine cooked bacon, onion, and asparagus into a bowl. Serve with the scallops.
recipe.note: Note: Recipe can be modified to accommodate available ingredients and dietary preferences.

recipe.name: Stir-Fry with Tomato and Celery
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat. Add diced celery and stir-fry until tender, about 3-4 minutes. Step 2. Add sliced mushrooms and continue stir-frying for another 2-3 minutes until they start to soften. Step 3. Add sliced tomatoes and stir-fry for another 2-3 minutes, until the vegetables are tender but still crisp. Step 4. Season with soy sauce to taste. Step 5. Serve hot, garnished with chopped scallions if desired.

recipe.name: Vegan Edamame Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat a non-stick pan with 1 tablespoon of oil over medium heat. Add the sliced eggplant and cook for 5 minutes, or until it starts to soften.
Step 2. Add the sliced mushrooms and cook for another 5 minutes, or until they release their liquid and start to brown.
Step 3. Add the sliced cucumber and cook for 5 minutes, or until it starts to soften.
Step 4. Add the edamame and stir-fry everything together for 5 minutes, or until the edamame are heated through.
Step 5. Season with salt and pepper to taste, and serve hot.
recipe.note: This recipe is completely vegan and uses only plant-based ingredients.

recipe.name: Grilled Steak Fajita with Roasted Vegetables
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Season the beef steaks with salt and pepper. Grill for 5-6 minutes per side, or until cooked to desired level of doneness. Let rest for 5 minutes before slicing. Step 2. In a large bowl, toss together corn kernels, cauliflower florets, and sliced bell pepper. Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with salt. Step 3. Spread the vegetables on a baking sheet and roast in a preheated oven at 425°F (220°C) for 15-20 minutes, or until tender and lightly browned. Step 4. In a large skillet, heat a tablespoon of olive oil over medium heat. Add the sliced beef steaks and cook for 2-3 minutes per side, or until browned and crispy. Step 5. Add the roasted vegetables to the skillet with the beef steaks and stir to combine. Step 6. Serve the fajita mixture hot, garnished with fresh spinach leaves.

recipe.name: Indian Mushroom Masala
recipe.steps:
Step 1. In a pan, heat 2 tbsp of oil over medium heat. Add garlic and sauté for 1 minute.
Step 2. Add mushroom and cook until they release their moisture and start browning.
Step 3. Add cumin powder, cinnamon, and pepper. Mix well.
Step 4. Add tomato and cook for 2-3 minutes until the mixture thickens.
Step 5. Season with salt to taste and serve hot.

recipe.name: Kimchi Stir-Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a pan over medium heat. Add kimchi and cook for 2 minutes, breaking it down with a spatula as it cooks.
Step 2. Add 2 tablespoons of sesame oil to the pan and stir-fry the kimchi for an additional 2 minutes.
Step 3. Add 100g of lettuce to the pan and stir-fry for 1 minute, until the lettuce is slightly wilted.
Step 4. Season the kimchi stir-fry with pepper to taste.
Step 5. Serve the kimchi stir-fry immediately, garnished with additional kimchi if desired.

recipe.name: Lettuce, Carrot, and Pasta Stir-Fry with Grilled Pork Chop
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook pasta according to package instructions until al dente. Reserve 1 cup of pasta water before draining.
Step 2. In a large skillet, heat 1 tablespoon of oil over medium-high heat. Add the pork chop and cook for 5-6 minutes per side, or until cooked through. Transfer the pork chop to a plate and let it rest.
Step 3. In the same skillet, add another tablespoon of oil. Add sliced carrots and cook for 5 minutes, or until they start to soften.
Step 4. Add chopped lettuce to the skillet and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, or until the lettuce starts to wilt.
Step 5. Add the cooked pasta to the skillet, tossing everything together to combine. If the pasta seems dry, add a bit of the reserved pasta water.
Step 6. Slice the grilled pork chop and serve on top of the pasta and vegetable mixture.

recipe.name: Indian-Style Lentil Curry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a pan over medium heat. Add cumin and let it sizzle for a few seconds.
Step 2. Add the chopped onion and sauté until it's translucent.
Step 3. Add the lentils and stir well.
Step 4. Add the chopped tomatoes, cinnamon powder, and enough water to cover the lentils. Bring to a boil.
Step 5. Reduce the heat and let it simmer for 30 minutes or until the lentils are cooked.

recipe.name: Garlic Potato Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Peel and chop the potatoes into bite-sized pieces. Set aside. Step 2. Heat olive oil in a large wok or frying pan over medium-high heat. Step 3. Add minced garlic and stir-fry until fragrant (about 1 minute). Step 4. Add the chopped potatoes and stir-fry for 5 minutes, or until they start to soften. Step 5. Continue stir-frying for another 5 minutes, or until the potatoes are tender and lightly browned. Step 6. Serve hot and garnish with chopped scallions (if desired).

recipe.name: Thai-Inspired Celery Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of butter and 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chopped celery and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes until tender-crisp.
Step 2. Add the star anise to the skillet and stir-fry for another minute to release its aroma.
Step 3. Add the rice noodles to the skillet and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes until they're well combined with the celery mixture.
Step 4. Taste and adjust the seasoning as needed.
Step 5. Garnish the stir-fry with chopped cilantro and serve hot.

recipe.name: Stir-Fried Brussels Sprouts with Celery
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cut the celery into thin slices and set aside. Step 2. Cut the brussels sprouts in half and slice them thinly. Step 3. Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Step 4. Add the sliced celery to the skillet and cook until tender, about 3-4 minutes. Step 5. Add the sliced brussels sprouts to the skillet and cook until tender, about 5-6 minutes, adding sugar towards the end of cooking.
recipe.note: This recipe serves as a temporary substitute until the missing ingredients are acquired.

recipe.name: Pesto Pasta with Mushroom and Pine Nuts
recipe.steps: Step 1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil for the pasta. Step 2. While the pasta cooks, heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the sliced mushroom and cook until tender. Step 3. In a food processor, combine pine nuts, garlic, basil, and pecorino. Process until well combined and slightly smooth. With the processor running, slowly pour in the olive oil through the top. Step 4. When the pasta is al dente, reserve 1 cup of pasta water and then drain. Step 5. Add the cooked mushroom to the pesto sauce and stir to combine. Toss the pasta with the mushroom pesto sauce, adding some reserved pasta water if needed. Serve immediately, topped with shaved mozzarella.

recipe.name: Spicy Spinach Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Chop pepper, onion, and carrot into small pieces. Heat oil in a pan and sauté until tender.
     Step 2. Add minced garlic and sauté for 1 minute.
     Step 3. Add spinach and stir-fry until wilted.
     Step 4. Squeeze lime juice over the stir-fry and mix well.
     Step 5. Season with salt to taste.

recipe.name: Mussels and Avocado Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Rinse the mussels and remove any broken shells. Drain and set aside.
Step 2. In a pan, heat 2 tablespoons of oil over medium heat. Add the mussels and cook for 2-3 minutes on each side, until they open.
Step 3. Remove the mussels from the pan and set aside. 
Step 4. Add more oil to the pan if needed. Sauté the spinach until wilted.
Step 5. Slice the avocado and add it to the pan with the spinach. Stir in and cook for another minute.
recipe.note: Make sure to choose a low-carb and high-fat oil for the stir-fry.

recipe.name: Roasted Vegetable Quinoa Bowl
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). Cut the sweet potatoes and bell pepper into bite-sized pieces. Step 2. In a large bowl, toss the sweet potatoes and bell pepper with 1 tablespoon of butter until they are evenly coated. Step 3. Spread the sweet potatoes and bell pepper on a baking sheet and roast in the oven for 20-25 minutes, or until tender. Step 4. Cook the quinoa according to package instructions. Step 5. Chop the lettuce into bite-sized pieces. Step 6. To assemble the dish, divide the cooked quinoa among four bowls, then top with the roasted sweet potatoes and bell pepper, and finally the chopped lettuce.

recipe.name: Gluten-Free Roasted Chicken with Potatoes and Broccoli
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C). Season the chicken breast with salt and pepper. Step 2. In a separate bowl, toss the sliced potatoes and broccoli in olive oil until they are evenly coated. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Step 3. Place the chicken breast on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper and roast in the preheated oven for 20 minutes. Step 4. Add the potatoes and broccoli to the baking sheet and continue to roast for an additional 20-25 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the potatoes are tender. Step 5. Remove the baking sheet from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before serving.

recipe.name: Vietnamese-Style Chicken and Bean Sprouts Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cut the chicken breast into bite-sized pieces and season with a pinch of salt. Set aside. Step 2. Heat 1 tbsp of vegetable oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chicken and cook until browned, about 5-6 minutes. Remove from the wok and set aside. Step 3. In the same wok, add the remaining 1 tbsp of vegetable oil. Add the bird's eye chilies and cook until fragrant, about 1-2 minutes. Step 4. Add the bean sprouts to the wok and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes, until slightly tender. Step 5. Return the cooked chicken to the wok and stir in the chopped Vietnamese coriander. Cook for an additional minute, until the chicken is coated in the herbs.

recipe.name: Spaghetti Bolognese with Vegetables
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cook the spaghetti according to the package instructions in a large pot of boiling, salted water until al dente. Drain and set aside. Step 2. In a large skillet, heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil over medium heat. Add the chicken breast and cook until browned on both sides and cooked through. Step 3. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside. Add the sliced bell pepper and cook until tender. Step 4. Add the chopped tomato to the skillet and cook until the vegetables are tender. Step 5. Return the chicken to the skillet and stir in the cooked pasta. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Step 6. Serve the pasta hot, topped with steamed broccoli.

recipe.name: Roasted Potatoes with Lemon
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C). Step 2. Wash and peel the potatoes, then cut them into small wedges. Step 3. In a large bowl, toss the potatoes with olive oil, salt, and sugar until they're evenly coated. Step 4. Transfer the potatoes to a baking sheet lined with parchment paper and roast for 20 minutes. Step 5. Squeeze the lemon and lime juice over the potatoes and continue roasting for an additional 15-20 minutes, or until they're crispy.

recipe.name: Vegan Roasted Sprouts and Cauliflower
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat your oven to 425°F (220°C). In a large bowl, whisk together the olive oil, lemon juice, garlic powder, salt, and black pepper. Step 2. Add the halved brussels sprouts and cauliflower florets to the bowl and toss until they're evenly coated with the oil mixture. Step 3. Spread the sprouts and cauliflower out in a single layer on a baking sheet. Step 4. Roast in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender and caramelized. Step 5. Remove from the oven and sprinkle with nutritional yeast. Step 6. Serve hot and enjoy!

recipe.name: Mexican Broccoli Fritters
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oil in a deep frying pan to 350°F (180°C). In a bowl, mix together the chopped onion and broccoli. Step 2. Add the chili powder to the bowl and mix well. Step 3. Using your hands, shape the mixture into small patties. Step 4. Carefully place the patties into the hot oil and fry until golden brown (about 5 minutes per side). Step 5. Remove the fritters from the oil and place them on a paper towel-lined plate to drain excess oil. Step 6. Serve hot with your favorite Mexican dipping sauce.

recipe.name: Sweet Potato and Broccoli Fried Rice
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add the diced sweet potato and cook until slightly browned, about 3-4 minutes.
Step 2. Add the chopped broccoli, grated carrot, and cooked edamame to the skillet. Stir-fry for 2-3 minutes, until the vegetables are tender-crisp.
Step 3. Add the cooked rice to the skillet, breaking up any clumps with a spatula. Stir-fry for 2-3 minutes, until the rice is well combined with the vegetables.
Step 4. Season the Sweet Potato and Broccoli Fried Rice with soy sauce to taste. Transfer to a serving platter and garnish with chopped green onions, if desired.
Step 5. Serve immediately and enjoy!

recipe.name: Mackerel and Lentil Stew
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat a large pot over medium heat. Add 2 tablespoons of oil. Add the diced tomato and cook for 5 minutes. Step 2. Add the mackerel fillets to the pot and cook for 3-4 minutes per side. Step 3. Add the lentils to the pot and stir to combine with the tomato and mackerel. Step 4. Pour in 2 cups of water and bring to a boil. Reduce the heat to low and simmer for 15-20 minutes. Step 5. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
recipe.note: This recipe does not include spinach and bell pepper as they are missing from your inventory. Consider adding them to your shopping list.

recipe.name: Chicken and Vegetable Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a wok over medium heat. Add the sliced chicken breast and cook until browned, about 5 minutes. Remove from the wok and set aside.
Step 2. Add another tablespoon of oil to the wok and sauté the sliced bell pepper, eggplant, and potato until they start to soften, about 3-4 minutes.
Step 3. Add the cooked chicken back into the wok and stir in some salt to taste. Make a well in the center of the wok and add a tablespoon of oil.
Step 4. Crack in an egg and scramble it into the well, breaking it up with a spoon as it cooks.
Step 5. Stir everything together and serve the chicken and vegetable stir fry over a bed of steaming hot rice.

recipe.name: Vegan Quinoa Bowl with Roasted Brussels Sprouts and Cabbage
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Rinse the quinoa and cook according to package instructions using 2 cups of water. Set aside.
Step 2. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C). Cut the brussels sprouts in half and remove the leaves. Roast in the oven for 20-25 minutes or until tender and slightly caramelized.
Step 3. Cut the cabbage into small wedges and set aside.
Step 4. In a large pan, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the chopped peanuts and almonds. Cook for 2-3 minutes or until fragrant.
Step 5. Add the cooked quinoa, roasted brussels sprouts, and cabbage to the pan. Toss everything together to combine.

recipe.name: Creamy Potato and Tomato Pasta Substitute
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Boil the potato in salted water until tender, then drain the water. 
                Step 2. Chop the bell pepper and tomato into bite-sized pieces. 
                Step 3. In a pan, melt the butter and sauté the chopped bell pepper and tomato. 
                Step 4. Add the boiled potato to the pan and stir to combine with the bell pepper and tomato mixture. 
                Step 5. Serve hot.
recipe.note: Note: This recipe is a substitute for pasta as per the user's request, but it's not a traditional pasta dish.

recipe.name: Creamy Pasta Primavera
recipe.steps: Step 1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook pasta according to package instructions until al dente. Reserve 1 cup of pasta water before draining. Step 2. In a large skillet, heat a tablespoon of oil over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and sauté for 1-2 minutes until fragrant. Step 3. Add the chopped celery to the skillet and sauté for an additional 3-4 minutes until tender. Step 4. Add the reserved pasta water to the skillet and stir to combine. Step 5. Add the cooked pasta to the skillet, tossing to combine with the celery and garlic mixture. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Step 6. Stir in the chopped spinach until wilted. Serve hot and enjoy!

recipe.name: Garlic and Mushroom Toast
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat a toaster or toaster oven to 350°F (180°C). Step 2. Slice the bread into 1-inch thick slices. Step 3. In a pan, melt 1 tablespoon of butter over medium heat. Step 4. Add the sliced garlic and sauté for 1-2 minutes until fragrant, until slightly caramelized. Step 5. Add the sliced mushrooms and sauté for 3-4 minutes until tender. Step 6. Meanwhile, toast the bread until lightly browned. Step 7. Spread the remaining 1 tablespoon of butter on each toasted bread slice. Step 8. Spoon the garlic and mushroom mixture on top of the butter.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Mackerel with Mashed Potato and Onion Fritters
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat your oven to 200°C (400°F). Season the mackerel fillets with salt and pepper. Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat and sear the mackerel for 2-3 minutes on each side. Transfer the pan to the oven and bake for 8-10 minutes, or until the fish is cooked through.
Step 2. Meanwhile, boil the chopped potatoes in a large pot of salted water until tender. Drain the potatoes and mash with a fork. Add 1 tablespoon of milk to the mashed potatoes and mix well.
Step 3. In a separate pan, heat 1 tablespoon of oil over medium heat. Add the chopped onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes. 
Step 4. In a bowl, mix together 1/2 cup of flour, a pinch of salt, and a pinch of pepper.
Step 5. Using your hands, shape the onion mixture into small patties. Coat each patty with the flour mixture. Fry the onion fritters in the pan until golden brown, about 2-3 minutes on each side.

recipe.name: Lemon Spinach Chicken
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). Step 2. Season the chicken breast with salt and pepper. Step 3. Heat the vegetable oil in an oven-safe skillet over medium-high heat. Sear the chicken breast until browned on both sides, about 2-3 minutes per side. Step 4. Transfer the skillet to the preheated oven and bake for 12-15 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through. Step 5. While the chicken cooks, squeeze the lemon juice over a plate of fresh spinach leaves. Serve the chicken on top of the lemony spinach.

recipe.name: Creamy Pasta Bake
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F). Step 2. Cook the pasta according to the package instructions. Step 3. In a blender, mix the milk, lemon juice, and flour to create a creamy sauce. Step 4. Steam the broccoli until tender. Step 5. Combine the cooked pasta, broccoli, and creamy sauce in a baking dish. Bake for 15-20 minutes or until golden brown.

recipe.name: Grilled Chicken Teriyaki
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. In a small saucepan, combine 1/4 cup of rice vinegar, 2 tbsp of vegetable oil, and 2 tbsp of sugar. Bring to a boil over medium heat and simmer until the glaze thickens slightly. Step 2. Cut the chicken breast into bite-sized pieces and brush both sides with the teriyaki glaze. Step 3. Grill the chicken for 5-6 minutes per side, or until it reaches an internal temperature of 165°F. Step 4. Slice the bell pepper into thin rings and grill for 2-3 minutes per side, or until tender. Step 5. Serve the grilled chicken with the bell pepper and additional teriyaki sauce on the side.

recipe.name: Creamy Edamame and Kidney Bean Stew
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat the olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add the diced eggplant and bell pepper and cook until tender, about 5 minutes. Step 2. Add the chopped onion and cook until translucent, about 3 minutes. Step 3. Add the kidney beans, edamame, and milk. Stir to combine. Step 4. Bring the mixture to a simmer and let cook for 10-15 minutes, or until the flavors have melded together. Step 5. Season with salt and pepper to taste, and serve hot.

recipe.name: Grilled Salmon with Tomato and Pepper Salad
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cut the salmon into portions and grill for 8 minutes per side. Step 2. Chop the pepper and tomato into bite-sized pieces. Step 3. In a bowl, combine the chopped pepper, tomato, and lettuce. Step 4. Drizzle the salad with your favorite dressing and toss to coat. Step 5. Serve the grilled salmon with the salad on the side.
recipe.note: This recipe uses the available ingredients from the user's inventory. The missing lamb chop can be added to the shopping list for future use.

recipe.name: Lemon Garlic Rice
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 2 tbsp of non-dairy oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat.
         Step 2. Add the minced garlic and sauté for 1 minute until fragrant.
         Step 3. Add the rice to the saucepan and stir to coat with the garlic and oil mixture.
         Step 4. Cook for 2-3 minutes until the rice is lightly toasted.
         Step 5. Add 2 cups of water to the saucepan and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for 15-20 minutes until the water is absorbed.
         Step 6. Stir in the lemon juice and pepper. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Classic American Club Sandwich
main_ingredients: mayo or mustard (to taste, approximately 2 tbsp)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat a pan over medium heat. Butter 2 slices of bread on the outside. Cook until golden brown, flip and cook the other side. Repeat for the remaining bread slices. Step 2. Layer a slice of toasted bread, a few slices of tomato, a few slices of bell pepper, and a dollop of mayo or mustard. Step 3. Sprinkle with salt to taste. Step 4. Place another slice of toasted bread on top. Step 5. Cut the sandwich into halves or quarters, serve immediately.

recipe.name: Garlic and Mushroom Broccoli Fritters
recipe.steps: Step 1: In a large bowl, whisk together 1 cup of flour and salt. Add sliced mushrooms and broccoli. Step 2: In a separate pan, sauté garlic until fragrant. Step 3: Add the sautéed garlic to the bowl and mix well. Step 4: Using a spoon, drop small portions of the mixture into a hot non-stick pan with a small amount of oil. Step 5: Cook for 3-4 minutes on each side until golden brown. Step 6: Serve hot.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Chicken Breast
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat a non-stick skillet or cast-iron pan over medium-high heat. 
                Step 2. Season the chicken breast with salt. 
                Step 3. Add vegetable oil to the preheated pan and swirl it to coat the bottom. 
                Step 4. Place the chicken breast in the pan and sear for 5 minutes on each side. 
                Step 5. Reduce heat to medium-low and continue cooking for an additional 10-12 minutes or until the chicken reaches an internal temperature of 165°F.

recipe.name: Mexican Tempeh Chili
main_ingredients: 2 cups milk (unsweetened, almond or coconut milk for paleo)
recipe.steps: Step 1. In a large pan, heat a tablespoon of olive oil over medium heat. Add the crumbled tempeh and cook until browned, about 5 minutes. Step 2. Add the diced onion and cook until softened, about 3 minutes. Step 3. Add the kidney beans, diced tomatoes, chili powder, cumin, and salt. Stir to combine. Step 4. Pour in the unsweetened milk and stir to combine. Step 5. Bring the mixture to a simmer and let cook for 15-20 minutes, stirring occasionally.

recipe.name: Gluten-Free Pasta with Roasted Vegetables
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C). 
Step 2. Cut the broccoli, carrot, and pepper into bite-sized pieces. 
Step 3. In a large bowl, toss the vegetables with 2 tablespoons of olive oil, salt, and pepper until they are evenly coated. 
Step 4. Spread the vegetables in a single layer on a baking sheet and roast for 20-25 minutes or until tender. 
Step 5. Cook the pasta according to package instructions. 
Step 6. Add the roasted vegetables to the cooked pasta, toss in olive oil, and top with fresh spinach.

recipe.name: Vegan Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a pan over medium-high heat. Add tofu and cook until golden brown, about 3-4 minutes. Step 2. Remove tofu from the pan and set aside. Step 3. Add another tablespoon of oil and sauté the sliced eggplant until tender, about 3-4 minutes. Step 4. Add the chopped bok choy and brussels sprouts to the pan. Cook until the vegetables are tender-crisp, about 4-5 minutes. Step 5. Add the cooked rice to the pan, stir-frying everything together. Step 6. Return the tofu to the pan, and add the nutritional yeast. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

recipe.name: American-Style BBQ Potato Sandwich
main_ingredients: potato (4 medium), hamburger buns (4), bell pepper (1), mayonnaise (2 tbsp), ketchup (2 tbsp), BBQ sauce (2 tbsp)

Step 1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). Wash and poke the potatoes with a fork. Bake them in the oven for 20 minutes, or until tender.
Step 2. Slice the bell pepper into thin strips and grill them on a pan until slightly charred.
Step 3. Slice the potatoes in half lengthwise. Split the hamburger buns in half.
Step 4. Assemble the sandwiches by spreading mayonnaise on the bottom bun, then adding a potato half, followed by a few strips of the grilled bell pepper, a dollop of ketchup and BBQ sauce, and finishing with the top bun.
Step 5. Serve immediately and enjoy!

recipe.name: Grilled Mackerel with Green Beans and Citrus
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat the grill to medium-high heat. Rinse the mackerel fillet and pat it dry with paper towels.
      Step 2. In a small bowl, mix together 1 minced lime wedge, 1 minced onion (about 1/4 cup), and 1/4 cup chopped peanuts.
      Step 3. Place the mackerel fillet on the grill and cook for 4-5 minutes per side, or until it reaches an internal temperature of 145°F (63°C).
      Step 4. Meanwhile, toss the green beans with a pinch of salt and a squeeze of lime juice.
      Step 5. Serve the grilled mackerel with the green beans and peanut-lime sauce on top.

recipe.name: Shrimp and Eggplant Pasta
recipe.steps: Step 1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil and cook the pasta according to the package instructions until al dente. Reserve 1 cup of pasta water before draining.

recipe.name: Middle Eastern Rice Bowl
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Rinse the rice in a fine mesh strainer until the water runs clear. In a medium saucepan, combine the rice and 2 cups of water. Bring to a boil over high heat, then reduce the heat to low, cover, and simmer for 18-20 minutes or until the water is absorbed and the rice is tender.
Step 2. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add a pinch of salt to prevent the oil from smoking.
Step 3. Once the oil is hot, add the hummus and stir constantly for 2-3 minutes or until the mixture is well combined and fragrant.
Step 4. Fluff the cooked rice with a fork and stir in the hummus mixture until everything is well combined.
Step 5. Serve hot, garnished with a sprinkle of parmesan cheese (optional)

recipe.name: Cabbage and Pasta Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cook the pasta according to package instructions. Step 2. Chop the cabbage into small pieces. Step 3. Heat a pan over medium heat and add the ground beef, cook until browned. Step 4. Add the sugar and stir-fry for 2 minutes. Step 5. Combine cooked pasta and cabbage, stir-fry for 2 minutes.

recipe.name: Crab and Broccoli Stir Fry with Kidney Beans
main_ingredients: kidney beans (1 cup, drained and rinsed)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 2 tablespoons of vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the carrot and cook for 3-4 minutes, or until slightly tender.
Step 2. Add the broccoli to the skillet and cook for an additional 4 minutes, or until tender but still crisp.
Step 3. Add the kidney beans to the skillet and stir to combine with the carrot and broccoli.
Step 4. Add the flaked crab to the skillet and stir to combine with the other ingredients.
Step 5. Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, stirring frequently, until the crab is heated through and the ingredients are well combined.
Step 6. Serve hot, garnished with green onions if desired.

recipe.name: Vietnamese Beef and Tomato Stir Fry
main_ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables (substituted with 1 cup diced tomato)
2 cloves garlic (substituted with 1 minced bird's eye chili)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cook the rice noodles according to the package instructions and set aside. Step 2. Heat the vegetable oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Step 3. Add the ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks. Step 4. Add the minced bird's eye chili, soy sauce, fish sauce, lime juice, salt, black pepper, and ground cumin to the skillet and stir to combine. Step 5. Add the diced tomato, beef broth, chopped cilantro, and chopped mint to the skillet and stir to combine. Step 6. Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, until the flavors have melded together and the sauce has thickened. Step 7. Serve the beef and tomato mixture over the cooked rice noodles.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Lamb Chop with Roasted Vegetables
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat the grill to medium-high heat. Season the lamb chop with salt and pepper.
         Step 2. Grill the lamb chop for 3-4 minutes per side, or until cooked to desired doneness.
         Step 3. In a separate pan, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the chopped zucchini and cook for 5 minutes, or until tender.
         Step 4. Add the chopped kale to the pan with the zucchini and cook for an additional 2 minutes.
         Step 5. Serve the lamb chop with the roasted vegetables.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Lobster with Bok Choy and Cabbage Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Slice the lobster tail into 1-inch pieces and season with salt and pepper. Set aside. Step 2. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a wok or large skillet over high heat. Add the sliced onion and cook for 2-3 minutes until translucent. Step 3. Add the sliced bell pepper and cook for an additional 2 minutes. Step 4. Add the sliced cabbage and cook for 3-4 minutes until slightly wilted. Step 5. Push the vegetables to one side of the wok, add the remaining 1 tablespoon of oil, and add the lobster pieces to the empty side. Cook for 2-3 minutes per side until slightly charred. Step 6. Return the vegetables to the wok and stir-fry everything together for 1-2 minutes.

recipe.name: Mackerel and Avocado Keto Bowl
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 200°C. Step 2. Season the ground beef with salt and pepper. Cook the beef in a skillet over medium-high heat until browned, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks. Step 3. Once the beef is cooked, transfer it to the oven and roast for 10 minutes to enhance the flavor. Step 4. Meanwhile, grill the mackerel fillet until cooked through. Step 5. Slice the avocado and serve with the cooked beef and mackerel, garnished with grated ginger and a drizzle of coconut oil.

recipe.name: Savory Bok Choy Stir Fry with Garlic
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the sliced pork and cook until browned, about 3-4 minutes. Remove the pork from the wok and set aside.
Step 2. In the same wok, add the minced garlic and stir-fry for 1-2 minutes until fragrant.
Step 3. Add the chopped bok choy to the wok and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes until tender.
Step 4. Return the cooked pork to the wok, and stir in the rice vinegar and soy sauce.
Step 5. Cook for an additional minute, until the sauce has thickened. Serve hot and enjoy!

recipe.name: Lime Pasta Primavera
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil and cook the pasta according to the package instructions.
      Step 2. In a large skillet, heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil over medium-high heat. Add the sliced bell peppers and cook for 5 minutes.
      Step 3. Add the sliced carrots to the skillet and cook for another 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
      Step 4. Add the chopped lettuce to the skillet and cook for 1-2 minutes, until wilted.
      Step 5. Drain the cooked pasta and add it to the skillet with the vegetables. Squeeze the lime juice over the top and toss to combine.

recipe.name: Grilled Pork Chop with Black Bean Salsa
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Season the pork chop with salt, pepper, and your favorite spices. Step 2. Grill the pork chop for 5-6 minutes per side, or until it reaches an internal temperature of 145°F (63°C). Step 3. Meanwhile, mix together the cooked black beans, diced onion, and a squeeze of lime juice. Step 4. If using scallops, grill them for 2-3 minutes per side, or until they are opaque and cooked through. Step 5. Serve the grilled pork chop with the black bean salsa and top with scallops, if using.

recipe.name: Vegetarian Sweet Potato Pasta Bake
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat oven to 200°C (400°F). Cook pasta according to package instructions and set aside.

Step 2. Peel and dice the sweet potatoes, place them on a baking sheet, and roast for 20 minutes.

Step 3. In a large mixing bowl, combine ricotta cheese, olive oil, and a pinch of salt and pepper.

Step 4. Add the cooked pasta, roasted sweet potatoes, and chopped spinach and lettuce to the bowl. Mix well.

Step 5. Transfer the pasta mixture to a baking dish, top with additional cheese if desired, and bake for 20 minutes or until golden brown.

recipe.name: Beef Steak with Garlic and Tomato
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the grill or grill pan to medium-high heat. Season the beef steak with salt and pepper. Step 2. Grill the beef steak for 5-6 minutes per side, or until it reaches your desired level of doneness. Step 3. Meanwhile, heat some oil in a pan over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and sauté for 1 minute, until fragrant. Step 4. Slice the grilled beef steak against the grain and serve with sautéed garlic and tomato. Step 5. Garnish with fresh parsley or thyme, if desired.

recipe.name: Thai Garlic Shrimp Alternative (Vegan Version) - Inspired by Italian-Thai Fusion
main_ingredients: Parmesan (1/4 cup, dairy used in non-vegan recipe, adapted for vegan)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. In a blender or food processor, combine Thai chili and garlic to make a chili-garlic paste. Blend until smooth.
Step 2. In a large skillet, heat 1 tablespoon of oil over medium heat. Add the chili-garlic paste and sauté for 2-3 minutes.
Step 3. Add a handful of cilantro and sauté for another minute, until fragrant.
Step 4. Add the parmesan (in this vegan version, we'll substitute with nutritional yeast) and stir well. Cook for 1-2 minutes, until the parmesan is well coated with the chili-garlic sauce.
Step 5. Serve hot, garnished with additional cilantro if desired.

recipe.name: Gluten-Free Lime and Vegetable Stir-Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tbsp of olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the sliced cucumber and cook for 2-3 minutes until tender. Step 2. Add the chopped kale to the skillet and cook for another 2-3 minutes until wilted. Step 3. Add the diced tomato, grated carrot, and 1 tbsp of lime juice to the skillet. Stir-fry for 2-3 minutes until the vegetables are well combined. Step 4. Season the stir-fry with salt and pepper to taste. Step 5. Serve immediately, garnished with extra lime wedges if desired.

recipe.name: Grilled Lamb Chop with Roasted Vegetables
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Season the lamb chop with salt and grill for 4-5 minutes per side, or until it reaches your desired level of doneness. Let it rest for 10 minutes before slicing it thinly.
Step 2. Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C). Cut the potatoes and eggplant into 1-inch (2.5 cm) cubes and place them on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Drizzle with a little bit of oil and sprinkle with salt. Roast in the oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender and lightly browned.
Step 3. Slice the onion and sauté it in a pan with a little bit of oil until it's translucent. Add the zucchini and cook for another 5 minutes, or until it's tender.
Step 4. Serve the grilled lamb chop with the roasted vegetables and sautéed onion and zucchini.
Step 5. Garnish with chopped fresh herbs, if desired.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Scallops with Corn and Cabbage
main_ingredients: Scallops (12), Potato (2), Corn (1 cup), Cabbage (1 cup), Almonds (1/4 cup)
Olive oil (2 tbsp), Salt (to taste), Pepper (to taste)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add sliced potatoes and cook until golden brown, about 5 minutes. Remove from skillet and set aside.
Step 2. Add more olive oil if necessary, then add sliced cabbage and cook until slightly caramelized, about 5 minutes.
Step 3. Add corn to the skillet and cook for 2-3 minutes, stirring frequently. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Step 4. Pat the scallops dry with a paper towel and season with salt and pepper. Add the scallops to the skillet and sear for 2-3 minutes per side, until cooked through.
Step 5. Serve the scallops on top of the potato-cabbage-corn mixture, garnished with sliced almonds.

recipe.name: Carrot and Onion Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat the ghee in a pan over medium heat, add onion and sauté until translucent (3-4 minutes).
Step 2. Add the grated carrots and continue to sauté for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Step 3. Sprinkle sugar and pepper to taste, stir well to combine.
Step 4. Reduce heat to low, cover and let cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Step 5. Serve hot, garnished with lemon wedges if desired.

recipe.name: Vegetarian Thai Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a pan over medium heat. Add bell pepper and cook until tender, about 3-4 minutes.
Step 2. Add lentils and kidney beans to the pan and stir-fry for 2 minutes.
Step 3. Add a splash of soy sauce and stir-fry for another minute.
Step 4. Season with Thai red curry powder and stir-fry for another minute.
Step 5. Serve hot and garnish with fresh cilantro.

recipe.name: Vegan Teriyaki Lentil Bowl
main_ingredients: 2 tbsp soy sauce (make sure it's vegan)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Cook the lentils according to package instructions. Drain and set aside. 
      Step 2. In a pan, heat the sesame oil over medium heat. Add the sliced broccoli and cook until tender.
      Step 3. In a separate pan, mix the soy sauce, rice vinegar, and 1 tbsp water. Bring to a boil and then reduce heat to a simmer. 
      Step 4. Add the cooked lentils and black beans to the teriyaki sauce and stir to combine.
      Step 5. Serve the lentil and black bean mixture over a bed of steamed broccoli, garnished with sliced almonds and a sprinkle of sesame seeds.

recipe.name: Steamed Crab and Celery Stir-Fry
main_ingredients: crab (1 lb, cleaned and cut into chunks)
bok choy (1 bunch, cleaned and cut into 2-inch pieces)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Rinse the crab chunks and pat them dry with paper towels. Step 2. In a steamer basket, place the crab chunks and steam for 5 minutes, or until they're lightly cooked. Step 3. In a separate pan, heat 1 tablespoon of oil over medium-high heat. Add the sliced almonds and cook for 2-3 minutes, or until they're lightly toasted. Step 4. Add the cut celery and bok choy to the pan with the almonds and cook for 3-4 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender-crisp. Step 5. Serve the steamed crab on top of the vegetable and almond mixture.
recipe.note: This recipe doesn't require pepper or lemon, but you can add them if you have them on hand.

recipe.name: Bok Choy and Lemon Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Slice the chicken into thin strips and season with salt and pepper. Set aside.
Step 2. Slice the bok choy into 2-inch pieces and separate the leaves from the stems.
Step 3. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add the chicken and cook until browned, about 5 minutes. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.
Step 4. In the same skillet, add the minced garlic and cook for 1 minute until fragrant. Add the sliced bok choy and cook until wilted, about 3-4 minutes.
Step 5. Add the cooked chicken back into the skillet, along with the lemon juice and sliced tomato. Stir everything together and cook for an additional 2 minutes. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Japanese-Style Celery Tempura
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cut the celery into 1/4-inch slices. In a shallow dish, mix together panko and a pinch of salt. Step 2. Dip each celery piece into the dashi, coating it evenly, then roll it in the panko mixture to coat. Step 3. Heat 1/4 inch of vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Step 4. Fry the coated celery pieces in batches until golden brown, about 2-3 minutes per batch. Step 5. Remove the tempura from the oil with a slotted spoon and drain on paper towels.
recipe.note: Serve hot with your favorite dipping sauce.

recipe.name: Vegan Asian-Style Tofu Stir-Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a pan over medium-high heat. Add the tofu and cook until golden brown on all sides, about 5-6 minutes. Step 2. Remove the tofu from the pan and set aside. Step 3. In the same pan, add the chopped cashews and cook until fragrant and lightly browned, about 2-3 minutes. Step 4. Add the green beans and cabbage to the pan, and cook until tender, about 4-5 minutes. Step 5. Return the tofu to the pan and stir to combine with the vegetables. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Step 6. Serve hot, garnished with chopped scallions if desired.

recipe.name: Baked Salmon with Cauliflower
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
Step 2. Mix olive oil, garlic, salt, and pepper in a bowl.
Step 3. Place the salmon fillets on the baking sheet, brush the garlic mixture on both sides of the salmon.
Step 4. Place the cauliflower florets on the baking sheet around the salmon.
Step 5. Bake in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes or until the salmon is cooked through and the cauliflower is tender.

recipe.name: Chicken and Rice Bowl
recipe.steps: Step 1. Chop the onion and celery into small pieces, heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a pan over medium heat, and sauté the chopped onion and celery until softened. Step 2. Add 500g chicken breast to the pan, cook until browned, and set aside. Step 3. In a separate pot, boil 500ml water, add 250g rice, and cook until tender. Step 4. In a separate pan, heat 2 tablespoons of oil over medium heat, add the cooked chicken breast, and stir-fry until well coated. Step 5. To assemble the dish, place cooked rice in a bowl, top with the chicken breast, and sprinkle sautéed onion and celery on top.

recipe.name: Mexican Lentil and Bok Choy Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add lentils and cook, stirring occasionally, for 5 minutes. Step 2. Add chopped bok choy and cook, stirring frequently, until wilted, about 3-4 minutes. Step 3. Add diced tomato and cook for an additional 2 minutes. Step 4. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Step 5. Serve hot, garnished with your favorite Mexican toppings.

recipe.name: Tuna and Edamame Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 2 tbsp of olive oil in a pan over medium heat. Step 2. Add 1 cup of edamame and cook until tender. Step 3. Add 1 can of tuna and stir well. Step 4. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Step 5. Serve hot and enjoy!
recipe.note: Note: This recipe does not use rice, carrot, or tomato as they are not available in the inventory.

recipe.name: Sesame Edamame Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add sliced celery and cook for 3-4 minutes until tender.
Step 2. Add minced garlic and cook for another minute, until fragrant.
Step 3. Add edamame and cook for 2-3 minutes, until heated through.
Step 4. Sprinkle sesame seeds over the edamame mixture and stir to combine.
Step 5. Serve hot, garnished with additional sesame seeds if desired.

recipe.name: Vegan Lentil and Mushroom Stir Fry
main_ingredients: 2 cups mixed mushrooms (e.g., button, cremini, shiitake)
2 tbsp soy sauce (or tamari for gluten-free)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Rinse and cook the lentils according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
      Step 2. Heat a tablespoon of oil in a pan over medium-high heat. Add the sliced mushrooms and cook until they release their moisture and start browning.
      Step 3. Add the sliced cucumber to the pan with the mushrooms and stir-fry for another 2-3 minutes.
      Step 4. In a separate pan, heat the remaining oil over medium heat. Add the sliced almonds and toast until fragrant and lightly browned.
      Step 5. Combine the cooked lentils, mushroom and cucumber mixture, and toasted almonds in a large bowl. Stir in soy sauce and serve hot.

recipe.name: Lobster and Ground Pork Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Rinse mussels under cold water and scrub them clean. Remove the beard and any broken shells. 
               Step 2. Heat 2 tablespoons of butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the ground pork and cook, 
               breaking it up with a spoon, until it is no longer pink, about 5 minutes. 
               Step 3. Add the sliced onion and minced garlic to the skillet and cook until the onion is translucent. 
               Step 4. Add the mussels to the skillet, cover, and cook until they start to open, about 3-4 minutes. 
               Step 5. Stir in the lobster meat and cook until heated through. Add the bok choy and stir-fry until it is wilted.
recipe.note: This recipe highlights the flavors of the mussels, lobster, and ground pork. You can serve it with steamed rice or noodles.

recipe.name: Italian-Style Pasta and Rice
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil and cook the pasta according to the package instructions until al dente. Reserve 1 cup of pasta water before draining the spaghetti.
Step 2. In a large skillet, heat 2 tablespoons of oil over medium-high heat. Add the chicken thighs and cook until browned on both sides and cooked through, about 5-7 minutes per side.
Step 3. Add the sliced zucchini and cauliflower to the skillet with the chicken and cook until they start to soften, about 3-4 minutes.
Step 4. Stir in 1 cup of reserved pasta water and 1 tablespoon of olive oil. Bring the mixture to a simmer and cook until the sauce has slightly thickened, about 2-3 minutes.
Step 5. Serve the chicken and vegetable mixture over the cooked pasta, garnished with fresh parsley if desired.
recipe.note: Eggs are missing from the ingredients list. Try adding them to the recipe by making an egg-based sauce or using them as a topping.

recipe.name: Bacon Fajitas
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Chop the onion and bell pepper into thin slices. 
                Heat 1 tbsp of olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
                Add the chopped onion and bell pepper. Cook until they start to soften.
                Step 2. Add the sliced bacon to the skillet. Cook until crispy.
                Step 3. Add the sliced mushroom to the skillet. Cook until tender.
                Step 4. Add the corn and cook for an additional 2 minutes.
                Step 5. Stir in the chopped spinach and cook until wilted.

recipe.name: Roasted Broccoli and Vegetable Medley
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C).
Step 2. In a large bowl, toss broccoli florets, chopped celery, and onion with olive oil, salt, and pepper until they are evenly coated.
Step 3. Spread the vegetable mixture on a baking sheet in a single layer.
Step 4. Roast in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes or until the vegetables are tender and lightly browned.
Step 5. Serve hot, garnished with fresh herbs if desired.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Crab with Edamame
recipe.steps: Step 1. Rinse the crab under cold water and pat dry with paper towels. Step 2. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a pan over medium-high heat. Add the crab and sear for 2-3 minutes on each side, until golden brown. Step 3. Remove the crab from the pan and set aside. Step 4. Add the edamame to the pan and sauté for 2-3 minutes, until tender. Step 5. Serve the crab with the edamame and steamed quinoa, garnished with lettuce.

recipe.name: Spinach and Ground Beef Stuffed Zucchini
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). Cut zucchini in half lengthwise and scoop out seeds. Step 2. In a pan, heat 1 tbsp olive oil over medium heat. Add garlic and cook for 1 minute. Step 3. Add ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it into small pieces. Step 4. Stir in spinach, dried oregano, salt, and pepper. Cook until spinach wilts. Step 5. Stuff each zucchini half with the beef mixture and place in a baking dish. Drizzle with remaining 1 tbsp olive oil. Step 6. Bake for 20 minutes or until zucchini is tender.

recipe.name: Sardine and Green Bean Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil in a pan over medium-high heat. Step 2. Add the sardines and cook until they break apart, about 2-3 minutes. Step 3. Add the green beans and cook until they're tender but still crisp, about 3-4 minutes. Step 4. Serve the sardine and green bean mixture over cooked rice. Step 5. Garnish with chopped peanuts for added crunch.

recipe.name: Lemongrass Stir Fry with Mushroom
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Chop the lemongrass into 2-inch pieces and bruise with a kitchen mallet. Heat a tablespoon of butter in a wok over medium heat. Add the lemongrass and sauté for 2 minutes.
Step 2. Add the sliced bell pepper and sauté for another 3 minutes until tender.
Step 3. Add the chopped shallots and sauté for 3 minutes until softened.
Step 4. Add the sliced mushrooms and sauté for 5 minutes until they release their moisture and start to brown.
Step 5. Season with pepper and salt to taste, then serve hot.

recipe.name: Non-Dairy Pasta Primavera
recipe.steps: Step 1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil and cook pasta according to package instructions. Step 2. In a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Step 3. Add sliced celery and bell pepper to the skillet and cook for 5 minutes or until tender. Step 4. Drain cooked pasta and add it to the skillet with the celery and bell pepper mixture. Step 5. Season with salt to taste and serve hot.

recipe.name: Vegetarian Kidney Bean and Mushroom Salad
recipe.steps: Step 1. In a large bowl, combine cooked kidney beans, sliced mushroom, and shredded lettuce. Step 2. In a small bowl, mix cottage cheese with a pinch of salt and pepper. Step 3. Pour the cottage cheese mixture over the bean and mushroom mixture. Step 4. Toss gently to combine. Step 5. Serve chilled.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Cod and Mackerel with Citrus Salsa
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Cut the cod and mackerel fillets into portions and season with salt.
                Step 2. Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat and cook the cod and mackerel for 4-5 minutes per side, until cooked through.
                Step 3. Meanwhile, mix the lemon juice, diced tomatoes, and a pinch of salt in a bowl.
                Step 4. Serve the cooked cod and mackerel with the citrus salsa spooned over the top.
                Step 5. Garnish with fresh parsley and serve hot.

recipe.name: Chicken and Veggie Stir-Fry
main_ingredients: 2-3 medium potatoes, peeled and diced (2 cups)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Cut the chicken thigh into bite-sized pieces and season with salt, pepper, and your favorite Italian spices. Set aside.
Step 2. Heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the diced potatoes and cook for 5 minutes, or until they start to brown.
Step 3. Add the sliced bell peppers to the skillet and cook for an additional 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Step 4. Add the chicken to the skillet and cook until browned on all sides and cooked through, about 5-7 minutes.
Step 5. Stir in the chickpeas, spinach, and a pinch of salt. Cook until the spinach has wilted.
Step 6. Serve hot, garnished with fresh herbs if desired.

recipe.name: Korean-Style Shrimp and Mushroom Stir-Fry with Rice and Zucchini
main_ingredients: 1 cup mixed mushrooms (button, cremini, shiitake), sliced
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Cook the Korean-style rice according to package instructions. Set aside.
               Step 2. Heat 1 tablespoon of sesame oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat.
               Step 3. Add the sliced mushrooms and cook until they release their liquid and start to brown, about 3-4 minutes.
               Step 4. Add the shrimp and cook until they turn pink and are cooked through, about 2-3 minutes per side.
               Step 5. Add the sliced zucchini and cook until it's tender but still crisp, about 3-4 minutes.
               Step 6. Stir in 1 tablespoon of soy sauce, 1 tablespoon of Gochujang (Korean chili paste), and 1 teaspoon of sesame oil.
               Step 7. Serve the shrimp and mushroom mixture over the cooked Korean-style rice.

recipe.name: Grilled Corn with Avocado Salsa
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Grill the corn for 10-12 minutes, turning occasionally, until lightly charred.
Step 2. Meanwhile, chop the onion and mash the avocado in a bowl. Squeeze the lime juice over the avocado and mix well.
Step 3. Add the sugar to the avocado mixture and mix well.
Step 4. Once the corn is grilled, slather the avocado salsa over the corn.
Step 5. Drizzle the olive oil over the corn and serve immediately.

recipe.name: Thai-Style Stir-Fried Beef and Spinach
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 10g of butter in a wok or large skillet over medium heat. Add 60g of ground beef, breaking it up with a spoon as it cooks, until browned, about 5 minutes.
Step 2. Add 60g of diced onion to the wok and cook until it is translucent, about 3 minutes.
Step 3. Add 200g of fresh spinach to the wok and cook until wilted, about 2 minutes.
Step 4. Stir in 10g of chopped holy basil, 20g of sugar, and salt to taste.
Step 5. Serve the beef and spinach mixture immediately, garnished with additional holy basil if desired.

recipe.name: Tofu and Lentil Fajita
main_ingredients: 1 block tofu (drained and cut into small pieces)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add tofu and cook until golden brown, about 5-7 minutes. Step 2. Add lentils and cook for another 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Step 3. Add chopped kale and cook until wilted, about 3-5 minutes. Step 4. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Step 5. Serve with chopped almonds on top. Step 6. Optional: Serve with gluten-free tortillas or rice.

recipe.name: Pork and Sage Fettuccine
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil and cook 200g fettuccine according to package instructions. Reserve 1 cup pasta water before draining the fettuccine.
Step 2. In a large skillet, heat 1 tablespoon olive oil over medium heat. Add 3 minced garlic cloves and cook for 1-2 minutes until fragrant.
Step 3. Add 200g pork cutlets to the skillet and cook for 3-4 minutes per side, or until cooked through.
Step 4. Add 20g chopped fresh sage to the skillet and cook for an additional minute.
Step 5. Combine cooked fettuccine, reserved pasta water, and the pork and sage mixture. Toss to combine and top with toasted pine nuts.

recipe.name: Cilantro Chicken Pasta
recipe.steps: Step 1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil and cook the pasta according to the package instructions until al dente. Reserve 1 cup of pasta water before draining. Step 2. In a large skillet, melt the butter over medium-high heat. Add the chicken breast and cook until browned and cooked through, about 5-6 minutes per side. Step 3. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside to rest. Step 4. Add the reserved pasta water to the skillet and stir in the reserved pasta. Step 5. Chop the cilantro and stir it into the pasta. Step 6. Slice the cooked chicken and serve on top of the pasta.

recipe.name: Indian Quinoa and Scallop Biryani
main_ingredients: ground beef (1/2 cup, cooked and shredded)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat oil in a pan and sauté the ground beef until browned. Set aside. 
Step 2. In a separate pan, heat some oil and sauté the zucchini slices until they are tender.
