Step 3. In a large saucepan, heat some oil and add the diced scallops. Cook until they are opaque and set aside.
Step 4. In the same saucepan, add the quinoa and sauté for 1-2 minutes. Then, add 2 cups of water and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 15-20 minutes or until the quinoa is cooked and fluffy.
Step 5. In a large serving dish, combine the cooked quinoa, sautéed zucchini, cooked scallops, and ground beef. Squeeze some lemon juice on top and serve hot.
recipe.note: This recipe is a fusion of Indian and seafood flavors. You can adjust the amount of spices and chilies to your taste.

recipe.name: Grilled Mackerel with Stir-Fried Bok Choy and Sweet Potatoes
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat a grill or grill pan to medium-high heat. Season the mackerel fillet with salt and pepper. Grill the mackerel for 4-5 minutes per side, or until cooked through. Step 2. In a separate pan, heat 1 tbsp of sesame oil over medium heat. Add sliced sweet potatoes and cook for 5 minutes, or until slightly caramelized. Step 3. Add sliced bok choy to the pan with the sweet potatoes. Cook until the bok choy is wilted. Step 4. Slice the grilled mackerel into thick slices. Step 5. Serve the mackerel slices on top of the stir-fried sweet potatoes and bok choy.

recipe.name: Vietnamese Grilled Chicken with Caramel Sauce
recipe.steps: Step 1. In a large bowl, whisk together 2 tbsp of sugar and 2 tsp of cinnamon to make the caramel sauce. Step 2. Add 1 sliced onion to the bowl and toss to coat with the caramel sauce. Step 3. Heat a grill or grill pan to medium-high heat. Step 4. Grill the chicken breast for 5-6 minutes per side, or until cooked through. Step 5. Serve the grilled chicken with the caramelized onions on top.

recipe.name: Grilled Eggplant and Rice
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the grill to medium heat. Step 2. Brush the eggplant slices with oil and season with salt and pepper. Step 3. Grill the eggplant slices for 3-4 minutes per side, or until tender. Step 4. Cook the rice according to package instructions. Step 5. Serve the grilled eggplant slices on top of a bed of rice with sliced tomatoes.
recipe.note: Chicken breast and lettuce are not available in the inventory. You may consider adding these to the shopping list for a more complete dish.

recipe.name: Vegetarian Lentil and Broccoli Frittata
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). Step 2. In a pan, sauté broccoli in a little water until tender. Step 3. In a bowl, mash lentils with a fork. Add yogurt and mix well. Step 4. In a greased skillet, layer bread slices and spread the lentil mixture on top. Step 5. Add sautéed broccoli on top and fold the bread slices to form a frittata. Step 6. Bake in the oven for 20 minutes or until golden brown.

recipe.name: Bell Pepper Fritters
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C). In a large bowl, whisk together flour, a pinch of salt, and pepper. Add in milk and mix until smooth. Step 2. Chop the bell pepper into small pieces and add it to the bowl. Mix well to combine. Step 3. Using a 1/4 cup measuring cup, scoop the batter and shape into patties. Step 4. Heat a large skillet with 1-2 inches of oil over medium-high heat. Fry the fritters until golden brown on both sides. Step 5. Remove the fritters from the oil and place them on a paper towel-lined plate to drain excess oil. Step 6. Transfer the fritters to a baking sheet and bake for 10-15 minutes or until crispy.

recipe.name: Vietnamese Grilled Sweet Potato and Mushroom
main_ingredients: 1 large sweet potato ( peeled and sliced)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. In a small bowl, whisk together coconut oil, fish sauce, and lime juice. Step 2. Brush the mixture on both sides of the sweet potato slices. Step 3. Grill the sweet potato slices for 5-7 minutes on each side, or until they're tender and slightly charred. Step 4. Grill the mushroom and cauliflower slices for 2-3 minutes on each side, or until they're tender and slightly charred. Step 5. Serve the grilled vegetables with your favorite Vietnamese dipping sauce.

recipe.name: Vegan Quinoa Bowl with Roasted Cauliflower and Edamame
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C). Rinse the quinoa in a fine mesh strainer and drain well. In a medium saucepan, bring the quinoa and water to a boil. Reduce the heat to low, cover, and simmer for about 15-20 minutes, or until the quinoa is tender and the water has been absorbed.
Step 2. In a large bowl, toss the cauliflower florets with a tablespoon of olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Spread the cauliflower on a baking sheet and roast in the oven for 20-25 minutes, or until tender and lightly browned.
Step 3. In a separate pan, heat a tablespoon of olive oil over medium heat. Add the chopped onion and cook for 5-7 minutes, or until softened and lightly browned.
Step 4. In a large serving bowl, combine the cooked quinoa, roasted cauliflower, and cooked onion. Top with edamame and serve warm.
Step 5. Garnish with chopped fresh herbs, if desired.

recipe.name: Stir-Fried Vegetables with Hoisin Sauce
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cook pasta according to package instructions. Drain and set aside. Step 2. Chop chinese cabbage and bok choy into bite-sized pieces. Step 3. Heat a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat. Add 2 cloves of minced garlic and stir-fry for 1 minute. Step 4. Add chopped vegetables to the wok or skillet and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes or until tender-crisp. Step 5. Add hoisin sauce and sugar to the wok or skillet and stir-fry for 1 minute, coating the vegetables evenly.

recipe.name: Asian-Style Roasted Broccoli with Sesame Seeds
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Step 2. In a large bowl, toss broccoli with sugar, salt, and lemon juice until evenly coated.
Step 3. Spread the broccoli mixture on a baking sheet in a single layer.
Step 4. Roast in the oven for 15-20 minutes or until tender and slightly caramelized.
Step 5. Remove from oven and sprinkle with sesame seeds. Serve hot and enjoy.

recipe.name: Cheesy Spinach Fritters
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat a non-stick skillet over medium heat. 
               Step 2. Finely chop the garlic and sauté in a pan for 1 minute. 
               Step 3. Add the chopped spinach to the skillet and cook until wilted. 
               Step 4. In a large bowl, combine the flour, nutritional yeast, and cooked spinach mixture. 
               Step 5. Mix well until a dough forms, then divide into 6 portions. 
               Step 6. Flatten each portion into a disk shape and pan-fry until golden brown.

recipe.name: Grilled Mushroom Teriyaki
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cut the mushrooms into bite-sized pieces and season with salt. Step 2. In a small saucepan, combine butter and lemon juice over low heat. Step 3. Once melted, add 1 cup of water to the saucepan to create the teriyaki sauce. Step 4. Grill the mushrooms until golden brown. Step 5. Brush the teriyaki sauce over the mushrooms during the last 2 minutes of grilling.

recipe.name: Cheesy American Style Stuffed Bell Peppers
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C). Cut the tops off the bell peppers and remove seeds and membranes. In a large skillet, sauté the chopped green beans until tender. Step 2. Open the cans of sardines and mash them using a fork. In a large bowl, combine mashed sardines, sautéed green beans, spinach, and nutritional yeast. Step 3. Stuff each bell pepper with the sardine mixture and place them in a baking dish. Step 4. Bake for 25 minutes or until the bell peppers are tender. Step 5. Serve hot and enjoy! Note: This recipe showcases the requested ingredients and adds sardines for a non-vegan twist.

recipe.name: Lentil and Ginger Curry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Rinse the lentils and soak them in water for 15 minutes. Drain and set aside.
               Step 2. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a pan over medium heat. Add the mustard seeds and let them sizzle for a few seconds.
               Step 3. Add the grated ginger and sauté until fragrant.
               Step 4. Add the curry powder and sauté for another minute.
               Step 5. Add the lentils, 2 cups of water, and salt to taste. Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for 20-25 minutes, or until the lentils are tender.

recipe.name: Broccoli and Pepper Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Chop broccoli and pepper into bite-sized pieces. Step 2. Heat a pan with a small amount of oil and sauté the broccoli and pepper until tender. Step 3. Crack in the eggs and scramble them. Step 4. Add chopped almonds and stir-fry for a minute. Step 5. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Roasted Vegan Cauliflower with Cashew Sauce
main_ingredients: 2 heads of cauliflower (cleaned, separated into florets)
1 cup of cashews (soaked in water for 30 minutes)
2 cups of kale (stems removed, leaves chopped)
2 slices of bread (gluten-free or whole wheat)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C). In a bowl, toss cauliflower florets with 2 tbsp of olive oil, salt, and pepper. Spread on a baking sheet and roast for 20 minutes. Step 2. In a blender, combine soaked cashews, 1 cup of water, and 1 tsp of lemon juice. Blend until smooth and creamy. Step 3. In a pan, heat 1 tbsp of olive oil over medium heat. Add chopped kale and cook until wilted. Step 4. In a separate pan, heat 1 tbsp of olive oil over medium heat. Add corn kernels and cook until lightly toasted, about 5 minutes. Step 5. To assemble, place roasted cauliflower on a plate, top with a dollop of cashew sauce, and garnish with wilted kale and toasted corn.

recipe.name: Chicken Tempura Pasta
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Cook pasta according to package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside.
Step 2. Cut chicken breast into bite-sized pieces and season with salt and pepper.
Step 3. In a shallow dish, mix together panko and a pinch of salt.
Step 4. Dip each chicken piece into the panko mixture, coating both sides evenly.
Step 5. Heat a non-stick pan over medium-high heat with a small amount of oil. Fry the coated chicken pieces until golden brown and crispy.
Step 6. In a separate pan, combine rice vinegar, a bit of soy sauce (optional), and cook for about 1 minute.
Step 7. Combine the cooked pasta, chicken tempura, and the rice vinegar sauce. Toss everything together and serve hot.

recipe.name: Gluten-Free Pasta with Mushroom and Tomato
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Bring a large pot of water to a boil. Cook pasta according to package instructions for 8-10 minutes or until al dente.
Step 2. Chop mushroom and celery into small pieces. Heat a pan over medium heat and sauté until mushroom is tender.
Step 3. Add chopped tomato to the pan and cook for an additional 5 minutes.
Step 4. Drain the cooked pasta and add it to the pan with the mushroom and tomato mixture. Toss everything together.
Step 5. Season with salt to taste and serve hot.

recipe.name: Baja-Style Fish Tacos
main_ingredients: 1 pound salmon fillet (cut into small pieces)
Sliced radishes, lime wedges, and cilantro for garnish (optional)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat a grill or grill pan to medium-high heat. Season the salmon fillet with salt, pepper, cumin, and paprika. Step 2. Grill the salmon for 3-4 minutes per side, or until cooked through. Step 3. Meanwhile, heat the olive oil in a pan over medium heat. Add the chopped green beans and cook for 2-3 minutes, or until tender. Step 4. Warm the corn tortillas by wrapping them in a damp paper towel and microwaving for 20-30 seconds. Step 5. Assemble the tacos by placing a piece of grilled salmon onto a tortilla, followed by some green beans, kidney beans, and a sprinkle of cumin. Serve immediately and garnish with radishes, lime wedges, and cilantro if desired.

recipe.name: Roasted Brussels Sprouts and Asparagus
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). Rinse the Brussels sprouts and asparagus, and trim the ends. Cut the Brussels sprouts in half and cut the asparagus into 2-inch pieces. Step 2. In a large bowl, mix together 2 cloves of minced garlic, 1/4 cup of cashews, and 2 tablespoons of olive oil (not in the inventory, this ingredient will be removed for strict vegan adherence). Step 3. Add the Brussels sprouts and asparagus to the bowl and toss to coat with the garlic-cashew mixture. Step 4. Spread the vegetables in a single layer on a baking sheet and roast in the oven for 20-25 minutes or until tender and caramelized. Step 5. Serve hot and garnish with a sprinkle of cashews.

recipe.name: Keto Vietnamese Grilled Beef Skewers
recipe.steps:
Step 1. In a large bowl, whisk together 2 tbsp fish sauce, 2 tbsp lime juice, 1 tsp sugar, 1 tsp grated ginger, and 1 tsp garlic. Add 1 tsp black pepper and mix well.
Step 2. Add the sliced beef steak to the marinade mixture and mix well to coat. Cover and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes.
Step 3. Preheat a grill or grill pan over medium-high heat. Remove the beef from the marinade and thread onto skewers.
Step 4. Grill the beef for 8-10 minutes per side, or until cooked to desired level of doneness.
Step 5. Meanwhile, toss the cauliflower florets with 1 tbsp coconut oil and season with salt and pepper. Grill or roast in the oven for 10-12 minutes, or until tender and slightly charred.
Step 6. Serve the grilled beef skewers with the cauliflower and your choice of keto Vietnamese sides.

recipe.name: Mackerel and Mushroom Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat a pan over medium heat and add the mackerel. Cook for 3-4 minutes per side, until cooked through.
Step 2. Remove the mackerel from the pan and set aside. In the same pan, add the onion and mushroom. Cook until the onion is translucent.
Step 3. Add the cooked mackerel back into the pan and stir to combine with the onion and mushroom mixture.
Step 4. Serve the mackerel and mushroom mixture over rice or quinoa.
Step 5. Enjoy your delicious Mackerel and Mushroom Stir Fry!
recipe.note: The recipe uses available ingredients, but chicken breast and salt are missing. You can add these to your shopping list to make other recipes.

recipe.name: Thai-Style Stir-Fried Noodles with Chicken and Mushroom
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cook the rice noodles according to the package instructions. Drain and set aside. Step 2. In a pan, heat 1 tbsp of oil over medium-high heat. Add the chicken breast and cook until browned on both sides. Remove from heat and set aside. Step 3. In the same pan, add the sliced mushroom and cook until tender. Step 4. Add the cooked chicken back into the pan and stir in the soy sauce, lemon juice, and chopped holy basil. Step 5. Combine the cooked noodle and the chicken-mushroom mixture. Serve immediately.

recipe.name: Thai-Style Coconut Rice
recipe.steps: Step 1. Rinse the rice thoroughly and soak it in water for about 30 minutes. Drain the water and set the rice aside. Step 2. In a large saucepan, heat the milk over medium heat. Add the flour and pepper, whisking continuously until the mixture thickens. Step 3. Add 2 cups of water to the saucepan and bring the mixture to a boil. Step 4. Stir in the soaked rice and reduce the heat to low. Step 5. Cover the saucepan with a tight-fitting lid and cook for about 18-20 minutes, or until the water is absorbed and the rice is tender.

recipe.name: Roasted Lemon Potato with Cod
main_ingredients: 2 large potatoes (1 each, peeled and cubed)
2 lemons (1/4 cup, freshly squeezed lemon juice)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C). Step 2. In a bowl, toss the cubed potatoes with 2 tablespoons of butter, salt, and 1/4 cup of freshly squeezed lemon juice. Step 3. Spread the potatoes out in a single layer on a baking sheet. Step 4. Roast the potatoes in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until tender. Step 5. Meanwhile, season the cod fillets with salt. Step 6. In a skillet, heat 1 tablespoon of butter over medium heat. Add the cod fillets and cook for 3-4 minutes per side, or until cooked through. Step 7. Serve the roasted potatoes with the pan-seared cod and a squeeze of lemon juice.

recipe.name: Gluten-Free Korean-Style Cod with Cauliflower and Sweet Potato
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Cut the sweet potatoes into 1-inch cubes and roast in the oven for 20-25 minutes, or until tender. Step 2. Cut the cauliflower into florets and roast in the oven with the sweet potatoes for the last 10-12 minutes, or until tender. Step 3. Prepare the cod by cutting it into 1-inch pieces. Step 4. In a pan, heat 1 tablespoon of oil over medium heat. Add the cod and cook for 3-4 minutes per side, or until cooked through. Step 5. In a separate pan, heat 1 tablespoon of oil over medium heat. Add the spinach and cook until wilted. Serve with steamed rice and roasted sweet potatoes and cauliflower.

recipe.name: Thai Basil Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Slice the chicken breast into thin strips. Heat 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil in a wok over medium-high heat. Add the chicken and cook until browned, about 3-4 minutes. Remove from the wok and set aside.
Step 2. In the same wok, add the remaining 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil. Add the minced galangal and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
Step 3. Add the sliced shallots and cook until they start to brown, about 2-3 minutes.
Step 4. Add the broccoli and cook until it starts to soften, about 3-4 minutes.
Step 5. Add the cooked chicken back into the wok. Stir in the fish sauce and soy sauce. Cook for an additional 1-2 minutes.
Step 6. Add the cooked rice noodles to the wok. Stir-fry everything together for about 2-3 minutes.
Step 7. Taste and adjust the seasoning as needed.
Step 8. Garnish with Thai basil leaves and serve hot.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Paneer and Bell Pepper
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cut the paneer into 1-inch cubes and season with salt. Step 2. Heat 1 tbsp of oil in a pan over medium heat. Add the paneer and cook until golden brown on all sides, about 5-6 minutes. Step 3. Remove the paneer from the pan and set aside. Step 4. Add the remaining 1 tbsp of oil to the pan and sauté the bell pepper until tender, about 4-5 minutes. Step 5. Add the peanuts to the pan and sauté for another minute. Step 6. Serve the pan-seared paneer with sautéed bell pepper and peanuts.

recipe.name: Black Bean and Sweet Potato Hash
main_ingredients: 1 can kidney beans, drained and rinsed (15 oz)
1 cup green beans (trims ends, cut into 1-inch pieces)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Toss diced sweet potato with 1 tbsp olive oil, salt, and pepper on a baking sheet. Roast for 20 minutes, or until tender.
Step 2. Heat remaining olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the green beans and cook, stirring occasionally, for 5 minutes, or until tender.
Step 3. Add the diced tomatoes to the skillet and cook for an additional 2 minutes.
Step 4. In a large bowl, mash the kidney beans using a fork or a potato masher. Add the roasted sweet potato, cooked green bean and tomato mixture, and stir to combine.
Step 5. Serve the black bean and sweet potato hash hot, garnished with chopped fresh herbs if desired.

recipe.name: Chicken Parmesan Cutlets
recipe.steps: Step 1: Prepare the breading station by placing the flour on a plate. Place the beaten egg in a shallow dish. Place the breadcrumbs (made from flour) mixed with parmesan on another plate. Step 2: Season the chicken breast with salt. Step 3: Dip each chicken breast in the flour, coating completely. Then, dip in the egg mixture, and finally in the breadcrumb mixture, pressing gently to adhere. Step 4: Heat 1/4 cup of vegetable oil in a skillet over medium-high heat. Step 5: Add the breaded chicken breast and cook for 3-4 minutes on each side or until golden brown and cooked through.

recipe.name: Beef and Bell Pepper Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 50g of butter in a pan over medium heat. Add 250g ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks. Step 2. Add 1 medium bell pepper, sliced, to the pan and cook until it starts to soften. Step 3. Add 10g sugar and cook for another 2-3 minutes, stirring constantly. Step 4. Reduce heat to low and let it simmer for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally. Step 5. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve hot.
recipe.note: Lime juice would be a great addition to this recipe, but it's not necessary. You can also add some mushrooms or potato to make it more substantial.

recipe.name: Japanese-Style Edamame and Rice Bowl
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Rinse the edamame and cook according to package instructions until tender. Drain excess water and set aside.
Step 2. Cook the rice according to package instructions. Set aside.
Step 3. Cut the nori sheets into thin strips.
Step 4. In a small bowl, whisk together lime and lemon juice. Brush the mixture onto the nori strips.
Step 5. In a large bowl, combine cooked edamame, cooked rice, and nori strips. Toss gently to combine.

recipe.name: Vegan Brussels Sprouts Bread Pâté
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). Cut the Brussels sprouts in half and toss with 1 tablespoon olive oil, salt, and pepper. Spread on a baking sheet and roast for 20 minutes or until tender. Step 2. In a blender, combine roasted Brussels sprouts, nutritional yeast, and cashews. Blend until smooth. Step 3. Transfer the mixture to a bowl and stir in 1 tablespoon lemon juice. Step 4. Serve the pâté on toasted bread. Step 5. Garnish with additional nutritional yeast if desired.

recipe.name: Simple Mushroom Carrot Fritters
recipe.steps:
Step 1. In a large bowl, combine grated carrot and chopped mushroom. Set aside.
Step 2. In a separate bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, and salt. Add olive oil to the dry ingredients and mix until a crumbly mixture forms.
Step 3. Add the dry mixture to the carrot-mushroom mixture and mix well.
Step 4. Using your hands, shape the mixture into 8-10 patties.
Step 5. Heat a non-stick pan with a tablespoon of olive oil over medium heat. Cook the fritters for 4-5 minutes on each side, until golden brown.

recipe.name: Roasted Broccoli and Toast
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
Step 2. Cut the broccoli into florets and toss with olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Step 3. Spread the broccoli on a baking sheet and roast for 10-12 minutes, or until tender.
Step 4. Meanwhile, toast the bread slices.
Step 5. Serve the roasted broccoli over the toasted bread, with a drizzle of maple syrup (if desired).

recipe.name: Spaghetti with Sweet Potato and Cucumber
main_ingredients: sweet potato (1 large, peeled and sliced)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 200°C (400°F). Toss sweet potato slices with a little oil and season with salt. Bake in the oven for 15-20 minutes until tender and golden brown. Step 2. Cook pasta according to package instructions. Step 3. In a pan, sauté cucumber slices with a little oil until tender. Step 4. Combine cooked pasta, roasted sweet potato, and sautéed cucumber. Step 5. Season with salt and serve.
recipe.note: Some ingredients were not available in your inventory: ground beef, tomato, lettuce. You can add these to your shopping list to make a more complete dish.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Squid and Spinach
main_ingredients: 1 lb squid, cleaned and cut into bite-sized pieces
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the sliced duck breast and cook for 2 minutes per side, or until browned. Remove from skillet and set aside.
Step 2. Add the remaining 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil to the skillet. Add the squid pieces and cook for 2-3 minutes per side, or until tender.
Step 3. Add the fresh spinach to the skillet and cook until wilted.
Step 4. Serve the squid and spinach hot, topped with the cooked duck breast if desired.
Step 5. Garnish with lemon wedges and serve immediately.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Potato and Pork Belly with Crab Fritters
main_ingredients: 1 large potato (2 cups, peeled and diced)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). Season the diced potato with salt, pepper, and a drizzle of olive oil. Roast in the oven for 20 minutes or until tender. Step 2. In a pan, sear the diced pork belly until crispy. Set aside. Step 3. In a separate pan, heat a tablespoon of oil and sauté the crab meat until lightly browned. Step 4. In a bowl, mix together the roasted potato, seared pork belly, and sautéed crab meat. Step 5. Shape the mixture into patties and pan-fry until crispy and golden brown.

recipe.name: Zucchini and Mushroom Quesadilla
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Slice the zucchini and mushrooms. Place them in a bowl and sprinkle with cumin and paprika.
Step 2. Heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a pan over medium heat. Add the zucchini and mushrooms mixture and sauté for 5 minutes.
Step 3. Meanwhile, butter one side of each bread slice. Place one slice, butter-side down, in the pan.
Step 4. Add the zucchini and mushrooms mixture to the bread slice. Place another slice of bread on top, butter-side up.
Step 5. Cook for 2-3 minutes or until the bread is golden brown. Flip and cook for another 2-3 minutes or until the other side is also golden brown.
Step 6. Serve hot and enjoy!

recipe.name: Lettuce and Rice Gyoza
recipe.steps: Step 1. In a large mixing bowl, combine chopped lettuce, cooked rice, and grated cabbage. Step 2. Add 1 tablespoon of soy sauce and 1 tablespoon of sesame oil to the bowl and mix well. Step 3. Lay out gyoza wrappers on a clean surface. Step 4. Place a tablespoon of the lettuce and rice mixture in the center of each wrapper. Step 5. Dip your finger in a small amount of water and run it along the edges of the wrapper. Step 6. Fold the wrapper into a triangle by bringing the two opposite corners together to form a point, pressing the edges together to seal the gyoza.

recipe.name: Gluten-Free Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1-2 tablespoons of vegetable oil in a pan over medium heat. Step 2. Add the sliced bell pepper and sauté for 3-4 minutes until slightly tender. Step 3. Add the chopped onion and sauté for another 3-4 minutes until the onion is translucent. Step 4. Add the sliced mushrooms and sauté for 5-6 minutes until they soften. Step 5. Crack the eggs into the pan and scramble them into the vegetable mixture. Step 6. Season with salt to taste.

recipe.name: Grilled Sardines with Sweet Potato and Celery
recipe.steps: Step 1: Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Season the sardines with salt and pepper. Grill the sardines for 2-3 minutes per side or until cooked through. Step 2: In a large bowl, toss the sweet potatoes and celery with a tablespoon of oil, salt, and pepper. Spread the vegetables on a baking sheet and roast in the oven at 400°F (200°C) for 20-25 minutes or until tender. Step 3: In a pan, heat a tablespoon of oil over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and cook for 1 minute. Step 4: Add the roasted sweet potatoes and celery to the pan with garlic. Toss to combine and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes. Step 5: Serve the grilled sardines on top of the sweet potato and celery mixture, drizzled with lime juice and milk.
recipe.note: This recipe uses the available ingredients. The missing ingredient, chicken breast, would have added protein to the dish, but it can be omitted or substituted with another protein source.

recipe.name: Vegan Quinoa Stuffed Bell Peppers
main_ingredients: 1 can kidney beans, drained and rinsed
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). Cut the tops off the bell peppers and remove seeds and membranes. Place in a baking dish.
Step 2. In a medium pot, bring 2 cups of water to a boil. Add the quinoa and reduce heat to low. Cover and cook for 15-20 minutes or until quinoa is tender and fluffy.
Step 3. In a large skillet, heat 1 tablespoon of oil over medium heat. Add the diced zucchini and eggplant. Cook, stirring occasionally, until tender, about 5-7 minutes.
Step 4. Add the crumbled tofu and cooked kidney beans to the skillet. Stir to combine.
Step 5. Fluff the cooked quinoa with a fork. Add the cooked vegetable mixture to the quinoa and stir to combine.
Step 6. Stuff each bell pepper with the quinoa mixture and cover with the tops. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until bell peppers are tender.

recipe.name: Cauliflower and Potato Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Chop the cauliflower, potato, and cucumber into small pieces. Step 2. Heat some oil in a pan over medium heat. Step 3. Add the chopped vegetables to the pan and sauté until tender. Step 4. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Step 5. Serve hot.
recipe.note: This recipe uses the available ingredients in your inventory. Unfortunately, rice is not available, so we made a dish without it.

recipe.name: American-Style Chicken and Veggie Stir-Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 2 tbsp of oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chicken breast and cook until browned, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat and set aside. Step 2. In the same skillet, add the sliced mushrooms and cook until they release their liquid and start to brown, about 3-4 minutes. Step 3. Add the sliced carrots and pepper to the skillet and cook for an additional 5 minutes, or until the vegetables start to soften. Step 4. Add the fresh spinach leaves to the skillet and cook until wilted, about 1-2 minutes. Step 5. Add the cooked chicken back into the skillet and stir to combine with the vegetables. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Vegetarian Tempura with Bok Choy Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Bring a pot of water to a boil and cook the pasta according to the package instructions. Drain and set aside.
Step 2. In a separate pot, prepare a tempura batter by mixing 1 tablespoon of cornstarch with 1/2 cup of water. Add the batter to a bowl with the almonds, stir to coat, and set aside.
Step 3. In a skillet, heat a couple of tablespoons of vegetable oil over medium heat. Add the bok choy and cook until tender, about 3-4 minutes. Set aside.
Step 4. In the same skillet, add more oil if necessary and fry the almond-coated almonds in batches until crispy. Drain on paper towels.
Step 5. In a large skillet, combine the cooked pasta, green beans, and black beans. Stir in a couple of tablespoons of soy sauce and serve with the baked bok choy and crispy almonds.

recipe.name: Pad Thai
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cook the rice noodles according to package instructions. Drain and set aside. Step 2. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the minced garlic and stir-fry until fragrant. Step 3. Add the sliced mushrooms and cook until they release their liquid and start to brown. Step 4. Add the cooked noodles to the wok, followed by the fish sauce, lime juice, and sugar. Stir-fry everything together for about 2-3 minutes, until the noodles are well coated with the sauce. Step 5. Taste and adjust the seasoning as needed. Serve immediately.

recipe.name: Cantonese-Style Stir-Fried Broccoli
recipe.steps: Step 1. In a large skillet or wok, heat coconut oil over medium-high heat. Add minced garlic and stir-fry for 1-2 minutes until fragrant. Step 2. Add broccoli florets and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes until they start to tenderize. Step 3. Add a pinch of salt and a few grinds of black pepper to taste. Step 4. Continue stir-frying for another 2-3 minutes until broccoli reaches desired tenderness. Step 5. Serve immediately, garnished with green onions if desired.
recipe.note: This recipe is a paleo twist on traditional Chinese stir-fries, using coconut oil instead of vegetable oil.

recipe.name: Kimchi Stir-Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cut the pasta into smaller pieces and set aside. Cut the broccoli and spinach into florets. Step 2. Heat 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil in a pan over medium heat. Add the pasta and cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Step 3. Add the broccoli and spinach to the pan and cook for another 3-4 minutes, stirring frequently. Step 4. Stir in the remaining 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil and 2 tablespoons of butter. Step 5. Cook for an additional 2 minutes, until the vegetables are tender and the pasta is well coated with the sauce.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Sweet Potato and Zucchini with Herb Crust
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). Step 2. In a large bowl, toss the sweet potato and zucchini slices with olive oil, salt, and pepper until they're evenly coated. Step 3. In a separate bowl, mix together the chopped parsley and thyme. Step 4. Add the herb mixture to the sweet potato and zucchini mixture and toss to coat. Step 5. Spread the mixture out on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper and bake for 20-25 minutes or until the sweet potatoes are tender.

recipe.name: Vegan Quinoa and Tempeh Bowl
main_ingredients: tempeh (1 block, cut into small pieces)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Roast the eggplant and bell pepper slices for 20-25 minutes or until tender.
Step 2. In a large pan, heat some oil over medium-high heat. Add the tempeh pieces and cook until golden brown, about 5-7 minutes.
Step 3. Add the chopped bok choy, sliced tomato, and cooked tempeh to the pan. Stir-fry for 2-3 minutes.
Step 4. Cook the quinoa according to package instructions.
Step 5. To assemble the bowls, place a scoop of quinoa at the bottom, followed by the tempeh and vegetable mixture, and finally garnish with sliced almonds.

recipe.name: Flour and Bell Pepper Fritters
recipe.steps: Step 1. In a large bowl, whisk together flour, salt, and pepper. Step 2. Add diced onion, shredded chicken, and grated bell pepper to the bowl. Step 3. Mix well until all ingredients are combined. Step 4. Gradually add water to the mixture and mix until a dough forms. Step 5. Heat oil in a frying pan and shape dough into small patties. Fry the fritters until golden brown. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Quinoa and Bok Choy Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Chop the bok choy into small pieces and set aside. Step 2. Rinse the quinoa in a fine mesh strainer and drain well. Step 3. In a medium saucepan, heat the olive oil over medium-high heat. Step 4. Add the quinoa and cook for 2-3 minutes, stirring constantly. Step 5. Add 2 cups of water to the saucepan and bring to a boil. Step 6. Reduce the heat to low, cover, and simmer for 15-20 minutes or until the quinoa is tender and the water has been absorbed.
recipe.note: This recipe requires the following ingredients that are not available in your inventory: olive oil, eggs, milk. A shopping list has been generated to help you obtain these ingredients.

recipe.name: Cod and Cauliflower Pescatarian
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat oven to 200°C (400°F). In a large bowl, toss cauliflower florets with 1 tbsp olive oil, salt, and pepper. Spread on a baking sheet and roast for 20-25 minutes until tender and golden brown. 
Step 2. Meanwhile, season cod fillet with salt, pepper, and parsley. Drizzle 1 tbsp olive oil on a baking sheet and place the cod fillet. 
Step 3. Bake the cod fillet in the oven for 12-15 minutes until cooked through. 
Step 4. In a pan, sauté minced garlic for 1 minute until fragrant. 
Step 5. Serve the roasted cauliflower with baked cod fillet and garlic sauce.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Cod with Garlic and Herbs
recipe.steps: Step 1. Rinse the cod fillets under cold water, pat dry with paper towels, and season with salt and pepper. Set aside. Step 2. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Step 3. Add the garlic and sauté for 1 minute until fragrant. Step 4. Add the cod fillets, skin side up (if they have skin), and sear for 2-3 minutes until golden brown. Step 5. Flip the cod over and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes until cooked through. Step 6. Remove the cod from the skillet and place on a plate. Step 7. Sprinkle the parsley and basil over the top and serve with lemon wedges on the side.

recipe.name: Classic American Onion Sandwich
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tbsp of vegetable oil in a pan over medium heat. Add the sliced onion and cook for 3-4 minutes until softened and golden brown. Step 2. Meanwhile, toast the bread slices by placing them in the pan for a minute on each side. Step 3. Remove the toasted bread from the pan and spread 1 tbsp of ranch dressing on each slice. Step 4. Add the cooked onion on top of the ranch dressing. Step 5. Assemble the sandwich by placing the two slices together, and serve immediately.

recipe.name: Kimchi-Style Korean Radish Banchan
recipe.steps:
Step 1. In a large bowl, combine korean radish, lime juice, and a pinch of salt. Mix well and let it sit for 5 minutes.
Step 2. Add green onion and chicken breast to the bowl and mix well.
Step 3. Heat a small amount of oil in a pan over medium heat.
Step 4. Add the korean radish mixture to the pan and cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Step 5. Garnish with sesame seeds and serve.

recipe.name: Tomato and Onion Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the chopped onion and sauté until softened, about 3-4 minutes.
Step 2. Add the sliced celery and continue to sauté for another 2-3 minutes, until they start to soften.
Step 3. Add the sliced tomatoes and stir to combine with the onion and celery mixture.
Step 4. Reduce heat to low and continue to simmer for 5-7 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the tomatoes have released their juices and the mixture has thickened slightly.
Step 5. Season with salt and pepper to taste, and serve hot.

recipe.name: Lemon Broccoli Pasta
recipe.steps: Step 1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil and cook the pasta according to the package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside. Step 2. In a pan, heat 1-2 tablespoons of water over medium heat. Add the sliced onion and cook for 3-4 minutes until translucent. Step 3. Add the broccoli florets to the pan with the onion and cook for an additional 4-5 minutes, stirring occasionally, until tender but still crisp. Step 4. Squeeze the juice of the two lemons over the broccoli mixture and stir to combine. Step 5. Add the cooked pasta to the pan with the broccoli mixture and toss to combine, ensuring everything is well coated with the lemon juice. Serve immediately.

recipe.name: Italian Kale and Ground Pork Ragu
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chopped onion and cook until translucent, about 5 minutes. Step 2. Add the minced garlic and cook for an additional 1-2 minutes, until fragrant. Step 3. Add the ground pork and cook, breaking it up with a spoon, until browned, about 5-7 minutes. Step 4. Add the tomato paste, beef broth, salt, and pepper. Stir to combine. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer, uncovered, for 20-25 minutes. Step 5. Stir in the chopped kale and cook until wilted. Serve hot, garnished with grated Parmesan cheese.

recipe.name: Korean-Style Garlic Beef and Radish Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a large pan over medium-high heat. Add the minced garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
 Step 2. Add the ground beef to the pan, breaking it up with a spoon as it cooks. Cook until the beef is browned, about 3-4 minutes.
 Step 3. Add the diced Korean radish to the pan and cook for 2-3 minutes, until it begins to soften.
 Step 4. Add the gochujang to the pan and stir to combine with the beef and radish mixture. Cook for an additional 1-2 minutes.
 Step 5. Serve the beef and radish mixture over a bed of cooked rice.

recipe.name: Grilled Shiso Chicken
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Season the chicken breast with salt and grill for 4-5 minutes per side, or until cooked through. Step 2. Meanwhile, mix sake and shiso leaves in a small bowl. Step 3. Let the chicken rest for a few minutes before slicing into thin strips. Step 4. Serve the chicken with cooked rice and garnish with sesame seeds. Step 5. Drizzle the shiso sake sauce over the chicken.

recipe.name: Roasted Chickpea and Broccoli Medley
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Rinse the chickpeas and pat dry with paper towels. Spread the chickpeas on a baking sheet and roast for 20 minutes. Step 2. In a small bowl, mix 2 tablespoons of olive oil, 1 minced garlic clove, and a pinch of salt and pepper. Step 3. After 10 minutes of roasting the chickpeas, add the broccoli florets to the baking sheet and drizzle with the garlic-oil mixture. Step 4. Continue roasting for another 15 minutes, or until the broccoli is tender. Step 5. Meanwhile, toast the almonds in a dry skillet over medium heat for 5-7 minutes, stirring frequently. Step 6. To serve, combine the roasted chickpeas and broccoli with toasted almonds and a sprinkle of sugar.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Duck Breast with Roasted Sweet Potatoes
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Pierce the sweet potatoes with a fork a few times and place them on a baking sheet. Roast in the oven for 20-25 minutes, or until tender when pierced with a fork.
Step 2. Season the duck breast with salt and pepper. Heat a skillet over medium-high heat and sear the duck breast for 2-3 minutes per side, or until cooked to desired doneness.
Step 3. Let the duck breast rest for 5 minutes before slicing.
Step 4. Slice the roasted sweet potatoes into wedges.
Step 5. Serve the sliced duck breast with roasted sweet potatoes.
recipe.note: This recipe uses the available ingredients. Missing ingredients are rice, eggs, and mushroom.

recipe.name: Roasted Vegetable Bruschetta
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Cut the bok choy and asparagus into bite-sized pieces and spread on a baking sheet. Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Roast in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until tender.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Chicken Thigh with Kidney Bean Salsa
main_ingredients: 1 cup kidney beans, drained and rinsed
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). Season the chicken thighs with salt, pepper, and your favorite herbs. Heat the olive oil in an oven-safe skillet over medium-high heat. Sear the chicken thighs for 2-3 minutes on each side until browned. Transfer the skillet to the preheated oven and bake for 15-20 minutes or until cooked through.

Step 2. While the chicken is cooking, prepare the kidney bean salsa. In a large bowl, combine the kidney beans, chopped broccoli, grated carrot, and a squeeze of lime juice. Mix well to combine.

Step 3. To serve, place a cooked chicken thigh on each plate and top with a spoonful of the kidney bean salsa.

Step 4. Garnish with chopped fresh cilantro, if desired.

Step 5. Serve immediately and enjoy!

Note: This recipe highlights the use of kidney beans and chicken thigh, perfect for a pescatarian meal.

recipe.name: Mushroom and Spinach Pilaf
recipe.steps: Step 1. Rinse the rice and soak it in water for 10 minutes. Drain the water and set the rice aside. Step 2. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a large pan over medium heat. Add the sliced mushrooms and cook until they release their moisture and start browning (5 minutes). Step 3. Add the minced garlic to the pan and sauté for another minute until fragrant. Step 4. Add the chopped spinach to the pan and cook until wilted (2 minutes). Step 5. In a separate pot, bring 2 cups of water to a boil and add the soaked rice. Reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for 15-17 minutes until the rice is cooked. Step 6. Fluff the cooked rice with a fork and mix in the cooked mushroom and spinach mixture. Serve hot with a squeeze of lemon juice.

recipe.name: Roasted Vegetable Quinoa Bowl
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C). In a large bowl, toss broccoli, zucchinis, and cucumber with 2 tablespoons of olive oil and a pinch of salt. Spread the vegetables on a baking sheet and roast for 20 minutes, or until tender. Step 2. Rinse the quinoa in a fine-mesh strainer and cook according to package instructions. Step 3. In a separate pan, heat a drizzle of olive oil over medium heat. Step 4. Add sliced almonds to the pan and toast until lightly browned, stirring frequently, about 5 minutes. Step 5. To assemble the bowls, divide cooked quinoa among four bowls, then top with roasted vegetables, toasted almonds, and a sprinkle of salt.
recipe.note: This recipe should satisfy your vegetarian dietary preference.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Chicken Breast with Spinach
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 2 tbsp olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the sliced pepper and sauté for 3-4 minutes until tender. Remove from the skillet and set aside. Step 2. Add the chicken breast to the skillet and cook for 5-6 minutes per side, or until cooked through. Step 3. In the same skillet, add the sliced mushrooms and cook for 3-4 minutes until tender. Step 4. Add the chopped spinach to the skillet and cook until wilted. Step 5. Slice the cooked chicken breast and serve with the sautéed pepper, mushrooms, and spinach.

recipe.name: Italian-Style Grilled Eggplant
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat the grill to medium heat. Slice the eggplant into 1/2-inch thick rounds. Season with salt and pepper.
Step 2. Grill the eggplant slices for 3-4 minutes per side, or until tender and slightly charred.
Step 3. Meanwhile, cook the chopped bacon in a pan over medium heat until crispy. Set aside.
Step 4. Brush the sliced potato with olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Grill for 5-7 minutes per side, or until tender.
Step 5. In a large bowl, combine the chopped kale, cooked bacon, and grilled potato. Squeeze with lemon juice and season with salt and pepper. Serve with the grilled eggplant slices.

recipe.name: Thai Vegetable Curry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat the oil in a pan over medium heat. Add the sliced carrots and cook until they are slightly tender, about 5 minutes. Step 2. Add the Thai curry paste to the pan and cook for 1-2 minutes, stirring constantly, until fragrant. Step 3. Add 1 cup of water to the pan and bring to a simmer. Step 4. Reduce the heat to low and let it cook for 10-15 minutes or until the carrots are tender. Step 5. Season with fish sauce to taste. Serve with steamed rice.

recipe.name: Vietnamese Cauliflower Stir Fry
main_ingredients: sweet potato (1 medium, peeled and grated)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Cook the quinoa according to the package instructions. Set aside.
       Step 2. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a large pan over medium-high heat. Add the cauliflower and cook for 3-4 minutes or until tender.
       Step 3. Add the sweet potato to the pan and cook for an additional 4 minutes or until slightly tender.
       Step 4. Stir in the peanuts, asparagus, and edamame. Cook for 2-3 minutes or until the vegetables are tender-crisp.
       Step 5. Combine the cooked quinoa and stir-fry mixture in a large bowl. Toss to combine and serve hot.

recipe.name: Stir-Fried Tempeh and Vegetables
recipe.steps:
Step 1: Heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat.
Step 2: Add the tempeh and cook until golden brown, about 3-4 minutes per side.
Step 3: Add the chopped kale and cook until wilted.
Step 4: Add the sliced carrot and cauliflower and cook until tender.
Step 5: Season with salt to taste.

recipe.name: Stir-Fried Asparagus and Sweet Potato
recipe.steps: Step 1. Peel the sweet potato and slice it into 1-inch cubes. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a wok or large skillet over high heat. Step 2. Add the sweet potato and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes, until slightly tender. Step 3. Add the asparagus and stir-fry for an additional 4-5 minutes, until the sweet potato is tender and the asparagus is slightly browned. Step 4. Transfer the stir-fry to a serving dish and sprinkle with peanuts. Step 5. Serve immediately, garnished with sesame seeds if desired.

recipe.name: Roasted Broccoli and Mushroom
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). 
                Step 2. Cut the broccoli into florets and the mushroom into slices. 
                Step 3. Toss the broccoli and mushroom with vegetable oil in a large bowl. 
                Step 4. Sprinkle flour over the mixture and toss to coat. 
                Step 5. Spread the mixture on a baking sheet and roast for 15-20 minutes or until tender. 
                Step 6. Serve hot with a side of sautéed lettuce and celery.

recipe.name: Indian-Style Tomato and Pepper Curry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat oil in a pan over medium heat. Add the grated ginger and sauté for 2 minutes until fragrant.
Step 2. Add the chopped onion and sauté until translucent. Add the diced pepper and cook until tender.
Step 3. Add the diced tomato and cook until they start breaking down.
Step 4. Add a pinch of salt and cardamom powder, and mix well.
Step 5. Serve the curry hot, garnished with lemon juice.

recipe.name: Thai Cod Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Chop the garlic and pound it into a paste using a mortar and pestle. Set aside. Step 2. Cut the cod into bite-sized pieces and season with salt. Set aside. Step 3. In a hot pan, add a small amount of oil and sauté the cod until it's golden brown. Remove from heat and set aside. Step 4. In the same pan, add more oil and stir-fry the garlic paste until fragrant. Step 5. Return the cod to the pan and stir-fry everything together until well combined. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Roasted Vegetable Shawarma
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C). Toss the potato, bell pepper, and tomato with 2 tablespoons of vegetable oil, salt, and pepper.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Sardines with Lettuce Salad
recipe.steps: Step 1. Rinse the lettuce and cabbage, pat dry with paper towels. In a large bowl, combine chopped lettuce, shredded cabbage, and grated carrot. Step 2. Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat. Add the chopped sardines and cook for 3-4 minutes on each side, until flaky and golden brown. Step 3. Serve the sardines on top of the lettuce salad. Step 4. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Step 5. Serve immediately and enjoy!

recipe.name: Coconut Galangal Curry
recipe.steps: Step 1. In a pan, sauté galangal, garlic, and lemongrass in a little oil until fragrant. Step 2. Add mixed mushrooms and cook until they release their moisture and start browning. Step 3. Pour in coconut milk and bring the mixture to a boil. Step 4. Reduce heat and let simmer for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally. Step 5. Season with salt to taste. Step 6. Serve hot, garnished with chopped cilantro or scallions if desired.
recipe.note: This recipe is a classic Thai dish that showcases the flavors of galangal and lemongrass. Enjoy!

recipe.name: Greek Potato Cakes
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C). Step 2. In a large bowl, combine the grated potato, cucumber, garlic, and oregano. Step 3. Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat and add a small amount of vegetable oil. Step 4. Using a spatula, scoop the potato mixture and shape into patties. Step 5. Cook the patties for 3-4 minutes on each side, until golden brown. Step 6. Transfer the patties to the preheated oven and bake for an additional 10-12 minutes, until crispy.

recipe.name: Stir-Fried Sardines and Chicken with Kale
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 2 tbsp of oil in a wok or large skillet over high heat. Add the chicken breast and cook until browned, about 3-4 minutes. Remove from the wok and set aside.
Step 2. Add more oil if needed, then add the sardines and cook until they start to flake apart, about 2-3 minutes.
Step 3. Add the chopped celery and bell pepper to the wok and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes, or until they start to soften.
Step 4. Add the kale to the wok and stir-fry for another 2-3 minutes, or until the kale has wilted.
Step 5. Add the cooked chicken back into the wok and stir-fry everything together for a final 1-2 minutes, seasoning with your favorite stir-fry sauce.
Step 6. Garnish with scallops and serve immediately.

recipe.name: Japanese Potato and Prosciutto Hash
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat sesame oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add diced prosciutto and cook until crispy. 
               Step 2. Add diced potatoes to the skillet and cook for 10-12 minutes or until they start to brown.
               Step 3. Stir in chopped pine nuts and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes.
               Step 4. Use a spatula to break up the potatoes and create a hash-like consistency.
               Step 5. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Vegetarian Cauliflower Fritters
recipe.steps:
Step 1. In a food processor, pulse the cauliflower florets until they resemble rice. Set aside.
Step 2. In a bowl, combine the grated zucchini, shredded cheddar, and a pinch of salt. Mix well.
Step 3. Add the cauliflower rice to the bowl and mix until well combined.
Step 4. Using your hands, shape the mixture into patties. Place on a plate.
Step 5. Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat and cook the fritters for 4-5 minutes on each side, until golden brown.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Cod with Garlic Shrimp and Tomato Scallops
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat oil in a pan over medium heat. Add garlic and sauté for 1 minute.
               Step 2. Add diced tomatoes and cook for 3-4 minutes or until they start to release their juices.
               Step 3. Season the cod fillets with salt and pepper. Add the cod to the pan and cook for 4-5 minutes per side or until it's cooked through.
               Step 4. Add scallops to the pan and cook for 2-3 minutes per side, until they're golden brown.
               Step 5. Serve the cod and scallops together with the garlic and tomato sauce.

recipe.name: Lime and Broccoli Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a pan over medium heat.
Step 2. Add broccoli to the pan and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes.
Step 3. Squeeze lime juice over the broccoli and stir-fry for another 2 minutes.
Step 4. Serve the broccoli mixture over cooked rice.
Step 5. Garnish with a slice of lime.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Anchovy and Potato Hash
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 2 tablespoons of vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the diced onion and cook until translucent, about 3-4 minutes. Step 2. Add the diced potato to the skillet and cook for 5-6 minutes, stirring occasionally, until they start to brown. Step 3. Add the chopped green onions and diced anchovy to the skillet and stir to combine. Step 4. Continue cooking for another 2-3 minutes, stirring frequently, until the potatoes are golden brown and the onions are tender. Step 5. Season with salt and pepper to taste, and serve hot.

recipe.name: Vietnamese Galangal Soup (Canh Ga Loi)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. In a large pot, heat 2 tablespoons of butter over medium heat. Add galangal and sauté until fragrant, about 5 minutes.
Step 2. Add sliced onion and sauté until softened, about 5 minutes.
Step 3. Add sliced carrot and continue sautéing for another 5 minutes.
Step 4. Pour in 4 cups of water and bring the mixture to a boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 20 minutes.
Step 5. Stir in chopped basil and season with salt to taste. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Japanese-Style Beef and Broccoli Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tbsp of butter in a pan and cook the ground beef until browned. Step 2. Add the sliced celery and cook until tender. Step 3. Add the broccoli and cook until it starts to soften. Step 4. Add the mirin and dashi, and stir to combine. Step 5. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Step 6. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Spiced Lentil Curry
main_ingredients: 1/2 pound pork, cut into bite-sized pieces
recipe.steps: Step 1. Rinse the lentils and pick out any debris. Drain and set aside. Step 2. Heat 1 tablespoon of ghee in a large pan over medium heat. Add the pork pieces and cook until browned, about 5 minutes. Step 3. Add the curry powder and cook for 1 minute, stirring constantly. Step 4. Add the lentils and 2 cups of water to the pan. Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for 20 minutes. Step 5. Stir in the remaining 1 tablespoon of ghee and season with salt to taste.

recipe.name: Grilled Pork and Pepper Fajitas
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the sliced onion and cook until it's translucent, about 3 minutes.
Step 2. Add the sliced bell peppers and cook for another 3 minutes.
Step 3. Add the sliced pork and cook until it is browned, about 5 minutes.
Step 4. Add the sliced chipotle peppers and cook for another minute.
Step 5. Season with salt and pepper to taste, then serve with crispy tortillas, warm flour tortillas, or rice.

recipe.name: Vegetarian Corn and Edamame Salad
recipe.steps: Step 1. In a large bowl, combine kidney beans, edamame, corn, and cashews. Step 2. In a small bowl, whisk together lime juice and olive oil. Step 3. Pour the dressing over the vegetables and toss to combine. Step 4. Add chopped lettuce to the bowl and toss gently. Step 5. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Step 6. Serve immediately.

recipe.name: Spicy Celery and Potato Stew
recipe.steps: Step 1. Peel and dice the potatoes, celery, and tomato. Chop the bird's eye chili for added heat. Step 2. In a large pot, heat a couple of tablespoons of oil over medium heat. Add the diced onion and cook until translucent, about 3-4 minutes. Step 3. Add the chopped potatoes, celery, and tomato to the pot. Season with salt, pepper, and a pinch of sugar. Step 4. Cook the mixture for about 10 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the potatoes start to brown. Step 5. Add the chopped bird's eye chili to the pot and stir well to combine. Step 6. Pour in about 2 cups of water and bring the mixture to a boil. Reduce the heat to low and let simmer for 20-25 minutes, or until the potatoes are tender.

recipe.name: Crispy Lettuce and Mushroom Wrap
recipe.steps:
Step 1. In a pan, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the sliced mushroom and sauté for 3-4 minutes until tender.
Step 2. In a separate pan, heat a small amount of oil over medium heat. Add the peanuts and toast for 2-3 minutes until fragrant.
Step 3. In a bowl, mix together the flour and a pinch of salt. Gradually add water to form a dough, kneading for 2-3 minutes until smooth.
Step 4. Divide the dough into 2-3 equal portions and roll out each portion into a thin circle.
Step 5. Place a spoonful of sautéed mushroom onto one half of each dough circle, followed by a handful of lettuce leaves. Fold the dough in half to enclose the filling and press the edges together to seal.

recipe.name: Lime Garlic Pita Bread
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). Step 2. In a small bowl, mix minced garlic and diced onion. Step 3. Brush pita bread slices with garlic and onion mixture. Step 4. Top pita bread slices with sliced olives. Step 5. Drizzle lime juice over the top and serve.

recipe.name: Lentil and Brussels Sprouts Stew
recipe.steps:
Step 1. In a large pot, heat 2 tbsp of oil over medium heat. Add the sliced mushrooms and cook until they're tender and lightly browned, about 5 minutes.
Step 2. Add the halved Brussels sprouts to the pot and cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Step 3. Add the lentils, vegetable broth, and chopped almonds to the pot. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Step 4. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer, covered, for 20-25 minutes or until the lentils are tender.
Step 5. Serve the stew hot, garnished with additional chopped almonds if desired.

recipe.name: Korean-Style Grilled Salmon with Stir-Fried Vegetables
main_ingredients: veggie stir-fry mix (1 large sweet potato, peeled and sliced, 2 medium green beans, 1 medium zucchini)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Season salmon with salt and pepper. Step 2. Grill the salmon for 4-5 minutes per side, or until cooked through. Step 3. While the salmon cooks, heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add sliced sweet potato and cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Step 4. Add sliced green beans and zucchini to the skillet and cook for an additional 3-4 minutes, stirring frequently. Step 5. Serve the grilled salmon with the stir-fried vegetables and garnish with sesame seeds and chopped scallions if desired.

recipe.name: Lemongrass and Celery Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Cut the celery and lemongrass into 2-inch pieces. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the celery and lemongrass and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes or until they start to soften.
Step 2. Add the diced potato to the wok and stir-fry for another 4-5 minutes, or until the potato starts to brown.
Step 3. Add 2 tablespoons of soy sauce and 1 tablespoon of lime juice to the wok. Stir-fry for 1-2 minutes, or until well combined.
Step 4. Season with salt to taste. Remove from heat and serve hot.
Step 5. Garnish with chopped cilantro or scallions, if desired.

recipe.name: Pasta Carbonara
recipe.steps: Step 1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil and cook the pasta according to the package instructions until al dente. Reserve 1 cup of pasta water before draining. Step 2. In a large skillet, cook the pancetta over medium heat until crispy. Step 3. In a medium bowl, whisk together the ricotta and a pinch of salt. Step 4. In the skillet with the pancetta, add the reserved pasta water and stir to combine. Step 5. Add the cooked pasta to the skillet, tossing to combine with the pancetta and pasta water. Step 6. Add the ricotta mixture to the pasta and toss to combine, adding more pasta water if needed to achieve a creamy sauce. Step 7. Finally, stir in the chopped basil and spinach. Serve immediately.

recipe.name: Vegetarian Fajita Pasta
recipe.steps: Step 1: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil and cook the pasta according to package instructions. Reserve 1 cup of pasta water and then drain the pasta. Step 2: In a large skillet, heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil over medium-high heat. Add the tempeh and cook for 3-4 minutes on each side or until browned. Remove the tempeh from the skillet and set aside. Step 3: In the same skillet, add another tablespoon of olive oil and sauté the mushroom and asparagus for 4-5 minutes or until tender. Step 4: Add the bok choy to the skillet and cook for an additional 2 minutes. Step 5: Add the cooked pasta to the skillet and toss everything together, adding some reserved pasta water if the mixture seems dry.

recipe.name: Crab and Vegetable Biryani
main_ingredients: 1/2 cup crab (diced, note: this is a vegan substitute using mock crab)
2 tbsp vegan butter (such as earth balance)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of vegan butter in a pan over medium heat. Add onions and sauté until they are translucent. Step 2. Add diced zucchini and mock crab to the pan and sauté for 2-3 minutes. Step 3. In a separate pan, heat the remaining 1 tablespoon of vegan butter. Add 2 tablespoons of nutritional yeast and sauté for 1 minute, stirring constantly. Step 4. Combine the sautéed onion and vegetable mixture with the nutritional yeast mixture. Step 5. Serve hot, garnished with chopped cilantro if desired.
recipe.note: For the mock crab substitute, you can use a store-bought vegan crab or create your own by marinating and baking tofu to mimic the texture of crab.

recipe.name: Vegetable Biryani
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tbsp of butter in a pan over medium heat. Add chopped onion and sauté until golden brown.
Step 2. Add chopped spinach to the pan and cook until wilted.
Step 3. In a separate pot, boil water and cook basmati rice until al dente.
Step 4. In a large mixing bowl, combine cooked rice, sautéed onion and spinach mixture.
Step 5. Fluff the mixture with a fork and add lemon juice. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Indian Lentil Stew
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Chop the celery, bell pepper, and tomato into bite-sized pieces.
Step 2. In a large pot, heat some oil over medium heat and sauté the chopped vegetables until they're tender.
Step 3. Add the lentils, cashews, and a pinch of salt to the pot and stir to combine.
Step 4. Pour in enough water to cover the ingredients and bring to a boil.
Step 5. Reduce the heat to low and simmer for 20-25 minutes, or until the lentils are tender.
recipe.note: This recipe can be made with the addition of lime juice and garlic for extra flavor.

recipe.name: Seafood Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil in a pan over medium-high heat. Add the squid and crab, cook for 2-3 minutes on each side, until golden brown.
Step 2. Remove the squid and crab from the pan, and set aside. Add the remaining 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil to the pan.
Step 3. Add the brussels sprouts to the pan and cook for 3-4 minutes, until they start to brown.
Step 4. Add the lettuce to the pan and cook for another 2-3 minutes, until wilted.
Step 5. Return the squid and crab to the pan, and stir to combine with the vegetables. Cook for an additional 1-2 minutes.
Step 6. Serve hot and enjoy!
recipe.note: This recipe uses the available ingredients in your inventory. Unfortunately, spinach and broccoli are missing, so you'll need to add them to your shopping list.

recipe.name: Squid and Chickpea Stuffed Bell Peppers
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 200°C. Cut the tops off the bell peppers and remove seeds. Step 2. In a pan, sauté the mushroom and carrot until tender. Step 3. Add the cooked chickpeas, squid, and a pinch of salt and pepper to the pan and stir well. Step 4. Stuff each bell pepper with the squid and chickpea mixture and place in a baking dish. Step 5. Bake for 20-25 minutes or until the bell peppers are tender.

recipe.name: Classic American Mushroom Spinach Quiche
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). In a bowl, whisk together flour, salt, and sugar. Add in maple syrup and mix until well combined.
Step 2. In a skillet, sauté the mushrooms until they're tender and lightly browned. Set aside.
Step 3. In the same skillet, add the spinach and cook until wilted. Set aside with the mushrooms.
Step 4. In a separate bowl, whisk together the lime juice and eggs. Mix well.
Step 5. In a greased 9-inch pie dish, arrange the cooked mushroom and spinach mixture. Pour in the lime-egg mixture and smooth over the top.
Step 6. Roll out the dough and place it over the pie dish. Crimp the edges to seal.
Step 7. Bake the quiche for 35 minutes or until the crust is golden brown.

recipe.name: Grilled Eggplant and Spinach Shawarma
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Grill eggplant slices for 5-6 minutes per side or until tender. Set aside.
               Step 2. In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add chopped spinach and cook until wilted.
               Step 3. In a large serving dish, layer cooked eggplant, wilted spinach, sliced tomato, and sliced olives.
               Step 4. Warm pita bread by wrapping it in foil and heating in oven at 350°F (180°C) for 5-7 minutes.
               Step 5. Assemble shawarma by placing a portion of the eggplant and spinach mixture onto the warmed pita bread and top with sliced cucumber.

recipe.name: Spicy Ginger Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat oil in a pan over medium heat. Step 2. Add mustard seeds and let them sizzle. Step 3. Add grated ginger and minced garlic, sauté until fragrant. Step 4. Add spinach and lettuce, cook until wilted. Step 5. Season with salt and serve.

recipe.name: Vegetarian Tofu Panini
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat a panini press to medium heat. Step 2. Slice the bread into 2 equal pieces and toast until lightly browned. Step 3. Mix the ricotta with edamame in a bowl until well combined. Step 4. Pan-fry the tofu in a pan with a small amount of oil until crispy and golden brown. Step 5. Assemble the panini by spreading the ricotta-edamame mixture on one slice of bread, followed by the tofu and topped with the other slice of bread.

recipe.name: Italian-Style Stuffed Peppers
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C). Cut off the tops of the peppers and remove seeds. Step 2. In a large skillet, cook the pancetta over medium heat until crispy. Step 3. Add the ground beef to the skillet and cook until browned, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks. Step 4. Stir in the sun-dried tomatoes and cook for 1-2 minutes. Step 5. Add the cooked beef mixture to the peppers and top with a sprinkle of flour. Step 6. Drizzle olive oil over the peppers and bake for 25-30 minutes, or until the peppers are tender.

recipe.name: Crab and Chickpea Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tbsp vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the sliced bell peppers and cook for 3-4 minutes, until tender.
Step 2. Add the chickpeas to the skillet and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, until lightly browned.
Step 3. Add the crab to the skillet and stir in the nutritional yeast. Cook for 1-2 minutes, until the crab is lightly coated.
Step 4. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Step 5. Serve hot, garnished with additional nutritional yeast if desired.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Potato and Spinach Delight
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of butter in a large pan over medium heat. Step 2. Add the sliced onions and sauté until caramelized, about 10 minutes. Step 3. Add the sliced potatoes and cook for an additional 5 minutes, until they begin to soften. Step 4. Add the halved Brussels sprouts and sliced carrots to the pan. Cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Step 5. Add the fresh spinach to the pan and cook until wilted. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

recipe.name: Roasted Carrot with Chili Powder
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C). Cut the carrot into 1-inch wedges. Step 2. In a small bowl, mix together olive oil, chili powder, and salt. Step 3. Add the diced jalapeño to the bowl and stir. Step 4. In a baking sheet, toss the carrot wedges with the chili oil mixture until they're evenly coated. Step 5. Roast in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes or until the carrots are tender and slightly charred.
recipe.note: Authentic Mexican dishes often incorporate fresh chilies and spices for flavor. This recipe captures the essence of Mexican cuisine with the use of chili powder and jalapeño.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Sardines with Asparagus
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat. Step 2. Add 1 tablespoon of peanuts to the pan and toast until fragrant. Step 3. Add 1 minced garlic clove and cook for 1 minute. Step 4. Add the sardines and cook for 2-3 minutes per side. Step 5. Serve with sautéed asparagus and bell pepper.

recipe.name: Duck Breast and Eggplant Casserole
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C). Step 2. Slice the eggplants into 1/4-inch thick rounds. Step 3. Cook the sliced eggplants in a pan with a little oil until they're golden brown and crispy. Step 4. In a large skillet, cook the ground beef over medium-high heat, breaking it up with a spoon as it cooks. Step 5. Once the ground beef is browned, add the sliced onion and cook until it's translucent. Step 6. In a large baking dish, create a layer of eggplant slices, followed by a layer of cooked ground beef and onion mixture, and finally a layer of sliced duck breast. Step 7. Repeat the layers two more times, ending with a layer of eggplant on top. Step 8. Cover the dish with aluminum foil and bake for 30 minutes. Step 9. Remove the foil and continue baking for an additional 15-20 minutes, or until the duck breast is cooked to your liking.
recipe.note: This recipe is a hearty and flavorful casserole that showcases the rich flavors of duck breast and eggplant.

recipe.name: Stuffed Broccoli with Vegan Salsa
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). Cut the broccoli into florets and set aside. Step 2. Cook pasta according to package instructions, then set aside. Step 3. In a blender, combine 1 cup of water, 1 tablespoon of lemon juice, and chopped lettuce. Blend until smooth. Step 4. In a large skillet, heat 1 tablespoon of oil over medium heat. Add garlic and sauté for 1 minute. Step 5. To assemble the dish, place cooked pasta at the bottom of a baking dish, followed by broccoli florets, and finally the vegan salsa.
recipe.note: Since you requested a vegan recipe, I've excluded ground pork and garlic from the recipe. Instead, I've created a vegan-friendly dish using broccoli, pasta, and lettuce.

recipe.name: Gluten-Free Pasta with Celery and Potato
recipe.steps: Step 1. Peel and chop the potatoes into bite-sized pieces. Step 2. In a large pan, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the chopped garlic and sauté for 1 minute. Step 3. Add the chopped celery to the pan and cook for another 2 minutes, until it starts to soften. Step 4. Add the chopped potatoes to the pan and cook for about 10-12 minutes, or until they're tender. Step 5. Cook the gluten-free pasta according to the package instructions. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

recipe.name: Spicy Grilled Salmon with Bok Choy Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Season salmon fillet with salt and pepper. Grill for 4-5 minutes per side, or until cooked through. Set aside.

Step 2. In a large skillet or wok, heat 2 tablespoons of coconut oil over medium-high heat. Add garlic and ginger and stir-fry for 1 minute, until fragrant.

Step 3. Add bok choy to the skillet and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes, until wilted. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

Step 4. In a small bowl, whisk together sriracha sauce and 1 tablespoon of coconut oil. Pour the sauce over the bok choy and stir-fry for an additional 1-2 minutes, until the sauce is bubbly.

Step 5. To serve, slice the grilled salmon and place on top of the bok choy stir fry. Garnish with fresh cilantro leaves.

recipe.name: Crab and Chickpea Black Bean Tacos
main_ingredients: 1 can black beans, drained and rinsed
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the olive oil and cook the diced tomato until softened. Step 2. Add the black beans, chickpeas, and diced crab to the skillet. Cook for 2-3 minutes, stirring occasionally. Step 3. Warm tacos shells according to package instructions. Step 4. Assemble the tacos by spooning the crab and chickpea mixture onto a shell. Step 5. Sprinkle with nutritional yeast and serve immediately.

recipe.name: Classic Veggie Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. In a large skillet or wok, heat 1 tablespoon of oil over medium-high heat. Add chopped onion and cook until translucent.
Step 2. Add chopped celery and cook for another 3-4 minutes, until slightly tender.
Step 3. Add shredded lettuce and cook until wilted.
Step 4. Add cooked rice to the skillet and stir well to combine with vegetables.
Step 5. In a small bowl, mix flour with a small amount of water to create a slurry. Add the slurry to the rice mixture and stir-fry for an additional 2-3 minutes, until the mixture thickens slightly.

recipe.name: Vegetarian Sausage and Beef Fritters
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). In a large mixing bowl, combine the ground beef, sausage, and a pinch of salt. Use your hands to mix the ingredients until just combined. Be careful not to overmix. Step 2. In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour and a pinch of salt. Gradually add the flour mixture to the meat mixture and mix until just combined. Step 3. Using your hands, shape the mixture into small patties, about 1-inch thick. Step 4. Place the patties on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Drizzle with olive oil and gently roll them around to coat evenly. Step 5. Bake for 20-25 minutes or until the fritters are cooked through and lightly browned.

recipe.name: Bean and Carrot Stir-Fry
main_ingredients: Kidney Beans (1 can, drained and rinsed)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a pan over medium-high heat. Add the minced garlic and sauté for 1 minute. Step 2. Add the sliced carrots and cook for 3-4 minutes, or until they start to soften. Step 3. Add the chopped bok choy and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender-crisp. Step 4. Stir in the kidney beans and cook for 1-2 minutes, until heated through. Step 5. Season with salt and pepper to taste, and serve hot.

recipe.name: Galangal Spicy Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add minced galangal and sauté until fragrant. Step 2. Add diced potatoes and cook until they start to brown, about 5 minutes. Step 3. Add sliced bell pepper and cook until the vegetables are tender-crisp, about 5 minutes more. Step 4. Stir in chopped spinach and lettuce. Cook until the greens have wilted. Step 5. Season with pepper to taste. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Saffron Corn Pasta with Garlic and Epazote
recipe.steps: Step 6. To serve, combine cooked pasta, garlic-corn-epazote mixture, and sautéed celery. Top with chopped lettuce and serve immediately.

recipe.name: Lemon Garlic Chicken and Rice
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Rinse the chicken breast and pat dry with paper towels. Season with salt and pepper.
Step 2. Heat butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chicken breast and cook until browned on both sides and cooked through, about 5-6 minutes per side.
Step 3. In a separate pan, sauté the minced garlic until fragrant. Add the cooked rice and stir to combine.
Step 4. Squeeze the juice of two lemons over the rice mixture and stir to combine.
Step 5. Slice the cooked chicken breast and serve on top of the lemon garlic rice, garnished with sliced olives.

recipe.name: Indian-Style Vegetable Fritters
recipe.steps:
Step 1. In a large bowl, combine flour, vegetable oil, melted butter, and salt. Mix well. 
Step 2. Add diced tomato, ginger, and cardamom to the bowl. Mix until a smooth batter forms. 
Step 3. Heat a non-stick pan with a small amount of oil over medium heat. 
Step 4. Using a spoon, drop small portions of the batter into the pan and flatten slightly. Cook until golden brown and crispy. 
Step 5. Serve hot with a dollop of yogurt (optional).

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Shrimp and Cabbage Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the garlic and sauté for 1-2 minutes until fragrant.
Step 2. Add the cabbage and cook for 5 minutes until slightly tender.
Step 3. Add the shrimp and cook for 2-3 minutes per side until pink and cooked through.
Step 4. Add the diced tomato and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes until the vegetables are tender.
Step 5. Stir in the fresh spinach and cook until wilted. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Step 6. Serve immediately and enjoy!

recipe.name: Vietnamese Chicken and Chickpea Stir Fry with Tuna and Kidney Beans
main_ingredients: Chicken breast (1 pound, cut into bite-sized pieces)
Kidney beans (1 can, drained and rinsed)
Sweet potato (2 medium, peeled and sliced)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chicken breast and cook until browned, about 5 minutes. Remove from the skillet and set aside.
Step 2. In the same skillet, add another tablespoon of oil if necessary. Add the sliced celery and cook until tender, about 3-4 minutes.
Step 3. Add the sweet potato to the skillet and cook for another 5 minutes, stirring occasionally, until it starts to soften.
Step 4. Add the chickpeas, kidney beans, and tuna to the skillet. Stir to combine with the vegetables. Cook for 2-3 minutes.
Step 5. Return the cooked chicken breast to the skillet and stir to combine with all the ingredients. Cook for an additional 2 minutes to allow the flavors to meld.

recipe.name: Italian Risotto with Sun-Dried Tomatoes
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add the onion and cook until translucent, about 5 minutes. 
Step 2. Add the garlic and cook for another minute. 
Step 3. Add the sun-dried tomatoes and cook for 2-3 minutes, until they start to soften. 
Step 4. Add the rice and stir to coat it with the oil and mix with the onion and garlic.
