Step 5. Add 1 cup of vegetable broth to the saucepan and stir until it is mostly absorbed. Repeat this process, adding the broth in 1 cup increments, until the rice is cooked and creamy. 
Step 6. Stir in the pine nuts and cook for 1-2 minutes. 
Step 7. Remove the saucepan from the heat and stir in the grated pecorino cheese. 
Step 8. Serve the risotto immediately, garnished with a squeeze of lemon juice.

recipe.name: Baked Eggplant with Green Beans
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Slice the eggplant into 1/4 inch thick rounds. Season with salt and set aside to draw out excess moisture. Step 2. Toss green beans with a tablespoon of olive oil and roast in the oven for 15 minutes or until tender. Step 3. In a food processor, grind the cashews into a coarse crumb. Step 4. In a baking dish, create a layer of cashew crumbs, followed by a layer of eggplant slices, and finally a layer of roasted green beans. Step 5. Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt, pepper, and a pinch of paprika. Step 6. Bake in the preheated oven for 20 minutes or until the eggplant is tender and the topping is golden brown.

recipe.name: Paleo Mexican Chicken Fajitas
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Cut the bell pepper, onion, and mushroom into thin slices.
             Step 2. Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat and add the chicken breast. Cook until browned, about 5-6 minutes.
             Step 3. Add the sliced bell pepper, onion, and mushroom to the skillet. Cook until the vegetables are tender, about 5 minutes.
             Step 4. Add the green beans to the skillet and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes.
             Step 5. Serve the chicken and vegetable mixture hot, garnished with fresh cilantro if desired.

recipe.name: Crispy Chicken and Onion Fritters
main_ingredients: 1 1/2 pounds chicken breast (cut into small pieces)
recipe.steps: Step 1. In a large bowl, combine chicken breast pieces, onion, almonds, garlic, and potatoes. Season with salt and pepper to taste.Step 2. In a separate bowl, mix together 1 egg and 1 tablespoon of water. Add this egg mixture to the chicken mixture and mix well.Step 3. Divide the mixture into 8 equal portions and shape each portion into a patty.Step 4. Heat about 1/2 inch of oil in a large non-stick skillet over medium heat. When the oil is hot, add the patties and cook for 4-5 minutes on each side, until golden brown and crispy.Step 5. Remove the fritters from the oil and place them on a paper towel-lined plate to drain excess oil.

recipe.name: Savory Fried Rice with Chinese Cabbage
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat butter in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat. Crack in eggs and scramble till just set. Remove eggs from wok and set aside.
Step 2. In the same wok, add diced chinese cabbage and cook till slightly wilted. Remove cabbage from wok and set aside with eggs.
Step 3. In the wok, add a bit more butter if needed. Add cooked rice and stir-fry till combined with previous ingredients and slightly toasted.
Step 4. Add back in eggs and chinese cabbage to the wok. Stir-fry everything together.
Step 5. Add a pinch of star anise powder for added flavor. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Thai-Style Stir-Fried Pork and Vegetables
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add the pork and cook until browned, about 3-4 minutes. Step 2. Remove the pork from the skillet and set aside. Step 3. In the same skillet, add another tablespoon of oil and stir-fry the sliced galangal and carrots until they start to soften, about 2 minutes. Step 4. Add the sliced bell peppers and mushroom, and continue to stir-fry for another 2-3 minutes, until all the vegetables are tender-crisp. Step 5. Return the pork to the skillet and stir in your favorite Thai seasonings (such as fish sauce, soy sauce, and palm sugar). Cook for an additional minute, until the pork is coated in the seasoning sauce.

recipe.name: Spicy Gochujang Potato Pancakes
recipe.steps:
Step 1. In a large bowl, combine grated potato, korean radish, chopped korean chili pepper, and finely chopped celery. Mix well.
Step 2. Add gochugaru and mix until combined.
Step 3. Using a spatula, shape the mixture into 4-6 patties, depending on desired thickness.
Step 4. Heat a non-stick pan with a small amount of oil over medium heat.
Step 5. Cook the patties for 4-5 minutes on each side, until golden brown and crispy.

recipe.name: Indian Vegetable Curry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat oil in a pan and add the ceylon celery. Saute until slightly soft. Step 2. Add the chopped carrot and saute for a few minutes. Step 3. Add the diced tomato, garam masala, and curry powder. Mix well. Step 4. Add a little water and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and let it simmer for 15 minutes or until the vegetables are tender. Step 5. Add a pinch of sugar to balance the flavors. Serve hot with naan or rice.

recipe.name: Grilled Pork Chop with Coconut-Free Rice and Sauteed Onions
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Season pork chops with salt and pepper. Grill for 5-6 minutes per side, or until cooked through. Step 2. Cook rice according to package instructions. Step 3. Heat almond oil in a pan over medium heat. Add chopped onions and sauté until softened, about 5 minutes. Step 4. Stir in lime juice and cook for an additional minute. Step 5. Serve grilled pork chops on top of coconut-free rice with sautéed onions and garnish with chopped almonds.

recipe.name: Black Bean and Bell Pepper Chili
recipe.steps: Step 1. In a large pot, heat a tablespoon of oil over medium heat. Add the diced bell pepper and cook until tender, about 5 minutes. Step 2. Add the cooked kidney beans, black beans, and diced tomato to the pot. Step 3. Stir in your favorite spices, such as cumin, chili powder, and paprika. Step 4. Bring the chili to a simmer and let cook for 10-15 minutes. Step 5. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Scallop and Rice Delight
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tbsp of vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add scallops and cook for 2-3 minutes per side, until golden brown. Step 2. In a separate pan, heat the remaining 1 tbsp of vegetable oil over medium heat. Add chopped lettuce and cabbage, and cook until wilted. Step 3. In a large bowl, combine cooked rice, scallops, and the lettuce-cabbage mixture. Step 4. Season with pepper to taste. Step 5. Serve immediately and enjoy!
recipe.note: This recipe uses only the available ingredients in the inventory. Missing ingredients: milk

recipe.name: Grilled Chicken Salad
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat a grill or grill pan to medium-high heat. Season the chicken breast and chicken thigh with salt (Note: Salt is missing from the inventory). Step 2. Grill the chicken for 5-6 minutes per side, or until it reaches an internal temperature of 165°F. Step 3. Chop the grilled chicken into bite-sized pieces. Step 4. Wash and chop the lettuce. Step 5. Assemble the salad by placing the chopped lettuce on a plate, topping it with the grilled chicken, and serving.
recipe.note: Salt, tomato, and potato are not available in the inventory. Consider adding these ingredients to your shopping list to make a more complete salad.

recipe.name: Grilled Beef Steak with Roasted Asparagus and Sauteed Green Beans
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat and season the beef steak with salt. Grill for 5-7 minutes per side, or until the internal temperature reaches 130°F for medium-rare. Let it rest for 10 minutes before slicing.
      Step 2. Toss the asparagus with salt and grill for 3-5 minutes per side, or until tender and slightly charred.
      Step 3. In a large skillet, heat 1 tablespoon of oil over medium-high heat. Add the green beans and cook for 3-4 minutes, or until slightly tender but still crisp. Season with salt to taste.
      Step 4. Slice the grilled beef steak against the grain and serve with roasted asparagus and sauteed green beans.
      Step 5. Garnish with garlic slices if desired.

recipe.name: Roasted Potato and Bell Pepper Pasta
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Step 2. Cut potato and bell pepper into medium-sized chunks. Step 3. In a large bowl, toss potato and bell pepper with vegetable oil, salt, and your desired herbs. Step 4. Spread the vegetables on a baking sheet and roast for 20-25 minutes or until tender. Step 5. Cook pasta according to package instructions. Step 6. Toss cooked pasta with roasted potato and bell pepper.

recipe.name: Crab and Pepper Stir Fry with Fresh Tomato Salsa
main_ingredients: 1 pound crab, cleaned and cut into bite-sized pieces
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the crab and cook for 3-4 minutes, until lightly browned. Step 2. Remove the crab from the skillet and set aside. Step 3. In the same skillet, add another tablespoon of oil and sauté the sliced pepper until tender. Step 4. Add the diced tomatoes and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, until they start to break down. Step 5. Stir in the minced garlic and cook for 1 minute, until fragrant. Step 6. Return the crab to the skillet and stir in the freshly squeezed lime juice. Cook for an additional 1-2 minutes, until the crab is fully coated.

recipe.name: Pork Belly and Chicken Breast Fricassee
main_ingredients: 1 lb pork belly, cut into 1-inch pieces
1 1/2 lbs chicken breast, cut into 1-inch pieces
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the pork belly and cook until browned, about 5 minutes. Remove the pork from the skillet and set aside. Step 2. Add another tablespoon of oil to the skillet and cook the chicken until browned, about 5 minutes. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside with the pork. Step 3. Add another tablespoon of oil to the skillet and cook the cauliflower until tender, about 5 minutes. Step 4. Add the cooked pork and chicken back into the skillet with the cauliflower. Add 1 cup of chicken broth and bring to a simmer. Step 5. Reduce the heat to low and let the fricassee cook for 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally.

recipe.name: Paleo Italian Sardine and Zucchini Fritters
recipe.steps: Step 1: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). In a large bowl, combine grated zucchini, mashed potato, flaked sardines, minced garlic, and chopped nuts. Mix well. Step 2: Using your hands, shape the mixture into patties. Step 3: Place the patties on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Step 4: Bake for 20-25 minutes or until golden brown. Step 5: Serve hot and enjoy!

recipe.name: American-Style Tofu Scramble
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat a non-stick skillet or griddle over medium heat. Step 2. In a separate bowl, whisk together crumbled tofu, nutritional yeast, and a pinch of salt and pepper. Step 3. Add the diced zucchini, tomato, and corn to the skillet and sauté until tender, about 5 minutes. Step 4. Add the tofu mixture to the skillet and scramble everything together. Step 5. Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the mixture is lightly browned.

recipe.name: Vegan Garlic and Mushroom Stir Fry
main_ingredients: chicken thigh (optional use in non-vegan version, but omitted here) or portobello mushroom (1 cup sliced)
recipe.steps: Step 1. In a small bowl, whisk together lime juice and 1 tablespoon olive oil to make a marinade. Add sliced mushrooms and let it sit for 5 minutes. Step 2. In a large skillet or wok, heat 1 tablespoon olive oil over medium-high heat. Add sliced onions and cook until they start to caramelize (5-7 minutes). Step 3. Add minced garlic and cook for another minute, until fragrant. Step 4. Add the marinated mushrooms, bok choy, and cucumber to the skillet. Cook until the vegetables are tender-crisp (3-5 minutes). Step 5. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve hot, garnished with additional sliced onions and lime wedges if desired. Note: Since we omitted the chicken thigh for vegan version, we've replaced it with portobello mushroom.

recipe.name: Japanese-Style Beef and Vegetable Stir-Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cook pasta according to package instructions. Drain and set aside. Step 2. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks. Step 3. Add the sliced carrot and daikon radish to the wok and cook until they begin to soften. Step 4. Add the miso paste to the wok and stir to combine with the beef and vegetables. Step 5. Add the cooked pasta to the wok and stir to combine with the beef and vegetable mixture.

recipe.name: Stir-Fried Asparagus and Broccoli with Thai Spice
main_ingredients: 1 tsp soy sauce (make sure it's vegan)
2 cups mixed bell peppers (any color, sliced)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat the oil in a wok or large skillet over high heat. Add the garlic and ginger and stir-fry for 1 minute.
Step 2. Add the Thai curry paste and stir-fry for another minute.
Step 3. Add the bell peppers and mushrooms and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes or until they start to soften.
Step 4. Add the broccoli and asparagus and stir-fry for another 3-4 minutes or until the vegetables are tender but still crisp.
Step 5. Add the soy sauce, brown sugar, and black pepper, and stir-fry for 1 minute. Serve immediately.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Pork Chops with Roasted Vegetables
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C). Step 2. In a bowl, toss the chopped carrots and celery with 2 tbsp olive oil, salt, and pepper. Spread on a baking sheet and roast for 20-25 minutes, or until tender. Step 3. Season the pork chops with salt, pepper, and your favorite herbs. Heat 1 tbsp olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat. Sear the pork chops for 3-4 minutes per side, or until cooked through. Step 4. Let the pork chops rest for 5 minutes before serving. Step 5. Serve the pan-seared pork chops with the roasted carrots and celery.

recipe.name: Thai-Style Pork and Vegetable Stir-Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the pork and cook until browned, about 3-4 minutes. Step 2. Remove the pork from the skillet and set aside. Step 3. Add the sliced celery to the skillet and cook until tender, about 3-4 minutes. Step 4. Add the bonito flakes and stir to combine. Step 5. Return the pork to the skillet and stir in the coconut milk and lemon juice. Serve immediately.

recipe.name: Gluten-Free Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tbsp of vegetable oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add the sliced onion and sauté until translucent.
Step 2. Add the sliced mushrooms and bell pepper to the skillet. Cook until they start to soften.
Step 3. Add the minced garlic to the skillet and sauté for 1 minute, until fragrant.
Step 4. Squeeze the juice of 1 lime over the vegetables in the skillet.
Step 5. Stir-fry the vegetables for an additional 2-3 minutes, until they are tender-crisp. Serve hot.
recipe.note: This recipe is gluten-free, but please note that cross-contamination may occur in a shared kitchen space.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Salmon with Celery Stir-Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 2 tbsp olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat. Season salmon portions with salt and pepper. Step 2. Add salmon to the skillet and cook for 3-4 minutes per side or until cooked through. Step 3. In a separate pan, heat 1 tbsp olive oil over medium heat. Add garlic and cook until fragrant. Step 4. Add celery to the pan and cook for 3-4 minutes or until tender. Step 5. Stir in lemon juice and season with salt and pepper to taste.

recipe.name: Scallop and Cod Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Chop the onion into thin slices and set aside. Step 2. Heat 2 tablespoons of vegetable oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat. Step 3. Add the chopped garlic and sauté for 1 minute until fragrant. Step 4. Add the cod and cook for 3-4 minutes per side, until cooked through. Remove from the wok and set aside. Step 5. Add the scallops to the wok and cook for 2-3 minutes per side, until opaque and cooked through. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Step 6. Stir in the chopped cashews and cook for 1 minute. Step 7. Return the cooked cod to the wok and stir in the chopped onion. Serve immediately.

recipe.name: Gluten-Free Sauteed Greens
recipe.steps: Step 1. Chop the garlic and sauté in butter until fragrant. Step 2. Add the chopped carrot and cook until slightly tender. Step 3. Add the lettuce and spinach, and cook until the greens have wilted. Step 4. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Step 5. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Tilapia with Roasted Sweet Potato and Vegetables
main_ingredients: 2 medium sweet potatoes (2 lbs), peeled and cubed
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C). Toss sweet potatoes with 2 tbsp olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Spread on a baking sheet and roast for 20-25 minutes or until tender.
Step 2. Season tilapia fillets with salt and pepper. Heat 1 tbsp olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the tilapia and cook for 3-4 minutes per side or until cooked through.
Step 3. In the same skillet, add the sliced bell pepper and cook for 3-4 minutes or until tender. Add the sliced mushrooms and cook for an additional 2 minutes.
Step 4. Add the lettuce leaves to the skillet and cook for 1 minute or until wilted.
Step 5. Serve the pan-seared tilapia on top of the roasted sweet potatoes and vegetables.

recipe.name: Black Bean and Blackened Tuna Bowl
main_ingredients: 6 oz tuna (wild caught, without animal-based seasonings)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cook the black beans according to package instructions. Drain and set aside. Step 2. Preheat a skillet over medium-high heat. Step 3. Add olive oil to the skillet and sear the tuna for 2-3 minutes per side, or until blackened. Step 4. Transfer the cooked tuna to a plate and set aside. Step 5. In the same skillet, add a pinch of salt and pepper to taste, then add a squeeze of lemon juice (if available). Step 6. Serve the blackened tuna on top of the cooked black beans.

recipe.name: Broccoli Tempura with Miso Dipping Sauce
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cut the celery and broccoli into bite-sized pieces. In a bowl, mix 1/2 cup ice-cold soda water with 1/2 cup all-purpose flour. Step 2. Dredge the celery and broccoli in the flour mixture, shaking off excess. Step 3. Heat 1/2 inch of vegetable oil in a deep frying pan over medium-high heat. Step 4. Fry the celery and broccoli in batches until golden brown, about 3-4 minutes per batch. Step 5. Drain the tempura on paper towels and serve with a side of Miso Dipping Sauce. Step 6. To make the Miso Dipping Sauce, whisk together 2 tbsp miso paste, 2 tbsp soy sauce, and 1 tsp sugar in a small bowl.

recipe.name: Creamy Mushroom Pasta
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cook pasta in boiling water for 8-10 minutes or until al dente. Drain and set aside. Step 2. In a large skillet, heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil over medium heat. Add the sliced pork and cook until browned and cooked through. Remove from the skillet and set aside. Step 3. In the same skillet, add another tablespoon of olive oil. Add the sliced mushrooms and cook until they release their moisture and start to brown, about 5 minutes. Step 4. Add the broccoli to the skillet and cook until tender, about 3-4 minutes. Step 5. Add the cooked pasta, pork, and mushroom mixture back to the skillet. Toss everything together and season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Stir-Fried Zucchini and Bok Choy
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat a tablespoon of oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the minced peanuts and stir-fry for 2 minutes until fragrant. Step 2. Add the sliced tomatoes and stir-fry for 3 minutes until they start to soften. Step 3. Add the sliced zucchini and chopped bok choy to the skillet. Stir-fry for 5 minutes until the vegetables are tender. Step 4. Add the chopped spinach to the skillet and stir-fry for an additional 2 minutes until wilted. Step 5. Transfer the stir-fry to a serving platter and garnish with sliced almonds. Serve immediately.

recipe.name: Vietnamese Broccoli and Bacon Stir-Fry with Grilled Pork Chop
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Season the pork chop with 1 tsp salt and 1 tsp black pepper. Grill the pork chop for 5 minutes per side, or until it reaches an internal temperature of 145°F (63°C). Set aside to rest. Step 2. In a large skillet, cook the bacon slices over medium heat until crispy. Remove the cooked bacon from the skillet and set aside. Step 3. Add 1 tbsp vegetable oil to the skillet and sauté the broccoli and peppers until tender-crisp. Step 4. Slice the grilled pork chop into thin strips. Step 5. Combine the cooked broccoli and peppers with the sliced pork chop and crispy bacon in the skillet. Stir-fry for 2 minutes, seasoning with 1 tsp fish sauce and 1 tsp lime juice.

recipe.name: Spicy Korean Pasta
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cook pasta according to package instructions. Drain and set aside. Step 2. Heat sesame oil in a pan over medium heat. Add korean chili pepper and sauté for 1 minute. Step 3. Add cooked pasta to the pan and toss to coat with the spicy oil. Step 4. Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, until the pasta is well coated. Step 5. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Baked Potato and Vegetable Cakes
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 200°C (400°F). Step 2. Boil the potatoes until tender, then mash. Step 3. In a separate pan, sauté the chopped tomatoes and lettuce until softened. Step 4. In a mixing bowl, combine the mashed potatoes, sautéed vegetables, and flour. Step 5. Shape the mixture into patties and bake in the oven for 20 minutes.

recipe.name: Vietnamese-Style Braised Beef and Rice
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 2 tablespoons of butter in a large pan over medium heat. Add the galangal and celery, and sauté until fragrant, about 2-3 minutes.
Step 2. Add 2 whole star anise and stir to combine. Continue cooking for a further 1-2 minutes.
Step 3. Add 1 cup of rice to the pan, and stir to coat the rice in the flavorful oil. Cook for 5 minutes, stirring frequently.
Step 4. Add 4 cups of water to the pan, and bring to a boil. Reduce the heat to low, cover the pan, and braise for 15-20 minutes, or until the rice is cooked and the liquid has been absorbed.
Step 5. Remove the star anise and season the rice with salt and a pinch of cinnamon to taste. Garnish with a sprinkle of vietnamese coriander before serving.

recipe.name: Thai Lemongrass Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tbsp oil in a pan and cook the pork until browned. Step 2. Add sliced lemongrass and thai chilies and sauté for 2 minutes. Step 3. Add cooked rice and stir-fry for 3 minutes. Step 4. Add sugar and stir-fry for another minute. Step 5. Serve hot with lime wedges.

recipe.name: Crab and Veggie Stir-Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 2 tbsp of oil in a wok over medium-high heat. Add the crab and cook until lightly browned. Step 2. Add the garlic and cook for 1 minute. Step 3. Add the spinach, bok choy, tomato, and potato. Stir-fry for 3-4 minutes or until the vegetables are tender. Step 4. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Step 5. Serve hot and enjoy!

recipe.name: Japanese Stir-Fried Spinach with Bell Pepper
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cut the bell pepper into bite-sized pieces and set aside. Step 2. Heat the vegetable oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Step 3. Add the bell pepper to the skillet and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes. Step 4. Add the spinach to the skillet and stir-fry until wilted. Season with soy sauce and serve.

recipe.name: Creamy Pasta Primavera
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil and cook pasta according to package instructions until al dente. Reserve 1 cup of pasta water before draining.
Step 2. In a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Add sliced mushrooms and cook until they release their moisture and start browning, about 5 minutes.
Step 3. Add sliced bell peppers to the skillet and cook for another 5 minutes, stirring occasionally, until they start to soften.
Step 4. In a small bowl, whisk together maple syrup, reserved pasta water, and a pinch of salt. Pour the mixture over the mushrooms and bell peppers, and stir to combine.
Step 5. Add cooked pasta to the skillet, tossing everything together until the pasta is well coated with the sauce. Serve hot, garnished with fresh parsley if desired.

recipe.name: Mussels in White Wine and Herbs
recipe.steps: Step 1. Rinse the mussels under cold water, discarding any broken shells. Remove the beard by pulling it off at the hinge. Step 2. In a large saucepan, heat the olive oil over medium-high heat. Add the garlic and cook for 1-2 minutes until fragrant. Step 3. Add the white wine to the saucepan and bring to a simmer. Step 4. Add the mussels to the saucepan and cover with a lid. Cook for 5-7 minutes until the mussels open. Step 5. Stir in the chopped parsley and cooked sardines. Serve the mussels with quinoa.

recipe.name: Tempeh and Quinoa Bowl
main_ingredients: tempeh (1 block, cut into small pieces)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Rinse the quinoa in a fine mesh strainer and drain well. In a medium saucepan, bring 2 cups of water to a boil. Add the quinoa, reduce heat to low, cover and simmer for 15-20 minutes or until the quinoa is tender and fluffy.
Step 2. While the quinoa cooks, heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a non-stick skillet over medium-high heat. Add the tempeh and cook for 3-4 minutes per side, or until golden brown.
Step 3. In a separate pan, heat another tablespoon of oil over medium heat. Add the grated carrot and cook for 5-7 minutes, or until the carrot is tender and lightly browned.
Step 4. To assemble the bowl, fluff the cooked quinoa with a fork. Arrange the tempeh and carrot on top of the quinoa. Sprinkle shredded cheese over the top.
Step 5. Serve immediately and enjoy!

recipe.name: Tilapia and Quinoa Pasta Bake
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Cook the gluten-free pasta according to the package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside. Step 2. In a large skillet, heat a tablespoon of oil over medium heat. Add the diced bell pepper and cook for 3-4 minutes until tender. Step 3. Add the chopped peanuts to the skillet and cook for another minute, stirring constantly. Step 4. In a large bowl, combine the cooked quinoa, cooked pasta, cooked bell pepper mixture, and tilapia pieces. Step 5. In a small bowl, mix together 1 tablespoon of olive oil, 1 tablespoon of lemon juice, and a pinch of salt and pepper. Pour the dressing over the quinoa mixture and toss to combine. Step 6. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and bake in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes until lightly browned and heated through.

recipe.name: Italian Stuffed Mushroom Caps
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C). Step 2. Clean and prepare the mushroom caps by removing the stems and scraping out the insides. Step 3. Sauté the chopped cucumber, asparagus, and tomato in olive oil until tender. Step 4. Season the mixture with salt and pepper to taste. Step 5. Stuff each mushroom cap with the sautéed mixture and place them on a baking sheet. Step 6. Bake for 15-20 minutes or until the mushrooms are tender and the filling is heated through.

recipe.name: Nutritional Yeast Salad with Grilled Chicken
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat a grill to medium-high heat. Season the chicken with salt and pepper and cook for 5-6 minutes per side, or until cooked through. Let rest for 5 minutes before slicing. Step 2. In a pan, cook the bacon over medium heat until crispy. Remove from heat and chop into small pieces. Step 3. In a large bowl, combine the chopped lettuce, sliced chicken, and crispy bacon. Step 4. In a small bowl, mix the nutritional yeast with 2 tbsp of olive oil (not provided but can be added) and 1 tsp of lemon juice (not provided but can be added). Step 5. Pour the nutritional yeast mixture over the salad and toss to combine. Step 6. Serve immediately and enjoy!

recipe.name: Vegan Sweet Potato Fritters with Zucchini Slaw
main_ingredients: sweet potato (2 medium, peeled and grated)
recipe.steps: Step 1. In a large bowl, combine grated sweet potato, zucchini, and nutritional yeast. Step 2. In a separate bowl, mix together chopped lettuce and a squeeze of lemon juice. Step 3. Heat a non-stick pan with a small amount of oil over medium heat. Step 4. Using a 1/4 cup measuring cup, scoop the sweet potato mixture into the pan and flatten slightly. Step 5. Cook for 4-5 minutes on each side, or until golden brown and crispy. Serve with zucchini slaw.

recipe.name: Baja-Style Sardine Tacos with Carrot Slaw and Tempeh
main_ingredients: 1 can sardines in water, drained and flaked (120g)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add 1-2 tablespoons of oil and cook the crumbled tempeh until golden brown and crispy. Step 2. Transfer the tempeh to a plate and set aside. Step 3. In the same skillet, add the sardines and cook for 1-2 minutes, breaking them up with a spoon as they cook. Step 4. In a separate bowl, mix together the grated carrots, lime juice, and salt. Step 5. Warm the corn tortillas by wrapping them in a damp paper towel and microwaving for 20-30 seconds. Step 6. Assemble the tacos by spooning the tempeh onto a tortilla, topping with sardines, carrot slaw, and a sprinkle of salt. Serve with lime wedges and chopped cilantro.

recipe.name: Thai Ground Pork and Vegetable Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add ground pork and cook, breaking it up with a spoon, until browned, about 3-4 minutes. Step 2. Add the broccoli to the skillet and cook, stirring occasionally, until tender but still crisp, about 3-4 minutes. Step 3. Add the chopped lettuce and spinach to the skillet, and stir-fry until the greens have wilted. Step 4. Season with your favorite Thai spices and serve hot. Step 5. Garnish with sliced almonds, if desired.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Cod with Mediterranean Avocado Salsa
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat a non-stick skillet over medium-high heat. Season the cod fillets with salt and black pepper. Add 1 tbsp of olive oil to the skillet and sear the cod for 3-4 minutes on each side or until cooked through. Step 2. In a large bowl, combine diced avocado, tomato, red onion, cucumber, red pepper, and garlic. Squeeze lemon juice over the mixture and toss to coat. Step 3. To assemble the dish, place a cooked cod fillet on a plate and top with a spoonful of the Mediterranean avocado salsa. Step 4. Drizzle the remaining 1 tbsp of olive oil over the salsa and serve immediately. Step 5. Garnish with fresh parsley or basil leaves, if desired.

recipe.name: Garlic Parmesan Roasted Vegetables
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C). Cut 2-3 cloves of garlic into small pieces and mix with 2 tbsp of butter. Place the garlic-butter mixture on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Step 2. Toss 1 cup of parmesan cheese with 1 tsp of salt and spread it evenly over the garlic-butter mixture. Step 3. Roast in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes or until the cheese is golden brown and fragrant. Step 4. Remove from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes. Step 5. Serve hot, garnished with fresh herbs if desired.

recipe.name: Sardine Cakes with Cabbage Slaw
recipe.steps: Step 1. In a large bowl, combine flaked sardines, shredded cabbage, garlic (minced), and onion (chopped). Step 2. Gradually add milk to the bowl and mix until a batter forms. Step 3. Heat 1 tbsp of vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Step 4. Using a 1/4 cup measuring cup, scoop the batter into the skillet and flatten slightly. Cook for 3-4 minutes on each side, or until golden brown. Step 5. Meanwhile, heat the remaining 1 tbsp of vegetable oil in a small skillet over medium heat. Step 6. Add the cooked sardine cakes to the small skillet and cook for an additional 1-2 minutes to crisp the exterior.
recipe.note: Add any desired seasonings to the sardine batter, such as salt, pepper, or dried herbs.

recipe.name: Eggplant and Mushroom Stuffed Lobster
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). Step 2. Clean and de-vein the lobster, then set aside. Step 3. Slice the eggplant into 1/2-inch thick rounds and brush with vegetable oil. Step 4. Grill or sauté the eggplant until tender, then set aside. Step 5. In a pan over medium heat, combine the mushroom and peanuts. Cook until the mushroom releases its liquid and starts to brown, about 5 minutes. Step 6. Stuff each lobster tail with the eggplant, mushroom, and peanut mixture, and bake for 12-15 minutes or until cooked through.

recipe.name: Sausage and Bell Pepper Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Cook quinoa according to package instructions. Set aside.
               Step 2. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
               Step 3. Add sausage and cook until browned, about 3-4 minutes.
               Step 4. Add pork belly and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes.
               Step 5. Add sliced bell peppers and cook until tender, about 4-5 minutes.
               Step 6. Serve sausage and vegetable mixture over quinoa.

recipe.name: Celery and Mushroom Fritters
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat a non-stick pan with butter over medium heat. Chop the celery into small pieces and sauté until tender. Set aside. Step 2. Finely chop the mushroom and sauté until it releases its moisture and starts to brown. Step 3. In a large bowl, combine flour, salt, and sugar. Step 4. Add the sautéed mushroom and celery to the flour mixture and mix until well combined. Step 5. Using a spoon, shape the mixture into small patties. Cook in the non-stick pan for 3-4 minutes or until golden brown and crispy. Flip and cook the other side.

recipe.name: Grilled Salmon and Tempeh Skewers with Roasted Vegetables
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Step 2. Thread salmon, tempeh, eggplant, and celery onto skewers. Step 3. In a small bowl, whisk together soy sauce and honey. Brush the mixture onto the vegetables. Step 4. Grill the skewers for 10-12 minutes, turning occasionally. Step 5. Meanwhile, heat sesame oil in a small saucepan over medium heat. Add salt and pepper to taste. Serve the grilled skewers with the roasted vegetables.
recipe.note: This recipe highlights the use of salmon, tempeh, eggplant, and celery, while also incorporating other ingredients from the inventory.

recipe.name: Lemon and Turmeric Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. In a pan, heat a small amount of oil over medium heat. Add minced garlic and sauté until fragrant. Step 2. Add sliced onion and cook until it starts to caramelize. Step 3. Add chopped lettuce and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes. Step 4. Add turmeric powder and mix well. Step 5. Squeeze the juice of 1 lemon over the stir fry and serve.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Scallop and Edamame Stir-Fry
main_ingredients: corn (1 cup, kernels removed from cob)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 2 tbsp of oil in a pan over medium-high heat. Add halved scallops and sear for 2-3 minutes per side. Set aside. Step 2. In the same pan, add another 1 tbsp of oil and sauté edamame for 2-3 minutes until tender. Step 3. Add brussels sprouts and corn, stir-frying for 3-4 minutes until slightly tender. Step 4. Add cauliflower and stir-fry for another 2-3 minutes until all vegetables are tender. Step 5. Return the pan-seared scallops to the pan and season with soy sauce. Step 6. Serve hot, garnished with sesame seeds and chopped green onions.

recipe.name: Stir-Fried Vegetables with Cashews
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat. Step 2. Add the sliced carrot and cook for 3-4 minutes, until tender. Step 3. Add the sliced cucumber and diced tomato to the wok, and stir-fry for another 2-3 minutes. Step 4. Add the chopped cashews and stir-fry for 1 minute. Step 5. Season with your favorite Chinese spices and serve hot.

recipe.name: Gluten-Free Beef and Vegetable Stir-Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks.
Step 2. Add bell pepper and garlic to the skillet. Cook until the bell pepper is tender.
Step 3. Add the diced tomato to the skillet and stir to combine.
Step 4. Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, stirring constantly.
Step 5. Serve hot and enjoy!

recipe.name: Vegan Stir Fry with Quinoa
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Rinse the quinoa in a fine mesh strainer and drain well. In a medium saucepan, bring 2 cups of water to a boil. Add the quinoa, cover, reduce heat to low, and simmer for 15-20 minutes or until the water is absorbed. Set aside. 

Step 2. In a large skillet or wok, heat 2 tablespoons of oil over medium-high heat. Add the tempeh and cook for 5-7 minutes per side, or until golden brown and crispy. Remove from the skillet and set aside. 

Step 3. Add another tablespoon of oil to the skillet, then add the sliced carrot and cook for 5 minutes, or until tender but still crisp. 

Step 4. Add the diced tomato and chopped bok choy to the skillet, cooking for 2-3 minutes or until the vegetables are tender. 

Step 5. Fluff the cooked quinoa with a fork and stir in the cooked tempeh, carrot, tomato, and bok choy mixture. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

recipe.name: Minty Mushroom Beef Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat butter in a pan and sauté the mushrooms until tender. Step 2. Add ground beef and stir-fry until browned. Step 3. Add fresh mint leaves and stir-fry for 1 minute. Step 4. Season with pepper to taste. Step 5. Serve hot and enjoy!

recipe.name: Italian Chicken and Mushroom Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chicken breast and cook until browned on both sides, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat and set aside.
Step 2. Add the remaining 1 tablespoon of olive oil to the skillet and sauté the mushroom until tender, about 3-4 minutes.
Step 3. Add the oregano and stir to combine. Return the chicken breast to the skillet and stir to coat with the mushroom and oregano mixture.
Step 4. Reduce heat to low and let simmer for 2-3 minutes, allowing the flavors to meld together.
Step 5. Season with salt and pepper to taste, then serve hot.

recipe.name: Crispy Keto Cod Tenders
main_ingredients: Parmesan cheese (1 cup, non-dairy alternative if needed)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cut cod fillets into strips. Step 2. In a shallow dish, mix almond flour, Parmesan cheese, garlic powder, and paprika. Step 3. In a separate dish, beat egg whites. Step 4. Dip each cod strip into the egg whites and then coat in the almond flour mixture, pressing gently to adhere. Step 5. Heat avocado oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Step 6. Add the coated cod strips to the skillet and cook for 3-4 minutes on each side, until crispy and cooked through.

recipe.name: Sausage and Kale Hash
main_ingredients: sweet potato (1 large), peeled and diced
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Cut the sweet potato into 1-inch cubes and place on a baking sheet. Roast in the oven for 20-25 minutes, or until tender.
                Step 2. Chop the kale leaves into 1-inch pieces and set aside.
                Step 3. Cook the sausage in a large skillet over medium-high heat, breaking it up with a spoon as it cooks, until browned and cooked through.
                Step 4. Add the chopped kale to the skillet with the cooked sausage and stir-fry until wilted.
                Step 5. Add the roasted sweet potato to the skillet and toss with the sausage and kale mixture.
recipe.note: Missing garlic, but can still make a great hash with sausage and sweet potato. Add garlic to the skillet with the sausage for extra flavor.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Salmon with Roasted Vegetables
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Step 2. Toss the cauliflower and asparagus with olive oil, salt, and pepper on the prepared baking sheet. Roast in the oven for 15-20 minutes or until tender. Step 3. Season the salmon fillets with salt and pepper. Step 4. Heat a skillet over medium-high heat and add a small amount of oil. Sear the salmon for 3-4 minutes per side or until cooked through. Step 5. Serve the pan-seared salmon with roasted vegetables.

recipe.name: Grilled Chicken and Mushroom Salad
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat and season the chicken breast with your favorite spices. Grill the chicken until it's cooked through, about 5-6 minutes per side. Let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it thinly.
Step 2. In a large bowl, combine chopped lettuce, sliced mushroom, diced tomato, and grilled chicken.
Step 3. Squeeze the juice of one lime over the salad and toss to combine.
Step 4. Season the salad with salt and pepper to taste.
Step 5. Serve the salad immediately, garnished with additional lime wedges if desired.

recipe.name: Celery and Herb Biscuit
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.

      Step 2. In a large mixing bowl, combine flour and butter. Use a pastry blender or your fingers to work the butter into the flour until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs.

      Step 3. Add the chopped celery and maple syrup to the flour mixture. Mix until just combined.

      Step 4. Turn the dough out onto a floured surface and gently knead a few times until it comes together.

      Step 5. Roll the dough out to a thickness of about 1 inch (2.5 cm) and use a biscuit cutter or the rim of a glass to cut out rounds. Gather the scraps, re-roll the dough, and cut out additional biscuits.

      Step 6. Place the biscuits on the prepared baking sheet and bake for 18-20 minutes, or until golden brown.

recipe.name: Bok Choy Kimchi Quinoa Bowl
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Rinse and chop the bok choy into 2-inch pieces. Set aside.
Step 2. Cook the quinoa according to package instructions. Set aside.
Step 3. Grill the bacon slices until crispy. Chop into small pieces.
Step 4. Grill corn kernels in a pan with a little oil until slightly charred.
Step 5. In a large bowl, combine the cooked quinoa, bok choy, corn, and crispy bacon. Mix well and serve as a side dish or add to a bowl with your favorite toppings.

recipe.name: Mussel and Eggplant Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the sliced eggplant and cook until tender, about 3-4 minutes. Step 2. Add the mussels to the skillet and cook until they open, about 2-3 minutes. Step 3. In a separate pan, sauté the broccoli and edamame in a little oil until tender. Step 4. In a small bowl, whisk together the milk and a pinch of salt to make a sauce. Step 5. To serve, place the mussels and eggplant on a plate, top with the broccoli and edamame mixture, and drizzle with the milk sauce.

recipe.name: Vegetarian Bean and Cheese Frittata
main_ingredients: kidney beans (1/2 cup), drained and rinsed
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). Step 2. Bake the potato in the oven for 15-20 minutes, until tender when pierced. Step 3. In a medium bowl, whisk together the cheddar and mozzarella cheese. Step 4. In a separate bowl, mash the baked potato and mix with kidney beans. Step 5. In a greased skillet, combine the cheese mixture and potato-bean mixture. Cook over medium heat until the cheese is melted and the mixture is heated through.

recipe.name: Pad Thai with Holy Basil
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cook pasta according to the package instructions and set aside. Step 2. In a large wok or frying pan, heat 2 tbsp of oil over medium heat. Step 3. Add ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it down into small pieces as it cooks. Step 4. Add kaffir lime leaves, holy basil, and cook for 1 minute, stirring constantly. Step 5. Push the beef mixture to one side of the pan, add 2 tbsp of oil to the empty side, and pour in 2 beaten eggs. Scramble the eggs until cooked through, then mix with the beef mixture. Step 6. Add cooked pasta to the pan, stir-frying everything together. Step 7. Squeeze the juice of 2 limes over the top and season with salt to taste.

recipe.name: Thai-Style Fish Sauce Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat butter in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add garlic, shallots, and celery. Stir-fry until the vegetables are softened.
Step 2. Add fish sauce and stir-fry for 1 minute.
Step 3. Add holy basil and stir-fry until the leaves are wilted.
Step 4. Squeeze lemon juice over the mixture and stir-fry for another minute.
Step 5. Taste and adjust seasoning as needed.
Step 6. Serve hot, garnished with additional holy basil if desired.
recipe.note: This recipe is a simple and flavorful stir-fry that showcases the authentic Thai flavors of fish sauce and holy basil.

recipe.name: Lamb Chop and Beef Steak Frittata
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). In a large skillet, cook lamb chops over medium-high heat for 3-4 minutes per side. Transfer lamb chops to a plate and set aside.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Scallops with Mediterranean Rice
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add garlic and cook for 1 minute until fragrant. Step 2. Add the scallops and cook for 2-3 minutes on each side, until they are golden brown and cooked through. Step 3. Remove the scallops from the skillet and set aside. Step 4. Stir in lemon juice and cook for an additional 1-2 minutes, until the sauce has slightly thickened. Step 5. Serve the scallops on top of a bed of Mediterranean rice, garnished with chopped parsley and a sprinkle of red pepper flakes if desired.

recipe.name: Stir-Fried Vegetables with Tempeh
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cut the cauliflower, zucchini, and carrot into bite-sized pieces. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat. Step 2. Add the tempeh and cook until golden brown, about 3-4 minutes. Step 3. Add the garlic and cook for 1 minute. Step 4. Add the cauliflower, zucchini, and carrot. Cook until the vegetables are tender-crisp, about 5 minutes. Step 5. Add the spinach and cook until wilted. Step 6. Season with soy sauce to taste. Step 7. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Shrimp and Mussels Fajitas
main_ingredients: Optional toppings: avocado, sour cream, cilantro
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Rinse the mussels under cold water, removing any broken shells. Pat dry with paper towels.
Step 2. Heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the sliced onion and cook for 3-4 minutes, until softened.
Step 3. Add the minced garlic and cook for 1 minute, until fragrant.
Step 4. Add the mussels and shrimp to the skillet, along with the cumin, chili powder, and paprika. Cook for 2-3 minutes, until the seafood is slightly browned.
Step 5. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Warm the tortillas by wrapping them in a damp paper towel and microwaving for 20-30 seconds.
Step 6. Assemble the fajitas by placing the seafood mixture onto the tortillas and topping with your choice of avocado, sour cream, and cilantro.

recipe.name: Saag Aloo
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat oil in a pan over medium heat. Add cumin, coriander, and cinnamon. Let it sizzle for a minute. Step 2. Add broccoli and cook until tender. Step 3. Add spinach and cook until wilted. Step 4. Add salt to taste and mix well. Step 5. Serve hot with naan or rice.

recipe.name: Miso Ramen
main_ingredients: Kombu (1 piece, cut into small pieces)
Milk (optional, omit for a clear broth)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Simmer the kombu in 2 cups of water for 10 minutes. Remove the kombu and add dashi to the pot. Step 2. In a separate pan, heat some oil over medium heat and sauté the chopped ground beef until browned. Set aside. Step 3. Add the sliced carrots to the pan and cook until tender. Step 4. To assemble the ramen, place some noodles in a bowl, then add slices of carrot, a spoonful of the simmered broth, and a sprinkle of bonito flakes. Step 5. Garnish with a sprinkle of shichimi togarashi and top with a slice of cooked ground beef. Serve immediately.

recipe.name: Italian-Style Vegetable Risotto
recipe.steps: Step 1. In a large skillet, heat 2 tbsp of olive oil over medium heat. Add the sliced bell pepper and cook until tender, about 5 minutes. Add the diced tomato and cook for an additional 2 minutes. Step 2. In a separate pot, heat 2 cups of water over high heat. Add 1 tsp of salt and 1 tsp of dried basil. Step 3. In a large saucepan, melt 2 tbsp of olive oil over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and cook for 1 minute, until fragrant. Step 4. Add the rice to the saucepan and cook for 1-2 minutes, until lightly toasted. Step 5. Add the heated water to the saucepan, 1 cup at a time, stirring constantly and allowing each portion to absorb before adding the next. Step 6. When the rice is cooked, stir in the cooked bell pepper and tomato mixture. Step 7. Season with salt and basil to taste.

recipe.name: Garlic Pepper Stir Fry with Sauteed Spinach and Corn
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the minced garlic and sauté for 1 minute until fragrant.
Step 2. Add the corn kernels to the skillet and sauté for 3-4 minutes until lightly browned.
Step 3. In a separate pan, heat a little oil and add the chopped spinach. Cook until wilted.
Step 4. Add the cooked spinach to the skillet with the garlic and corn mixture. Stir well to combine.
Step 5. Season with ground pepper and serve hot.

recipe.name: Stir-Fried Chicken and Edamame with Bok Choy
main_ingredients: 1 cup chicken breast (cut into bite-sized pieces)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add the chicken breast and cook until browned, about 5 minutes. Step 2. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside. Step 3. In the same skillet, add the chopped onion and cook until softened, about 3 minutes. Step 4. Add the chopped bok choy and cook until wilted, about 3 minutes. Step 5. Add the cooked chicken back into the skillet, along with the chopped edamame, cashews, potato, and cauliflower. Stir-fry everything together for about 2-3 minutes, until heated through.

recipe.name: Spicy Sweet Potato and Ground Beef Hash
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat a large non-stick skillet over medium-high heat. Add the diced onion and cook until translucent, about 5 minutes. Step 2. Add the diced celery and cook for another 2 minutes, until slightly tender. Step 3. Add the ground beef and cook, breaking it up with a spoon, until browned, about 5 minutes. Step 4. Add the diced sweet potato to the skillet and cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Step 5. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Step 6. Serve the hash hot, garnished with diced cucumber.
recipe.note: You are missing the following ingredients: pepper.

recipe.name: Crab and Mussels Stir Fry
main_ingredients: crab (1 cup, jumbo lump crab meat)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Rinse the mussels under cold water and remove any broken shells. Step 2. In a large skillet, heat 2 tablespoons of oil over medium-high heat. Add mussels and cook until they open, about 3-4 minutes. Remove mussels from skillet and set aside. Step 3. In the same skillet, add another tablespoon of oil. Add crab and cook for 2-3 minutes, until lightly browned. Step 4. Add 2 cloves of minced garlic and cook for 1 minute, until fragrant. Step 5. Return mussels to the skillet, add 1 tablespoon of chopped fresh parsley, and stir to combine.

recipe.name: Grilled Chicken and Veggie Skewers
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces and thread onto skewers, alternating with onion, carrot, and kale. Step 2. Brush skewers with oil to prevent sticking. Step 3. Grill skewers for 10-12 minutes per side, or until chicken is cooked through. Step 4. Let skewers rest for 5 minutes before serving. Step 5. Serve hot, garnished with fresh kale if desired.

recipe.name: Vegan Quinoa Bowl
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Cut the bell pepper, onion, and potato into bite-sized pieces. Place on a baking sheet and drizzle with water. Roast in the oven for 20 minutes or until tender.
Step 2. Cook quinoa according to package instructions. Set aside.
Step 3. In a pan, sauté garlic and edamame in a little water until the edamame is tender. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Step 4. In a large bowl, combine cooked quinoa, roasted vegetables, and sautéed edamame. Toss to combine.
Step 5. Serve the quinoa bowl hot, garnished with additional roasted vegetables if desired.

recipe.name: Duck and Tempeh Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Slice the duck breast into thin strips and set aside. Slice the tempeh into small cubes.
            Step 2. Heat the vegetable oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add the sliced duck and cook until browned, about 3-4 minutes.
            Step 3. Remove the duck from the skillet and set aside. Add the sliced tempeh to the skillet and cook until browned, about 3-4 minutes.
            Step 4. Add the sliced almonds and kidney beans to the skillet and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, stirring frequently.
            Step 5. Return the cooked duck to the skillet and stir to combine with the tempeh, almonds, and kidney beans. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Sweet Potato and Black Bean Fritters
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oil in a deep frying pan over medium heat. Step 2. In a large bowl, mash the cooked black beans using a fork or a potato masher. Step 3. Add the grated carrot, chopped onion, and diced sweet potato to the bowl with the mashed black beans. Step 4. Mix well until all the ingredients are well combined. Step 5. Using a spoon, drop small amounts of the sweet potato mixture into the hot oil and fry until golden brown. Step 6. Remove the fritters from the oil and place them on a paper towel to drain excess oil.
recipe.note: This recipe uses the available ingredients in your inventory. The missing ingredient, eggs, is needed for a traditional fritter recipe. Feel free to experiment and adjust the recipe to your taste.

recipe.name: Stir-Fried Pork and Vegetables
main_ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables (onion, pepper, sichuan pepper)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a wok or large skillet over high heat. Add the diced pork and cook until browned, about 3-4 minutes. Remove the pork from the wok and set aside. Step 2. Add another tablespoon of oil to the wok and sauté the onion and mixed vegetables until they are tender-crisp. Step 3. Add the cooked pork back into the wok and stir in the Sichuan pepper. Step 4. Season with salt to taste. Step 5. Serve immediately and enjoy!

recipe.name: Indian-Style Lettuce and Onion Fritters
recipe.steps: Step 1. In a large bowl, mix together the sliced onion, chopped lettuce, and flour. Step 2. Add the pepper to the mixture and stir well. Step 3. Gradually add the coconut milk to the mixture and mash everything together until it forms a dough. Step 4. Heat a non-stick pan with a little oil and shape the dough into small patties. Step 5. Cook the patties until they are golden brown on both sides. Step 6. Serve the fritters hot with a dollop of yogurt (not used in this recipe but suggested for a variation)

recipe.name: Mediterranean Olive Fritters
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oil in a deep frying pan over medium heat. In a large bowl, combine the flour, salt, and baking powder. Step 2. In a separate bowl, whisk together the melted butter, water, and egg substitute (such as aquafaba). Step 3. Add the chopped olives, carrot, and spices to the wet ingredients and stir. Step 4. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients and mix until a dough forms. Step 5. Using a spoon, drop small portions of the dough into the hot oil, flattening the tops slightly with a spatula. Step 6. Fry the fritters until golden brown, then remove them from the oil with a slotted spoon and place them on a paper towel-lined plate to drain excess oil.

recipe.name: Mexican Avocado Tacos
recipe.steps: Step 1. Finely chop the onion and sauté it in a pan until translucent. Add the mushrooms and pepper, and cook until the pepper is tender. Step 2. Add a handful of epazote to the pan and stir for 1 minute. Step 3. Slice the avocado and set it aside. Step 4. Warm tacos shells according to the package instructions. Step 5. Assemble the tacos by placing the sautéed vegetables onto the shells, topping with sliced avocado, and serving with a dollop of sour cream. Step 6. Garnish with lettuce and serve.
recipe.note: None

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Mackerel with Roasted Vegetables
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C). Step 2. In a bowl, toss cauliflower, asparagus, and bell pepper with 1 tbsp olive oil, salt, and pepper. Spread on a baking sheet and roast for 15 minutes. Step 3. Meanwhile, season mackerel fillets with salt and pepper. Step 4. Heat 1 tbsp olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat. Add mackerel and cook for 3-4 minutes per side, or until cooked through. Step 5. Serve mackerel with roasted vegetables and squeeze lemon juice on top.

recipe.name: Japanese Teriyaki Stir-Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cut the onion and mackerel into bite-sized pieces. Step 2. Heat a tablespoon of oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Step 3. Add the beef steak and cook until browned, about 3 minutes per side. Remove from heat and set aside. Step 4. In the same skillet, add the onion and cook until softened, about 3-4 minutes. Step 5. Add the mackerel and cook until cooked through, about 4-5 minutes. Step 6. To make the teriyaki sauce, combine 2 tablespoons of soy sauce, 2 tablespoons of sake, and 2 tablespoons of mirin in a small bowl. Step 7. Pour the teriyaki sauce over the onion and mackerel mixture. Step 8. Add the cooked beef steak back into the skillet and stir to combine. Step 9. Season with salt and stir-fry for an additional 2 minutes. Step 10. Garnish with chopped peanuts and serve over a bed of spinach.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Pork Chops with Tomato Salsa
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat a non-stick pan with 1 tbsp olive oil over medium heat. Add the pork chops and cook for 5-6 minutes per side, or until they reach an internal temperature of 63°C (145°F). Remove the pork from the pan and set aside. Step 2. In the same pan, add 1 tbsp chopped onion and cook until translucent. Step 3. Add the sliced mushrooms and cook until they release their liquid and start to brown. Step 4. Add the diced tomatoes, salt, and pepper to the pan. Stir to combine and cook for an additional 5 minutes. Step 5. Serve the pork chops with the tomato salsa spooned over the top.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Shrimp with Spinach
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Season the shrimp with salt and pepper. Step 2. Add the shrimp to the skillet and sear for 2-3 minutes on each side. Step 3. Remove the shrimp from the skillet and set aside. Step 4. In the same skillet, add the remaining 1 tablespoon of olive oil. Add the chopped spinach and cook until wilted. Step 5. Return the shrimp to the skillet and squeeze lemon juice over the top. Serve immediately.

recipe.name: Chicken Thigh and Broccoli Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chicken thigh and cook for 5-6 minutes per side, until browned and cooked through. Set aside. Step 2. In the same skillet, add another tablespoon of oil and sauté the broccoli for 3-4 minutes, until tender. Step 3. Add the chopped peanuts to the skillet and stir-fry for 1 minute. Step 4. Add the cooked rice to the skillet and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes, until combined with the broccoli and peanuts. Step 5. Return the cooked chicken thigh to the skillet and stir-fry for an additional 2 minutes, until coated with the rice and vegetable mixture.
recipe.note: Please note that the requested ingredients, chicken breast and tomato, are not available in your inventory.

recipe.name: Vietnamese-Style Stir-Fried Broccoli
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a wok over medium-high heat. Add diced potato and cook until slightly browned. Step 2. Add broccoli and cook until it starts to soften. Step 3. Add chopped lettuce and cook until wilted. Step 4. Stir in chopped cilantro. Step 5. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Step 6. Serve hot.
recipe.note: This dish showcases the use of fresh vegetables commonly found in Vietnamese cuisine, along with the wok-frying technique.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Lobster and Potato
main_ingredients: lobster (4 pieces, 120g), potato (2 medium, 400g), lemon (1, 100g), peanuts (1/4 cup, 30g), mushroom (1 cup, 120g), edamame (1 cup, 170g)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Rinse the lobster pieces under cold water and pat them dry with paper towels. Season with salt (not available) but we can use lemon juice and peanuts for flavor. Step 2. Cut the potatoes into wedges and toss with a little lemon juice. Step 3. Heat a non-stick pan over medium-high heat. Add the peanuts to the pan and let them toast for a minute or until fragrant. Remove the peanuts and set them aside. Step 4. Add the potatoes to the pan and cook until they're golden brown on both sides. Step 5. Add the lobster to the pan and cook until it's pink and cooked through. Add the mushroom and edamame to the pan and stir to combine.
recipe.note: This recipe is missing salt, but we can use lemon juice and peanuts for flavor instead.

recipe.name: Italian Lamb Chop and Vegetable Skewers
main_ingredients: 1 large celery stalk, cut into 1-inch pieces
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat your grill to medium-high heat. Thread lamb chop, celery, onion, and corn onto skewers.
Step 2. Season with Italian seasoning and olive oil, and grill for 8-10 minutes per side, or until lamb is cooked to desired doneness.
Step 3. Once lamb is cooked, remove from skewers and serve with remaining vegetables.
Step 4. Serve with a side of garlic and lemon squeezed over top.
Step 5. Optional: Serve with a side of fresh spinach for added nutrition.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Pork and Broccoli Stir-Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1: Heat 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add the pork and cook until browned, about 3-4 minutes. Remove the pork from the skillet and set aside.
Step 2: In the same skillet, add the remaining 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil. Add the diced potato and cook until slightly tender, about 5 minutes.
Step 3: Add the broccoli florets to the skillet and cook until they start to soften, about 3-4 minutes.
Step 4: Add the chopped dried seaweed to the skillet and stir-fry for 1 minute.
Step 5: Return the cooked pork to the skillet and stir in the beaten eggs. Cook until the eggs are scrambled and the ingredients are well combined. Season with soy sauce to taste. Serve hot, garnished with bean sprouts.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Brussels Sprouts with Tofu and Garlic Butter
main_ingredients: 1 lb Brussels sprouts, trimmed and halved
1/2 cup tofu, cut into small cubes
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
                Step 2. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium-high heat. Add the tofu and cook until golden brown, about 3-4 minutes. Remove from heat and set aside.
                Step 3. In the same skillet, add the butter and let it melt. Add the minced garlic and cook for 1 minute, until fragrant.
                Step 4. Add the halved Brussels sprouts to the skillet, tossing them with the garlic butter until they're well coated. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
                Step 5. Transfer the skillet to the preheated oven and roast for 12-15 minutes, until the Brussels sprouts are tender and caramelized.
                Step 6. Serve the pan-seared Brussels sprouts with the crispy tofu on top, and garnish with additional garlic butter if desired.

recipe.name: Grilled Mackerel with Roasted Carrot
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the grill to medium heat. Step 2. Season the mackerel fillets with salt and pepper (use pepper from shopping list). Step 3. Grill the mackerel for 4-5 minutes per side, or until cooked through. Step 4. Toss the chopped carrot with a bit of oil (use vegetable oil from shopping list) and season with salt. Step 5. Roast the carrot in the oven at 200°C (400°F) for 20-25 minutes, or until tender.

recipe.name: Grilled Carrot and Mussels Skewers
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the grill to medium-high heat. Step 2. Cut the carrots, broccoli, and zucchini into large chunks. Step 3. Thread the carrots, broccoli, zucchini, and mussels onto skewers, leaving a little space between each piece. Step 4. Brush the skewers with olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Step 5. Grill the skewers for 8-10 minutes, turning occasionally, until the vegetables are tender and slightly charred.
recipe.note: This recipe uses the available ingredients from your inventory. Unfortunately, pork and eggs are not available. Consider adding them to your shopping list.

recipe.name: Lemon Herb Tilapia with Mediterranean Roast
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
Step 2. In a bowl, mix together olive oil, minced garlic, chopped fresh oregano, and lemon zest. Add the carrot and Brussels sprouts to the bowl and toss to coat.
Step 3. Spread the carrot and Brussels sprouts on the prepared baking sheet and roast for 20-25 minutes, or until tender and lightly browned.
Step 4. Meanwhile, season the tilapia fillets with salt and pepper. Heat a non-stick skillet over medium-high heat and add a tablespoon of olive oil.
Step 5. Sear the tilapia fillets for 2-3 minutes on each side, or until cooked through.
Step 6. Serve the tilapia with the roasted carrot and Brussels sprouts, and garnish with chopped fresh parsley and a squeeze of lemon juice.

recipe.name: Thai-Style Tempeh Stir-Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add the tempeh and cook until golden brown, about 3-4 minutes. Remove from the skillet and set aside. Step 2. In the same skillet, add the remaining 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil. Add the sliced eggplant and cook until tender, about 3-4 minutes. Step 3. Add the sliced mushrooms to the skillet and cook until they release their moisture and start to brown, about 3-4 minutes. Step 4. Add the minced garlic and Thai red curry paste to the skillet and cook for 1 minute, stirring constantly. Step 5. Add the cooked tempeh back into the skillet, along with the soy sauce, fish sauce (if using), and brown sugar. Stir everything together to combine. Step 6. Cook for an additional 1-2 minutes, until the sauce has thickened and the tempeh is coated. Serve hot over steamed rice or noodles.
recipe.note: None

recipe.name: Italian-Style Pasta alla Carbonara
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook 8 oz of spaghetti according to package instructions until al dente. Reserve 1 cup of pasta water before draining the spaghetti.

Step 2. In a large skillet, heat 2 tbsp of olive oil over medium heat. Add the minced anchovies and cook until they dissolve into the oil, stirring frequently.

Step 3. Add the ground beef to the skillet, breaking it up with a spoon as it cooks. Cook until the beef is browned, about 5-7 minutes.

Step 4. Stir in the grated carrot and cook for 2-3 minutes until it starts to soften.

Step 5. In a large mixing bowl, whisk together the reserved pasta water and Parmesan. Add the cooked spaghetti to the bowl and toss until the spaghetti is well coated.

Step 6. Add the beef and carrot mixture to the bowl with the spaghetti and toss everything together until well combined. Season with sugar to balance the flavors.

Step 7. Serve immediately, garnished with additional Parmesan if desired.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Tilapia with Scallops and Edamame
main_ingredients: tilapia (4 fillets), edamame (1 cup), scallops (12 pieces), lettuce (1 bunch)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Rinse the tilapia and scallops and pat them dry with paper towels. Season with salt and pepper.
Step 2. Heat a skillet over medium-high heat and add the tilapia fillets. Cook for 3-4 minutes on each side, or until cooked through.
Step 3. Remove the tilapia from the skillet and add the scallops. Cook for 3-4 minutes on each side, or until cooked through.
Step 4. In a separate pan, add the edamame and cook over medium heat until tender. Season with salt and pepper.
Step 5. To serve, place a tilapia fillet on each plate, top with a scallop and a spoonful of edamame. Garnish with lettuce.

recipe.name: Garlic Chicken Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cut the chicken breast into bite-sized pieces and season with salt and pepper. Step 2. Heat 1 tbsp of olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chicken and cook until browned, about 5-6 minutes. Step 3. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside. Step 4. In the same skillet, add the remaining 1 tbsp of olive oil, minced garlic, and grated ginger. Cook until fragrant, about 1 minute. Step 5. Add the sliced potato to the skillet and cook until tender, about 5 minutes. Step 6. Return the chicken to the skillet and stir in the hoisin sauce. Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes until the sauce has thickened. Serve the chicken and potato mixture over cooked rice.

recipe.name: Cheesy Broccoli Fritters
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oil in a deep frying pan over medium heat. Step 2. In a large bowl, combine broccoli florets, grated cheese, flour, and chopped onion. Step 3. Mix well until all ingredients are well combined. Step 4. Using a spoon, drop small portions of the broccoli mixture into the hot oil and flatten slightly. Step 5. Fry for 3-4 minutes on each side, until golden brown.

recipe.name: Paleo Sweet Potato and Chicken Hash
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Step 2. Toss the diced sweet potato with 1 tablespoon of olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Spread on a baking sheet and roast for 15 minutes. Step 3. In a large skillet, heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil over medium-high heat. Add the diced onion and cook until translucent, about 5 minutes. Step 4. Add the chicken to the skillet and cook until browned, about 5-6 minutes. Step 5. Add the roasted sweet potato and flaked sardines to the skillet, stir to combine. Cook for an additional 2 minutes. Step 6. Serve hot and enjoy!

recipe.name: Garlic Lime Potato Roast
main_ingredients: potato (2 large), salt (to taste), garlic (3 cloves), lime (1)

Step 1. Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C). Wash and peel the potatoes, cutting them into 1-inch cubes. Place on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
Step 2. Drizzle the potatoes with lime juice, followed by a sprinkle of salt and minced garlic. Toss to coat evenly.
Step 3. Roast in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes or until the potatoes are tender and golden brown.
Step 4. Remove from the oven and let cool for a few minutes. Serve hot, garnished with additional lime wedges if desired.
Step 5. Enjoy your delicious Garlic Lime Potato Roast!

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Lobster with Roasted Potato
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Step 2. Toss diced potatoes with olive oil, salt (if available), and pepper. Roast in the oven for 15-20 minutes. Step 3. In a pan, cook diced bacon until crispy. Step 4. Add cleaned and seasoned lobster to the pan with bacon, cook for 2-3 minutes per side. Step 5. Serve lobster with roasted potatoes and a side of lettuce.
recipe.note: Some requested ingredients are missing: broccoli, pork, salt.

recipe.name: Vegan-Free Pasta Primavera with Tofu
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cook pasta according to package instructions, then set aside. Step 2. Chop onion and sauté in a pan until translucent. Step 3. Add kale to the pan and cook until wilted. Step 4. Cube tofu and add it to the pan, stir-frying until golden. Step 5. Combine cooked pasta, kale mixture, and ricotta cheese (for non-dairy, replace ricotta with a vegan alternative like soy ricotta or cashew cheese). Mix well.

recipe.name: Vegan Eggplant Stir-Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat. Add sliced eggplants and bell peppers. Cook for 5 minutes.
Step 2. Add corn kernels and cook for another 3 minutes.
Step 3. Add spinach and stir-fry until wilted.
Step 4. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Step 5. Serve hot over rice.

recipe.name: Garlic Crab Stir Fry with Bok Choy
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Peel and dice the sweet potatoes. Soak them in cold water for 10 minutes to remove excess starch. Drain and set aside for cooking later.
Step 2. In a pan, heat 2 tablespoons of oil and sauté the minced garlic until fragrant. Add the lump crab and stir-fry until partially cooked.
Step 3. Add 1 bunch of bok choy to the pan and stir-fry until wilted.
Step 4. In a separate pan, boil or steam the diced sweet potatoes until tender. Season with salt to taste.
Step 5. Serve the garlic crab stir-fry with bok choy over the boiled sweet potatoes.

recipe.name: Korean-Style Beef Pasta Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cook pasta according to package instructions. Drain and set aside. Step 2. In a large pan or wok, heat 1 tablespoon of oil over medium-high heat. Add the ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks. Step 3. Add the minced garlic and gochugaru to the pan and cook for 1 minute, until fragrant. Step 4. Add the cooked pasta to the pan, tossing everything together to combine. Step 5. Squeeze the juice of 1/2 lemon over the top and toss again to coat.

recipe.name: Teriyaki Chicken
recipe.steps:
Step 1: Cut the chicken breast into bite-sized pieces and season with salt. Set aside.
Step 2: In a saucepan, combine vegetable oil and sugar. Heat over medium heat until the sugar dissolves.
Step 3: Add the lime juice to the saucepan and bring to a simmer.
Step 4: Add the chicken to the saucepan and cook for 5-7 minutes or until cooked through.
Step 5: In a small bowl, mix together the teriyaki sauce ingredients. Pour the sauce over the chicken and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes.
Step 6: Garnish with sliced green onions and serve hot.

recipe.name: Classic Beef and Rice Bowl
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the ground beef and cook, breaking it up with a spoon, until browned, about 5 minutes. Step 2. Add the sliced bell pepper to the skillet and cook until tender, about 3-4 minutes. Step 3. Stir in 1 cup of cooked rice and cook for 2-3 minutes. Step 4. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Step 5. Serve the beef and rice mixture hot, garnished with chopped fresh herbs if desired.

recipe.name: Stir-Fried Chicken and Broccoli with Green Beans
main_ingredients: 1 lb chicken thigh (cut into bite-sized pieces)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add the chicken and cook until browned, about 5 minutes. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.Step 2. In the same skillet, add the remaining 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil. Add the minced garlic and grated ginger and sauté for 1 minute.Step 3. Add the broccoli and green beans to the skillet. Cook until the vegetables are tender-crisp, about 3-4 minutes.Step 4. In a small bowl, whisk together the soy sauce, cashew butter, and sesame oil. Pour the sauce over the vegetables and stir to coat.Step 5. Return the cooked chicken to the skillet and stir to combine with the vegetables and sauce. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Masala Lentil Biryani
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat oil in a pan and add cumin seeds, mustard seeds and cardamom pods. Let it sizzle. Then add chopped onion and sauté until it's translucent.
Step 2. Add garam masala and sauté for a minute. Then add diced tomato and cook until it's soft.
Step 3. Add lentils and enough water to cook. Bring it to a boil and simmer for 15-20 minutes or until the lentils are cooked.
Step 4. Meanwhile, preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C). Place the naan breads in the oven and toast for 5-7 minutes or until crispy.
Step 5. Once the lentils are cooked, add the toasted naan breads to the pan and mix well. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Thai-Style Broccoli Stir-Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Chop broccoli into florets and set aside. Step 2. In a pan, heat 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil over medium-high heat. Step 3. Add sliced galangal, lemongrass, and shallots. Stir-fry until fragrant, about 2 minutes. Step 4. Add broccoli to the pan and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes or until tender but crisp. Step 5. Season with fish sauce to taste. Serve hot and enjoy!

recipe.name: Stuffed Eggplant with Ricotta and Edamame
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). Step 2. Prepare the eggplant by scooping out the flesh and leaving a shell. Step 3. In a bowl, mix together ricotta, edamame, and a pinch of salt and pepper. Step 4. Stuff each eggplant half with the ricotta mixture and top with the remaining eggplant flesh. Step 5. Place the stuffed eggplant on a baking sheet, drizzle with olive oil, and sprinkle with dried basil and oregano. Step 6. Bake in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the eggplant is tender.

recipe.name: Spinach and Zucchini Pasta Bake
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F). Cook the pasta according to the package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside.Step 2. Chop the zucchini and carrot into small pieces. Heat a pan with a little bit of oil over medium heat and sauté the zucchini and carrot until tender.Step 3. Chop the spinach leaves and add them to the pan with the cooked zucchini and carrot. Stir well.Step 4. Slice the potato into thin slices and set aside.Step 5. In a large bowl, combine the cooked pasta, sautéed zucchini and carrot mixture, and chopped spinach. Mix well. Add the sliced potato on top of the pasta mixture and transfer to a baking dish.Step 6. Bake in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the potato is golden brown.

recipe.name: Sweet Sardine Stir-Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add diced potato and cook until tender, about 10 minutes.
Step 2. Add flaked sardines to the skillet and stir to combine with potato. Cook for 2-3 minutes.
Step 3. In a small bowl, mix together sugar and 1/4 cup water to create a sweet syrup. Pour the syrup over the sardine mixture and stir to combine.
Step 4. Stir in chopped peanuts and cook for an additional 1-2 minutes, until the peanuts are fragrant.
Step 5. Serve hot, garnished with additional peanuts if desired.

recipe.name: Japanese-Style Fried Rice
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chopped shiso leaves and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
Step 2. Push the shiso leaves to one side of the skillet. Crack the egg into the other side and scramble it until cooked through.
Step 3. Mix the egg with the shiso leaves. Add the cooked rice to the skillet, breaking up any clumps with a spatula.
Step 4. Stir-fry the rice with the egg and shiso mixture for about 5 minutes, until heated through.
Step 5. Add the chopped lettuce to the skillet and stir-fry for another minute.
Step 6. Transfer the Japanese-style fried rice to a serving platter and serve immediately.

recipe.name: Tempeh Stir Fry with Peanut Sauce
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cut the zucchini into bite-sized pieces and set aside. Step 2. Cut the tempeh into small cubes and set aside. Step 3. In a blender, combine peanuts, 2 tablespoons of water, 1 tablespoon of soy sauce, and 1 tablespoon of rice vinegar. Blend until smooth. Step 4. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a pan over medium heat.
