Add the tempeh and cook until golden brown, about 3-4 minutes per side. Step 5. Add the zucchini to the pan and cook until tender, about 3-4 minutes. Step 6. Pour the peanut sauce into the pan and stir to combine with the tempeh and zucchini. Step 7. Serve hot and enjoy!

recipe.name: Cashew and Pork Belly Stir Fry with Edamame and Sweet Potato
recipe.steps: Step 5. Add the cooked edamame to the skillet and stir to combine with the sauce and vegetables.

recipe.name: Black Bean and Corn Fritters with Mackerel and Asparagus
main_ingredients: 225g black beans (1 can drained and rinsed)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 200°C (400°F). In a bowl, mash black beans using a fork. Add corn, butter, and milk, and mix well until combined. Step 2. Divide the mixture into 8 equal portions and shape into patties. Step 3. Place the patties on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Step 4. Bake for 15-20 minutes or until golden brown. Meanwhile, grill or bake the mackerel for 10-12 minutes or until cooked through. Step 5. Grill or sauté the asparagus with a pinch of salt until tender. Step 6. Serve the fritters with mackerel and asparagus.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Salmon with Roasted Sweet Potato
main_ingredients: sweet potato (2 large, peeled and cubed)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C). Toss sweet potato cubes with a little oil and season with salt and pepper. Spread on a baking sheet and roast for 15-20 minutes or until tender.
Step 2. In a separate pan, heat a little oil over medium-high heat. Sear the salmon fillets for 3-4 minutes per side or until cooked through.
Step 3. In a separate pan, steam the green beans until tender. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Step 4. Serve the seared salmon with roasted sweet potato and steamed green beans, accompanied by a side of cooked rice.

recipe.name: Kidney Bean and Tempeh Stir Fry
main_ingredients: 2 cups tempeh, cut into bite-sized pieces
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat a tablespoon of oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the sliced onion and cook until translucent. Step 2. Add the sliced red pepper and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes. Step 3. Add the tempeh pieces and cook until browned and crispy. Step 4. Add the cooked kidney beans and stir to combine. Step 5. Sprinkle nutritional yeast over the top and stir to combine. Step 6. Serve hot and enjoy!

recipe.name: Asian-Style Stir-Fried Bok Choy and Celery
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add sliced celery and cook until tender, about 3-4 minutes.
Step 2. Add diced potato to the skillet and continue cooking for another 2-3 minutes.
Step 3. Add sliced beef steak to the skillet and cook until browned, about 3-4 minutes.
Step 4. Add bok choy to the skillet, folding it in with a spatula to combine with other ingredients.
Step 5. Stir-fry everything together for an additional 2-3 minutes, until the bok choy has wilted and the ingredients are well combined.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Sardines with Cabbage and Rice Pilaf
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat oil in a pan over medium-high heat and add sliced pepper. Sear the sardines for 2-3 minutes on each side until cooked through. Step 2. Set the sardines aside and add sliced cabbage to the pan. Cook until wilted, about 5 minutes. Step 3. In a separate pot, boil water and cook white rice according to package instructions. Step 4. In a large skillet, heat some oil over medium heat and sauté chopped broccoli and carrots until tender. Step 5. To assemble the dish, place a scoop of cooked rice on a plate, top with seared sardines, wilted cabbage, and a side of steamed broccoli and carrots.

recipe.name: Roasted Poblano Pepper with Lime and Cilantro
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). Cut the poblano pepper in half and remove the seeds. Coat with 1 tablespoon of olive oil and place on a baking sheet. Roast for 20-25 minutes or until the skin is charred and blistered. Step 2. Remove the poblano pepper from the oven and let it cool down. Step 3. Once the poblano pepper has cooled, peel off the skin and chop it into small pieces. Step 4. In a pan, heat the remaining 1 tablespoon of olive oil over medium heat. Add the chopped onion and cook until translucent. Step 5. Add the chopped poblano pepper, chopped cilantro, and freshly squeezed lime juice to the pan. Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, stirring occasionally.

recipe.name: Grilled Chicken Fajitas
main_ingredients: 1 medium Lime (juice and wedges for serving)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chicken and cook until browned, about 5-6 minutes. Remove from heat and set aside.
Step 2. In the same skillet, add another tablespoon of oil and sauté the sliced tomatoes for 2-3 minutes.
Step 3. Add the shredded lettuce to the skillet and cook for 1 minute.
Step 4. Add the cooked chicken back into the skillet and stir in freshly squeezed lime juice.
Step 5. Serve the chicken and vegetable mixture hot in warm flour tortillas.

recipe.name: Italian-Style Roasted Vegetables
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C). Cut the bell pepper and celery into bite-sized pieces. Step 2. In a large bowl, whisk together sliced garlic and a pinch of salt. Add the bell pepper and celery, and toss to coat. Step 3. Spread the vegetables on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Roast in the preheated oven for 20 minutes. Step 4. After 20 minutes, sprinkle with black pepper. Step 5. Return to the oven for an additional 10 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender and slightly caramelized.

recipe.name: Thai Basil Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the sliced bell pepper and cook until tender, about 3-4 minutes.
Step 2. Add the minced garlic and cook for 1 minute, until fragrant.
Step 3. Add the spinach and cook until wilted, about 2-3 minutes.
Step 4. Stir in the tamarind paste and cook for 1 minute, until well combined.
Step 5. Stir in the chopped Thai basil and cook for an additional minute. Serve hot.
recipe.note: None

recipe.name: Rosemary and Pancetta Frittata-Style Bell Pepper
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 2 tbsp of vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add sliced pancetta and cook until crispy, about 5 minutes. Set aside.
Step 2. Add more vegetable oil if necessary, then add the sliced bell peppers. Cook for 5 minutes.
Step 3. Add minced garlic to the skillet and cook for 1 minute.
Step 4. In a bowl, combine cooked pancetta, bell peppers, and parmesan.
Step 5. In a separate bowl, beat eggs (not included in the list since pancetta is a non-veg option). Pour the egg mixture over the pancetta mixture and cook until the eggs are almost set.
Step 6. Transfer the skillet to the oven (if needed) to cook the eggs through.
Step 7. Slice the frittata into wedges and serve.

recipe.name: Lentil and Bell Pepper Curry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Chop the onion and bell pepper into small pieces and sauté in a pan for 5 minutes. Step 2. Add the minced garlic and cook for another minute. Step 3. Add the lamb chop and cook until browned. Step 4. Add the lentils, quinoa, and water to the pan and bring to a boil. Step 5. Reduce heat and let simmer for 20 minutes.
recipe.note: No explanation

recipe.name: Cauliflower and Edamame Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a wok over medium-high heat. Add 2 cloves of minced garlic and sauté until fragrant. Step 2. Add 1 cup of edamame and cook for 2-3 minutes, until tender but still crisp. Step 3. Add the cauliflower florets and cook for an additional 3-4 minutes, until tender and lightly browned. Step 4. Season with salt to taste. Step 5. Serve hot, garnished with green onions if desired.

recipe.name: Mexican-Style Lime Rice with Tortilla
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add mexican oregano and cook for 1 minute, until fragrant.
Step 2. Add rice to the skillet and stir to coat with oil and mix with oregano. Cook for 2-3 minutes.
Step 3. Add 2 cups of water to the skillet and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for 15-20 minutes or until rice is cooked.
Step 4. Warm tortillas by wrapping them in a damp paper towel and microwaving for 20-30 seconds.
Step 5. Serve lime rice with warm tortillas on the side, squeeze lime juice over both.

recipe.name: Roasted Cauliflower and Lentil Bowl
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). Cut the cauliflower into florets and place on a baking sheet. Drizzle with a little bit of oil and season with salt and pepper.
Step 2. Roast the cauliflower in the oven for 20-25 minutes, or until tender and lightly browned.
Step 3. In a large pan, heat some oil over medium heat. Add the chopped bell pepper and cook for 5 minutes, or until slightly tender.
Step 4. Add the cooked lentils to the pan and stir to combine with the bell pepper. Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes.
Step 5. In a small pan, dry roast the peanuts over medium heat, stirring frequently, until fragrant and lightly browned.
Step 6. To assemble the bowls, divide the roasted cauliflower between two bowls, then top with the lentil and bell pepper mixture, and sprinkle with roasted peanuts.

recipe.name: Creamy Asparagus and Lettuce Salad
recipe.steps:
Step 1. In a blender, combine milk, nutritional yeast, and a pinch of salt. Blend until smooth and creamy. Set aside.
Step 2. In a large bowl, combine chopped lettuce and blanched asparagus. Toss to combine.
Step 3. Drizzle the creamy sauce over the lettuce and asparagus mixture. Toss to coat.
Step 4. Season with lemon juice to taste.
Step 5. Serve chilled or at room temperature.

recipe.name: Shiso Leaf Stir-Fried Vegetables
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil in a wok over medium-high heat. Add the sliced mushrooms and cook until they're tender, about 3-4 minutes.
Step 2. Add the chopped shiso leaves and cook for an additional 30 seconds, until fragrant.
Step 3. Add the broccoli, daikon radish, and carrot. Stir-fry for 5 minutes, until the vegetables are tender-crisp.
Step 4. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Step 5. Serve immediately, garnished with additional shiso leaves if desired.

recipe.name: Spicy Korean Lobster Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a wok over medium-high heat. Add lobster and cook for 2-3 minutes until pink. Remove lobster and set aside. Step 2. In the same wok, add sliced onion and cook until translucent. Step 3. Add sliced scallops and cook for 3-4 minutes until white. Remove from wok and set aside with lobster. Step 4. In the same wok, add 2 tablespoons of gochujang (Korean chili paste) and 1 tablespoon of soy sauce. Stir for 1 minute. Step 5. Add cooked lobster and scallops back into the wok and stir-fry for 2 minutes, combining with the spicy sauce. Garnish with toasted cashews.

recipe.name: Celery and Onion Soup
recipe.steps: Step 5. Use an immersion blender to puree the soup until smooth.

recipe.name: Veggie Frittata-Style Omelette
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat a medium non-stick skillet over medium-high heat. Step 2. Add chopped celery, cook for 3 minutes until softened, stirring occasionally. Step 3. Add broccoli to the skillet and cook for 5 minutes until it starts to soften. Step 4. Stir in chopped spinach and cook until wilted, about 2 minutes. Step 5. Stir in lemon juice and cook for 1 minute. Step 6. Transfer the mixture to a greased skillet, cook until it is set, about 2-3 minutes. Step 7. Fold the omelette in half, serve hot.

recipe.name: Classic BBQ Pork Sandwiches
main_ingredients: pork (500g), hamburger buns (4), butter (2tbsp), garlic (3 cloves), onion (1 medium), BBQ sauce (1/2 cup), pickles (1 cup)

Step 1. Preheat a grill or grill pan to medium-high heat. Step 2. In a small bowl, mix together minced garlic and a pinch of salt. Rub the garlic mixture all over the pork. Step 3. Grill the pork for 5-7 minutes per side, or until it reaches an internal temperature of 160F. Step 4. Meanwhile, toast the hamburger buns on the grill or in a toaster. Step 5. Assemble the sandwiches by spreading a layer of butter on each bun, followed by a few slices of the grilled pork, a dollop of BBQ sauce, and finally, a few slices of pickle.

recipe.name: Mexican Chicken and Broccoli Fajitas
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chicken breast and cook until browned, about 5-6 minutes. Step 2. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside. Step 3. In the same skillet, add another tablespoon of olive oil. Add the broccoli and epazote leaves. Cook until the broccoli is tender, about 3-4 minutes. Step 4. Add the cooked chicken back into the skillet and stir in the corn kernels. Step 5. Warm corn tortillas by wrapping them in a damp paper towel and microwaving for 20-30 seconds. Step 6. Assemble the fajitas by placing the chicken and vegetable mixture onto the tortillas and topping with queso fresco.

recipe.name: Roasted Kale and Chickpea Salad
main_ingredients: 1 large kale bunch (stems removed, leaves torn)
1 can chickpeas (15 oz, drained and rinsed)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Toss the kale leaves with 1 tbsp olive oil (not provided) and season with salt. Spread the kale on the prepared baking sheet and roast for 10-12 minutes or until crispy. Step 2. In a large bowl, whisk together 2 tbsp lemon juice (not provided), 1 tsp apple cider vinegar (not provided), and 1 tsp ground cumin (not provided). Add the roasted kale, chickpeas, cucumber slices, peanuts, and nutritional yeast to the bowl. Step 3. Toss the mixture to combine. Step 4. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Step 5. Serve immediately.

recipe.name: Beef and Sugar Meatballs
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 180°C. In a mixing bowl, combine the ground beef and sugar. Mix well until the sugar dissolves. Step 2. Using your hands, shape the mixture into small meatballs, about 1 inch in diameter. Step 3. Place the meatballs on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Drizzle with olive oil and gently roll them to coat evenly. Step 4. Bake the meatballs in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes or until cooked through. Step 5. Remove the meatballs from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes. Serve hot with your favorite dipping sauce.

recipe.name: Mexican Potato and Black Bean Tacos
main_ingredients: 1 medium potato, peeled and diced (1 cup)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat a large skillet over medium heat. Add 1 clove of minced garlic and sauté for 1-2 minutes until fragrant.
Step 2. Add the diced Potato and cook for 5-7 minutes until they're tender and lightly browned.
Step 3. Add the cooked black beans and diced poblano pepper to the skillet. Stir to combine and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes.
Step 4. Warm the tortillas by wrapping them in a damp paper towel and microwaving for 20-30 seconds.
Step 5. Assemble the tacos by spooning the potato and black bean mixture onto a tortilla, and topping with additional diced garlic and a sprinkle of salt.

recipe.name: Grilled Tilapia with Japanese Teriyaki Sauce
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Season tilapia with salt and pepper. Step 2. Grill tilapia for 5-6 minutes per side, or until cooked through. Step 3. Meanwhile, slice potatoes into thin rounds. Step 4. In a small saucepan, combine 2 tablespoons coconut aminos, 2 tablespoons coconut sugar, and 2 tablespoons water. Step 5. Bring sauce to a boil, then reduce heat to simmer and cook for 5 minutes, or until thickened. Step 6. Serve grilled tilapia with Japanese teriyaki sauce, potato slices, and steamed kale.

recipe.name: Japanese Edamame Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat a pan over medium heat and cook the ground beef until browned, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks. Step 2. Remove the cooked ground beef from the pan and set aside. Step 3. In the same pan, add the minced garlic and cook for 1 minute until fragrant. Step 4. Add the sliced onion to the pan and cook until it is translucent. Step 5. Add the edamame to the pan and cook for 2-3 minutes until heated through. Step 6. Return the cooked ground beef to the pan and stir in the shichimi togarashi. Step 7. Season with salt to taste and serve hot.
recipe.note: A flavorful and easy-to-make Japanese-inspired dish using ground beef, edamame, and shichimi togarashi.

recipe.name: Vegan Black Bean and Broccoli Enchiladas
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). Step 2. Cook pasta according to the package instructions. Step 3. In a pan, sauté chopped broccoli and carrot in a little water until tender. Step 4. In a blender, blend cooked kidney beans and chickpeas with a tablespoon of water until smooth. Step 5. In a baking dish, fill cooked pasta with the bean-chickpea mixture and top with sautéed broccoli and carrot. Bake for 20 minutes. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Japanese-Style Stuffed Mushrooms
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C). In a pan, heat the butter over medium heat. Add the chopped onion and sauté until softened.
Step 2. Add the grated potato to the pan and cook for an additional 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Step 3. Stuff each mushroom cap with the potato and onion mixture, followed by a sprinkle of chopped spinach.
Step 4. Place the stuffed mushrooms on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper and bake for 15 minutes.
Step 5. Serve the stuffed mushrooms hot, garnished with additional spinach if desired.

recipe.name: Spinach and Mushroom Fritters
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oil in a deep frying pan over medium heat. Step 2. In a bowl, combine chopped spinach, mushroom, almond flour, and celery. Step 3. Mix the ingredients well until they form a dough. Step 4. Divide the dough into 4-6 portions, depending on the desired fritter size. Step 5. Carefully place the dough portions into the hot oil and fry until they are golden brown. Step 6. Remove the fritters from the oil and place them on a paper towel-lined plate to drain excess oil.

recipe.name: Vegan American Sweet Potato and Kidney Bean Hash
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
Step 2. In a large bowl, toss the sweet potato with 1 tablespoon of oil until evenly coated. Spread on the prepared baking sheet and roast for 20 minutes or until tender.
Step 3. In a pan, heat 1 tablespoon of oil over medium heat. Add the chopped bok choy and cook until wilted, about 3 minutes. Set aside.
Step 4. In a separate pan, sauté the asparagus with 1 tablespoon of oil for 3-4 minutes or until tender.
Step 5. In a large skillet, heat 2 tablespoons of oil over medium heat. Add the cooked kidney beans, roasted sweet potato, and sautéed asparagus. Sprinkle with nutritional yeast and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes until heated through. Serve with the wilted bok choy.

recipe.name: Roasted Broccoli and Cauliflower Medley
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C).
         Step 2. Rinse the broccoli and cauliflower florets under cold water and pat dry with paper towels.
         Step 3. In a large bowl, mix the broccoli and cauliflower florets together with salt and sugar.
         Step 4. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper and arrange the broccoli and cauliflower mixture.
         Step 5. Roast in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender and lightly browned.
         Step 6. Serve hot, garnished with lettuce leaves if desired.

recipe.name: Teriyaki Chicken and Vegetable Wrap
main_ingredients: 1 lb chicken breast (cut into thin strips)
recipe.steps:
Step 1: In a large bowl, whisk together soy sauce, salt, and a pinch of water. Add the chicken breast strips and marinate for at least 15 minutes.
Step 2: Preheat a non-stick pan over medium heat. Remove the chicken from the marinade, letting any excess liquid drip off. Cook the chicken for 5-7 minutes per side, until cooked through.
Step 3: In the same pan, add the julienne-cut carrot and cook for 3-4 minutes, until slightly tender.
Step 4: Warm the nori sheets by wrapping them in a damp paper towel and microwaving for 20-30 seconds.
Step 5: Assemble the wraps by placing a few slices of the cooked chicken, some carrot, and a sprinkle of chopped shiso leaves onto each nori sheet.

recipe.name: Kimchi Spinach Rice Bowl (Kimchi Bibimbap)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Rinse the spinach and green onion, and set aside.
Step 2. In a pan, heat some oil over medium-high heat. Add the sliced mushrooms and cook until they're golden brown.
Step 3. In a separate pan, cook the garlic and chopped green onion until fragrant.
Step 4. Add the chopped spinach to the pan and stir-fry until wilted.
Step 5. To assemble the dish, place a scoop of rice on top of the rice cake, followed by the kimchi spinach mixture, and finish with a sprinkle of sesame seeds.
Step 6. Serve immediately.

recipe.name: Spicy Pasta Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Cook the pasta according to package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside.
Step 2. Chop the celery and green onion. Slice the tomato into wedges.
Step 3. In a large skillet, heat a small amount of oil over medium-high heat. Add the chopped celery and cook until slightly tender.
Step 4. Add the sliced tomato to the skillet and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes.
Step 5. Stir in the hoisin sauce and cook for 1 minute, until the sauce has thickened. Season with salt to taste.
Step 6. Combine the cooked pasta, celery, and tomato mixture in the skillet. Toss to combine and serve hot.

recipe.name: Grilled Mushroom and Corn Fritters
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat a non-stick pan or griddle over medium heat.
Step 2. In a large bowl, combine 2 cups of corn kernels, 1/4 cup of vegetable oil, 1 cup of sliced mushrooms, 1 cup of broccoli florets, and 1/2 teaspoon of salt. Mix well.
Step 3. Add 2 tablespoons of nutritional yeast and mix until combined.
Step 4. Using a spoon, drop small balls of the mixture onto the preheated pan. Flatten slightly with a spatula.
Step 5. Cook for 4-5 minutes on each side, until the fritters are golden brown and crispy.

recipe.name: Sardine Pasta Bake
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 180°C. Step 2. Cook the pasta as per instructions until al dente. Step 3. In a pan, heat some oil and sauté the onion and garlic until softened. Step 4. Add the sardines and cook for about 2 minutes until lightly browned. Step 5. In a large bowl, combine the cooked pasta, sardine mixture, and milk. Step 6. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and top with more grated cheese (if desired). Step 7. Bake in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes until golden brown.

recipe.name: Lemon Chicken and Potato
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C). Rinse the chicken breast and pat it dry with paper towels. Season with salt and pepper. Step 2. In a large bowl, mix together 2 tablespoons of lemon juice, 1 minced garlic clove, and 1 teaspoon of olive oil. Add the chicken breast and marinate for at least 15 minutes. Step 3. Peel and chop the potatoes into 1-inch wedges. Place them on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper and toss with 2 tablespoons of olive oil, salt, and pepper. Step 4. Remove the chicken from the marinade and place it on a separate baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Roast in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes or until cooked through. Step 5. Toss the potatoes with additional olive oil, salt, and pepper if needed. Spread out the potatoes in a single layer and roast in the oven for 20-25 minutes or until golden brown.

recipe.name: Thai Vegetable Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat oil in a pan over medium-high heat. Add the chopped onion and cook until translucent. Step 2. Add the chopped kale, green beans, and cabbage to the pan. Stir-fry for 3-4 minutes until the vegetables are tender. Step 3. Season with Thai red curry paste and stir well. Step 4. Add cooked rice to the pan and stir-fry for another 2-3 minutes. Step 5. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Tuna and Spinach Stuffed Broccoli
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Step 2. Rinse the broccoli and cut it into florets. Step 3. In a pan, sauté the garlic and spinach until wilted. Step 4. Place the tuna fillet on top of the broccoli florets and spoon the spinach mixture over it. Step 5. Season with salt and bake in the oven for 15-20 minutes or until cooked through.

recipe.name: Spicy Korean-Style Pork Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tsp of sesame oil in a large pan over high heat. Add the pork and cook until browned, about 3-4 minutes. Remove the pork from the pan and set aside.
Step 2. In the same pan, add the chopped kimchi and cook until it starts to caramelize, about 3-4 minutes.
Step 3. Add the doenjang to the pan and stir to combine with the kimchi. Cook for another minute.
Step 4. Add the cooked pork back into the pan and stir to combine with the kimchi and doenjang mixture.
Step 5. Add the fresh spinach to the pan and cook until wilted, about 1-2 minutes. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Mussels with Black Bean Stir-Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Rinse the mussels under cold water and scrub them clean. Remove the beard and any broken shells. Set aside.
Step 2. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the mushroom and cook until it starts to soften, about 2 minutes.
Step 3. Add the black beans, cauliflower, and peanuts to the wok. Cook for 5 minutes, stirring constantly, until the vegetables are tender-crisp.
Step 4. Add the mussels to the wok, and stir to combine. Cook for 2-3 minutes, until the mussels start to open.
Step 5. Season with soy sauce and serve immediately.

recipe.name: Teriyaki Pasta
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Cook pasta according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
Step 2. In a pan, heat 1 tbsp of vegetable oil over medium heat. Add ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks.
Step 3. In a small bowl, whisk together 1 tbsp of vegetable oil, lime juice, and salt. Pour the mixture over the cooked ground beef and stir to combine.
Step 4. Add the cooked pasta to the pan with the beef mixture and toss to combine.
Step 5. Serve the Teriyaki Pasta hot, garnished with additional lime wedges if desired.
recipe.note: Inspired by traditional Japanese Teriyaki sauce, this recipe brings a bold and savory flavor to simple pasta.

recipe.name: Vegan Tofu Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Chop the tofu into small cubes and set aside. Step 2. In a large pan, heat a non-stick cooking spray over medium heat. Step 3. Add the chopped peanuts and cook until fragrant, about 2 minutes. Step 4. Add the chopped cabbage and cook until it starts to soften, about 3 minutes. Step 5. Add the chopped tofu and cook until the vegetables are tender, about 5 minutes. Step 6. Add the chopped lettuce and stir-fry until wilted. Step 7. Season with your favorite spices and serve hot.

recipe.name: Miso and Garlic Tonkotsu Ramen Broth
recipe.steps:
Step 1. In a blender, combine 2 cups of water, miso paste, garlic (minced), and 1 tsp of bonito flakes. Blend until smooth.
Step 2. Heat the blended mixture over low heat in a saucepan. 
Step 3. Add 4 cups of water to the saucepan and bring to a simmer until the broth is clear and flavorful.
Step 4. Slice the lettuce and shiso leaves for garnish.
Step 5. Serve the hot broth with sliced lettuce, shiso leaves, and a sprinkle of bonito flakes.

recipe.name: Spicy Korean Noodle Stir-Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cook the pasta according to package instructions. Drain and set aside. Step 2. In a pan, heat 1 tsp of oil over medium heat. Add the ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks. Step 3. Add the korean chili pepper and stir to combine. Step 4. Add the green onion and stir-fry for 1 minute. Step 5. Combine the cooked pasta and beef mixture in the pan, and stir-fry for an additional 2 minutes.

recipe.name: Stir-Fried Broccoli with Carrot-Ginger Sauce
recipe.steps:
Step 1. In a blender or food processor, combine the grated carrot and 2 tbsp water. Blend until smooth and set aside to form the carrot-ginger sauce.
             Step 2. In a separate pan, heat 1 tbsp of oil over medium heat. Add the broccoli and cook for 3-4 minutes, or until slightly tender.
             Step 3. In a small bowl, whisk together the soy sauce and five-spice powder. Add the cornstarch and whisk until well combined.
             Step 4. Pour the soy sauce mixture over the broccoli and stir to coat. Continue cooking for an additional 2-3 minutes, or until the sauce thickens.
             Step 5. Add the carrot-ginger sauce to the pan and stir to combine. Cook for a final 1-2 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened and the broccoli is well coated.

recipe.name: Peanut Pasta with Cod
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil and cook the pasta according to package directions until al dente. Drain and set aside.
Step 2. In a large skillet, heat a couple of tablespoons of oil over medium heat. Add the cod fillets and cook for 3-4 minutes per side, or until cooked through.
Step 3. In a food processor or blender, grind the peanuts into a fine paste.
Step 4. In a large serving bowl, combine the cooked pasta, peanut paste, and cooked cod.
Step 5. Season with salt and pepper to taste, and serve hot.
recipe.note: Note: This recipe does not include tomato or lettuce as they are not available in the inventory.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Tilapia with Spinach and Beans
recipe.steps: Step 1. Rinse the tilapia fillet under cold water and pat it dry with a paper towel. Season with salt and pepper. Set aside. Step 2. In a pan, heat 1 tablespoon of oil over medium heat. Add the tilapia and cook for 3-4 minutes per side or until cooked through. Step 3. Remove the tilapia from the pan and set it aside. Step 4. In the same pan, add the spinach and cook until wilted, about 1 minute. Step 5. Stir in the cooked kidney beans and cook for an additional minute. Step 6. Serve the tilapia with the spinach and bean mixture.

recipe.name: Vegetarian Bell Pepper Biryani
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat oil in a pan over medium heat and sauté the sliced bell peppers until tender. Set aside.
Step 2. In the same pan, add the diced tomato and cook until it starts to soften. Add the sliced almonds and cook for another minute.
Step 3. In a large pot, heat water and add the rice. Cook according to package instructions until the rice is 3/4 cooked.
Step 4. In a separate pan, heat some oil and sauté the bok choy until wilted. Add the cooked rice to the pan and mix well with the bok choy.
Step 5. Add the cooked bell pepper and tomato mixture to the rice mixture and mix well. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Tuna Tikka Masala
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). 
         Step 2. In a bowl, mix together 2 tablespoons lemon juice, 1 teaspoon garam masala, 
         1 teaspoon cumin powder, and 1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper.
         Step 3. Add the flaked tuna to the bowl and mix well.
         Step 4. Place the tuna mixture on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper and bake for 15 minutes.
         Step 5. Meanwhile, heat 2 tablespoons oil in a pan over medium heat. Add 1 minced onion and cook until translucent.
         Step 6. Add 1 minced garlic and cook for 1 minute. Stir in 1 cup tomato puree and 1 cup water. Bring to a boil and let simmer for 10 minutes.
         Step 7. Stir in 1/4 cup cottage cheese and let simmer for 2-3 minutes or until the sauce thickens slightly.
         Step 8. To assemble, place the baked tuna on a serving dish and spoon the tikka masala sauce over it.

recipe.name: Gluten-Free Rice Pasta
main_ingredients: flour (not used in this recipe, but could be an ingredient to add in future recipes)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cook the rice according to package instructions. Step 2. Chop the onion and sauté it in a pan until translucent. Step 3. Combine the cooked rice and sautéed onion in a large mixing bowl. Step 4. Season the mixture with salt to taste. Step 5. Serve hot.
recipe.note: Note: This recipe is gluten-free as it only uses gluten-free ingredients. However, if you want to make it more gluten-free, you could use a gluten-free pasta instead of rice.

recipe.name: Japanese Broccoli Tempura
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cut broccoli into florets and set aside. In a bowl, mix panko, a pinch of salt, and a pinch of pepper. Step 2. Dip each broccoli floret into the panko mixture to coat, shaking off excess. Step 3. Heat about 2-3 inches of vegetable oil in a deep frying pan over medium-high heat until it reaches 350°F. Step 4. Fry the coated broccoli in batches until golden brown and crispy, about 2-3 minutes per batch. Step 5. Drain the fried broccoli on paper towels and dust with additional panko. Serve with a dipping sauce made from mirin, soy sauce, and wasabi.

recipe.name: Mussel and Lamb Chop Tagine
main_ingredients: 2 medium carrots, peeled and chopped (1 cup)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat the peanut oil in a large Dutch oven over medium-high heat. Add the lamb chop and cook until browned, about 5 minutes. Remove the lamb and set aside. Step 2. Add the chopped carrots and cook until they start to soften, about 5 minutes. Step 3. Add the chopped tomatoes, garlic, cumin, smoked paprika, salt, and pepper. Cook for 2 minutes, stirring occasionally. Step 4. Add the mussels to the pot, cover, and cook until they open, about 5 minutes. Step 5. Add the browned lamb back to the pot and simmer for an additional 2 minutes. Step 6. Serve hot, garnished with fresh parsley or cilantro.

recipe.name: Indian Pork and Broccoli Biryani
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat oil in a pan over medium heat. Add ground pork and cook until browned. Step 2. Add broccoli florets and cook until tender. Step 3. Add chickpeas and stir to combine. Step 4. In a separate pan, heat butter over medium heat. Add cooked rice and stir to combine. Step 5. Combine the pork and broccoli mixture with the rice mixture and stir to combine. Step 6. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Mexican Corn and Queso Pasta
recipe.steps: Step 1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook the pasta according to package instructions until al dente. Reserve 1 cup of pasta water before draining. Step 2. In a large skillet, heat 1 tablespoon of oil over medium-high heat. Add the chicken breast and cook until browned and cooked through, about 5-6 minutes. Step 3. Add the epazote sprigs to the skillet and cook for 1 minute, until fragrant. Step 4. Add the cooked pasta to the skillet, tossing to combine with the chicken and epazote. Step 5. Add the grated queso fresco and reserved pasta water to the skillet, tossing until the cheese is melted and the pasta is well coated. Step 6. Stir in the chopped corn and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, until heated through.

recipe.name: Korean-Style Baked Salmon with Zucchini and Rice
recipe.steps: Step 1: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Step 2: In a small bowl, whisk together 2 tbsp soy sauce, 2 tbsp Gochujang, 2 tbsp brown sugar, 1 tbsp rice vinegar, 2 tbsp water, and 2 cloves minced garlic. Step 3: Place the salmon fillet on the prepared baking sheet, skin side down (if it has skin). Brush the soy sauce mixture evenly over the salmon. Step 4: Toss the zucchinis with 1 tbsp vegetable oil, salt, and pepper on a separate baking sheet. Roast in the oven for 10-12 minutes, or until tender. Step 5: After 15 minutes of baking the salmon, toss the cooked rice with 1 tbsp vegetable oil, soy sauce, and Gochujang in a separate pan. Serve the salmon with roasted zucchinis and flavored rice.
recipe.note: This Korean-style dish combines the flavors of soy sauce, Gochujang, and brown sugar to create a sweet and savory sauce for the salmon. The roasted zucchinis and flavored rice complement the dish nicely.

recipe.name: Grilled Tempeh and Pork Skewers with Salted Lettuce Salad
main_ingredients: 1 block tempeh, cut into bite-sized pieces (120g)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat a grill or grill pan to medium-high heat. Thread tempeh and pork pieces onto skewers. Season with salt. Step 2. Grill the skewers for 10-12 minutes, turning occasionally, until the tempeh is golden brown and the pork is cooked through. Step 3. Meanwhile, mix chopped lettuce with a pinch of salt in a bowl. Step 4. Once the skewers are ready, let them rest for a few minutes before serving. Step 5. Serve the grilled skewers with a side of salted lettuce salad.

recipe.name: Tom Yum Soup
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a large pot over medium-high heat. Add the sliced celery and cook until slightly tender, about 3-4 minutes. Step 2. Add the bruised lemongrass and minced garlic, and cook for another minute, until fragrant. Step 3. Add the tamarind paste, sugar, fish sauce (assuming non-veg preference), and 2 cups of water to the pot. Step 4. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to medium-low and simmer for 10-15 minutes, allowing the flavors to meld. Step 5. Stir in the lemongrass juice and season with salt to taste. Step 6. Serve the soup hot, garnished with sliced lime wedges and a sprinkle of fresh cilantro (optional).

recipe.name: Tomato and Spinach Fried Rice
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tbsp oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add 2 tbsp ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks.
Step 2. Add 1 medium tomato, diced, and cook until the tomato starts to soften.
Step 3. Add 1 cup spinach and cook until wilted.
Step 4. Add 2 cups cooked rice to the skillet, stirring to combine with the other ingredients.
Step 5. Add 1 tsp rice vinegar and 1 tsp lemon juice, and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes to combine.
Step 6. Serve hot.
recipe.note: This recipe is a great way to use up leftover rice and add some protein to your meal. Feel free to customize with your favorite seasonings!

recipe.name: Vietnamese-Style Braised Pork
recipe.steps:
Step 1. In a large pot, heat 2 tablespoons of oil over medium heat. Add the pork and cook until browned on all sides. Remove the pork from the pot and set aside.
Step 2. In the same pot, add the star anise and cook for 1 minute, until fragrant.
Step 3. Add 2 cups of water to the pot and bring to a boil.
Step 4. Return the pork to the pot, cover, and simmer for 1 hour, or until the pork is tender.
Step 5. Remove the pork from the pot and let it rest for 10 minutes before slicing.

recipe.name: Vegetarian Korean Bibimbap
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cook the oats according to package instructions. Set aside. Step 2. Slice the bell peppers and mushrooms into thin pieces. Step 3. Heat a non-stick pan with a small amount of oil and sauté the vegetables until tender. Step 4. Prepare the edamame according to package instructions. Step 5. Assemble the Bibimbap by placing a scoop of cooked oats on a plate, topping with sautéed vegetables and edamame. Serve immediately.
recipe.note: This dish is inspired by traditional Korean Bibimbap and is adapted to accommodate vegetarian dietary preferences. Feel free to customize with your favorite vegetables!

recipe.name: Spicy Mushroom Pasta
recipe.steps: Step 1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil and cook pasta according to package instructions until al dente. Reserve 1 cup of pasta water before draining. Step 2. In a large skillet, heat a couple of tablespoons of the reserved pasta water over medium heat. Add minced garlic and sauté for 1-2 minutes until fragrant. Step 3. Add sliced mushrooms and cook until they release their moisture and start to brown. Step 4. Add sliced bird's eye chili and cook for another minute. Step 5. Combine cooked pasta, mushroom mixture, and a sprinkle of chopped cilantro in a serving dish.

recipe.name: Mackerel and Vegetable Stir-Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cut the onion and mushroom into bite-sized pieces. Step 2. Heat a pan with a small amount of oil over medium heat. Step 3. Add the mackerel fillets and cook for 3-4 minutes per side. Step 4. Add the cauliflower and cook until it's tender. Step 5. Serve the mackerel and vegetables together.
recipe.note: This recipe uses the available ingredients from your inventory, but note that lemon and pasta were requested but not available. They have been added to your shopping list.

recipe.name: Garlic and Mushroom Fried Rice
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add 2 cloves of minced garlic and cook for 1 minute.
Step 2. Add the sliced mushrooms and cook until they release their moisture and start browning, about 3-4 minutes.
Step 3. In a separate bowl, whisk 2 eggs and set aside.
Step 4. Push the mushroom mixture to one side of the skillet. Add the other tablespoon of olive oil to the empty side of the skillet and pour in the whisked eggs. Scramble the eggs until they are cooked through.
Step 5. Mix the eggs with the mushroom mixture and add 2 cups of cooked rice to the skillet. Stir-fry everything together until the rice is heated through and starting to brown.
Step 6. Serve the garlic and mushroom fried rice hot.

recipe.name: Mediterranean Hummus Wrap
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat a pan over medium heat. Saute the sliced bell peppers until tender. Step 2. In a large bowl, combine the cooked bell peppers, lemon juice, hummus, and chopped mint. Step 3. Wash and chop the fresh spinach. Step 4. Add the chopped spinach to the bowl and mix well. Step 5. Place a large tortilla on a flat surface and spread the hummus mixture evenly over half of the tortilla. Step 6. Top with sliced tomatoes and fold the tortilla in half. Step 7. Cook the wrap in the preheated pan until the tortilla is crispy and the filling is heated through.

recipe.name: Roasted Sage Potatoes with Tomato Salsa
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C). Cut the potatoes into 1-inch cubes and toss with 2 tbsp of olive oil, salt, and pepper. Spread on a baking sheet and roast for 20 minutes.
Step 2. In a bowl, mix together diced tomatoes, chopped sage, and pine nuts.
Step 3. After 20 minutes of roasting, remove the potatoes from the oven and toss with the tomato mixture.
Step 4. Drizzle the balsamic vinegar over the potatoes and return to the oven for an additional 10 minutes.
Step 5. Garnish with fresh sage leaves and serve.

recipe.name: Grilled Zucchini and Kale Salad
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat grill or grill pan to medium-high heat. Grill sliced zucchinis for 3-4 minutes per side, until tender.
Step 2. In a large bowl, massage chopped kale with your hands for 2-3 minutes to make it tender.
Step 3. Add cooked ground beef, chopped lettuce, and steamed broccoli to the bowl with kale. Toss to combine.
Step 4. Top the salad with grilled zucchinis and serve immediately.
Step 5. Serve as a side dish or add your favorite dressing to make it a complete meal.
recipe.note: Rice is missing from the inventory. Recipe modified to exclude rice.

recipe.name: Broccoli Teriyaki
recipe.steps: Step 1. In a small saucepan, combine sake, butter, and rice vinegar. Bring to a boil and reduce the sauce by half. Set aside. Step 2. In a large pan, heat 1 tablespoon of sake sauce over medium heat. Add broccoli and cook until tender, about 5 minutes. Step 3. In a small bowl, whisk together remaining sake sauce and lime juice. Step 4. Pour the sauce over the broccoli and toss to coat. Step 5. Serve hot and enjoy!

recipe.name: Sun-Dried Tomato Fettuccine
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook the pasta according to package instructions until al dente. Reserve 1 cup of pasta water before draining.
Step 2. In a large skillet, heat a dash of water over medium heat. Add the sun-dried tomatoes and cook for 2-3 minutes,until fragrant.
Step 3. Add 2 tablespoons of the reserved pasta water to the skillet with the sun-dried tomatoes. Stir to combine.
Step 4. Add the cooked fettuccine to the skillet and toss with the sun-dried tomato sauce. Season with salt to taste.
Step 5. Serve immediately, topped with additional sun-dried tomatoes if desired.

recipe.name: Beef and Broccoli Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add the ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks. Step 2. Add 2 cups of broccoli florets to the skillet and cook for 3-4 minutes, or until they start to soften. Step 3. Add the chopped lettuce to the skillet and stir-fry for 2 minutes. Step 4. Season with soy sauce and stir-fry for another minute. Step 5. Serve hot and enjoy! Step 6. Garnish with sliced green onions, if desired.

recipe.name: Miso Glazed Mushroom and Celery Stir-Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. In a blender or food processor, combine kombu dashi, rice vinegar, and miso paste. Blend until smooth. Set aside. Step 2. In a large skillet or wok, heat 1 tablespoon of oil over medium-high heat. Add the sliced celery and cook for 2-3 minutes, or until slightly tender. Step 3. Add the minced garlic and cook for another minute, stirring constantly to prevent burning. Step 4. Add the mixed mushrooms and cook for 3-4 minutes, or until they release their liquid and start to brown. Step 5. Pour the miso glaze over the mushrooms and celery, and stir to combine. Cook for an additional 1-2 minutes, or until the glaze has thickened slightly. Step 6. Serve hot, garnished with sliced green onions or sesame seeds if desired.

recipe.name: Korean-Style Napa Cabbage Stir Fry
main_ingredients: dried seaweed (2 sheets, soaked and chopped)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat olive oil in a large pan over medium heat. Add minced garlic and sauté until fragrant. Step 2. Add chopped green onion and sauté for another minute. Step 3. Add chopped napa cabbage and bean sprouts. Stir-fry until the vegetables are tender-crisp. Step 4. Add soaked and chopped dried seaweed. Stir-fry for another minute. Step 5. To serve, place a scoop of cooked rice on a plate, then top with the stir-fried vegetables. Serve immediately.

recipe.name: Stir-Fried Tuna and Garlic
recipe.steps: Step 1. Chop the garlic and sauté it in a pan until fragrant. Step 2. Add the tuna to the pan and cook until browned. Step 3. Slice the tuna into strips and serve hot. Step 4. Serve the tuna with a side of stir-fried tomato. Step 5. Garnish with lemon slices.
recipe.note: This recipe uses the available ingredients in the inventory. The missing ingredients, bell pepper and pepper, are added to the shopping list.

recipe.name: Grilled Salmon with Vietnamese-Style Zucchini
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Step 2. Cut potatoes into wedges and brush with 1 tbsp vegetable oil. Grill for 5 minutes per side. Step 3. Cut zucchinis into slices and brush with 1 tbsp vegetable oil. Grill for 3-4 minutes per side. Step 4. Season salmon fillet with soy sauce, fish sauce, lime juice, ginger, sugar, and black pepper. Grill for 4-5 minutes per side. Step 5. Serve grilled salmon with roasted potatoes and zucchinis.

recipe.name: Thai Mushroom Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Cook pasta according to package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside.
Step 2. In a wok or large skillet, heat 1 tablespoon of oil over medium-high heat. Add garlic and sauté until fragrant.
Step 3. Add the sliced mushrooms and stir-fry until they release their liquid and start browning.
Step 4. Add the cooked pasta, soy sauce (optional), and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes, until the pasta is well coated.
Step 5. Add the sliced bird's eye chilies and stir-fry for another 1-2 minutes.
Step 6. Squeeze the juice of the lime over the stir-fry and stir well to combine.
Step 7. Serve immediately, garnished with fresh cilantro if desired.

recipe.name: Keto Mexican-Style Grilled Skirt Steak
main_ingredients: beef steak (1.5 pounds), sliced into thin strips
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Season the sliced beef steak with cumin, chili powder, salt, and pepper. Step 2. Grill the seasoned beef for 5-7 minutes per side or until cooked to your desired level of doneness. Step 3. Meanwhile, grill the sliced sausage for 2-3 minutes per side or until slightly charred. Step 4. Grill the ground pork for 5-7 minutes or until browned and cooked through. Step 5. Once the beef is cooked, let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it thinly against the grain. Step 6. Serve the sliced beef with grilled sausage, ground pork, and sliced avocado on the side. Squeeze lime juice over the top and serve immediately.

recipe.name: Palak Mackerel Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat a non-stick pan with 1 tablespoon of oil. Step 2. Add cumin, coriander, turmeric, and cayenne pepper powder. Let it sizzle for a few seconds. Step 3. Add mackerel fillet and cook until it's golden brown from both sides. Step 4. In a separate pan, heat the other tablespoon of oil. Step 5. Add zucchini and cabbage. Cook until they are tender. Step 6. Mix lemon juice, salt, and cooked rice, and add it to the vegetable mix. Step 7. Serve the Palak Mackerel Fry with the vegetable rice.

recipe.name: Indian-Style Spinach and Coriander Saag
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Rinse the spinach and coriander leaves. Chop them coarsely and set aside.
Step 2. Heat the ghee in a pan over medium heat. Add the chopped garlic and sauté until fragrant.
Step 3. Add the chili powder and cook for 1 minute, until fragrant.
Step 4. Add the chopped spinach and coriander to the pan. Cook, stirring occasionally, until the greens have wilted.
Step 5. Season with salt to taste and serve hot.

recipe.name: Stir-Fried Lemongrass Spinach
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat butter in a pan over medium heat. Add sliced lemongrass and sauté until fragrant. Step 2. Add chopped pepper and stir-fry for 1 minute. Step 3. Add fresh spinach leaves and stir-fry until wilted. Step 4. Season with salt to taste. Step 5. Serve immediately.

recipe.name: Mexican Sopa de Tortilla
recipe.steps: Step 1. Chop onion and celery. Mince garlic and sauté in a bit of oil until soft. Step 2. Add diced pork and cook until browned, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks. Step 3. Add tomatillos, broth, and tortilla chips to the pot. Step 4. Simmer the soup for 20 minutes or until the flavors have melded together. Step 5. Taste and adjust the seasoning. Step 6. Serve hot, garnished with chopped cilantro and a squeeze of lime juice.

recipe.name: Lime and Maple Syrup Glazed Broccoli
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Step 2. In a large bowl, whisk together maple syrup, lime juice, and lemon juice. Step 3. Add chopped pickles, sliced onion, and broccoli florets to the bowl. Step 4. Toss to coat the broccoli evenly with the glaze. Step 5. Spread the broccoli mixture on a baking sheet and bake for 15-20 minutes or until tender and lightly caramelized.

recipe.name: Quinoa Stuffed Cauliflower with Black Bean Tempeh Crumble
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Toss cauliflower with 1 tbsp olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Roast in the oven for 15 minutes. Step 2. Cook quinoa according to package instructions. Step 3. In a pan, heat 1 tbsp olive oil over medium heat. Add chopped onion and cook until softened. Step 4. Add cooked black beans, crumbled tempeh, and chopped cashews to the pan. Stir to combine. Step 5. Once the cauliflower is done roasting, fill it with the quinoa mixture and top with the black bean tempeh crumble.

recipe.name: Japanese Garlic Fried Rice
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add 1 minced garlic clove and cook for 30 seconds.
Step 2. Add 2 cups of cooked rice to the skillet and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes.
Step 3. In a small bowl, mix 1 teaspoon of flour and 1 teaspoon of wasabi. Add this mixture to the rice and stir-fry for another 2 minutes.
Step 4. Add the remaining 1 garlic clove, minced, and 1 teaspoon of pepper to the rice and stir-fry for 1 minute.
Step 5. Serve hot and garnish with sesame seeds, if desired.

recipe.name: Basmati Rice with Spiced Ground Beef
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat oil in a pan over medium heat. Add cinnamon and sauté for 1 minute. Step 2. Add ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it into small pieces as it cooks. Step 3. Add chili powder and mix well. Step 4. Add cooked basmati rice to the pan and mix everything together. Step 5. Season with salt to taste. Step 6. Serve hot, garnished with fresh cilantro if desired.

recipe.name: Roasted Bok Choy with Almonds
recipe.steps: Step 1: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Rinse the bok choy and trim the ends. Step 2: Place bok choy on a baking sheet and drizzle with vegetable oil. Step 3: Sprinkle almonds over the bok choy. Step 4: Roast in the oven for 15-20 minutes or until tender. Step 5: Serve hot.

recipe.name: Mexican Corn Fritters
recipe.steps: Step 1. In a bowl, whisk together eggs and a pinch of salt. Add the diced avocado, chopped chipotle, and crumbled cotija cheese. Mix well. Step 2. Add the corn to the bowl and stir until everything is well combined. Step 3. Using your hands, shape the mixture into small patties. Step 4. Heat a non-stick skillet or griddle over medium heat. Step 5. Add the patties to the skillet and cook for 3-4 minutes on each side, until they're golden brown and crispy.
recipe.note: Authentic Mexican cooking often uses tortillas as a primary ingredient, but in this recipe, we're using corn as the main component to create a crispy fritter.

recipe.name: Southern Style Corn Fritters (Mock Version)
main_ingredients: duck breast (marrow, use as egg substitute, 25g)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat a non-stick skillet over medium heat. In a bowl, mix together corn, nutritional yeast, sugar, and duck breast marrow. Step 2. Add a little water to achieve a thick batter consistency. Step 3. Pour the mixture and shape into round fritters. Step 4. Cook the fritters for 2-3 minutes on each side until golden brown. Step 5. Serve with a fresh lettuce salad.
recipe.note: Note: Although duck breast is not a typical vegan ingredient, in this recipe, we've used its marrow as a substitute for eggs. This allows us to create a fritter-like texture without compromising the vegan dietary preference.

recipe.name: Mackerel and Sweet Potato Fritters
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat a non-stick pan with 1 tablespoon of oil over medium heat. In a bowl, mix together sweet potato, edamame, mackerel pieces, and nutritional yeast (if using). Step 2. Using your hands, shape the mixture into small patties. Step 3. Place the patties in the pan and cook for 3-4 minutes on each side, until golden brown. Step 4. In a separate pan, heat 1 tablespoon of oil over medium heat and sauté the diced bell pepper until tender. Step 5. Serve the fritters hot with the sautéed bell pepper.

recipe.name: Kimchi Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Cut the green onions into 2-inch pieces and set aside.
Step 2. In a pan, heat the vegetable oil over medium heat. Add the green onions and stir-fry until slightly softened.
Step 3. Add the spinach to the pan and stir-fry until wilted.
Step 4. Squeeze the fresh lime juice over the spinach mixture and season with salt to taste.
Step 5. Serve hot, garnished with additional green onions if desired.

recipe.name: Korean-Style Grilled Tilapia with Gochujang Glaze
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Prepare the gochujang glaze by whisking together gochujang, coconut aminos, rice vinegar, ginger, and garlic in a small bowl. Set aside.
Step 2. Season the tilapia with salt and pepper. Heat a grill pan over medium-high heat and grill the tilapia for 4-5 minutes per side, or until cooked through.
Step 3. In a small saucepan, heat the sesame oil over medium heat. Add the gochujang glaze and cook for 2-3 minutes, stirring constantly, until thickened.
Step 4. Brush the gochujang glaze over the grilled tilapia during the last minute of cooking.
Step 5. Serve the grilled tilapia with a side of sautéed spinach leaves, cooked in a little sesame oil until wilted.

recipe.name: Carrot and Chicken Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat a pan over medium heat and add the diced chicken breast. Cook until browned, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat and set aside. Step 2. In the same pan, add a bit more oil and sauté the grated carrot and thinly sliced onion until they are tender, about 5 minutes. Step 3. Add the cooked chicken back into the pan and stir to combine with the carrot and onion mixture. Step 4. Season with salt to taste. Step 5. Serve the Carrot and Chicken Stir Fry hot, garnished with chopped green onions if desired.

recipe.name: Gluten-Free Grilled Pork and Broccoli
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat a grill pan over medium-high heat. Season the pork with salt and grill for 5 minutes on each side, until browned and cooked through. Step 2. In a separate pan, heat a tablespoon of oil over medium heat. Add the bell pepper and broccoli and cook for 5 minutes, until tender. Step 3. In a small bowl, whisk together a sauce made from a mixture of gluten-free soy sauce (or tamari), olive oil, and rice vinegar. Step 4. Once the pork is cooked, let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it thinly. Step 5. Serve the pork with the grilled broccoli and bell pepper, and garnish with shredded lettuce.

recipe.name: Thai-Style Pasta with Cilantro and Spinach
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Cook pasta according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
Step 2. In a blender or food processor, combine cilantro, lemon, and lemon grass. Blend until a smooth paste forms.
Step 3. Heat oil in a pan over medium heat. Add the cilantro paste and cook for 2 minutes.
Step 4. Add spinach to the pan and cook until wilted. Season with salt to taste.
Step 5. Combine cooked pasta and spinach mixture. Toss to coat pasta evenly.

recipe.name: Creamy Mushroom Pasta
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cook the pasta in boiling water until al dente. Drain and set aside. Step 2. In a large skillet, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the sliced mushrooms and cook until they release their moisture and start browning. Step 3. Add the diced tomato and ketchup to the skillet, stirring to combine. Step 4. Add the cooked pasta to the skillet, tossing to coat with the mushroom-tomato sauce. Step 5. Serve the creamy pasta hot, garnished with extra butter if desired.

recipe.name: Spicy Lime Broccoli Wrap
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Cut the chicken breast into thin strips and season with salt. Heat 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil in a pan over medium heat and cook the chicken until browned and cooked through. Set aside.
Step 2. Cut the broccoli into florets and place in a steamer basket. Steam for 3-4 minutes until tender.
Step 3. Slice the bird's eye chili and sauté in 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil until fragrant.
Step 4. In a pan, heat 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil and sauté the garlic until fragrant.
Step 5. Wrap the cooked chicken, broccoli, and chili in rice paper sheets, serve with lime juice.

recipe.name: Tilapia and Cashew Pasta Alternative
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Step 2. Season the tilapia fillets with salt and pepper. Place on a baking sheet and bake for 12-15 minutes or until cooked through.
Step 3. Meanwhile, cook the lentils according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
Step 4. In a blender or food processor, blend the cashews with lemon juice until smooth.
Step 5. In a large skillet, heat the cashew-lemon sauce over medium heat. Add the diced tomato and cook for 3-4 minutes or until softened.
Step 6. To serve, place the cooked lentils on a plate, top with a tilapia fillet, and spoon the cashew-tomato sauce over the top.
recipe.note: Pasta would have been a great addition to this dish, but it's not available in your inventory. The cashew-lemon sauce replaces traditional pasta sauce.

recipe.name: Thai Basil Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat butter in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat. Add pork and cook until browned, about 3-4 minutes. Step 2. Add bell pepper and cook until tender, about 3-4 minutes. Step 3. Add thai basil, lime juice, and coconut milk. Stir-fry for 2 minutes. Step 4. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Step 5. Serve hot, garnished with additional thai basil if desired.

recipe.name: Tuna and Cucumber Stir-Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cut the cucumber into thin slices. Step 2. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a pan over medium heat. Step 3. Add the tuna and cook for 5-6 minutes on each side, or until it's cooked through. Step 4. Stir in the cucumber slices and cook for another 2 minutes. Step 5. Serve hot.
recipe.note: This recipe uses tuna and cucumber from your available ingredients. Unfortunately, lime is not available, which is typically used in Asian-style stir-fries for added flavor.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Sausage with Roasted Vegetables
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the sliced sausage and cook for 5 minutes on each side, or until browned and cooked through. Step 2. Remove the cooked sausage from the skillet and set aside. Step 3. In the same skillet, add the remaining 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil. Add the sliced mushrooms and cook for 5 minutes, or until they release their liquid and start to brown. Step 4. Add the green beans and brussels sprouts to the skillet with the mushrooms and cook for an additional 5 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender. Step 5. Serve the roasted vegetables alongside the cooked sausage.

recipe.name: Spinach and Quinoa Bowl
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Rinse the quinoa and cook it according to the package instructions in 2 cups of water. Set aside. 
Step 2. Chop the onion, cucumber, and spinach. 
Step 3. Pan-fry the cubed tofu with a little bit of oil until golden brown. 
Step 4. In a large bowl, combine the cooked quinoa, pan-fried tofu, cucumber, onion, and spinach. 
Step 5. Squeeze a bit of lemon juice and add salt and pepper to taste. 
Step 6. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Olive Oil Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Slice the celery into thin strips and set aside. Heat the olive oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks. Step 2. Add the sliced celery to the wok and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes, until it begins to soften. Step 3. Add the rice noodles to the wok and stir-fry for another 2-3 minutes, until the noodles are well coated with the oil and the celery is tender. Step 4. Squeeze the juice of 1 lime over the noodles and stir-fry for a final minute, until the flavors have melded together. Step 5. Serve the stir-fry hot, garnished with any additional sliced celery or lime wedges if desired.

recipe.name: Shrimp and Vegetable Risotto
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chopped carrot and cook until tender, about 5 minutes. Step 2. Add the chopped kale to the skillet and cook until wilted, about 2 minutes. Step 3. Add the cooked rice to the skillet and stir to combine with the vegetables. Step 4. Add 2 cups of water to the skillet and bring to a boil. Step 5. Reduce the heat to low and simmer, covered, for 15-20 minutes, or until the water has been absorbed and the rice is tender.

recipe.name: Grilled Eggplant and Corn
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat grill to medium heat. Step 2. Brush eggplant slices with 2 tablespoons olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Step 3. Grill eggplant for 3-4 minutes per side, or until tender. Step 4. Grill corn for 5-6 minutes, turning occasionally, or until charred. Step 5. To assemble, place a few slices of eggplant on a plate, top with black beans, and serve with grilled corn.
recipe.note: No broccoli is available.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Duck Breast with Caramelized Onion
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Season the duck breast with salt.
recipe.note: Use a skillet with a lid to achieve a nice crust on the duck breast.

recipe.name: Lemon Broccoli Fritters
recipe.steps: Step 1. In a bowl, whisk together eggs and a pinch of salt. Step 2. Add broccoli, vegetable oil, lemon juice, and a zest of lemon to the bowl. Mix well. Step 3. Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat. Drop rounded spoonfuls of the broccoli mixture onto the skillet. Step 4. Flatten the mixture slightly with a spatula and cook for about 3-4 minutes on each side, until golden brown. Step 5. Serve hot with a squeeze of lemon.

recipe.name: Pasta Bolognese with Cod
main_ingredients: 1 head of cauliflower, broken into florets
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil and cook the pasta according to the package instructions until al dente. Reserve 1 cup of pasta water before draining the spaghetti.
Step 2. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium-high heat. Add the ground pork and cook, breaking it up with a spoon, until browned, about 5 minutes.
Step 3. Add the cod pieces to the skillet and cook until opaque and flaked, about 3-4 minutes. Remove from heat and set aside.
Step 4. In the same skillet, add the broken cauliflower and cook until tender, about 5 minutes. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Step 5. Add the reserved pasta water to the skillet and stir to combine. Then, add the cooked pasta to the skillet, tossing to coat with the cauliflower and sauce.
Step 6. Serve the pasta hot, topped with the cooked ground pork and cod, and garnished with chopped almonds.

recipe.name: Greek-Style Stuffed Mushrooms
main_ingredients: 2 cups mushroom (2 large mushroom caps cleaned and stems removed)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). Step 2. In a pan, heat 1 tbsp of vegetable oil over medium heat. Add the mushroom stems and cook until they release their moisture and start browning. Step 3. Add the diced cucumber to the pan and cook for 2-3 minutes until it softens. Step 4. In a bowl, mix together the cooked mushroom stems and cucumber mixture, crumbled feta cheese, and a pinch of salt. Step 5. Stuff each mushroom cap with the mixture and drizzle with the remaining 1 tbsp of vegetable oil. Step 6. Bake the stuffed mushrooms in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes until they're tender and the filling is heated through.

recipe.name: Vegetarian Quinoa Bowl with Roasted Broccoli
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). Toss broccoli florets with 1 tablespoon of oil, salt, and pepper, and spread on a baking sheet. Roast in the oven for 20 minutes or until tender.

Step 2. In a large pan, heat 1 tablespoon of oil over medium heat. Add the cubed potatoes and cook for 10 minutes or until they start to brown. Add 1/2 cup of water and cover the pan, reducing the heat to low. Simmer for 15 minutes or until the potatoes are tender.

Step 3. Meanwhile, cook quinoa according to package instructions. Set aside.

Step 4. In a bowl, toss together roasted broccoli, cooked quinoa, and sliced cucumber.

Step 5. To assemble the quinoa bowl, place a portion of cooked quinoa on a plate, followed by a portion of roasted broccoli, and top with cubed potatoes. Garnish with fresh herbs or lemon wedges if desired.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Cod with Spinach
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat a non-stick pan with 1 tbsp of olive oil over medium heat. Season cod fillets with salt and pepper. Step 2. Add pork belly to the pan and cook until crispy (3-4 minutes). Step 3. Remove pork belly from the pan and set aside. Step 4. Add cod fillets to the pan and sear for 2-3 minutes on each side, or until cooked through. Step 5. Add spinach to the pan and cook until wilted. Step 6. Serve cod with spinach and crispy pork belly.
recipe.note: Note: This recipe uses available ingredients and omits requested items onion and lettuce. For a complete recipe, add onion and lettuce to your shopping list.

recipe.name: Lamb and Veggie Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cut the lamb chop into small pieces and season with salt. Step 2. Heat a pan over medium heat and cook the lamb for 3-4 minutes. Step 3. Add broccoli and lettuce to the pan and cook for 5-6 minutes. Step 4. Serve the lamb and veggie mixture over a bed of cooked rice.
recipe.note: This recipe can be modified to suit your dietary preferences. We had to exclude eggs from the original ingredients.

recipe.name: Roasted Celery and Carrot Pasta
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 200°C. Cut the carrots and celery into bite-sized pieces and place them on a baking sheet. Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with minced garlic. Step 2. Roast the carrots and celery in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes or until tender. Step 3. Cook the pasta according to the package instructions. Drain and set aside. Step 4. In a large skillet, combine the roasted carrots and celery, cooked pasta, and a squeeze of fresh lime juice. Step 5. Toss everything together to combine and season with salt and pepper to taste.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Vegetable Stir-Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the diced onion and cook until translucent, about 3-4 minutes.
Step 2. Add the minced garlic and cook for an additional 1 minute, until fragrant.
Step 3. Add the medium-diced bell pepper and cook for 3-4 minutes, until tender.
Step 4. Add the fresh spinach to the skillet and cook until wilted, about 2 minutes.
Step 5. Season with black pepper to taste, and serve immediately.

recipe.name: Roasted Brussels Sprouts with Cauliflower
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C). Cut the cauliflower into florets and the carrots into sticks.
              Step 2. Place the brussels sprouts and vegetables on a baking sheet and drizzle with olive oil.
              Step 3. Roast in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender and caramelized.
              Step 4. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
              Step 5. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Spinach and Bean Sprouts Fried Rice
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add minced garlic and cook for 1 minute until fragrant.
 Step 2. Add the bean sprouts and cook for 3-4 minutes until they start to brown, stirring occasionally.
 Step 3. Add the cooked rice to the skillet, breaking up any clumps with a spatula. Stir-fry the rice with the bean sprouts and garlic for 5 minutes.
 Step 4. Add the fresh spinach to the skillet and stir-fry until wilted.
 Step 5. Season with soy sauce to taste and garnish with chopped cilantro. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Thai-Style Stir-Fried Mushroom with Holy Basil
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat a pan over medium-high heat and add 1 tablespoon coconut milk. Cook for 2 minutes until fragrant.
Step 2. Add sliced mushroom and cook until tender, about 3-4 minutes.
Step 3. Add chopped holy basil, sliced celery, and chopped lettuce. Cook until the vegetables are wilted.
Step 4. Stir in the lime juice and season with salt to taste.
Step 5. Serve immediately and garnish with kaffir lime leaves if desired.

recipe.name: Korean-Style Beef and Rice Bowl
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cook the rice according to package instructions and set aside. Step 2. Heat 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil in a pan over medium heat. Add the ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks. Step 3. Add the sesame seeds to the pan and stir-fry for 1-2 minutes until fragrant. Step 4. In a small bowl, whisk together the lemon juice and a pinch of salt. Pour the lemon sauce over the beef and sesame seed mixture, and stir-fry for another minute. Step 5. To assemble the dish, place a scoop of cooked rice in a bowl and top with the beef and sesame seed mixture.

recipe.name: Vegan Eggplant Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium-high heat. Add the garlic and cook for 1 minute.
Step 2. Add the eggplant slices to the skillet and cook for 3-4 minutes per side, or until tender.
Step 3. In a separate pan, cook the tempeh until crispy and golden brown.
Step 4. In a large bowl, combine the cooked eggplant, tempeh, and mixed greens.
Step 5. Serve immediately.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Asparagus and Brussels Sprouts
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Rinse the asparagus and Brussels sprouts, pat dry with paper towels.
Step 2. Season the duck breast with salt and pepper.
Step 3. Heat 1 tbsp of vegetable oil in a pan over medium heat. Sear the duck breast for 2-3 minutes on each side, then set aside.
Step 4. In the same pan, add the remaining 1 tbsp of vegetable oil. Add the asparagus and Brussels sprouts, cook for 5-6 minutes until tender.
Step 5. Serve the asparagus and Brussels sprouts with the pan-seared duck breast and a squeeze of lime juice.

recipe.name: Italian-Style Broccoli Pasta
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook the pasta according to package instructions until al dente. Reserve 1 cup of pasta water and then drain the pasta.
Step 2. In a large skillet, heat 1 tablespoon of oil over medium heat. Add the broccoli and bell pepper, and cook until the vegetables are tender and lightly browned, about 5-7 minutes.
Step 3. Add the cooked pasta to the skillet with the vegetables, and toss to combine.
Step 4. Season with salt to taste, and add some reserved pasta water if the mixture seems dry.
Step 5. Serve hot and enjoy!

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Chicken with Roasted Veggies
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 220°C (425°F). Season the chicken breast with salt and pepper. Step 2. Heat 1 tablespoon of butter in an oven-safe pan over medium heat. Sear the chicken breast for 2-3 minutes on each side. Step 3. Transfer the pan to the preheated oven and bake for 12-15 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through. Step 4. In a separate pan, sauté the sliced potato in butter until golden brown. Step 5. Toss the cauliflower florets with olive oil, salt, and pepper. Spread on a baking sheet and roast in the oven for 15-20 minutes or until tender.

recipe.name: Spicy Spinach Rice Bowl
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tsp of butter in a pan over medium heat. Add 1 cup of spinach and sauté until wilted. Step 2. Add 1 cup of cooked rice to the pan and stir well. Step 3. Squeeze juice of 1/2 lemon over the rice and spinach mixture. Step 4. Add 1 tsp of hot sauce and stir well. Step 5. Serve hot and garnish with a squeeze of lemon juice.

recipe.name: Roasted Bell Pepper and Mushroom Delight
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C). Place the sliced bell peppers on a baking sheet and drizzle with 1 tablespoon of olive oil. Roast for 20 minutes or until the skin is blistered, then let cool.

Step 2. Heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a pan over medium heat. Add the sliced mushrooms and cook until they release their liquid and start browning, about 5 minutes.

Step 3. Add the chopped celery to the pan with the mushrooms and cook for another 2-3 minutes until the celery is slightly tender.

Step 4. Once the roasted bell peppers have cooled, peel off the skin and slice them into strips.

Step 5. To assemble the dish, place a portion of the roasted bell pepper strips on a plate, followed by a spoonful of the mushroom and celery mixture.
recipe.note: This recipe is a flavorful and colorful dish that combines the sweetness of roasted bell peppers with the earthiness of sautéed mushrooms and celery. Enjoy as a side dish or add it to a salad for extra nutrition.

recipe.name: Miso Glazed Mushroom Nori Rolls
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C). Step 2. In a small bowl, mix together miso paste, wasabi, and a splash of water to create a glaze. Step 3. In a separate pan, sauté the onion and mushroom in a little water until tender. Step 4. Assemble the nori rolls with the sautéed mixture and drizzle the miso glaze on top. Step 5. Bake in the preheated oven for 5-7 minutes or until the nori is crispy. Step 6. Serve hot and enjoy!

recipe.name: Spicy Korean Cashew Stir-Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the sliced onion and cook until caramelized, about 5 minutes.
Step 2. Add 1/2 cup of chopped cashews to the skillet and cook for an additional 2 minutes, stirring frequently.
Step 3. In a small bowl, whisk together 2 tablespoons of sugar, 1 tablespoon of soy sauce, and 1 tablespoon of gochujang (Korean chili paste).
Step 4. Pour the sugar-soy-gochujang mixture into the skillet and stir to combine.
Step 5. Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, until the sauce has thickened and the cashews are well coated.

recipe.name: Tilapia and Edamame Stir Fry with Pan-Seared Tuna
recipe.steps: Step 1. Slice the bell pepper and set aside. Step 2. Season the tilapia fillets with salt and pepper. Step 3. Heat 1 tbsp of vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the tilapia and cook for 3-4 minutes per side, or until cooked through. Step 4. In a separate pan, heat 1 tbsp of vegetable oil over medium heat. Add the sliced edamame and cook for 2-3 minutes, or until tender. Step 5. In a third pan, heat 1 tbsp of sesame oil over medium heat. Add the sliced bell pepper and cook for 2-3 minutes, or until tender. Step 6. Add the cooked edamame to the bell pepper pan and stir to combine. Step 7. Slice the cooked tuna steak into thin strips. Step 8. Serve the tilapia and edamame stir fry with pan-seared tuna on top.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Salmon and Sweet Potato with Mussel Salsa
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat a skillet over medium-high heat and add 1 tbsp of oil. Season the salmon fillets with salt and pepper. Step 2. Pan-sear the salmon for 3-4 minutes per side or until cooked through. Step 3. Meanwhile, peel and chop the sweet potatoes into 1/2-inch cubes. Toss with 1 tbsp of oil and roast in the oven at 400°F for 15-20 minutes or until tender. Step 4. In a separate pan, heat 1 tbsp of oil over medium heat. Add the mussels and cook until they open, about 3-4 minutes. Step 5. To make the salsa, chop the cooked mussels and combine with chopped peanuts, 1 tbsp of lemon juice, and salt to taste. Serve the pan-seared salmon with roasted sweet potatoes and mussel salsa.

recipe.name: Mussel and Cashew Paella
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil in a large paella pan over medium-high heat. Add the chopped bell pepper and sauté until tender, about 5 minutes.
Step 2. Add the chopped cashews and cook for an additional 2 minutes, stirring frequently to prevent burning.
Step 3. Add the sardines and cook for 1 minute, breaking them up with a spoon as they cook.
Step 4. Add the mussels and 1 cup of water to the pan. Cover and cook until the mussels open, about 8-10 minutes.
Step 5. Stir in 2 cloves of minced garlic and cook for 1 minute. Serve hot, garnished with chopped kale or lettuce.

recipe.name: Spinach and Tomato Fritters
recipe.steps:
Step 1. In a pan, heat 2 tablespoons of vegetable oil over medium heat.
Step 2. Add the minced garlic and sauté for 1 minute until fragrant.
Step 3. Add the chopped bell peppers and sauté for 2 minutes until tender.
Step 4. Add the chopped tomatoes and spinach, stir well and cook for 3-4 minutes until the vegetables are well combined.
Step 5. In a separate bowl, mix together 1 cup of flour and a pinch of salt. Add the cooked vegetable mixture and mix well.
Step 6. Using your hands, shape the mixture into small patties.
Step 7. Heat a non-stick pan with a little vegetable oil over medium heat.
Step 8. Add the patties and cook for 3-4 minutes on each side until golden brown.

recipe.name: Roasted Broccoli and Potato Medley
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C). Cut the potatoes and onion into 1-inch pieces. Toss with 2 tablespoons of olive oil, salt, and pepper on a baking sheet. Step 2.
