Roast in the preheated oven for 20 minutes, until the potatoes start to brown. Step 3. Add the broccoli to the baking sheet and toss to coat with the remaining oil. Step 4. Return the baking sheet to the oven and roast for another 15-20 minutes, until the broccoli is tender and the potatoes are golden brown. Step 5. Remove from the oven and serve hot. Garnish with chopped fresh herbs if desired.

recipe.name: Kimchi Spinach Pasta with Gochujang Sauce
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cook pasta according to the package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside. Step 2. In a blender or food processor, blend gochujang, sugar, and 2 tbsp water until smooth. Step 3. In a pan, heat 1 tbsp of water over medium heat. Add blended gochujang mixture and cook for 2-3 minutes, stirring constantly. Step 4. In the same pan, add spinach and cook until wilted. Step 5. Combine cooked pasta, gochujang sauce, and spinach in a bowl. Mix well to combine. Step 6. Serve hot garnished with toasted flour breadcrumbs.
recipe.note: This is a creative fusion of Korean and Italian cuisines using a vegan-friendly gochujang sauce and spinach. Enjoy!

recipe.name: Mackerel Tandoori
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C). Step 2. In a blender or food processor, blend the tempeh, 1/4 cup water, and 1 tablespoon of lemon juice to create a paste. Step 3. In a large bowl, combine the mackerel, tempeh paste, lemon juice, garam masala, cumin, coriander, cayenne pepper, salt, and black pepper. Step 4. Add the sliced onion and mushroom to the bowl and mix well. Step 5. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and bake for 15-20 minutes or until the mackerel is cooked through.

recipe.name: Gluten-Free Japanese Shrimp and Eggplant Stir-Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cut the eggplant into thin slices and place them on a plate. Sprinkle both sides with salt to remove excess moisture. Let it sit for 10 minutes and then pat dry with paper towels. Step 2. In a small bowl, whisk together soy sauce and sake (or gluten-free substitute). Add the chopped cashews and mix well. Step 3. Heat 2 tablespoons of vegetable oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add the tilapia pieces and cook until browned, about 3-4 minutes per side. Remove from the skillet and set aside. Step 4. In the same skillet, add the remaining 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil. Add the eggplant slices and cook until they start to brown, about 3-4 minutes per side. Step 5. Add the shrimp to the skillet and cook until pink and fully cooked, about 2-3 minutes per side. Step 6. Return the cooked tilapia to the skillet and pour in the soy sauce mixture. Stir to combine and cook for an additional 1-2 minutes. Step 7. Serve the stir-fry hot, garnished with chopped lettuce.

recipe.name: Thai Coconut Rice
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 cup water in a saucepan over high heat. Step 2. Bring the water to a boil. Step 3. Once boiling, reduce heat to low, add 1 cup rice to the saucepan and stir gently. Step 4. Add 1 cup coconut milk to the saucepan and stir. Step 5. Cook for 10-15 minutes, or until the rice is fully cooked. Step 6. Stir in 1 cup Thai curry paste for extra flavor.

recipe.name: Vegetarian Cashew and Bell Pepper Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat.
Step 2. Add the sliced bell pepper and cook for 3-4 minutes or until tender.
Step 3. Add the cashews and cook for an additional 2 minutes, stirring constantly.
Step 4. Stir in the lemon juice and season with salt to taste.
Step 5. Serve the cashew and bell pepper mixture over a bed of rice or noodles.

recipe.name: Thai-Style Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chopped galangal and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
Step 2. Add the sliced pork to the wok and cook until browned, about 3-4 minutes. Remove from the wok and set aside.
Step 3. In the same wok, add the chopped onion and cook until translucent, about 2-3 minutes.
Step 4. Add the chopped bird's eye chilies and cook for another minute, until fragrant.
Step 5. Push the vegetables to one side of the wok. Crack in the eggs and scramble them until cooked through. Then, mix with the vegetables.
Step 6. Add the cooked pork back into the wok, along with the chopped spinach. Stir-fry until the spinach has wilted.
Step 7. Serve hot, garnished with lime wedges.

recipe.name: Spicy Beef Potato Hash
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Peel and chop the potatoes into large chunks and boil them until tender. Drain excess water.
Step 2. Chop the bread into small cubes and toast them until crispy. 
Step 3. In a pan, heat a tablespoon of oil and add the ground beef. Cook until browned.
Step 4. Add chopped pepper to the pan and sauté for a minute. Add hot sauce and stir well.
Step 5. Serve the cooked potatoes on top of a bed of bread, and spoon the spicy beef mixture over the potatoes.

recipe.name: Thai Chili Chicken Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1: Marinate the chicken breast in 1 tsp sugar, 1 tsp fish sauce (not in inventory, assume omitting), and 1 tsp Thai chili for at least 5 minutes.
Step 2: Heat 1 tbsp oil in a pan over medium heat and cook the marinated chicken until browned and cooked through.
Step 3: In the same pan, sauté 3 cloves of minced garlic until fragrant.
Step 4: Add 3-4 Thai chilies, sliced, and cook for an additional 2 minutes.
Step 5: Serve the chicken and stir-fry together, garnished with chopped Thai basil (not in inventory, assume omitting).

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Cod with Asparagus
recipe.steps: Step 1. Rinse the cod fillets under cold water and pat them dry with paper towels. Step 2. Heat a non-stick skillet over medium-high heat. Step 3. Add a small amount of oil to the skillet and sear the cod fillets for 3-4 minutes on each side, until cooked through. Step 4. Meanwhile, steam the asparagus in a separate pot until tender. Step 5. Season the cod with salt, pepper, and lemon juice. Step 6. Serve the pan-seared cod with steamed asparagus.

recipe.name: Carrot and Mushroom Fricassee
recipe.steps:
Step 1. In a large skillet, heat 2 tablespoons of oil over medium heat. Add the sliced garlic and sauté for 1 minute until fragrant.
Step 2. Add the sliced carrots to the skillet and cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Step 3. Add the sliced mushrooms to the skillet and continue cooking for another 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Step 4. Pour in the lemon juice and stir to combine. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Step 5. Serve the fricassee hot, garnished with chopped fresh herbs if desired.

recipe.name: Grilled Pork with Lime and Rice
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Cut the pork into 1-inch thick slices and season with salt and pepper.
Step 2. Grill the pork for 5-6 minutes per side, or until cooked through. Let it rest for 5 minutes before slicing.
Step 3. In a small bowl, whisk together lime juice and olive oil to make a marinade.
Step 4. Slice the cooked pork into thin strips and toss with the marinade.
Step 5. Heat a small pan over medium heat and add the sliced carrots. Cook for 5-7 minutes, or until tender.
Step 6. Serve the grilled pork with sliced carrots and steamed rice.

recipe.name: Korean-Style Stir-Fried Broccoli and Bell Pepper
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Step 2. Add the chopped green onions and sauté for 2 minutes until fragrant. Step 3. Add the sliced bell pepper and sauté for 3-4 minutes until tender. Step 4. Add the broccoli florets, Korean chili pepper, and chopped perilla leaves. Stir-fry for 4-5 minutes until the vegetables are tender-crisp. Step 5. Season with lemon juice and serve hot.

recipe.name: Ginger and Chickpea Curry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat oil in a large pan over medium heat. Add minced garlic and sauté for 1 minute.
Step 2. Add diced bell pepper to the pan and cook for 3-4 minutes until tender.
Step 3. Add grated ginger to the pan and cook for 1 minute.
Step 4. Add chickpeas and curry powder to the pan. Stir well and cook for 2 minutes.
Step 5. Mix flour with a little water to make a paste. Add the paste to the pan and stir well. Cook for 2-3 minutes until the curry thickens.

recipe.name: Lemon Rice Noodle Stir Fry
main_ingredients: milk (2 tbsp, as a sauce thickener)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cook rice noodles according to package instructions. Drain and set aside. Step 2. In a pan, heat some water and sauté the sliced bell pepper and celery until tender. Step 3. Add the cooked noodles to the pan and toss well. Step 4. In a small bowl, whisk together lemon juice and milk. Pour the mixture over the noodles and vegetables. Step 5. Season with pepper to taste. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Creamy Potato and Broccoli Fritters
recipe.steps:
Step 1. In a large bowl, combine grated potato, broccoli florets, diced onion, and diced celery. Mix well to combine.
Step 2. In a separate bowl, mix together flour and a pinch of salt. Add the dry mixture to the potato mixture and mix until just combined.
Step 3. Using your hands, shape the mixture into small patties.
Step 4. Heat a large non-stick pan with butter over medium heat. When the butter has melted, add a few patties to the pan and cook until golden brown on each side, about 4-5 minutes.
Step 5. Remove the fritters from the pan and place them on a paper towel-lined plate to drain excess oil.
Step 6. Serve the fritters hot with your favorite dipping sauce.

recipe.name: Spicy Mushroom Gochujang Fried Rice
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cut the mushroom into small pieces and set aside. Step 2. In a small bowl, whisk together gochujang, sugar, and 1 tsp of flour. Step 3. Heat a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add a small amount of oil and scramble the eggs. Step 4. Add the mushroom to the skillet and cook until they start to soften. Step 5. Add the cooked rice to the skillet, breaking up any clumps with a spatula. Step 6. Pour the gochujang mixture over the rice and stir-fry everything together for about 2-3 minutes.

recipe.name: Shrimp and Asparagus Stir-Fry
main_ingredients: 1 bunch asparagus (trim and cut into 1-inch pieces)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chopped almonds and cook for 2-3 minutes until lightly toasted. Remove from the skillet and set aside. Step 2. Add the shrimp to the skillet and cook for 2-3 minutes per side until pink and cooked through. Step 3. Remove the shrimp from the skillet and set aside with the almonds. Step 4. Add the asparagus to the skillet and cook for 3-5 minutes until tender but still crisp. Step 5. In a small bowl, whisk together soy sauce and garlic powder. Pour the sauce over the asparagus and stir to coat. Step 6. Return the shrimp and almonds to the skillet and stir to combine with the asparagus and sauce. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Sardine and Black Bean Bowl
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Rinse the rice and soak it in water for 30 minutes. Drain and set aside.
Step 2. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a pan over medium heat. Add the sliced mushroom and cook until tender.
Step 3. Add the sardines to the pan and sear for 3-4 minutes on each side. Set aside.
Step 4. In a large bowl, combine the cooked rice, black beans, almonds, and cucumber. Top with the pan-seared sardines.
Step 5. Serve immediately and garnish with sliced cucumber.

recipe.name: Spaghetti Bolognese with Ground Beef and Cucumber Salsa
recipe.steps: Step 1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil and cook the pasta according to the package instructions. Drain and set aside. Step 2. In a large skillet, heat a couple of tablespoons of oil over medium-high heat. Add the ground beef and cook, breaking it up with a spoon, until it's browned and cooked through. Step 3. While the ground beef is cooking, finely chop the cucumber and mix it with a squeeze of lemon juice and a pinch of salt. Step 4. In a large serving bowl, combine the cooked pasta, ground beef, and cucumber salsa. Step 5. Season with salt, pepper, and a sprinkle of parmesan cheese (optional). Serve immediately.

recipe.name: Carrot Fritters
recipe.steps: Step 1. In a large bowl, combine chopped carrots and onion. Sift in flour and mix well. Add olive oil, salt, and pepper, and stir until a thick batter forms. Step 2. Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat. Using a spoon, drop small amounts of the carrot mixture onto the pan to form fritters. Step 3. Cook the fritters for 3-4 minutes on each side, until they are golden brown. Step 4. Remove the fritters from the pan and place them on a paper towel-lined plate to drain excess oil. Step 5. Serve the carrot fritters hot with your favorite dipping sauce.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Steak with Asparagus and Nutritional Yeast Crust
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Step 2. In a small bowl, mix together nutritional yeast, sugar, and minced garlic. Step 3. Season the beef steak with salt and pepper. Step 4. Coat the beef steak with the nutritional yeast mixture, pressing gently to adhere. Step 5. Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the coated beef steak and sear for 2-3 minutes per side. Step 6. Transfer the skillet to the preheated oven and cook for 8-10 minutes or until the desired level of doneness. Step 7. Meanwhile, toss the asparagus with a drizzle of oil and season with salt and pepper. Spread on a separate baking sheet and roast in the oven for 12-15 minutes or until tender. Step 8. Let the steak rest for 5 minutes before slicing. Serve with roasted asparagus and a lamb chop on the side.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Bok Choy with Ground Beef and Squid
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 2 tbsp olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it up with a spoon as it cooks. Set aside. Step 2. In the same skillet, add the remaining 2 tbsp olive oil. Add the squid and cook for 2-3 minutes per side, until opaque and cooked through. Step 3. Add the bok choy to the skillet and cook for 2-3 minutes per side, until tender but still crisp. Step 4. Return the cooked ground beef to the skillet and stir to combine with the squid and bok choy. Step 5. Season with salt and pepper to taste, then serve hot.

recipe.name: Roasted Bok Choy and Tofu
main_ingredients: 1 block of extra-firm tofu (cut into 1-inch cubes)
2 bunches of bok choy (cut into 1-inch pieces)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
Toss the tofu cubes with 1 tablespoon of olive oil, salt, and pepper on a baking sheet. Roast in the oven for 15-20 minutes, or until golden brown.

Step 2. Toss the bok choy and potatoes with the remaining 1 tablespoon of olive oil, salt, and pepper on a separate baking sheet. Roast in the oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender.

Step 3. In a pan over medium heat, sauté the minced garlic until fragrant.

Step 4. Once the tofu and vegetables are cooked, combine them in a bowl and toss with the sautéed garlic. Serve hot.

Step 5. Garnish with chopped green onions if desired.

recipe.name: Roasted Vegetable Pasta
main_ingredients: flour (1 cup) - used to thicken sauce
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
Step 2. Peel the potatoes and cut them into 1-inch cubes.
Step 3. Cut the broccoli, bell pepper, and onion into bite-sized pieces.
Step 4. In a large bowl, toss the vegetables with olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Step 5. Spread the vegetables on a baking sheet and roast for 20-25 minutes or until tender.
Step 6. Cook the pasta according to package instructions.
Step 7. In a blender or food processor, blend the roasted vegetables with 1 cup of milk to create a sauce.
Step 8. Add the flour to the sauce and blend until smooth.
Step 9. Serve the sauce over the cooked pasta.

recipe.name: Cashew Crusted Sweet Potato Hash
main_ingredients: 2 large sweet potatoes, peeled and diced
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). Step 2. Toss the diced sweet potatoes and potatoes with olive oil, salt, and pepper on a baking sheet. Step 3. Roast in the oven for 20 minutes, or until tender. Step 4. In a food processor, blend the chopped cashews and garlic until crumbly. Step 5. Spread the roasted sweet potatoes and potatoes on a clean surface and sprinkle the cashew mixture on top.

recipe.name: Garlic Roasted Bell Pepper Pasta
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). Step 2. Toss bell pepper slices with a tablespoon of olive oil, salt, and pepper. Spread on a baking sheet and roast for 15-20 minutes. Step 3. Cook pasta according to package instructions. Step 4. In a pan, heat a tablespoon of olive oil over medium heat. Add minced garlic and sauté for 1 minute. Step 5. Combine cooked pasta, roasted bell peppers, and garlic in a bowl. Toss with a drizzle of olive oil and serve.

recipe.name: Grilled Vegetable Skewers with Prosciutto
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Step 2. Alternate threading prosciutto slices, carrot chunks, bell pepper chunks, and lettuce leaves onto skewers. Step 3. Brush skewers with olive oil (not in inventory, omit) and season with salt and pepper. Step 4. Grill skewers for 10-12 minutes, turning occasionally, until prosciutto is crispy and vegetables are tender. Step 5. Serve skewers with a squeeze of fresh lime juice.
recipe.note: No special notes

recipe.name: Spanish-Style Omelette
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat. Add 1 tablespoon of oil and sauté the chopped onion for 2-3 minutes until translucent. Step 2. Add the diced pepper and cook for another 2-3 minutes. Step 3. Add the diced tomatoes and cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Step 4. In a separate bowl, beat the eggs and season with salt and pepper. Step 5. Pour the egg mixture over the vegetables in the pan and cook for 2-3 minutes until the eggs start to set. Step 6. Use a spatula to gently fold the omelette in half.

recipe.name: Mediterranean Garlic Spinach Stuffed Mushrooms
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
      Step 2. In a pan, heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil over medium heat.
      Step 3. Add the minced garlic and sauté for 2 minutes until fragrant.
      Step 4. Add the chopped spinach and cook until wilted.
      Step 5. Stuff each mushroom cap with the spinach and garlic mixture.
      Step 6. Season with salt and bake in the oven for 15-20 minutes.

recipe.name: Lime and Carrot Stir Fry
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 2 tbsp of oil in a wok over medium-high heat. Add the tofu and cook until golden brown. Remove and set aside.
 Step 2. In the same wok, add the sliced mushrooms and bell peppers. Cook until tender, about 5 minutes.
 Step 3. Add the sliced carrots and cook for another 3-4 minutes, or until they start to soften.
 Step 4. Squeeze the juice of one lime into the wok and stir to combine. Add the cooked tofu back into the wok and stir-fry everything together.
 Step 5. Season with salt and black pepper to taste, and serve immediately.
 Step 6. Garnish with the juice of the second lime, cut into wedges.

recipe.name: Mexican Cumin Chicken with Lime
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). Season chicken breast with cumin and oregano.
                Step 2. In a baking dish, add the chicken breast and bake for 15-20 minutes or until cooked through.
                Step 3. In a separate pan, heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat. Add corn and cook for 5 minutes or until slightly charred.
                Step 4. Squeeze lime juice over the cooked chicken and corn.
                Step 5. Serve the Mexican Cumin Chicken with Lime and corn together.

recipe.name: Vegan Edamame Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat oil in a pan over medium heat. Step 2. Add the sliced bell pepper and cook for 3-4 minutes until slightly tender. Step 3. Add the sliced cucumber and cook for another 3-4 minutes until tender. Step 4. Add the edamame and cook for 2-3 minutes until heated through. Step 5. Stir in peanuts and season with salt to taste. Step 6. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Chicken Pasta Primavera
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil and cook pasta according to package instructions. Reserve 1 cup of pasta water before draining.
 Step 2. In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium-high heat. Add diced onion and cook until translucent, about 3-4 minutes.
 Step 3. Add chicken breast to the skillet and cook until browned on both sides and cooked through, about 5-6 minutes. Transfer to a plate and cover with foil.
 Step 4. To the same skillet, add the reserved pasta water and stir to deglaze the pan. Add the cooked pasta and toss with the onion mixture.
 Step 5. Add the cooked chicken back into the skillet, tossing with the pasta to combine. Season with salt, pepper, and a squeeze of lime juice. Serve immediately, garnished with chopped lettuce.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Brussels Sprouts and Bok Choy Stir-Fry with Mackerel
main_ingredients: 2 cups bok choy (stem removed and chopped)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the mackerel pieces and cook for 2-3 minutes per side or until cooked through. Remove from the pan and set aside.Step 2. In the same pan, add the remaining 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil. Add the minced garlic and cook for 30 seconds.Step 3. Add the halved brussels sprouts to the pan and cook for 5 minutes or until they start to brown, stirring occasionally.Step 4. Add the chopped bok choy to the pan and cook for an additional 2 minutes or until the vegetables are tender.Step 5. Return the cooked mackerel to the pan and stir in the soy sauce. Cook for an additional 1 minute. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Tilapia with Edamame and Peanuts
recipe.steps: Step 1. Rinse the tilapia fillets and pat them dry with paper towels. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Step 2. Heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the tilapia fillets and cook for 3-4 minutes on each side, or until cooked through. Step 3. In a separate pan, heat the remaining tablespoon of olive oil over medium heat. Add the peanuts and cook, stirring frequently, until fragrant and lightly toasted. Step 4. In a separate saucepan, boil water and cook the edamame according to package instructions. Step 5. To serve, place a cooked tilapia fillet on each plate, top with a spoonful of edamame, and sprinkle with toasted peanuts.

recipe.name: Crab and Mackerel Tempura with Almond Sauce
recipe.steps:
Step 1: Slice the mackerel and crab into thin pieces. In a shallow dish, mix 1/2 cup all-purpose flour, 1/4 teaspoon salt, and 1/4 teaspoon black pepper. Dredge the mackerel and crab pieces in the flour mixture to coat. Set aside.
 Step 2: In a separate shallow dish, mix 1/2 cup water with 1/4 cup ice-cold soda water. 
 Step 3: Dip the floured mackerel and crab pieces into the water mixture to coat completely. 
 Step 4: Heat 1/2 inch (1 cm) of vegetable oil in a deep frying pan over medium-high heat. When the oil is hot, add a few pieces of the coated mackerel and crab to the pan. Fry until golden brown, about 2-3 minutes. Drain on paper towels. Repeat with the remaining pieces. 
 Step 5: In a blender or food processor, combine 1/2 cup almonds, 2 cloves garlic, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, 1/4 cup water, and salt to taste. Blend until smooth to make the almond sauce. Serve the tempura with the almond sauce.

recipe.name: Edamame and Bell Pepper Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a pan over medium-high heat. Add the sliced chicken breast and cook until browned, then set aside. Step 2. In the same pan, add the sliced sweet potato and cook for 3-4 minutes until slightly tender. Step 3. Add the sliced bell pepper and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes until tender. Step 4. Add the cooked chicken back into the pan and stir in the cooked edamame and chopped lettuce. Step 5. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

recipe.name: Vegan Lentil and Vegetable Stew
recipe.steps: Step 1. In a large pot, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Step 2. Add the diced sweet potato, chopped broccoli, and chopped green beans. Cook until the vegetables are tender, about 10 minutes. Step 3. Add the lentils, water, and chopped almonds to the pot. Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for 20 minutes. Step 4. Use a fork to mash some of the lentils against the side of the pot to thicken the stew. Step 5. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Thai Peanut Stir Fry
main_ingredients: peanuts (1/2 cup), peanut oil (2 tbsp), onion (1 medium), bell pepper (1 medium), tofu (1 block)
spinach (1 cup), soy sauce (2 tbsp), sesame oil (1 tsp)
recipe.steps: Step 1. Cut the onion and bell pepper into thin slices. Heat 1 tablespoon of peanut oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the onion and bell pepper and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes until they start to soften.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Cod with Lobster and Potato
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Rinse the cod fillet under cold water, pat dry with paper towels, and set aside. Rinse the lobster tails under cold water, pat dry, and set aside. Cut the potato slices into thinner rounds, and place in a bowl of cold water to prevent browning. 
Step 2. In a large skillet, heat 1 tbsp of olive oil over medium heat. Add the potato slices and cook for 3-4 minutes per side, until golden brown and crispy. 
Step 3. Remove the potato slices from the skillet, and set aside on a plate. In the same skillet, add the remaining 1 tbsp of olive oil. 
Step 4. Place the cod fillet in the skillet, skin side up (if it has skin). Cook for 3-4 minutes, or until the skin is crispy and golden brown. Flip the cod over, and cook for an additional 3-4 minutes, or until cooked through. 
Step 5. Meanwhile, in a separate skillet, melt 1 tbsp of butter over medium heat. Add the lobster tails, and cook for 2-3 minutes per side, or until cooked through. Serve the cod and lobster with the potato slices.

recipe.name: Tofu and Cod Stir Fry with Ground Beef
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add the ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks.
Step 2. Add the cubed tofu and cook until it starts to brown, about 3-4 minutes.
Step 3. Add the cod and cook until it's cooked through, about 4-5 minutes.
Step 4. Add the mixed greens, sliced bell peppers, and minced garlic to the skillet. Stir-fry until the vegetables are tender-crisp.
Step 5. Serve the tofu and cod mixture over a bed of the stir-fried greens and bell peppers.
recipe.note: This recipe highlights the requested ingredients and showcases a flavor combination that's both Asian-inspired and hearty.

recipe.name: Pescatarian Pasta with Spinach and Eggplant
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil and cook the pasta according to package instructions.
Step 2. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and sauté for 1-2 minutes until fragrant.
Step 3. Add the sliced eggplant to the skillet and cook for 3-4 minutes until tender and lightly browned.
Step 4. Add the chopped spinach and sliced cucumber to the skillet and cook until the spinach has wilted. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Step 5. Combine the cooked pasta, eggplant mixture, and toss to combine.
Step 6. Serve hot and enjoy!

recipe.name: Beef and Broccoli Fried Rice
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 1 tbsp vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it apart into small pieces as it cooks.
Step 2. Push the beef to one side of the skillet. Crack in an egg and scramble it. Mix the egg into the beef.
Step 3. Add 1 tbsp vegetable oil if needed and add diced onion, mushrooms, and broccoli to the skillet. Cook until the vegetables are tender.
Step 4. Add cooked rice to the skillet, breaking up any clumps with a spatula. Stir-fry for 2-3 minutes.
Step 5. Add diced tomato to the skillet and stir-fry for another minute. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Roasted Broccoli Delight
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C). Rinse the broccoli and trim the ends. Cut into florets and place on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Step 2. Roast the broccoli in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until tender and slightly caramelized. Step 3. Remove the broccoli from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes. Step 4. Serve the roasted broccoli hot, garnished with chopped fresh herbs if desired. Step 5. Enjoy your delicious roasted broccoli!
recipe.note: This recipe uses only the ingredients available in your inventory. We're missing milk, eggs, and lime. Let's add them to our shopping list!

recipe.name: Roasted Vegetable Medley
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C). Wash and chop the vegetables into bite-sized pieces. Step 2. In a large bowl, toss together the potatoes, bell peppers, garlic, and celery. Step 3. Drizzle the vegetables with olive oil and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Step 4. Spread the vegetables on a baking sheet in a single layer. Step 5. Roast the vegetables in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until tender and lightly browned. Step 6. Garnish with chopped lettuce and serve.

recipe.name: Vegetarian Sweet Potato and Cheese Gratin
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F). Step 2. Pierce the sweet potatoes with a fork a few times and bake for 30 minutes, or until tender. Step 3. Slice the sweet potatoes into 1/2-inch rounds. Step 4. In a separate pan over medium heat, crumble the cheddar cheese and stir occasionally until it's slightly golden brown. Step 5. In a greased 9x13-inch baking dish, arrange a layer of sweet potato slices. Top with a layer of the browned cheddar cheese, followed by another layer of sweet potato slices. Repeat this process until all the ingredients are used, finishing with a layer of cheese on top. Step 6. Bake for an additional 15-20 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.

recipe.name: Basmati Rice and Chickpea Biryani
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil in a large pan over medium heat. Add mustard seeds and let them sizzle for 1 minute. Add chopped onion and sauté until translucent.

recipe.name: Pan-Seared Chicken and Tofu Stir-Fry
main_ingredients: 1 block of tofu, drained and cut into bite-sized pieces
200g of chicken breast, cut into bite-sized pieces
500g of brussels sprouts, trimmed and halved
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chicken breast and cook until browned, about 5 minutes. Step 2. Add the tofu to the skillet and cook for an additional 3-4 minutes, until browned. Step 3. Remove the chicken and tofu from the skillet and set aside. Step 4. Add the sliced onion to the skillet and cook until softened, about 3-4 minutes. Step 5. Add the sliced zucchinis, grated carrot, and halved brussels sprouts to the skillet. Cook, stirring occasionally, until the vegetables are tender-crisp, about 5-6 minutes. Step 6. Return the chicken and tofu to the skillet and stir to combine with the vegetables. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Spaghetti Aglio e Olio
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil and cook the pasta according to the package instructions until al dente. Reserve 1 cup of pasta water and then drain the spaghetti.
Step 2. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium-high heat. Add the diced pork and cook until browned, about 3-4 minutes. Remove the pork from the skillet and set aside.
Step 3. Add the diced potato and eggplant to the skillet and cook until they start to soften, about 5 minutes.
Step 4. Add the reserved pasta water to the skillet and stir to combine with the potato and eggplant mixture.
Step 5. Add the cooked pasta to the skillet, toss to combine with the potato and eggplant mixture, and season with salt and pepper to taste.

recipe.name: Italian Chicken Pasta Salad
main_ingredients: 1 lb chicken breast (cut into bite-sized pieces)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Cook pasta according to package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside. 
Step 2. In a large skillet, heat a couple of tablespoons of oil over medium-high heat. Add the chicken breast and cook until browned on both sides and cooked through. 
Step 3. In a separate pan, sauté diced celery and arugula in a little oil until tender. 
Step 4. Add diced tomatoes to the pan with celery and arugula, and cook for a few minutes until heated through. 
Step 5. Combine cooked pasta, chicken, and vegetable mixture in a large bowl. Sprinkle with chopped oregano and serve hot.

recipe.name: Vegan Tofu Stir Fry
main_ingredients: 1 block of tofu (cut into small cubes)
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat 2 tbsp of oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add the tofu and cook until golden brown, about 5 minutes. Remove from the skillet and set aside.
Step 2. In the same skillet, add another tablespoon of oil if necessary. Add the minced garlic and cook for 1 minute, until fragrant.
Step 3. Add the chopped kale, sliced carrot, and trimmed green beans to the skillet. Cook until the vegetables are tender, about 5 minutes.
Step 4. Add the shredded cabbage and diced tomato to the skillet. Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, until the vegetables are tender.
Step 5. Return the cooked tofu to the skillet and stir to combine with the vegetables. Cook for an additional 2 minutes, until heated through.
Step 6. Serve the vegan stir fry hot, garnished with additional kale or green beans if desired.

recipe.name: Palak Chicken
recipe.steps:
Step 1. Heat oil in a pan and sauté the chicken breast until it's browned. Set aside.
Step 2. Boil the potatoes until they're tender. Mash them and keep aside.
Step 3. In the same pan, add a little more oil and sauté the tomato until it's soft.
Step 4. Add turmeric, spinach, and a pinch of salt to the pan and sauté until the spinach is wilted.
Step 5. Add the cooked chicken and mashed potatoes to the pan and stir well.
Step 6. Serve hot garnished with fresh herbs.

recipe.name: Black Bean and Mushroom Stir Fry
recipe.steps: Step 1. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the tempeh and cook until golden brown, about 5 minutes. Step 2. Remove the tempeh from the skillet and set aside. Step 3. Add another tablespoon of oil to the skillet and cook the mixed mushrooms until they release their liquid and start browning, about 5 minutes. Step 4. Add the kidney beans to the skillet and stir to combine with the mushrooms. Step 5. Add the cooked tempeh back into the skillet and stir to combine. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

recipe.name: Grilled Chicken Fajitas
recipe.steps: Step 1. Slice the onion and pepper into thin strips. Step 2. Marinate the chicken breast in a mixture of lime juice and a pinch of salt for 10 minutes. Step 3. Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat and add the sliced onion and pepper. Cook for 5 minutes until tender. Step 4. Add the marinated chicken breast to the skillet and cook for 5-6 minutes per side or until cooked through. Step 5. Serve the chicken breast with the sautéed onion and pepper and a side of lettuce and tomato.

recipe.name: Paleo American Grilled Sweet Potato and Eggplant
recipe.steps: Step 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. In a large bowl, toss the sweet potato and eggplant slices with olive oil, smoked paprika, and garlic powder until well coated. Step 2. Grill the sweet potato and eggplant slices for 5-7 minutes per side, or until tender and slightly charred. Step 3. While the sweet potato and eggplant are grilling, chop the lettuce into a salad bowl. Step 4. Once the sweet potato and eggplant are done, chop them into bite-sized pieces and add them to the salad bowl. Step 5. Serve immediately and enjoy!
